T07vakobhau:3: tasmai namaskṛtya yathārthaśāstre śāstraṃ pravakṣyāmyabhidharmakośam // VAkK_1.1 // [001/08]
T07vakobhau:4: śāstraṃ praṇetukāmaḥ svasya śāsturmāhātmyajñāpanārthaṃ guṇākhyānapūrvakaṃ tasmai namaskāramārabhate ya iti / [001/09-001/10]
T07vakobhau:8: tacca bhagavato buddhasya pratipakṣalābhenātyantaṃ sarvathā sarvatra jñeye punaranutpattidharmatvāddhatam / [001/12]
T07vakobhau:13: tatha hyeṣāṃ buddhadharmeṣvativiprakṛṣṭadeśakāleṣu artheṣu cānantaprabhedeṣu bhavatyevākliṣṭamajñānam / [001/15-001/16]
T07vakobhau:14: ityātmahitapratipattisaṃpadā saṃstutya punastameva bhagavantaṃ parahitapratipattisaṃpadā saṃstauti saṃsārapaṅkājjagadujjahāreti / [001/17]
T07vakobhau:17: iti ya evamātmaparahitapratipattisaṃpadā yuktastasmai namaskṛtyeti śirasā praṇipatya / [001/20]
T07vakobhau:21: tasmai namaskṛtya kiṃ kariṣyāmī tyāha śāstraṃ pravakṣyāmi / [002/01]
T07vakobhau:33: yāpi ca śrutacintābhāvanāmayī sāsravā prajñā upapattipratilambhikā ca sānucarā / [002/09-002/10]
T07vakobhau:34: yacca śāstramasyāḥ prāptyarthamanāsravāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ tadapi tatsaṃbhārabhāvādabhidharma ityucyate / [002/10]
T07vakobhau:36: tadayaṃ paramārthadharmaṃ vā nirvāṇaṃ dharmalakṣaṇaṃ vā pratyabhimukho dharma ityabhidharmaḥ / [002/12]
T07vakobhau:41: sa hi śāstrasaṃjñako 'bhidharma etasminnarthato yathāpradhānamantarbhūta ityetacchāstraṃ tasya kośasthānīyaṃ bhavati / [002/16]
T07vakobhau:45: kimarthaṃ punarabhidharmopadeśaḥ kena cāyaṃ prathamata upadiṣṭo yaṭa ācāryo 'bhidharmakośaṃ vaktumādriyata iti // [002/19]
T07vakobhau:47: dharmāṇāṃ pravicayamantareṇa nāsti kleśānāṃ yata upaśāntaye 'bhyupāyaḥ /
T07vakobhau:48: kleśaiśca bhramati bhavārṇave 'tra lokastaddhetorata uditaḥ kilaiṣa śāstrā // VAkK_1.3 // [002/24]
T07vakobhau:51: atastaddhetostasya dharmapravicayasyārthe śāstrā kila buddhenābhidharma uktaḥ / [003/02]
T07vakobhau:52: nahi vinā 'bhidharmopadeśena śiṣyaḥ śakto dharmān pravicetumiti / [003/03-003/04]
T07vakobhau:53: sa tu prakīrṇa ukto bhagavatā bhadantakātyāyanīputra-prabhṛtibhiḥ piṇḍīkṛtya sthapitobhadanta dharmatrāto dānavargīyakaraṇavadityāhurvaibhāṣikāḥ
T07vakobhau:54: katame punaste dharmā yeṣāṃ pravicayārthamabhidharmopadeśa ityāha [003/06]
T07vakobhau:63: kāmaṃ nirodhamārgasatyālambanā api āsravā upajāyante na tinuśerate tatreti na tayoḥ sāsravatvaprasañgaḥ / [003/13-003/14]
T07vakobhau:64: yathā 'tra nānuśerate tat paścādanuśayanirdeśa eva jñāpayiṣyāmaḥ / [003/14]
T07vakobhau:80: duḥkhādīnāmāryasatyānāṃ pratisaṃkhyānaṃ pratisaṃkhyā prajñāviśeṣastena prāpyo nirodhaḥ / [004/02]
T07vakobhau:83: kiṃ punareka eva sarveṣāṃ sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ /
T07vakobhau:88: anyathā hi duḥkhadarśanaheyakleśanirodhasākṣātk karaṇāt sarvakleśanirodhasākṣātkriyā prasajyeta / [004/08-004/09]
T07vakobhau:91: nāsya kaścit sabhāgaheturasti nāsau kasyacidityayamasya vākyasyārtho na tu nāsya kaśicat sabhāgo 'stīti / [004/11]
T07vakobhau:94: anāgatānāṃ dharmāṇāmutpādasyātyantaṃ vighnabhūto visaṃyogād yo 'nyo nirodhaḥ so 'pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ / [004/14]
T07vakobhau:98: yathaikarūpavyāsaktacakṣurmanaso yāni rūpāṇi śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyāni cātyayante tadālambanaiḥ pañcabhirvijñānakāyairna śakyaṃ punarutpattum
T07vakobhau:99: na hi te satyā atītaṃ viṣayamālambayi tulmiti / [004/17]
T07vakobhau:102: santi te dharmā yeṣāṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodha eva labhyate / [004/19]
T07vakobhau:114: rūpaskandho vedanāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandho vijñānaskandhaścetyete saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ / [004/27]
T07vakobhau:115: sametya saṃbhūya pratyayaiḥ kṛtāḥ iti saṃskṛtāḥ /
T07vakobhau:118: ta evādhvā kathāvastu saniḥsārāḥ savastukāḥ (1-7c-7d) // VAkK_1.7 // [005/03]
T07vakobhau:119: ta eva saṃskṛtā gatagacchadgamiṣyadbhāvādadhvānaḥ adyante 'nitayatyeti vā / [005/03-005/04]
T07vakobhau:132: ya upādānaskandhāḥ skandhā api te syuḥ eva nopādānaskandhāḥ / [005/11]
T07vakobhau:138: upādānāni vā tebhyaḥ saṃbhavantīti upādānaskandhāḥ puṣpaphalavṛkṣavat / [005/13-005/14]
T07vakobhau:146: duḥkhaṃ samudayo loko dṛṣṭisthānaṃ bhavaśca te (1-8c-8d) // VAkK_1.8 // [005/18]
T07vakobhau:157: pañcārthāsteṣāmevacakṣurādīnāmindriyāṇāṃ yathāsvaṃ ye pañca viṣayāḥ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyākhyāḥ / [005/25]
T07vakobhau:160: tatra ya ete pañca rūpādayo 'rthā uktāḥ / [005/27]
T07vakobhau:162: rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyavijñānānāmāśrayabhūtā ye pañca rūpātmakāḥ prasādāste yathākramaṃ cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyā veditavyāḥ / [006/02-006/03]
T07vakobhau:163: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā “cakṣurbhikṣo ādhyātmikamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya” rūpa prasāda iti vistaraḥ / [006/03-006/04]
T07vakobhau:179: tadyathā nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitamavadātaṃ dīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ vṛttaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ unnatamavanataṃ sātaṃ visātaṃ abhraṃ dhūmo rajo mahikā cchāyā ātapaḥ ālokaḥ andhakāramiti / [006/13-006/14]
T07vakobhau:188: asti rūpāyatanaṃ varṇato vidyate na saṃsthānataḥ [006/17-006/18]
T07vakobhau:210: sa tu yathaikau varṇaparamāṇurna bhūtacatuṣkadvayamupādāyeṣyate tathā naivaiṣṭavya iti / [007/01]
T07vakobhau:221: catvāri mahābhūtāni ślakṣṇatvaṃ karkaśatvaṃ gurutvaṃ laghutvaṃ śītaṃ jighatsā pipāsā ceti / [007/10]
T07vakobhau:232: sukhā saṅghasya sāmagrī samagrāṇāṃ tapaḥ sukhaṃ” // iti / [007/15]
T07vakobhau:235: yadyapi tatra vastrāṇyekaśo na tulyante sañcitāni punastulyante / [007/16]
T07vakobhau:238: yadetadbahuvidhaṃ rūpamuktaṃ tatra kadācidekena dravyeṇa cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate yadā tatprakāravyavacchedo bhavati / [007/19]
T07vakobhau:240: tadyathā senāvyūhamanekavarṇasaṃsthānaṃ maṇisamūhaṃ ca dūrāt paśyataḥ / [007/20]
T07vakobhau:242: kāyavijñānaṃ tu paraṃ pañcabhiḥ spraṣṭavyairutpadyata ityeke / [007/21-007/22]
T07vakobhau:245: nanu caivaṃ samastālambanatvāt sāmānyaviṣayāḥ pañca vijñānakāyāḥ prāpnuvanti na svalakṣaṇaviṣayāḥ / [007/23-007/24]
T07vakobhau:246: āyatanasvalakṣaṇaṃ pratyete svalakṣaṇaviṣayā iṣyante na dravyasvalakṣaṇamityadoṣaḥ / [007/25]
T07vakobhau:248: kāyajihvendriyayoryugapad viṣayaprāptau satyāṃ katarad vijñānaṃ pūrvamutpadyate / [007/26]
T07vakobhau:252: uktāḥ pañācendriyārthāḥ yathā ca teṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ / [007/29]
T07vakobhau:266: rūpakriyāsvabhāvāpi satī vijñaptivat paraṃ na vijñāpayatītyavijñaptiḥ / [008/09-008/09
T07vakobhau:271: ityete catvāraḥ svalakṣaṇopādāyarūpadhāraṇād dhātavaścatvāri mahābhūtāny ucyante / [008/14]
T07vakobhau:274: te punahete dhātavaḥ kasmin karmaṇi saṃsidhāḥ kiṃsvabhāvāścetyāha [008/17]
T07vakobhau:286: “vāyudhātuḥ katamo laghusamudīraṇatvam” iti prakāraṇeṣu nirdiṣṭaṃ sūtre ca / [008/23-008/24]
T07vakobhau:288: ato ya īraṇāsvabhāvo dharmaḥ sa vāyuriti karṃaṇā 'sya svabhāvo 'bhivyaktaḥ / [008/26]
T07vakobhau:289: kaḥ punaḥ pṛthivyādināṃ pṛthivīdhātvādīnāṃ ca viśeṣaḥ / [009/01]
T07vakobhau:291: tathā hi pṛthivīṃ darśayanto varṇaṃ saṃsthānaṃ ca darśayanti /
T07vakobhau:296: ya eva tu vāyudhātuḥ sa eva loke vāyuarityucyate / [009/07]
T07vakobhau:298: yathā pṛthivī varṇasaṃsthānamucyate lokasaṃjñayā tatha vāyuarapi / [009/08-009/09]
T07vakobhau:302: uktaṃ bhagavatā “rūpyate rupyata iti bhikṣavastasmādrūpopādānasdandha ityucyate // [009/11-009/12]
T07vakobhau:308: te kāmā na samṛdhyanti śalyaviddha iva rūpyate //“ [009/16]
T07vakobhau:316: tadapi rūpitaṃ rūpayiṣyamāṇaṃ tajjātīyaṃ ceti rūpamindhanavat / [009/19-009/20]
T07vakobhau:324: avijñaptirhi cchāyeva vṛkṣaṃ prabheva maṇiṃ bhūtānyāśrtya varttate / [009/24-009/25]
T07vakobhau:325: na tvevaṃ cakṣurādīnyāśritya varttante cakṣurvijñānādīni kevalaṃ tūtpattinimiktamātraṃ tāni teṣāṃ bhavantīti / [009/25-009/26]
T07vakobhau:326: idaṃ tāvadavaibhāṣikīyaṃ vṛkṣamāśritya cchāyā varttate maṇiṃ cāśritya prabheti / [009/26-010/01]
T07vakobhau:330: niruddheṣvapi avijña ptyāśayeṣu mahābhūteṣu tasyā anirodho 'bhyupagamyate / [010/02-010/03]
T07vakobhau:332: anye punaratra parihāramāhuḥ cakṣurvijñānādīnāmāśrayo bhedaṃ gataḥ / [010/04]
T07vakobhau:333: kaṣcidrūpyate cakṣurādiḥ kaścinna rūpyate yathā manaḥ / [010/05]
T07vakobhau:340: dhātuvyavasthāyāṃ ta eva daśadhātavaścakṣurchātū rūpadhāturyāvat kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyadhāturiti / [010/11]
T07vakobhau:348: sa punarbhidyamānaḥ ṣaḍ vedanākāyāḥ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā yāvamvanaḥsaṃsparśajā vedaneti / [010/16]
T07vakobhau:354: bhagavatā tu sūtre ṣaṭ cetanākāyā ityuktaṃ prādhānyāt / [010/21-010/22]
T07vakobhau:357: tasmāt saṃskārā upādānaskandha ity ucyata” iti [010/23-010/25]
T07vakobhau:358: anyathā hi śeṣāṇāṃ caitasikānāṃ viprayuktānāṃ ca saṃskārāṇāṃ skandhāsaṃgrahādduḥkhasamudayasatyatvaṃ na syāditi parijñāparihāṇe api na syātām/
T07vakobhau:359: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā “nāhamekadharmamapi anabhijñāyāparijñāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāṃ vadāmīti / [010/26]
T07vakobhau:367: viṣayaṃ viṣayaṃ prati vijñaptirupalabdhirvijñāna skandha ityucyate / [011/07-011/08]
T07vakobhau:368: sa punaḥ ṣaḍ vijñānakāyāḥ cakṣurvijñānaṃ yāvanmanovijñānamiti / [011/08-011/09]
T07vakobhau:376: evamatra pañca skandhā dvādaśāyatanāni aṣṭādaśa dhātavo nirddiṣṭā bhavaṇti / [011/16-011/17]
T07vakobhau:378: vedanā dayaḥ skandhāstrayo “vijñaptirasaṃskṛtāni ca dharmāyatanaṃ dharmadhātuśca vijñānaskandho mana āyatanaṃ ṣaḍ vijñānadhātavo manodhātuśceti
T07vakobhau:379: nanu ca ṣaḍ vijñānakāyā vijñānaskandha ityuktam / [011/19-011/20]
T07vakobhau:380: atha ko “yaṃ punastebhyo “nyo manodhātuḥ na khalu kaścidanyaḥ / [011/20]
T07vakobhau:385: tadyathā sa eva putro “nyasya pitā bhavati tadeva phalamanyasya bījamiti / [011/23-011/25]
T07vakobhau:386: evaṃ tarhi dravyataḥ saptadaśa dhātavo bhavanti dvādaśa vā ṣaḍvijñānadhātumanodhātūnāmitaretarāntarbhāvāditi kasmādaṣṭādāśa vyavasthāpyante
T07vakobhau:393: arhatastarhi caramaṃ cittam na mano bhaviṣyati / [012/02]
T07vakobhau:403: rūpaskandhena mana āyatanena dharmadhātunā ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃgraho boddhavyaḥ / [012/08-012/09]
T07vakobhau:404: sa khalveṣa saṃgraho yatra kvaciducyamāno veditavyaḥ / [012/10]
T07vakobhau:411: tadyathā cakṣurindriyaṃ rūpaskandhena cakṣurāyatanadhātubhyāṃ ca duḥkhasamudayasatyābhyāṃ ca saṃgṛhītam / [012/15]
T07vakobhau:414: yastvanyenānyasya saṃgraha ucyate yathā saṃgrahavastubhiḥ parṣadāṃ sa hi kādācitkatvāt sāṃketiko veditavyaḥ / [012/17]
T07vakobhau:427: ekadhātutve “pi tu cakṣurādīnaṃ dvayoḥ saṃbhava āśrayasya śobhārtham / [012/25-013/01]
T07vakobhau:430: idaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ kaḥ skandhāyatanadhātvartha iti / [013/04]
T07vakobhau:433: vā praṇītaṃ vā yadvā dūre antike tatsarvamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya rūpaskandha iti
T07vakobhau:434: saṃkhyāṃ gacchatī ti vacanāt sūtre rāśyarthaḥ skandhārtha iti siddham / [013/07-013/08]
T07vakobhau:443: yadapekṣyau dārikaṃ na jātu tadapekṣya sūkṣmaṃ pitāputravat /
T07vakobhau:464: yathaikasmin parvate bahūnyayastāmrarūpyasuvarṇādigotrāni dhātava ucyante evam ekasminnāśraye santāne vā aṣṭādaśa gotrāṇi aṣṭādaśa dhātava ucyante
T07vakobhau:471: aṣṭādaśdharmāṇāṃ jātayaḥ svabhāvā aṣṭādaśa dhātava iti / [013/24-013/25]
T07vakobhau:472: yadi rāśyarthaḥ skandhārthaḥ prajñaptisantaḥ skandhāḥ prāpnuvanti / [013/25]
T07vakobhau:476: na tarhi rāśyarthaḥ skandhārtha iti vaktavyam / [013/27]
T07vakobhau:480: tathāhi vaktāro bhavanti tribhiḥ skandhakairdeyaṃ dāsyāma iti /
T07vakobhau:491: ekaśaḥ samagrāṇāṃ kāraṇabhāvāt viṣayasahakāritvādvā nendriyaṃ pṛthagāyatanaṃ syāt / 01405-01405]
T07vakobhau:493: sa āha paramāṇurekasya dhātorekasyāyatanasyaikasya skandhasya pradeśaḥ / [014/06-014/07]
T07vakobhau:497: bhavati hi pradeśe “pi pradeśivadupacāro yathā paṭṭaiakadeśe dagdhe paṭo dagdha iti / [014/09]
T07vakobhau:512: kim punaḥ kāraṇaṃ caitasikā ekatra saṃskāraskandhanikṣiptā vedanāsaṃjñe tu pṛthak skandhīkṛte ityāha [014/17-014/18]
T07vakobhau:521: yacca skandhakrame kāraṇamupadekṣyamāṇaṃ tato 'pi kramakāraṇādanayoḥ pṛthakskandhīkaraṇaṃ veditavyam / [014/23]
T07vakobhau:534: yathā ghaṭoparamo na ghaṭa evaṃ skandhoparamo na skandho bhavitumarhatītyapare / [015/06-015/07]
T07vakobhau:541: tathā hi vyapadiśanti haste me vedanā pāde me vedaneti / [015/11]
T07vakobhau:544: athavā anādimati saṃsāre strīpuruṣā anyonyaṃ rūpābhirāmāste ca vedanāsvādagarddhāt / [015/13]
T07vakobhau:546: tadviparyāsaḥ kleśaiścittaṃ aca tatsaṃkliṣṭamiti yathāsaṃkleśaṃ ca kramaḥ / [015/14-015/15]
T07vakobhau:554: etā eva vijñānasthitayaḥ tāsu ca pratiṣṭhitaṃ vijñānamiti kṣetrabijasaṃdarśanārthaḥ skandhānukramaḥ / [015/18-015/19]
T07vakobhau:555: ata eva pañcaskandhā nālpīyāṃso na bhūyāṃsaḥ / [015/19-015/20]
T07vakobhau:556: ata eva ca kramakāraṇādvedanāsaṃjñe saṃskārebhyaḥ pṛthaka skandhīkṛte / [015/20-015/21]
T07vakobhau:557: yata ete audārikatare saṃkleśānukramahetū bhājanavyañjanabhūte tatprabhāvitaṃ ca dhātudvayamiti // [015/22]
T07vakobhau:579: tayorāśutaravṛttitvāt ghrāṇaṃ pūrvamuktamaprāptasyaiva jihvā bhojyasya gandhagrahaṇāt / [016/10]
T07vakobhau:586: manaḥ punastānyeva niśritamadeśasthaṃ ceti yathāsthānameṣāṃ kramaḥ syāt / [016/14]
T07vakobhau:587: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ daśasvāyataneṣu rūpaskandhasaṃgṛhīteṣvekaṃ rūpāyatanamucyate / [016/14-016/15]
T07vakobhau:592: yathā gamyeta pratyekameṣāṃ daśānāmāyatanatvaṃ viṣayaviṣayitvena vyavasthānaṃ na samastānāmiti / [016/19-016/20]
T07vakobhau:593: cakṣurādibhiśca viśeṣitairyanna cakṣurādisaṃjñakaṃ rūpaṃ ca tadrūpakayātanaṃ jñāsyata ityasya punarnāmāntaraṃ nocyate / [016/20-016/21]
T07vakobhau:598: idamihāmutreti nirūpaṇāt loke 'pi ca tadrūpamiti pratītaṃ nānyāni / [016/23]
T07vakobhau:604: anyānyapi skandhāyatanadhātusaṃśabditānyupalabhyante sūtreṣu teṣāṃ kiṃebhireva saṃgraho veditavya āhosvidvyatirekaḥ [017/05]
T07vakobhau:609: yeṣāṃ vāksvabhāvaṃ buddhavacanaṃ teṣāṃ tāni rūpaskandhasaṃgṛhītāni / [017/09]
T07vakobhau:626: ye 'pyanye skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ sūtrāntareṣūktāste 'pyeṣveva yathokteṣu skandhādiṣu pratiopādyāḥ svaṃ svaṃ lakṣaṇameṣāṃ yathāvihitamasmiṃacchāstre saṃpradharya / [017/26-018/02]
T07vakobhau:627: tatra tāvat pañcānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktijñānadarśanaskandhānāṃ śīlaskandho rūpaskandhena saṃgṛhītaḥ / [018/02-017/02]
T07vakobhau:639: ya ime tatra ṣaḍ dhātavaḥ uktāḥ pṛthivīdhāturabdhātustejodhāturvāyudhāturākāśadhāturvijñānadhāturityeṣāṃ dvayorlakṣaṇamanuktam / [018/11-018/12]
T07vakobhau:640: tat kimākāśamevākāśadhāturveditavyaḥ sarvaṃ aca vijñānaṃ vijñānadhātuḥ/ [018/12]
T07vakobhau:653: aghaṃ ca tadanyasya rūpasya tatrāpratighātātsāmantakaṃ cānyasya rūpasyetyapare / [018/20]
T07vakobhau:660: tadevaṃ satyeṣāṃ catvāro dhātavaḥ spraṣṭavyadhātāvantarbhūtāḥ pañcamo rūpadhātau ṣaṣṭhaḥ saptasu vijñānadhātuṣviti / [018/26]
T07vakobhau:661: ye punarime aṣṭādaśa dhātava uktāsteṣāṃ kati sanidarśanāḥ katyanidarśanāḥ / [019/01]
T07vakobhau:668: ya ete rūpaskandhasaṃgṛhītā daśa dhātava uktāste sapratighāḥ / [019/06-019/07]
T07vakobhau:669: pratigho nāma pratighātaḥ sa ca trividhaḥ / [019/07]
T07vakobhau:672: yathā hasto haste pratihanyate upale vā /
T07vakobhau:675: yathoktaṃ prajñaptā“vasti cakṣurjale pratihanyate na sthale / [019/10]
T07vakobhau:693: yasmin yasya kāritraṃ sa tasya viṣayaḥ / [019/17]
T07vakobhau:695: kaḥ punaḥ svasminviṣaye pravarttamānamālamvane vā pratihanyata ityucyate / [019/18]
T07vakobhau:697: nipāto vā 'tra pratighāto yā svaviṣaye pravṛttiḥ [019/19-019/20]
T07vakobhau:699: ye dharmā viṣayapratighātena sapratighā āvaraṇapratighātenāpi ta iti catuṣkoṭikaḥ [019/21]
T07vakobhau:700: prathamā koṭiḥ sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaśca yaḥ saṃprayuktaḥ / [019/22]
T07vakobhau:704: ye dharmā viśayapratighātena sapratighā ālambana pratighātenāpi ta iti / [019/24]
T07vakobhau:749: tasmādabhyavahāravītarāgāṇāṃ gandharasau tatra niṣprayojanau na tu spraṣṭavyam / [021/02]
T07vakobhau:753: ata eṣāmeva trayāṇāṃ dhyānopapattau saṃbhavo na gandharasayoriti / [021/04]
T07vakobhau:758: yadyetat prayojanamadhiṣṭhānamevāstu śobhārthaṃ vacanārthaṃ ca mā bhūdindriyam / [021/07]
T07vakobhau:779: yāni tatrendriyāṇi tairavikalā ahīnendriyā iti ko 'tra virodhaḥ / [021/16-021/17]
T07vakobhau:782: sta eva tatra ghrāṇajivhendriye na tu gandharasau / [021/18]
T07vakobhau:783: ātmabhāvamukhena hi ṣaḍāyatane tṛṣṇāsamudācāro na viṣayamukhena / [021/19]
T07vakobhau:787: rūpavītarāgāṇāṃ tatropapattirato 'tra daśa rūpasvabhāvā dhātavastadāśrrayālambanāśca pañca vijñānadhātāvo na saṃabhavanti // [021/23]
T07vakobhau:794: kati savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ katyavitarkā vicāramātrāḥ katyavitarkā avicārāḥ / [022/03]
T07vakobhau:801: tatra manodhāturmanovijñānadhātuḥ saṃprayuktaśca dharamadhāturanyatra vitarkavicārābhyāṃ kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ
T07vakobhau:806: kāmadhātau prathame dhyāne vicāra eṣu triprakāreṣu nāntarbhavati / [022/11-022/12]
T07vakobhau:816: daśa rupiṇo dhātavaḥ śeṣā nityamavitarkā avicārā asaṃprayogitvāt // [022/18]
T07vakobhau:817: yadi pañca vijñānakāyāḥ savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ kathamavikalpakā ityucyante / [022/19]
T07vakobhau:829: tau prajñā mānasī vyagrā smṛtiḥ sarvaiva mānasī // VAkK_1.33 // [022/25]
T07vakobhau:833: mānasyeva sarvā smṛtiḥ samāhitā cāsamāhitā cānusmaraṇavikalpaḥ / [022/27]
T07vakobhau:836: cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānadhātavo manodhātuśca ete sapta cittadhātavaḥ sālambanā viṣayagrahaṇāt / [023/04-021/04]
T07vakobhau:839: śeṣā daśa rūpiṇo dhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaścāsaṃprayuktako 'nālambanā it isiddham / [023/07]
T07vakobhau:843: ye sapta sālambanā uktāḥ aṣṭamaṣyārdhena sārdham / [023/10]
T07vakobhau:852: anye 'nupāttāstadyathā mūlavarjeṣu keśaromanakhadanteṣu viṇmūtrakheṭasiṃghāṇakaśeṇitādiṣu bhūmyudakādiṣu ca / [023/16]
T07vakobhau:869: tacca naivaṃ bhūtānāṃ catuṣṭva khakkhaṭādilakṣaṇāvadhāraṇāt sūtre / [024/02]
T07vakobhau:871: na hi kāṭhinyādīni cakṣurādibhirgṛhyante nāpi varṇādayaḥ kāyendriyeṇa / [024/03-024/05]
T07vakobhau:872: uktaṃ ca sūtre “cakṣurbhikṣo ādhyātmikamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpaprasādo arupyanidarśanaṃ saprataighaṃ evaṃ yāvat kāyaḥ [024/05-024/06]
T07vakobhau:873: rūpāṇi bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāyarupi sanidarśanaṃ sapratigham / [024/06-024/07]
T07vakobhau:874: śabdo bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rupyanidarśanaṃ sapratigham / [024/07]
T07vakobhau:876: spraṣṭavyāni bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpyanidarśanaṃ sapratighami“ti / [024/09]
T07vakobhau:877: spraṣṭrvyāyatanikadeśenaiva bhūtānāṃ saṃgrahāccheṣaṃ na bhūtānīti spaṣṭamādarśitam / [024/09-024/10]
T07vakobhau:878: yattarhi sūtre uktaṃ “yaccakṣuṣi maṃsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagatami“ti [024/10-024/11]
T07vakobhau:882: na ca yuktaṃ cittameva caittā ityabhyupetum / [024/13-024/14]
T07vakobhau:883: “saṃjñā ca vedanā ca caitasika eṣa dharmaścittānvayāccittaniśrita';
T07vakobhau:889: paramāṇusaṃghātatvāt śeṣā na saṃcitā iti siddhaṃ bhavati // [024/20-024/21]
T07vakobhau:890: aṣṭādaśānaṃ dhātūnāṃ kaśchīnatti kaśiciādyate ko dahati ko dahyate kastulayati kastulyate / [024/22]
T07vakobhau:891: chinatti cchidyate caiva bāhyaṃ dhātue catuṣṭayam / [024/23]
T07vakobhau:901: yathā cchinattī cchiyate caiva bāhyaṃ dhātucatuṣṭayam / [025/01]
T07vakobhau:907: kecidāhuḥ tadeva dhātucatuṣṭayaṃ dāhakaṃ tulyaṃ ca [025/04-025/05]
T07vakobhau:909: kati vipākajāḥ dhātavaḥ katyaupacayikāḥ kati naihṣyandikāḥ kati dravayuktāḥ kati kṣaṇikāḥ / [025/07]
T07vakobhau:912: adhyātmaṃ tāvat pañca dhātavaḥ cakṣurādayo vipākajāścaupacayikāśca / [025/10]
T07vakobhau:921: bhavatu phalahetau phalopacāro yathā phale hetūpacāraḥ / [025/13-025/14]
T07vakobhau:932: yattarhi prajñaptiśāstre uktaṃ “pāruṣyavirateḥ subhāvitatvād brahmasvaratā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ nirvartta iti / [025/21]
T07vakobhau:934: karmabhyo hi bhūtāni bhūtebhyaḥ śabdaḥ iti /
T07vakobhau:936: karmabhyo hi vipākajāni mahābhūtāni tebhyaścaupacayikāni tebhyo naiḥṣyandikāni tebhyaḥ śabda iti / [025/24-025/25]
T07vakobhau:937: evam tarhi śāhī hikyapi vedanā karmajabhūtasaṃbhūtatvānna vipākaḥ prapnoti / [025/25]
T07vakobhau:947: te vipākajā apyaupacayikā api naiḥṣyandrikā api / [026/05]
T07vakobhau:953: te prathamānāsrave duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntikalāpe kṣaṇamekamanaiḥṣyandikā bhavantyataḥ kṣaṇikā ityucyante / [026/09-026/10]
T07vakobhau:961: cakṣurvijñānadhātvoḥ syāt pṛthak lābhaḥ sahāpi ca // VAkK_1.38 // [026/15]
T07vakobhau:975: tṛtīyā kāmadhātau labdhāvihīnacakṣuḥ prathamadhyānopapanno dvitīyādidhyānopapannaśca paśyan / [026/23-026/24]
T07vakobhau:978: etasya prasaṅgasya samuccayārthaścaśabdaḥ sahāpi ca iti / [027/01]
T07vakobhau:983: ṣaḍ vijñānāni ṣaḍāśrayā ityete dvādaśa dhātava ādhyātmakāḥ / [027/05-027/06]
T07vakobhau:990: “cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham” iti / [027/11]
T07vakobhau:993: evam tarhi ṣaḍ vijñānadhātava ādhyātmikā na prāpnuvanti / [027/13]
T07vakobhau:995: yadā tadā ta eva te bhavantīti lakṣaṇaṃ nātibarttante / [027/14-027/15]
T07vakobhau:998: yadi cānāgatapratyutpannasya vijñānasya manodhātulakṣaṇaṃ na syāt atīte 'pyadhvani manodhāturna vyavasthāpyeta / [027/17]
T07vakobhau:1004: yo hi viṣayo yasya vijñānasya niyato yadi tatra tadvijñānamutpantaṃ bhavatyutpattidharmi vā evaṃ sa viṣayaḥ sabhāga ityucyate / [027/22-027/23]
T07vakobhau:1005: na ca so 'sti kaściddharmadhāturyatra nānantaṃ manovijñānamutpannamutpatsyate vā / [027/23-027/24]
T07vakobhau:1006: tathā hi sarvāryapudgalānāmidaṃ cittamavaśyamutpadyate “sarvadharmā anātmāna” iti / [027/14-027/25]
T07vakobhau:1008: sa punaścittakṣaṇo 'nyasya cittakṣaṇasyālambanamiti dvayoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ sarvadharmā hyālambanaṃ bhavanti / [027/26]
T07vakobhau:1014: uktaṃ bhavati yaḥ svakarmakṛt sa sabhāga iti / [028/02-028/03]
T07vakobhau:1015: tatra yena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇyapaśyat paśyati drakṣyati vā taducyate sabhāgaṃ acakṣuḥ / [028/03-028/04]
T07vakobhau:1018: yad dṛṣṭvā rūpāṇi niaruddhaṃ nirudhyate nirotsyate vā yaccānutpattidharmi / [028/05-028/06]
T07vakobhau:1020: tadevānutpattidharmi dvidhā kṛtvā vijñānasamāyuktaṃ cāsamāyusktaṃ ca / [028/07]
T07vakobhau:1023: rūpāṇi ca yāni cakṣuṣā 'paśāyat paśyati drakṣyati vā tāni sabhāgāni / [028/08]
T07vakobhau:1025: yānyadṛṣṭānyeva niruddhāni nirudhyante nirutsyante vā yāni cānutpattidharmīṇi / [028/09-028/10]
T07vakobhau:1031: rūpaṃ tu yaḥ paśyati tasya sabhāgaṃ yo na paśyati tasya tatsabhāgam / [028/12]
T07vakobhau:1033: asti hi saṃbhavo yadrūpamekaḥ paśyati taddhavo 'pi paśyeyuryathā candranaṭmallaprekṣāsu / [028/13-028/14]
T07vakobhau:1034: natu saṃbhavo 'sti yadekena cakṣuṣā dvau paśyetām / [028/14]
T07vakobhau:1039: gandhādayastu ya ekena gṛhyante na te 'nyena prāptagṛhaṇādityasādhāraṇatvādeṣāṃ cakṣurādivadatideśo nyāyyaḥ / [028/18]
T07vakobhau:1041: asti hyeṣa saṃbhavo ya eva gandhādaya ekasya ghrāṇādivijñānamutpādayeyusta evānyeṣāmapi / [028/20]
T07vakobhau:1049: ye punarasabhāgāste teṣā sabhāgānāṃ jātisāmānyena sabhāgatvāt tatsabhāgāḥ / [028/25]
T07vakobhau:1050: kati dhātavo darśanaheyāḥ kati bhāvanāheyāḥ katyaheyāḥ /
T07vakobhau:1060: nanu cānyadapi darśanaprahātavyamasti pṛthagjanatvamāpāyikaṃ ca kāyavākkarma / [029/03-029/04]
T07vakobhau:1071: tasmādanyatra jātamaṣaṣṭhajaṃ pañcendriyajaṃ ca yattadapi nāsti darśnaprahātavyam // [029/13]
T07vakobhau:1072: aṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ kati dṛṣṭiḥ kati na dṛṣṭiḥ / [029/14]
T07vakobhau:1076: pañca satkāyadṛṣṭyādikā dṛṣṭayaḥ laukikī samyag dṛṣṭiḥ śaiṅkṣī dṛṣṭiraśaikṣī dṛṣṭirityayamaṣṭaprakāro dharmadhāturdṛṣṭi ravraśiṣṭo na dṛṣṭiḥ
T07vakobhau:1087: ata eva cānyā 'pi kliṣṭā 'kliṣṭā vā prājñā na dṛṣṭiḥ / [030/02]
T07vakobhau:1096: savijñānakaṃ yadā bhavati tadā paśyatyanyadā neti / [030/06-030/07]
T07vakobhau:1097: evam tarhi tadeva cakṣurāśritam vijñānaṃ paśyatītyastu / [030/08]
T07vakobhau:1102: dṛśyate rūpaṃ na kilāntaritaṃ yataḥ // VAkK_1.42 // [030/12]
T07vakobhau:1103: yasmāt kila rūpaṃ kuḍyādivyavahitaṃ na dṛśyate / [030/12-030/13]
T07vakobhau:1104: yadi hi vijñānaṃ paśyettassyāpratighatvāt kuḍyādiṣu pratighāto nāsti ityvāṛtamapi rūpaṃ paśyet / [030/13-030/14]
T07vakobhau:1105: naiva hāvṛte cakṣurvijñānamutpadyata ityanutpannaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati / [030/14]
T07vakobhau:1107: yasya tu cakṣuḥ paśyati tasya cakṣuṣaḥ saparatighatvādvyayavahite vṛttyabhāva iti vijñānasyānutpatti rāśrayeṇaika viṣayapravṛttatvāt yujyate
T07vakobhau:1108: kiṃ nu vai cakṣuḥ prāptaviṣayaṃ kāyendriyavat yata āvṛtaṃ na paśyet / [030/17]
T07vakobhau:1113: yatrālokasyāpratibandha āvṛte 'pi rupe tatropapadyata eva cakṣurvijñānam / [030/20-030/21]
T07vakobhau:1114: yatra tu pratibandhastatra notpadyata ityanutpannatvādāvṛtaṃ nekṣyate / [030/21]
T07vakobhau:1123: yathā ca sūtra uktaṃ “cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇīṣṭāni kāntāni“ti / [030/25]
T07vakobhau:1125: uktaṃ ca sūtre “cakṣurbrāhmaṇa dvāraṃ yāvadeva rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya” ityato gamyate cakṣuṣā dvāreṇa vijñānaṃ paśyatīti /
T07vakobhau:1129: yadi vijñānaṃ kpaśyati ko vijānāti kaścānayorviśeṣaḥ / [031/01-031/02]
T07vakobhau:1130: yadeva hi rūpasya vijñānaṃ tadevāsya darśnamiti / [031/02-031/03]
T07vakobhau:1131: tadyathā kācit prajñā paśyatītyapyucyate prajānātītyapyevaṃ kiñcidvijñānaṃ paśyatītyapyucyāte vijānātītyapi / [031/03]
T07vakobhau:1133: “yadi cakṣuḥ paśyati kartṛbhūtasya cakṣuṣaḥ kā 'nyā dṛśikriye“ti vaktavyam / [031/04]
T07vakobhau:1144: tathā hi tasminnutpanne rūpaṃ dṛṣṭamityucyate na vijñātam / [031/09-031/10]
T07vakobhau:1152: tatra kaḥ paśyati ko vā dṛśyate / [031/14]
T07vakobhau:1156: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā “janapadaniruktiṃ nābhiniviśeta saṃjñāṃ ca lokasya nābhidhāvedi“ti / [031/16-031/17]
T07vakobhau:1158: cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti ghrāṇaṃ jighrati jihvā āsvādayati kāyaḥ spṛśati mano vijānātīti / [031/19]
T07vakobhau:1159: tadyadi cakṣuḥ paśyati kimekena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyatyāhosvidubhābhyām / [031/20]
T07vakobhau:1163: tathā hi dvayorvivṛtayoḥ paraiśāuddhataraṃ darāśanaṃ bhavati / [031/23-031/24]
T07vakobhau:1164: ekasmiṃścīnmīlite cakṣuṣi dvitīye cārdhanimīlite dvicandrādigrahaṇaṃ bhavati / [031/24]
T07vakobhau:1166: na cāśrayavicchedād vicchedaparasaṅgo vijñānasya deśāpratiṣṭhitatvād raupavaditi / [031/26-031/27]
T07vakobhau:1167: yadi cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti yāvanmano vijānāti kimeṣāṃ prāpto viṣaya āhosvidaprāptaḥ / [032/01]
T07vakobhau:1169: tathā hi dūrādrūpaṃ paśyatyakṣisthamañjanaṃ na paśyati /
T07vakobhau:1171: sati ca prāptaviṣayatve divyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotramiha dhyāyināṃ nopajāyeta / [032/03]
T07vakobhau:1173: yadyaprāptaviṣayaṃ cakṣuḥ kasmānna sarvamaprāptaṃ paśyati dūraṃ tiraskṛtaṃ ca / [032/04-032/05]
T07vakobhau:1176: kasmānna sarvaṃ prāptaṃ paśyatyañjanaṃ śalākāṃ vā / [032/06-032/07]
T07vakobhau:1177: yathā ca ghrāṇādīnaṃ prāpto viṣayo na tu sarvaḥ / [032/7-03207]
T07vakobhau:1197: ata eva yadi hi spṛśeyurhasto haste 'bhyāhataḥ sajyeto palaścopale / [032/16-032/17]
T07vakobhau:1200: kaścidvāyudhāturvikiraṇāya pravṛtto yathā saṃvarttanyāṃ kaścit saṃdhāraṇāya yathā vivarttanyāmiti / [032/18-032/19]
T07vakobhau:1204: evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'yamapi grantha upapanno bhavati vibhāṣāyām / [032/21-032/22]
T07vakobhau:1205: kiṃ nu spṛṣṭahetukaṃ spṛṣṭamutpadyate āhosvidaspṛṣṭahetukamiti praśnayitvāha“kāraṇaṃ prati / [032/22-032/23]
T07vakobhau:1208: kadācit spṛṣṭahetukaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ yadā cayavatāṃ cayaḥ / [033/01-033/02]
T07vakobhau:1214: anyathā hi sāntarāṇāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ śūnyeṣvantareṣu gatiḥ kena pratibadhyeta / [033/04-033/05]
T07vakobhau:1217: ta eva te saṃghātāḥ paramāṇavaḥ spṛśyante yathā rūpyante / [033/06-033/07]
T07vakobhau:1218: yadi ca paramāṇordigbhāgabhedaḥ kalpyate spṛṣṭasyāspṛṣṭasya vā sāvayavatvaprasaṅgaḥ / [033/07]
T07vakobhau:1223: yāvanto hīndriyaparamāṇavastāvanto hi viṣayaparamāṇavaḥ sametya vijñānaṃ janayanti / [033/13]
T07vakobhau:1227: kadācit bhūyāṃso yadā mahāntaṃ parvataṃ paśyatyunmiṣitamātreṇa / [033/15]
T07vakobhau:1243: tatra cakṣurindriyaparamāṇavaḥ kadācit sarve sabhāgā bhavanti kadācittatsabhāgāḥ / [033/24-033/25]
T07vakobhau:1252: ya ime ṣaḍvijñānadhātava uktāścakṣurvijñānaṃ yavanmanovijñānaṃ kimeṣāṃ yatha viṣayo varttamānaḥ pañcānāṃ caramasya trikāla evamāśrayo 'pi /
T07vakobhau:1259: tatra cakṣurvijñānasya cakṣuḥ sahaja āśārayo yāvat kāyavijñānasya kāyaḥ / [034/10]
T07vakobhau:1260: atītaḥ punareṣāmāśrayo mana ityapyete pañca vijñānakāyā indriyadvayāśrayāḥ / [034/11]
T07vakobhau:1272: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamubhayādhīnāyāṃ vijñānotpattau cakṣurādayaḥ evāśrayā ucyante na rūpādayaḥ / [034/19]
T07vakobhau:1275: cakṣurādīnāṃ hi vikāreṇa tadvijñānānāṃ vikāro bhavatyanugrahopaghātapaṭumandatānuvidhānāt na tu rūpādīnāṃ vikāreṇa tadvikāraḥ / [034/22]
T07vakobhau:1276: tasmāt sādhīyastadadhīnatvat ta evāśrayā na rūpādayaḥ / [034/23-034/24]
T07vakobhau:1277: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ rūpādayaśca tairvijñāyante cakṣurvijñānaṃ cocyate yāvanmanovijñānam / [034/24]
T07vakobhau:1285: tasmādāśrayabhāvādasādhāraṇatvācca vijñānaṃ tenaiva nirdiśyate na rūpādibhiḥ / [034/29-034/30]
T07vakobhau:1287: atha yatra kāye sthitaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyati kiṃ tāni kāyacakṣūrūpavijñānānyekabhūmikānyeva bhavantyāhosvidanyabhūmikānyapi / [035/02]
T07vakobhau:1290: kāmadhātūpapannasya svena cakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyataḥ sarvaṃ svabhūmikam bhavati / [035/04-035/05]
T07vakobhau:1291: tasyaiva svāni rūpāṇi prathamadhyānabhūmīni paśyano rūpāṇi trīṇapi tadbhūmikāni / [035/06-035/07]
T07vakobhau:1292: dvitīyadhyānacakṣuṣā svāni rūpoāṇi paśyataḥ kāyarūpe svabhūmike cakṣustadbhūmikaṃ vijñānaṃ prathamadhyāna bhūmikam / [035/07-035/06]
T07vakobhau:1293: prathamadhyānabhūmīni paśyato vijñānarupe tadbhūmike kāyaḥ kāmāvacaraścakṣurdvitīyadyānabhūmikam / [035/08-035/10]
T07vakobhau:1294: dvitīyadhyānabhūmīni paśyataścakṣūarūpe tadbhūmike kāyaḥ kāmāvacaro vijñānaṃ prathamabhūmīkam / [035/10-035/11]
T07vakobhau:1295: evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikena cakṣuṣā tadbhūmikādharabhumikāni rūpāṇi paśyato yojayitavyam / [035/11-035/12]
T07vakobhau:1296: prathmadhyānopapannasya svena cakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyataḥ sarvaṃ svabhūmikamadharāṇi paśyataḥ trayaṃ svabhūmikaṃ / [035/12-035/13]
T07vakobhau:1297: dvitīyadhyānacakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyatastrayaṃ svabhūmikaṃ cakṣustadbhūmikam / [035/13-035/14]
T07vakobhau:1298: kāmāvacarāṇi paśyataḥ kāyavijñāne svabhūmike rūpāṇyadharāṇi cakṣustadbhūmikam / [035/14-035/15]
T07vakobhau:1301: dvitīyādidhyānopapannasya svaparacakṣurbhyāṃ svaparabhūmikāni rūpāṇi paśyato yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyam / [035/17]
T07vakobhau:1306: tatra yadbhūmikaḥ kāyastadbhūmikaṃ cakṣurūrdhvabhūmikaṃ vā cakṣurbhavati na tvadharabhūmikam / [035/21-035/22]
T07vakobhau:1307: yadbhūmikaṃ cakṣustadbhūmikamadharabhūmikaṃ vā rūpaṃ viṣayo bhavati / [035/23]
T07vakobhau:1309: na hi kadācidūrdhrvabhūmikaṃ rūpamadhobhūmikena cakṣuṣā draṣṭuṃ śakyate / [035/25]
T07vakobhau:1312: asya rūpaṃ tu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ // VAkK_1.46 // [036/02]
T07vakobhau:1313: asyetyanantaroktasya cakṣurvijñānasya rūpaṃ sarvato viṣayaḥ ūrdhvamadhaḥ svabhūmau ca / [036/03]
T07vakobhau:1317: “na kāyasyādharaṃ śrotramūrdhvaṃ śabdo na ca śruteḥ /
T07vakobhau:1318: vijñānaṃ cāsya śabdastu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ //“iti [036/07]
T07vakobhau:1324: kāyaḥ kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyaṃ ca svabhūmikānyeva nityaṃ bhavanti / [036/12-036/13]
T07vakobhau:1328: kadācit kāyamanovijñānadharmaiḥ samānabhūmikaṃ mano bhavati kadācidūrdhvādhobhūmikam / [036/17-036/19]
T07vakobhau:1329: pañcabhūmike 'pi hi kāye sarvabhūmikāni mana ādīni bhavanti samāpattyupapattikāle yathāyogamiti vistareṇa samāpattinirdeśe kośasthāna etadākhyāyiṣyate
T07vakobhau:1331: alpaṃ ca prayojanaṃ mahāṃśca śrama iti samāpta ānuṣaṅgikaḥ prasaṅgaḥ / [036/21]
T07vakobhau:1333: aṣṭādaśānāṃ cdātūnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ ca vijñānānāṃ kaḥ kena vijñeyaḥ / [036/22]
T07vakobhau:1337: evamete pratyekaṃ dvābhyāṃ vijñānābhyāṃ vijñeyā bhavanti / [036/26-036/27]
T07vakobhau:1338: śeṣāstrayodaśa dhātavaḥ pañcānāṃ vijñānakāyānāmaviṣayatvādekena manovijñānena vijñeyā ityākhyātaṃ bhavati / [037/01]
T07vakobhau:1339: eṣāmaṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ madhye kati nityāḥ katyanityāḥ / [037/01-037/02]
T07vakobhau:1340: na kaśct sakalo 'sti nityo dhāturapi tu [037/03]
T07vakobhau:1344: dharmārdhamindriyaṃ ye ca dvādaśādhyātmikāḥ smṛtāḥ // VAkK_1.48 // [037/07]
T07vakobhau:1346: cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyaṃ manaindriyaṃ
T07vakobhau:1347: strīndriyaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ sukhendriyaṃ duḥkhendriyaṃ saumanasyendriyaṃ
T07vakobhau:1348: daurmanasyendraiyaṃ upekṣendriyaṃ śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ smādhīndriyaṃ
T07vakobhau:1352: tatra dharmārdhaṃ jīvitendriyādīnyekādaśendriyāṇi trayāṇāṃ ca bhāgo dharmadhātupradeśatvāt / [037/13-037/14]
T07vakobhau:1354: sapta cittadhātavo manaindriyaṃ stripuruṣendriye kāyadhātupradeś iti paścād vakṣyati / [037/15-037/16]
T07vakobhau:1355: śeṣāḥ pañca dhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaśca nendriyamiti siddham // [037/17]
T07vakobhau:1358: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
T07vakobhau:1359: teṣāṃ ca yo nirhodha evaṃvādīu mahāśramaṇaḥ // [037/22]
T07vakobhau:1387: tathā hi tadviprayuktavikalpānāṃ ṣaṇḍha paṇḍakobhayavyañjanānāmasaṃvarānantāryakuāśalamulasamucchedā na bhavanti saṃvaraphalaprāptivairāgyāṇi ceti / [038/19]
T07vakobhau:1390: tatra punrbhavasaṃbandhe yathoktaṃ “gandharvasya tasmin samaye dvayościttayoranyatarānyataracittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtaṃ bhavatyanunayasahagataṃ vā pratighasahagataṃ ve“ti / [038/22]
T07vakobhau:1391: vaśibhāvānuvarttane yathoktaṃ “cittenāyaṃ loko nīyata” iti vistaraḥ / [038/22-038/23]
T07vakobhau:1392: yat punaḥ sukhādīndriyapañcakaṃ yāni cāṣṭau śraddhādīni teṣāṃ [038/24]
T07vakobhau:1423: kaścidasau kāyendriyabhāga upastha pradeśo yaḥ strīpuruṣendriyākhyāṃ paratilabhate / [039/15-039/16]
T07vakobhau:1430: jīvitaṃ vedanāḥ pañca śraddhādyāścendriyaṃ matāḥ // VAkK_2.3 // [039/20]
T07vakobhau:1432: tathāhi sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśete duḥkhāyāṃ pratigho 'duḥkhāsukhāyāmavidyetyuktaṃ sūtre / [039/21-039/22]
T07vakobhau:1456: saṃbhāro vyavadānaṃ ca yāvatā tāvadindriyam // VAkK_2.5 // [040/14]
T07vakobhau:1459: tasya strīpuruṣavikalpaḥ strīpuruṣendraiyābhyāṃ sthitirjīvitendriyeṇa saṃkleśo vedanā bhiḥ / [040/16]
T07vakobhau:1475: ājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ prabhavaḥ sthitirājñendriyam upabhoga ājñātāvīndriyeṇetyata etāvantyevendriyāṇi / [040/24]
T07vakobhau:1479: tadeva hi tadanyathā 'nyatra cotpannamādānaṃ viharaṇaṃ cocyate / [040/27]
T07vakobhau:1483: upasthasyāpi nendriyatvamānande strīpuruṣendriyakṛtaṃ hi tat saukhyamiti / [041/01-041/03]
T07vakobhau:1485: sarvasya vā kāraṇabhūtasya svasyāṃ kariyāyāmityayukataṃ vāgādīnāmindriyatvam // [041/05]
T07vakobhau:1497: dhyāne tṛtīye tu caitasī sā sukhendriyam // VAkK_2.7 // [041/14]
T07vakobhau:1498: tṛtīye tu dhyāne saiva śātā vedanā caitasī sukhendriyam / [041/14-041/15]
T07vakobhau:1502: tṛtīyāddhyānādanyatra kāmadhātau prathame dvitīye ca dhyāne sā caiatasikī śātā vedanā saumanasyendriyam / [041/18-041/19]
T07vakobhau:1503: tṛtīye tu dhyāne prītivītarāgatvāt sukhendriyameva sā na saumanasyendriyam / [041/19]
T07vakobhau:1513: caitasikaṃ hi sukhaduḥkhaṃ prāyeṇa vikalpanādutpadyate na tu kāyikam / [042/02-041/03]
T07vakobhau:1516: upekṣā tu svarasenāvikalpayata evotpadyate kāyikī caitasikī ce tyekamindriyam kriyate / [042/04-042/05]
T07vakobhau:1519: upekṣāyāṃ tveṣa vikalpo nāstyata upekṣaṇaṃ pratyavikalpanādabhedaḥ / [042/07]
T07vakobhau:1523: darśanamārge anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ bhāvanāmārge ājñendriyam aśaikṣamārge ājñātāvīndriyamiti / [042/10]
T07vakobhau:1531: “duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na punaḥ parijñātavyamiti” tathābhūtasyenriyamājñātāvīnriyam / [042/15-042/16]
T07vakobhau:1532: svabhāvanirdeśāṃ kṛtvā prakārabhedo vaktavya kati sāsravāṇi katyanāsravāṇi inriyāṇityevamādi / [042/16-042/17]
T07vakobhau:1542: manaḥsukhasaumanasyopekṣāḥ śraddhādīni ca pañca etāni navendriyāṇi sāsravāṇyanāsravāṇyapi / [042/25]
T07vakobhau:1544: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā “yasyemāni pañcendriyāṇi sarveṇa srvaṃ na santi tamahaṃ bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ vadāmī“ti / [042/27]
T07vakobhau:1550: uktaṃ ca sūtre “santi ca sattvā loke jātā loke vṛddhāstīkṣṇendriyā api madhyendriyā api mṛdvindriyā apī” tyapravarttita eva dharmacakre / [043/04]
T07vakobhau:1552: punaścoktaṃ “yāvacchāhameṣāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ samudayaṃ cāstagamaṃ ca svādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ nādhyajñāsiṣaṃ na tāvadahamasmātsadevakāllokādi“ti vistaraḥ / [043/07]
T07vakobhau:1557: atha yadarhan bhikṣurāyuḥsaṃskārān sthāpayati tajjīvitendriyaṃ kasya vipākaḥ / [043/11]
T07vakobhau:1559: arhan bhikṣuḥ ṛddhimāṃścetovaśitvaṃ prāptaḥ saṃghāya va pudgalāya vā pātraḥ vā cīvaraṃ
T07vakobhau:1560: vā anyatamānyatamaṃ vā śrāmaṇakaṃ jīvitapariṣkāraṃ vā dattvā tat praṇidhāya prantakoṭikam
T07vakobhau:1562: sa tasmāt vyutthāya cittamutpādayati vācaṃ ca bhāṣate yanme bhogavipākaṃ tadāyurvipākaṃ bhavatviti / [043/15]
T07vakobhau:1568: tathaīva dānaṃ dattvā praṇidhāya prantakoṭikaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate/ [043/19]
T07vakobhau:1569: yanme āyurvipākaṃ tat bhogavipākaṃ bhavatviti tasya tathā bhavati / [043/20]
T07vakobhau:1571: tasminneva āśraye rūpāvacarāṇi mahābhūtāni dhyānabalena saṃmudhakarotyāyuṣo 'nukūlāni vaihodhikāni ca / [043/21-043/22]
T07vakobhau:1574: samādhiprabhāva eva sa teṣāṃ tadṛśo yena pūrvakarmajaṃ ca sthitikālāvedhamindriyamahābhūtānāṃ vyāvrttayantyapūrvaṃ ca samādhijamāvedhamākṣipanti
T07vakobhau:1582: alpaṃ ca parahitaṃ jīvite paśyanti rogābhibhūtaṃ cātmabhāvam /
T07vakobhau:1587: athaitadāyuḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ sthāpanārthamutsarjanaṃ vā kva kasya vā veditavyam / [044/05]
T07vakobhau:1598: yaistu kālāntaraṃ jīvati te jīvitasaṃskārā iti / [044/11-044/12]
T07vakobhau:1607: yaccāpi tat pratijñātam “evaṃbhāvitairahaṃ caturbhirṛddhi pādairākāṅkṣankalpamapi tiṣṭheyaṃ kalpāvaśeṣamapī“ti / [044/18]
T07vakobhau:1624: jīvitendriyaṃ cakṣurādīni dvādaśa hitvā śeṣāṇyavipāka iti siddham / [045/04-045/05]
T07vakobhau:1625: yadi dauarmanasyendriyaṃ na vipāka iti sūtraṃ kathaṃ nīyate “trīṇi kāryāṇi / [045/05-045/06]
T07vakobhau:1626: saumanasyavedanīyaṃ karma daurmanasyavedanīyaṃ karma upekṣā vedanīyaṃ karme“ti saṃprayogavedanīyatāmadhikṛtyoktam / [045/06-045/07]
T07vakobhau:1629: saumanasyopekṣāvedanīye api tarhi karmaṇī evaṃ bhaviṣyataḥ / [045/08]
T07vakobhau:1631: saṃprayoge 'pi na doṣaḥ vipāke 'pi na doṣaḥ / [045/09]
T07vakobhau:1633: kā punratra yuktirdaurmanasyaṃ na vipāka iti / [045/10]
T07vakobhau:1634: daurmanasyaṃ hi parikalpaviśeṣairutpādyate ca vyupaśāmyate ca / [045/10-045/11]
T07vakobhau:1637: yadi tarhi daumanasyaṃ vipākaḥ syādānantaryakāriṇāṃ tannimittaṃ daurmanasyotpādāttatkarma vipakvaṃ syāt / [045/13]
T07vakobhau:1639: yadi saumanasyaṃ vipākaḥ syāt puṇyakāriṇāṃ tannimittaṃ saumanasyotpādāttatkarma vipakvaṃ syāt / [045/14]
T07vakobhau:1644: sati tu saṃbhave saumanasyasyāsti vipākāvakāśī na dauarmanasyasya / [045/16-045/17]
T07vakobhau:1645: sarvathā 'samudācārāditi nāstyevaṃ daurmanasyaṃ vipāka iti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [045/17-045/18]
T07vakobhau:1646: tatra jīvitendriyāṣṭamāni sugatau kuśalasya vipāko durgatāvakuśalasya / [045/18]
T07vakobhau:1667: tatra manaḥsukhasaumanasyopekṣā akuāśalāḥ kuśalāḥ sāsravāśca savipākāḥ / [046/04]
T07vakobhau:1694: tatra maithunadharmavairāgyādaśobhākaratvācca rūpadhātau strīpuruṣendriye na staḥ / [046/24]
T07vakobhau:1701: anyaḥ puruṣabhāvo yaḥ kāmachātau puruṣāṇāṃ bhavati / [046/27-046/28]
T07vakobhau:1704: ārūpyāptaṃ sukhe cāpohya rūpi ca // VAkK_2.12 // [047/02]
T07vakobhau:1752: sūtre 'pyuktaṃ “ye 'pi te bhikṣavaḥ śāntā vimokṣā atikramya rūpāṇyārupyā” iti / [048/09]
T07vakobhau:1753: tatra rūpadhātau ṣaḍḍindriyāṇi vipākaḥ parathamato labhyante / [048/09-048/10]
T07vakobhau:1758: tasmin ekameva jīvitendriyaṃ vipākaḥ prathamato labhyate nānyat / [048/14]
T07vakobhau:1766: sarve hyupapādukāḥ samagrendriyā upapadyante mriyante ca / [048/20]
T07vakobhau:1777: eṣa ca nyāyaḥ kliṣṭāvyākṛtacittasya maraṇe veditavyaḥ / [048/26]
T07vakobhau:1778: yadā tu kuśale cetasi sthito mriyate tadā [049/01]
T07vakobhau:1780: kuśale cetasi mriyamāṇaḥ sarvatra yathoktamindriyāṇi nirodhayati / [049/02-049/03]
T07vakobhau:1783: evamārūpyeṣvaṣṭau nirodhayati rūpeṣu trayodaśāeti vistareṇa gaṇanīyam / [049/05]
T07vakobhau:1799: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ tāvadyadyānupūrvikaḥ prāpnoti sa ca laukikena mārgeṇa tasya saptabhirindriyaiḥ prāptiḥ / [049/17]
T07vakobhau:1803: atha bhūyovītarāgaḥ prāpnoti tasya navabhiryeneva srota āpattiphalasya / [049/19-049/20]
T07vakobhau:1804: anāgāmiphalaṃ yadyānupūrvikaḥ prāpnoti sa ca laukikena mārgeṇa tasya saptabhirindriyaiḥ prāptiḥ / [049/21]
T07vakobhau:1812: yadāpyayamānupūrviko navame vimūktimārge tīkṣṇenriyatvā ddhyānaṃ praviśāti laukikena mārgeṇa tadāpyaṣṭābhirindriyairanāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti /
T07vakobhau:1814: bhavatyānantaryamārge tūpekṣendriyameva nityamubhābhyāṃ ca tasya prāptiḥ / [049/27-049/28]
T07vakobhau:1815: atha lokottareṇa praviśāti tasya navabhirindriyaiḥ prāptiḥ / [049/28]
T07vakobhau:1821: asti saṃbhavo yadekaḥ pudgalaḥ parihāya parihāya sukhasaumanasyīpekṣābhirarhattvaṃ prāpnuyādata ekādaśabhirityuktam / [050/05-050/06]
T07vakobhau:1824: nahyasau parihīṇaḥ kadācitsukhendriyeṇa prāpnnoti na ca vītarāgapūrvī parihīyate / [050/07-050/08]
T07vakobhau:1827: katamenendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ katibhiḥ avaśyaṃ samanvāgato bhavati / [050/10]
T07vakobhau:1830: ya eṣāmupekṣādīnāmanyatamena samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ tribhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgato bhavatyebhireva / [050/13]
T07vakobhau:1850: yaḥ sukhendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ caturbhirindriyaistaiśca tribhirupekṣādibhiḥ sukhendriyeṇa ca / [050/25]
T07vakobhau:1851: yaḥ kāyendriyeṇa so 'pi caturbhistaiśca tribhiḥ kāyendriyeṇa ca / [051/01]
T07vakobhau:1863: yaḥ strīndriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyamaṣṭabhiḥ taiśca saptabhiḥ strīndriyeṇaca / [051/13]
T07vakobhau:1877: atha yaḥ srvālpaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kiyadbhirindriyaiḥ / [051/24]
T07vakobhau:1883: vedanā hi vit vedayata iti kṛtvā /
T07vakobhau:1896: atha yaḥ sarvabahubhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kiyadbhiḥ / [052/10]
T07vakobhau:1910: kimete saṃskṛtā dharmā yathā bhinnalakṣaṇā evaṃ bhinnotpādā utāho niyatasahotpādā api kecitsanti / [052/20]
T07vakobhau:1913: rūpaṃ cittaṃ caitasikāścttaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārā asaṃskṛtaṃ ca / [052/22]
T07vakobhau:1917: sarvasūkṣmo hi rūpasaṃghātaḥ paramāṇur ity ucyāte /
T07vakobhau:1919: sa kāma ghātāvaśabdako 'nindriyaścāṣṭadravyaka utpadyate nānyatamena hīnaḥ/ [052/25-053/01]
T07vakobhau:1920: aṣṭo dravyāṇicatvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri copādāyarūpāṇi rūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyāni / [053/01-053/02]
T07vakobhau:1921: sendriyastu paramāṇuraśabdako navadravyaka utpadyate daśadravyako vā / [053/02]
T07vakobhau:1928: aparamindriyaṃ yatra paramāṇau tatra daśa dravyāṇi / [053/06-053/07]
T07vakobhau:1930: saśabdā punarete paramāṇava utpadyamānā yathākramaṃ navadaśaikādaśa dravyakā utpadyante / [053/08-053/09]
T07vakobhau:1932: kathamihāvinirbhāge bhūtānāṃ kaścideva saṃghātaḥ kaṭhina utpadyate kaścideva drava uṣṇo vā samudīraṇo vā / [053/10-053/11]
T07vakobhau:1933: yadyatra paṭutamaṃ prabhāvata udbhūtaṃ tasya tatropalabdhiḥ / [053/11]
T07vakobhau:1937: pratyayalābhe ca sati kaṭhinādīnāṃ dravaṇā dibhāvāt apsu śaityātiśayādauṣṇyaṃ gamyata ityapare / [053/13-053/14]
T07vakobhau:1940: bījatas teṣu teṣāṃ bhāvo na svarūpata ityapare / [053/15]
T07vakobhau:1945: rūpadhātau gandharasayorabhāva uktastena tatratyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ ṣaṭsaptāṣṭadravyakā ityuktarūpatvāt na punarucyante / [053/19]
T07vakobhau:1946: kiṃ punaratra dravyameva dravyaṃ gṛhyate āhosvidāyatanam /
T07vakobhau:1948: yadi dravyameva dravyaṃ gṛhyate atyalpamidamucyate aṣṭadravyako navadaśādravyaka iti / [053/20-053/21]
T07vakobhau:1954: caturdravyako hi vaktavyo yāvatā bhūtānyapi spraṣṭavyāyatanam / [053/24-053/25]
T07vakobhau:1955: kiñcidatra dravyameva dravyaṃ gṛhyate yadāśrayabhūtaṃ kiñcidatrāyatanaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhyate yadāśritabhūtam / [053/25-053/26]
T07vakobhau:1956: evamapi bhūyāṃsi bhūtadravyāṇi bhavantyupādāyarūpāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ bhūtacatuṣkāśritatvāt / [054/01]
T07vakobhau:1967: yatkiṃ cidutpadyate rūpaṃ cittaṃ caitasikā viprayuktā vā sarvaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaiḥ sārdhamutpadyate / [054/09]
T07vakobhau:1969: prāptyā saha satvākhyamevotpadyate nānyaditi vikalpārtho vāśabdaḥ / [054/11]
T07vakobhau:1973: pañca prakārāścaittā mahābhūmikāḥ kuśalamahābhūmikāḥ kleśamahābhūmikāḥ akuśalamahābhūmikāḥ parīttakleśamahābhūmikāśca / [054/14]
T07vakobhau:1975: yo hi yasya gativiśayaḥ sa tasya bhūmirityucyate / [054/15-054/16
T07vakobhau:1976: tatra mahatī bhūmireśāmiti mahābhūmikāḥ ye sarvatra cetasi bhavanti / [054/16]
T07vakobhau:1978: vedanā cetanā saṃjñā cchandaḥ sparśo matiḥ smṛtiḥ /
T07vakobhau:1980: ime kila daśa dharmāḥ sarvatra cittakṣaṇe samagrā bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:1993: sa eva duḥparicchedaḥ pravāheṣvapi tāvat kiṃ punaḥ kṣaṇeṣu / [054/25-055/02]
T07vakobhau:1994: rūpiṇīnāmapi tāvadoṣadhīnāṃ bahurasānāṃ kāsaṃcidindriyagrāhyā rasaviśeṣā duravadhārā bhavanti kiṃ punarye dharmā arūpiṇo buddhigrāhyāḥ / [055/02-055/03]
T07vakobhau:1995: kuśalā mahābhūmireṣāṃ ta ime kuśala mahābhūmikā ye sarvadā kuśale cetasibhavanti / [055/03]
T07vakobhau:1998: mūladvayamahiṃsā ca vīryaṃ ca kuśale sadā // VAkK_2.25 // [055/06]
T07vakobhau:1999: ime daśa dharmā kuśale cetasi nityaṃ bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:2009: sā tu yathā kāyikī vedanā tathā veditavyā / [055/10-055/11]
T07vakobhau:2017: tadyathā prītiḥ prītisthānīyāśca dharmāḥ prītisaṃbodhyaṅgamuktaṃ bhagavatā / [055/14-055/15]
T07vakobhau:2020: naca saṃkalpavyāyāmau prajñāsvabhāvau tasyāstvanuguṇāviti tāsyātvanuguṇāviti tācchaydyaṃ labhete / [055/17-055/18]
T07vakobhau:2034: prajñā ca mahābhūmiketi nāsau kuśalamahābhūmika evocyate / [055/25]
T07vakobhau:2039: kleśā mahābhūmireṣāṃ ta ime kleśamahābhūmikā ye dharmāḥ sadaiva kliṣṭe cetasi bhavanti / [056/03]
T07vakobhau:2040: ke punaste sadaiva kliṣṭe cetasi bhavanti / [056/04]
T07vakobhau:2055: “āśraddhyaṃ kauśīdyaṃ muṣitasmṛtitā cetaso vikṣepaḥ avidyā asaṃprajanyamayoniśomanaskāro mithyādhimokṣa auddhatyaṃ pramādaśce” ti / [056/14]
T07vakobhau:2062: ata evocyate “ye mahābhūmikāḥ kleśamahābhūmikā api ta” iti / [056/19]
T07vakobhau:2064: prathamā koṭirvedanā cetanā saṃjñā cchandaḥ sparśaśca / [056/19-056/20]
T07vakobhau:2070: styānaṃ punariṣyate sarvakleśasaṃprayogīti kleśamahābhūmikeṣu tasyāpāṭhe kasyāparādhaḥ / [056/23-056/24]
T07vakobhau:2071: evaṃ tvāhuḥ paṭhitavyaṃ bhavetsamādhyanuguṇatvāttu na paṭhitam / [056/24-056/25]
T07vakobhau:2073: kaḥ punaḥ styānacarito yo nauddhatyacaritaḥ ko vā auddhatyacarito yo na styānacaritaḥ / [056/26]
T07vakobhau:2077: ete hi sadā kleṣṭa eva cetasi bhavanti nānyatra // [057/01]
T07vakobhau:2079: akuśale tu cetasyāhrīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ ca nityaṃ bhavata ityetau dvau dharmāvakuśalamahābhūmikāvucyete / [057/03]
T07vakobhau:2083: parīttakleśā bhūmireṣāṃ ta ime parīttakleśabhūmikā avidyāmātreṇa bhāvanāheyena manobhūmikenaiva ca saṃprayogāt / [057/07]
T07vakobhau:2087: tatra vaktavyaṃ kasmiṃścitte kati caittā avaśyaṃ bhavantīti / [057/10]
T07vakobhau:2097: daśa mahābhūmikā daśa kuśalamahābhūmikā vitarko vicāraśca / [057/16]
T07vakobhau:2100: yatra tvasti tatra tadevādhikaṃ kṛtvā trayoviṃśatiścaittā bhavanti / [057/18]
T07vakobhau:2103: iha tu punaḥ kaukṛtyālambano dharmaḥ kaukṛtyamucyate cetaso vipratisāraḥ / [057/19-057/21]
T07vakobhau:2104: tadyathā śūnyatālalmvanaṃ vimokṣamukhṃ śūnyatetyucyate aśubhālambanaścālobho 'śubha iti / [057/21-057/22]
T07vakobhau:2105: loke 'pi ca dṛṣṭaḥ sthānena sthānināmatideśaḥ sarvo grāma āgataḥ sarvo deśa āgata iti / [057/22]
T07vakobhau:2111: na mayā sādhu kṛtaṃ yanna kṛtamiti /
T07vakobhau:2118: daśa mahābhūmikāḥ ṣaṭ kleāśamahābhūmikā dvāvakuśalamahābhūmikau vitarkovicāraśca / [058/06-058/07]
T07vakobhau:2119: āveṇikaṃ nāma cittaṃ yatrāvidyaiva kevalā nānyaḥ kleśo 'sti rāgādiḥ / [058/07-058/08]
T07vakobhau:2124: tatrākuśalaṃ dṛṣṭiyuktaṃ yatra mithyādṛṣṭirvā dṛṣṭiparāmarśo vā śīlavrataparāmarśo vā / [058/11]
T07vakobhau:2126: yatra punaścaturbhiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃprayuktamakuśalaṃ cittaṃ rāgeṇa va pratighena vā mānena vā vicikitsayā vā tatraikaviṃśatirbhavanti / [058/13-058/14]
T07vakobhau:2128: krodhādibhirapyupakleśairyathoktaiḥ saṃprayukte citte ete ca viṃśatiḥ sa copakleśa ityekaviṃśatirbhavanti / [058/15]
T07vakobhau:2131: samāsata āveṇike cetasyakuśale dṛṣṭiyukte ca viṃśatiḥ / [058/16-058/17]
T07vakobhau:2136: daśa mahābhūmikāḥ ṣaṭ kleśamahābhūmikāḥ vitarkavicārau ca / [058/20-058/21]
T07vakobhau:2144: middhaṃ sarvāvirodhitvādyatra syādadhikam hi tat // VAkK_2.30 // [058/27]
T07vakobhau:2148: ya eva kāmadhātau caittānāṃ niyama uktaḥ [059/03]
T07vakobhau:2150: ato yathoktāt kaukṛtyaṃ middhaṃ ca sarvathā nāsti prathame dhyāne yat kiñcidakuśalam / [059/05]
T07vakobhau:2153: ya eva prathame dhyāne na santi ta eva [059/07]
T07vakobhau:2158: dhyānāntarāt pareṇa dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣvārūpyeṣu ca yathāpratiṣiddhaṃ nāsti vicāraśca / [059/11]
T07vakobhau:2162: sa hi svasyāṃ parṣadyaśvajitā bhikṣuṇā praśnaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ “kutremāni brahman catavāri mahābhūtānyapariśeṣaṃ nirudhyante” iti / [059/13-059/14]
T07vakobhau:2164: “ahamasmin brahmā īśvaraḥ kartā nirmātā sraṣṭā sṛjaḥ pitṛbhūto bhūtānāmi“ti / [059/15]
T07vakobhau:2166: idānīṃ keṣāñcideva caittānāṃ tantravihitaṃ nānākāraṇaṃ vakṣyate / [059/16-059/17]
T07vakobhau:2169: guṇeṣu guṇavatsu cāgauravatā apratīśatā abhayamavaśavartitā āhrīkyaṃ gauravapratidvandvo dharmaḥ // [059/21]
T07vakobhau:2174: kathamidaṃ vijñātavyam abhayasya darśanamabhayadarśitā āhosvit bhayasyādarśanam / [059/24]
T07vakobhau:2176: abhayasya darśanaṃ cet prajñā vijñāsyate bhayasyādarśanaṃ cedavidyā vijñāsyate / [059/25]
T07vakobhau:2182: evamapi dve apekṣe yugapat kathaṃ setsyataḥ / [060/01-060/03]
T07vakobhau:2183: na khalūcyate yugapadātmānaṃ paraṃ cāpekṣata ityapi tvastyasau kadācidalajjā yā ātmānamapekṣamāṇasyāpi pravartate sā āhrīkyam / [060/03-060/04]
T07vakobhau:2186: pratahamena tāvat kalpena sagauravatā sapratīśatā na bhayavaśavrtitā hrīḥ / [060/05]
T07vakobhau:2200: pudgaleṣu tu prema na gauravaṃ putradārasārdhaṃ vihāryantevāsiṣu / [060/13]
T07vakobhau:2213: nanu ca śraddhā hrīśca kuśalamahābhūmikatvāttatrāpi vidyete / [060/21]
T07vakobhau:2214: dvividhā hi śraddhā dharmeṣu pudgaleṣu ca /
T07vakobhau:2216: tatra ye pudgalālambane śraddhāhriyau te tatra na staḥ / [060/22]
T07vakobhau:2227: evaṃvitarkavicārayogāccittaṃ nātisūkṣmaṃ bhavati nātyodārika mityubhayorapi tatrāsti vyāpāraḥ / [061/01-061/03]
T07vakobhau:2228: evaṃ tarhi nimiṭtabhūtau vitarkavicārāvaudārika sūkṣmatayoḥ prāpnuto yathā payaścā tapaścasarpiṣaḥ śyānatva vilīnatvayornatu punastatsvabhāvau
T07vakobhau:2234: tatra ye audārikāste vitarkāḥ ye sūkṣmāste vicārāḥ / [061/07-061/08]
T07vakobhau:2235: yadi caikatra citte 'nyo dharma audāriko 'nyaḥ sūkṣmaḥ ko 'tra virodha iti / [061/08-061/09]
T07vakobhau:2243: naiva hi vitarkavicārāvekatra citte bhavata ityapare / [061/12]
T07vakobhau:2248: madaḥ svadharme raktasya paryādānaṃ tu cetasaḥ // VAkK_2.33 // [061/17]
T07vakobhau:2249: yena kenacit parato viśeṣaparikalpena cetasa unnatiḥ mānaḥ / [061/17-061/18]
T07vakobhau:2253: uktāḥ saha cittena caittāḥ prakāraśa steṣāṃ punarimāḥ saṃjñāḥ paribhāṣyante / [061/21]
T07vakobhau:2267: ta eva hi cittacaittāḥ sāśrayā ucyante indriyāśritatvāt / [062/05-062/06]
T07vakobhau:2275: yathaiva hyekaṃ cittamevaṃ caittā apyekaikā iti / [062/10]
T07vakobhau:2278: āsaṃjñikaṃ samāpattī jīvitaṃ lakṣaṇāni ca // VAkK_2.35 // [062/13]
T07vakobhau:2280: ime saṃskārā na cittena asaṃprayuktā naca rūpasvabhāvā iti cittaviprayuktāucyante / [062/15]
T07vakobhau:2283: dvividhā hi prāptiraprāptavihīnasya ca lābhaḥ pratilabdhena ca samanvāgamaḥ / [062/18]
T07vakobhau:2294: ata eva hi cottamabhidharme “anāsravairdharmaḥ kaḥ samanvāgataḥ / [062/25]
T07vakobhau:2297: pratisaṃkhyānirodhena sakalabandhanādikṣaṇasthavarjyāḥ sarva āryāḥ pṛthagjanāśca kecitsamanvāgatāḥ / [063/01-063/02]
T07vakobhau:2300: yasya ca nāsti prāptistastasyāprāptirapi nāstīti siddhāntaḥ / [063/03]
T07vakobhau:2304: sūtre hyustaṃ “sa eṣāṃ daśānāmaśaikṣāṇāṃ dharmaṇāmutpādāt pratilambhātsamanvāgamādaryo bhavati pañcāṅgaviprahīṇa” iti vistaraḥ / [063/06]
T07vakobhau:2305: tena tarhi asattvākhyairapi samanvāgamaḥ prāpnoti parasattvaiśca /
T07vakobhau:2308: “rājā bhikṣavaścakravarti saptabhī ratnaiḥ samanvāgata” iti vistaraḥ / [063/08]
T07vakobhau:2310: tasya teṣu ratneṣu vaśitvaṃ kāmacāra iti / [063/09]
T07vakobhau:2313: ayam ayogaḥ yad asyā naiva svabhāvaḥ prajñāyate rūpaśabdādivad rāgadveṣādivad vā na cāpi kṛtyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrādivat / [063/11]
T07vakobhau:2317: ye ca dharmā aprāptā ye ca tyaktā bhūmisaṃcāravaiarāgyatasteṣāṃ kathamutpattiḥ syāt / [063/13]
T07vakobhau:2320: sakalabandhanānāṃ khalvapi mṛdumadhyādhimātrakleśotpattibhedo na syāt prāptyabhedāt / [063/15]
T07vakobhau:2321: yato vā sa bhedastata evāstu tadutpattiḥ / [063/15-063/16]
T07vakobhau:2326: asatyāṃ hi prāptau laukikamānasānāmāryapṛthagjanānāmāryā ime pṛthagjanā ima iti na syād vyavasthānam / [063/18-063/19]
T07vakobhau:2328: etaccaiva kathaṃ bhaviṣyatyeṣāṃ prahīṇaḥ kleśa eṣāmaprahīṇa iti / [063/20]
T07vakobhau:2331: āśrayo hi sa āryāṇāṃ darśanabhāvanāmārgasāmarthyāttathā parāvṛtto bhavati yathā na punastatpraheyāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prarohasamartho bhavati / [063/22-063/23]
T07vakobhau:2335: yaścāprahīṇastena samanvāgato yaḥ prahīṇastenā samanvāgata iti prajñapyate / [063/25-063/26]
T07vakobhau:2336: kuśalā api dharmā dviprakārā ayatnabhāvino yatnabhāvinaśca ye ta ucyante utpattipratilambhikāḥ prāyogikāśceti / [063/26-063/27]
T07vakobhau:2337: tatrāyatnabhāvibhirāśrayasya tadvījabhāvānupaghātāt samanvāgata upaghātādasamanvāgata ucyate samucchinnakuāśalamūlaḥ / [063/27-064/01]
T07vakobhau:2339: na tu khalu kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vījabhāvasyātyantaṃ santatau samudghātaḥ / [064/02-064/03]
T07vakobhau:2341: tasmādvījamevātrānapoddhṛtamanupahatam paripṛṣṭaṃ ca vāśiatvakāle samanvāgamākhyāṃ tabhate nānyad dravyam / [064/05]
T07vakobhau:2343: yannāmarūpaṃ phalotpattau samartha sākṣāt pāraṃparyeṇa vā / [064/06]
T07vakobhau:2351: yāvaddhi tasyādhivāsako 'vinodako bhavati tāvat bhavyastāni bhāvayitum / [064/10-064/11]
T07vakobhau:2352: evamayaṃ samanvāgamaḥ sarvāthā prajñaptidharmo na tu dravyadharmaḥ / [064/11]
T07vakobhau:2369: tatrāpraptiṃsaṃṅkhyānirodhasya traidhātukī pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya rūpārūpyāvacarī cānāsravā ca / [064/24]
T07vakobhau:2375: naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣā dharmā ucyante sāsravā dharmā asaṃskāṛtaṃ ca / [065/03-065/04]
T07vakobhau:2379: tasyaiva śaikṣeṇa mārgeṇa praptasya śaikṣī aśaikṣeṇāśaikṣī / [065/06-065/07]
T07vakobhau:2385: teṣāmapratisaṃkhyānirodhasya bhāvanāheyā prāptiḥ anāryaprāptasya ca pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya / [065/10-065/11]
T07vakobhau:2395: dve abhijñe avyākṛte nirmāṇacittaṃ ca varjayitvā / [065/18-065/19]
T07vakobhau:2396: teṣāṃ hi balavattvāt prayogaviśeṣaniṣpatteḥ pūrva paścāt sahajā prāptiḥ / [065/19-065/20]
T07vakobhau:2402: yathā 'vyākṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāmayaṃ praptibhedaḥ kimevaṃ kuśalākuśalānāmapikaścit prāptibhedo 'sti / [065/26]
T07vakobhau:2430: anyathā hi cuddho 'pi śrāvakapratyekabuddhagotrakai rasamanvāgamādanāryaḥ syāt / [066/14-066/15]
T07vakobhau:2449: yathā tāvadāryamārgasyālābhaḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ tasya lābhāttadvihīyate bhūmisaṃcārācca / [066/24]
T07vakobhau:2459: tatra prāptyutpādāttena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bhavati prāptiprāptyā ca / [067/02-067/03]
T07vakobhau:2460: prāptiprāptyutpādāt punaḥ prāptyaiva samanvāgato bhavatyato nānavsthā / [067/03-067/04]
T07vakobhau:2461: evaṃ ca kṛtva ātmanā tṛtīyasya dharmasya kuśalasya kliṣṭasya kliṣṭasya vā dvitīye kṣaṇe tisraḥ prāptayo jāyante / [067/04-067/05]
T07vakobhau:2462: tāsāṃ ca punastisro 'nuprāptaya iti ṣaḍ bhavanti / [067/05-067/06]
T07vakobhau:2463: tṛtīye kṣaṇe prathamadvitīyakṣaṇotpannānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ nava prāptayaḥ sārdhamanuprāptibhirityaṣṭādāśa bhavanti / [067/06-067/10]
T07vakobhau:2466: ekasya prāṇinaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe upajāyante ityanantadravyāḥ pratisantānamātmabhāvakṣaṇāḥ
T07vakobhau:2470: itarathā hyākāśe 'pyava kāśo na syāt dvitīyasya prāṇinaḥ // [067/13]
T07vakobhau:2474: sattvānāṃ sākṛśyaṃ nikāyasa bhāga ityasyāḥ śāstre saṃjñā / [067/16]
T07vakobhau:2478: bhinnā punasteṣāmeva sattvānāṃ dhātubhūmigatiyonijātistrīpuruṣopāsakabhikṣuśaikṣā śaikṣyādibhedena pratiniyatā dharmasabhāgatā / [067/18-067/20]
T07vakobhau:2479: punaḥ skndhāyatanadhātutaḥ yadi satvasabhāgatā dravyamaviśiṣtaṃ na syāt anyonyaviśeṣabhinneṣu sattveṣu sattvasttva ityabhedena buddhirna syāt prajñaptiśca / [067/20-067/21]
T07vakobhau:2481: syāccyavetopapadyeta na ca sattvasabhāgatāṃ vijahyānna ca pratilabheteti / [067/22]
T07vakobhau:2488: yadi pṛthagjanasabhāgatā nāma dravyamasti kiṃ punaḥ pṛthagjanatvena / [067/26]
T07vakobhau:2490: naiva ca lokaḥ sabhāgatāṃ paśyatyarūpiṇītvāt nacaināṃ prajñayā paricchinatti pratipadyate ca satvānāṃ jātyabhedamiti satyā api tasyāḥ kathaṃ tatra vyāpāraḥ / [068/02]
T07vakobhau:2492: śāliyavamudgamāsāmrapanasalohakāñcanādīnāṃ svajātisādṛśyāt tāsāṃ ca sabhāgatānāmanyonyabhinnānāṃ kathamabhedena sabhāgatā prajñaptiḥ kriyate
T07vakobhau:2497: sa eko 'pyanekasmin varttate yadi dyotitā yadi na dyotitā / [068/07-068/08]
T07vakobhau:2498: astyeṣā tu sabhāgatā sūtre vacanāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ / [068/08-068/09]
T07vakobhau:2499: ustaṃ hi bhagavatā “sa ceditthantvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāmi“ti / [068/09]
T07vakobhau:2502: ta eva hi tathābhūtāḥ saṃskārā yeṣu manuṣyādiprajñaptiḥ śālyādiṣu sabhāgatāvat / [068/10-068/11]
T07vakobhau:2507: asaṃjñisattveṣu devepūpapannānāṃ yaścittacaittānāṃ nirodhastadāsaṃjñikaṃnāma dravyaṃ yena cittacaittā anāgate 'dhvani kālāntaraṃ saṃnirudhyante notpattuṃ labhante / [681/7-06817]
T07vakobhau:2515: bṛhatphalā nāma devā yeṣāṃ kecidasaṃjñisattvāḥ pradeśe bhavanti dhyānāntarikāvat / [068/22]
T07vakobhau:2518: “prakṛṣṭamapi kālaṃ sthitvā saha saṃjñotpādātteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tatsthānāt cyutirbhavatī“ti sūtre pāthaḥ / [068/24-068/25]
T07vakobhau:2519: te ca tato dīrghasvapnavyutthitā iva cyutvā kāmadhātāvupapadyante nānyatra / [068/25-068/26]
T07vakobhau:2520: pūrvasamāpattisaṃskāraparikṣayāt apūrvānupacayācca kṣiptā iva kṣīṇavegā iṣavaḥ pṛthivīṃ patanti / [068/26-068/27]
T07vakobhau:2521: yena ca tatropapattavyaṃ tasyāvaśyaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ karmāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃbhavati / [068/27]
T07vakobhau:2523: atha samāpattī iti yaduktaṃ katame te samāpattī / [068/28-068/29]
T07vakobhau:2547: yo 'pyenāmutpādya parihīyate so 'pi kilāvaśyaṃ punarutpādyāsaṃjñisattveṣūpapadyata iti / [069/13-069/14]
T07vakobhau:2561: labdhayā tu dvitaīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣvatītayā 'pi samanvāgato bhavati yāvanna tyajati / [069/23]
T07vakobhau:2583: aniyatā ca vipākaṃ prati kadācinna vipacyate / [070/13-070/14]
T07vakobhau:2584: yadīha pariniarvāyāt tasyā hi bhavāgre catuḥskandhako vipākaḥ / [070/14]
T07vakobhau:2587: nahi pṛthagjanā nirodhasamāpattimutpādayituṃ śaknuvantyucchedabhīrutvādāryamārgabalena cotpādanāddṛṣṭadharmanirvāṇasya tadadhimuktitaḥ / [070/17]
T07vakobhau:2597: kṣayajñānasamanaṃ kālaṃ buddhā bhagavanta enāṃ labhante nāsti kiñcidbuddhānāṃ prāyogikaṃ nāma / [070/24]
T07vakobhau:2600: kathaṃ khalvi dānīmanutpāditāyāṃ nirodhasamāpattau kṣayajñānakāle bhagavānubhayotobhāgavimuktaḥ sidhyati / [070/27-071/01]
T07vakobhau:2601: sidhyatyutpāditāyāmiva tasyāṃ vaśitvāt prāgeva tāṃ bodhisattvaḥ śaikṣyāvasthāyāmutpādayatīti pāścattyāḥ / [071/01]
T07vakobhau:2603: evaṃ ca sthaviropaguptasyāpīdaṃ netrīpadaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ bhaviṣyati / [071/02-071/03]
T07vakobhau:2606: nahi pūrvaṃ tasyā utapādanaṃ yujyata iti kāśmīrakāḥ /
T07vakobhau:2610: satyābhisamaye ṣoḍaśabhirbhavāgravairāgye cāṣṭādaśabhirnavaprakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya navānantaryavimuktimārgotpādanāt / [071/09]
T07vakobhau:2617: kathaṃ tarhi “na tāvat bhetsyāmi paryaṅkamaprāpte āsravakṣaya” iti / [071/14-071/15]
T07vakobhau:2622: ubhe api tvete asaṃjñinirodhasamāpattī kāmadhātau rūpadhātau cotpatsyete / [071/18-071/19]
T07vakobhau:2623: ye tvasaṃjñisamāpattiṃ rūpadhātau necchanti teṣāmayaṃ grantho virudhyate / [071/19-071/20]
T07vakobhau:2625: syādrūpāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃjñināṃ devānāṃ visabhāge citte sthitānāmasaṃjñisamāpattiṃ
T07vakobhau:2626: nirodhasamāparttiṃ ca samāpannānāmasaṃjñināṃ ca devānāmāsaṃjñike pratilabdhe yo bhava” iti / [071/22]
T07vakobhau:2635: so 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāvedayita nirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate cāsti caitat sthānamiti
T07vakobhau:2636: yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti sa na haiva dṛṣṭa eva dharme pratipattye vājñāmārāgayati nāpi
T07vakobhau:2637: maraṇakālasamaye bhedācca kāyasyātikramya devān kavaḍīkārāhāra bhakṣānanyatarasmin
T07vakobhau:2639: sa tatropapanno 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭahate cāsti caitat sthānamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātī“ti / [072/06-072/07]
T07vakobhau:2640: atra hi divyo manomayaḥ kāyo rūpāvacara ukto bhagavatā / [072/07]
T07vakobhau:2662: kathamidānīṃ bahukālaṃ niruddhāccittāt punarapi cittaṃ jāyate / [072/20-072/21]
T07vakobhau:2665: kathaṃ tāvad rūpopapannānāṃ ciraniruddhe 'pi rūpe punarapi rūpaṃ jāyate / [072/22]
T07vakobhau:2666: cittād eva hi taj jāyate na rūpāt / [072/22-072/23]
T07vakobhau:2667: evaṃ cittam apy asmād eva sendriyāt kāyāj jāyate na cittāt / [072/23-072/24]
T07vakobhau:2668: anyonyabījakaṃ hy etadubhayaṃ yaduta cittaṃ ca sendriyaśca kāya iti pūrvācāryāḥ / [072/24-072/25]
T07vakobhau:2669: bhadantavasumitrastvāha paripṛcchāyāṃ “yasyācittikā nirodhasamāpattistasyaiṣa doṣo mama tu sacittikā samāpattiri“ti / [072/26] ti /
T07vakobhau:2672: sparśapratyayā ca vedanā saṃjñā cetan''etyuktaṃ bhagavatā / [072/28]
T07vakobhau:2676: satyāmapi tu vedanāyāmarhato na tṛṣṇotpattirevaṃ satyapi sparśe vedannādayo na syuriti / [073/02]
T07vakobhau:2678: avidyāsaṃsparśajaṃ hi veditaṃ pratītyotpannā tṛṣṇetyuktaṃ natu vedanotpattau sparśo viśeṣita ityasamānametat / [073/04]
T07vakobhau:2682: samāpatticittena ca tāṃ samāpadyante samāgacchantīti samāpattiḥ / [073/06]
T07vakobhau:2683: kiṃ punarete samāpattī dravyataḥ sta utāho prajñaptitaḥ / [073/07]
T07vakobhau:2687: samāpatticittameva hi taccittāntaraviruddhamutpadyate yena kālāntaraṃ cittasyā pravṛttimātraṃ bhavati / [073/09]
T07vakobhau:2689: yā 'sau samāpattiriti prajñapyate taccāpravṛttimātraṃ na pūrvamāsīnna paścāt bhavati vyutthitasyeti saṃskṛtā 'sau samāpattiḥ prajñapyate / [073/11]
T07vakobhau:2692: cittamevāsau tatra cittapravṛttiviruddhaṃ labhate taccāpravṛttimātramāsaṃjñikaṃ prajñapyata iti tadetanna varṇayanti / [073/13]
T07vakobhau:2698: etaccaiva na jñāyate āyurnāma ka eṣa dharma iti / [073/18]
T07vakobhau:2703: tad ya ūṣmaṇo vijñānasya cādhārabhūto dharmaḥ sthitihetustadāyuḥ / [073/22-073/23]
T07vakobhau:2705: evaṃ tarhi parasparāpekṣyavṛttitvādeṣāṃ kaḥ pūrvaṃ nivartiṣyate / [073/24]
T07vakobhau:2710: ūṣmaṇastarhi karmādhārbhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati ūṣmā ca vijñānasya / [073/27-073/28]
T07vakobhau:2713: na vai labhyate kāmacāro yat kvacidevoṣmā vijñānasyādhāro bhaviṣyati kvacideva karmeti / [074/02]
T07vakobhau:2721: yāvaddhi karmaṇā nikāyasabhāgasyāvedhaḥ kṛto bhavatyetāvantaṃ kālamavasthātavyamiti tāvat so 'vatiṣṭhate tadāyurityucyate / [074/06-074/07]
T07vakobhau:2723: yastu manyate saṃskāro nāma kaścin guṇaviśeṣa iṣau jāyate yadvaśādgamanamāpatanād bhavatīti / [074/08-074/09]
T07vakobhau:2724: tasya tadekatvāt pratipannābhāvācca deśāntaraiḥ śīghra taratamaprāptikālabhedā nupapattiḥ patanānupapattiśca / [074/09-074/10]
T07vakobhau:2739: kṣīṇe tvāyuṣi puṇyakṣayasya maraṇe nāsti sāmarthyam / [074/17]
T07vakobhau:2744: kāmāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃjñisamāparttiṃ nirodhasamāparttiṃ ca samāpannānāṃ santatyupanibaddhaṃ varttata iti vaktavyam / [074/20-074/21]
T07vakobhau:2745: samāpannānāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ ca sattvānāṃ sakrdutpannaṃ tiṣṭhatīti vaktavyam” / [074/21]
T07vakobhau:2748: yasya tvāśrayopaghāta eva nāsti tadyatho tpannāvasthānāt dvitīyam / [074/23-074/24]
T07vakobhau:2754: ātmasaṃcetanaiva kramate kāmadhātau krīḍāpramoṣkāṇāṃ devānāṃ manaḥpradūṣakāṇāṃ ca / [074/27-074/28]
T07vakobhau:2755: teṣāṃ hi praharṣamanaḥopradoṣābhyāṃ tasmāt sthānāccyutirbhavati nānyathā/ [074/28]
T07vakobhau:2764: atha kasmātsūtra uktaṃ katame te bhadanta sattvā yeṣāṃ nātmasaṃcetanā kramate na parasaṃacetanā / [075/07-075/08]
T07vakobhau:2766: anyeṣu kila dhyānarūpyedhvātmasaṃcetanāsvabhūmika āryamārgaḥ parasaṃcetanā uttarabhūmisāmantakastatra cobhayaṃ nāstīti / [075/09-075/10]
T07vakobhau:2767: nanu caivaṃ tatrāpi parabhūmika āryamārgaḥ parasaṃcetanā prāpnoti / [075/10]
T07vakobhau:2777: ayamatra tadyathāśabdo dṛṣṭāntavācaka iti yukta etasmāccheṣasaṃ pratyayaḥ / [075/14-074/15]
T07vakobhau:2778: eṣa hi dṛṣṭāntadharmo yadekamapi tajjātīyakaṃ dṛśyate / [075/15-075/16]
T07vakobhau:2780: yadyayaṃ tadyathāśabdo dṛṣṭāntavācakaḥ syādiha na prāpnuyāt / [075/16-075/17]
T07vakobhau:2781: santi sattvā nānātvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathā manuṣyastadekatyāścadevā iti / [075/17-075/18]
T07vakobhau:2786: yatraitāni bhavanti sa dharmaḥ saṃskṛto lakṣyate / [075/21]
T07vakobhau:2788: tatra jātistaṃ dharmaṃ janayati sthitiḥ sthapayati jarā jarayati anityatā vināśayati / [075/22-075/23]
T07vakobhau:2795: jarāyā eṣa paryāyastadyathā jāterutpāda ityanityatāyāśca vyaya iti / [075/25-076/01]
T07vakobhau:2796: ye hi dharmāḥ saṃskārāṇāmadhvasaṃcārāya pravṛttāsta eva sūtre lakṣaṇānyuktānyudvejanārtham / [076/01-076/02]
T07vakobhau:2799: tadyathā kila gahanapraviṣṭasya puruṣasya trayaḥ śatravaḥ / [076/03-076/04]
T07vakobhau:2800: tata eka enaṃ gahanādākarṣet dvau punarjīvitādvacyaparopayetāṃ tadvaditi / [076/04-076/05]
T07vakobhau:2804: anye punaḥ kalpayanti sthitiṃ jarāṃ cābhisamasya sthityanyathātvamityekaṃ lakṣaṇamuktaṃ sūtre / [076/07]
T07vakobhau:2806: eṣā hyeṣu saṅgāspadamataḥ śriyamivaināṃ kālakarṇīsahitāṃ darśayāmāsa tasyāmanāsaṅgārthamiti / [076/09]
T07vakobhau:2821: jātijātyādīnāṃ caikatra dharme kathaṃ kṛtvā ātmanā navamo hi dharma utpadyate / [076/18]
T07vakobhau:2825: tadyathā kila kācit kukkuṭī bahūnya patyāni prajāyate kācidalpāni / [076/20-076/21]
T07vakobhau:2826: tadvat sthitirapyātmānaṃ varjayitvā 'nyānaṣṭau dharmān sthāpayati sthitisthitistu tāmeva sthitim / [076/21-076/22]
T07vakobhau:2830: nahyete jātyādayo dharmā dravyataḥ saṃvidyante yathā 'bhivyajyante / [076/24]
T07vakobhau:2833: nahyeṣāṃ dravyato 'stitve kiñcidapi pramāṇamasti pratyakṣamanumānamāptāgamo vā yathā rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāmiti / [076/26-076/27]
T07vakobhau:2834: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ “saṃskṛtasyotpādo 'pi prajñāyate vyayo 'pi sthityanyathātvamapī” ti / [076/27]
T07vakobhau:2838: avidyāndhā hi bālāḥ saṃskārapravāhamātmāta ātmīyataścādhimuktā abhiṣvajante / [076/29-077/02]
T07vakobhau:2839: tasya mithyādhimokṣasya vyāvarttanārthaṃ bhagavāṃstasya saṃskārapravāhasyasaṃskṛtatvaṃ pratītyasamutpannatāṃ dyotayitukāma idamāha “triṇīmāni saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni” / [077/02]
T07vakobhau:2844: punaḥ saṃskṛtagrahaṇaṃ saṃskṛtatve lakṣaṇānīti yathā vijñāye ta / [077/05-077/06]
T07vakobhau:2845: maivaṃ vijñāyi saṃskṛtasya vastuno 'stitve lakṣaṇāni jalavalākāvat sādhvasādutve vā kanyālakṣaṇavaditi / [077/06-077/07]
T07vakobhau:2849: evaṃ ca kṛtvoktaṃ “viditā eva nandasya kulaputrasya vedanā utpadyante viditā ava tiṣṭhante viditā astaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchantī“ti /
T07vakobhau:2855: “kṣaṇikasya hi dharmasya vinā sthityā vyayo bhavet /
T07vakobhau:2856: na ca vyetyeva tenāsya vṛthā tatparikalpanā //“ [077/17]
T07vakobhau:2862: yadapi ca jñānaprasthāna uktam “ekasmiṃścitte ka utpādaḥ / [077/20]
T07vakobhau:2868: pratikṣaṇaṃ cāpi saṃskṛtasyaitāni lakṣaṇāni yujyante vinā 'pi dravyāntarakalpanayā / [077/22]
T07vakobhau:2878: nātivahuviśeṣabhinnāstu saṃskārāḥ satyapyanyathātve sadṛśā eva dṛśyante / [077/27-077/29]
T07vakobhau:2879: antimasya tarhi śabdārciḥkṣaṇasya parinirvāṇakāle ca ṣaḍāyatanasyottarakṣaṇābhāvāt sthityahnyanyathātvaṃ nāstītyavyāpinī lakṣaṇavyavasthā prāpnoti
T07vakobhau:2882: ato yasyāsti sthitistasyāvaśyamanyathātvaṃ bhavatīti nāsti lakṣaṇavyavasthābhedaḥ / [078/02-078/04]
T07vakobhau:2883: samāsatastvatra sūtre saṃskṛtasyedaṃ lakṣaṇamiti dyotitaṃ bhagavatā “saṃskṛtaṃ nāma
T07vakobhau:2884: yadbhūtavā bhavati bhūtvā ca punarna bhavati yaścāsya sthitisaṃjñakaḥ prabandhaḥ
T07vakobhau:2886: kim atra dravyāntarair jātyādibhiḥ katham idānīṃ sa eva dharmo lakṣyas tasyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ yokṣyate / [078/05-078/08]
T07vakobhau:2887: kathaṃ tāvan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni mahāpuruṣān nānyāni sāsnā-lāṅgūla-kakuda-śapha-viṣāṇādīni
T07vakobhau:2888: ca gotvalakṣaṇāni gor nānyāni kāṭhinyādīni ca pṛthivīdhātvādīnāṃ lakṣaṇāni tebhyo nānyāni / [078/08-078/09]
T07vakobhau:2889: yathā codhrvagamanena dūrāddhūmasya dhūmatvaṃ lakṣyate naca tattasmādanyat / [078/09]
T07vakobhau:2891: naca saṃskṛtānāṃ rūpādīnāṃ tāvat saṃskṛtatvaṃ lakṣyate / [078/10-078/11]
T07vakobhau:2892: gṛhṇatāpi svabhāvaṃ yāvat prāgabhāvo na jñāyate paścācca santateśca viśeṣaḥ / [078/11-078/12]
T07vakobhau:2893: tasmānna tenaiva tallakṣitaṃ bhavati naca tebhyo dravyāntarāṇyeva jātyādīni vidyante / [078/12]
T07vakobhau:2896: eko dharmaḥ ekasminneva kāle jātaḥ sthito jīrṇo naṣṭaḥ syādeṣāṃ sahabhūtvāt / [078/14]
T07vakobhau:2898: anāgatā hi jātiḥ kāritraṃ hi karoti / [078/14-078/16]
T07vakobhau:2899: yasmānna jātaṃ janyate janite tu dharme varttamānāḥ kṣityādayaḥ kāritraṃ kurvantīti na yadā jāyate tadā tiṣṭati jīryati vinaśyati vā / [078/16]
T07vakobhau:2901: kimanāgataṃ dravyato 'sti nāstīti paścājjanayati vā naveti sidhyet / [078/17-078/18]
T07vakobhau:2902: satyapi tu tasmin jātiḥ kāritaraṃ kurvatī kathamanāgatā sidhyatītyanāgata lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam / [078/18-078/20]
T07vakobhau:2903: uparatakāritrā cotpannā kathaṃ varttamānā sidhyatīti varttamānalakṣāṇaṃ vaktavyam / [078/20-078/21]
T07vakobhau:2904: sthityādayo 'pi ca yugapat kāritre varttamānā ekakṣaṇa eva dharmasya sthitajīrṇavinaṣṭatāṃ prasañjeyuḥ / [078/21-078/22]
T07vakobhau:2905: yadaiva hyenaṃ sthitiḥ sthāpayati tadaiva jrā jarayati anityatā vināśayatīti / [078/22-078/24]
T07vakobhau:2906: kimayaṃ tatra kāle tiṣṭatvāhosvijjīryatu vinaśyatu vā yo 'pi hi brūyāt sthityādīnāmapi kāritraṃ krameṇeti tasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ bādhyate / [078/24]
T07vakobhau:2907: athāpyevaṃ brūyāt eṣa eva hi naḥ kṣaṇo yāvataitat sarvaṃ samāpyata iti / [078/25-078/26]
T07vakobhau:2908: evamapoi tābhyāṃ sahotpannā sthitistāvat sthāpayati na jrā jarayati anityatā vā vināśyatīti / [078/26]
T07vakobhau:2916: śakyaṃ tu khalu sthityā sthāpyamatyantamapi sthāpayitum / [078/29-079/01]
T07vakobhau:2920: yadi hi te balīyasyau syātāṃ pūrvameva syātām / [079/02-078/04]
T07vakobhau:2921: nivṛttakāritrāyāṃ khalvapi sthitau ta cāpi na tiṣṭataḥ sa cāpi dharma iti kathaṃ kutra vā kāritraṃ karttumutsahiṣyete kiṃ vā punastābhyāṃ karttavyam
T07vakobhau:2922: sthitiparigrahāddhi sa dharma utpannamātro na vyanaśyat / [079/05-079/06]
T07vakobhau:2923: sa tu tayā vyupekṣyamāṇo niyataṃ na sthāsyatyayamevāsya vināśaḥ / [079/06]
T07vakobhau:2925: jarā tu khalu sarvathātvena na tathā /
T07vakobhau:2931: yo 'pyāha nikāyāntarīyo “vināśa kāraṇaṃ prāpyānityatā vināśāyatī“ti tasya harītakīṃ prāpya devatā virecayatītyāpannaṃ bhavati kiṃ punastāṃ kalpayitvā
T07vakobhau:2932: tat evāstu vināśakāraṇādvināśaḥ cittacaittānāṃ ca kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamāttadanityatāyā
T07vakobhau:2935: tasmāt pravāhaṃ pratyetāni saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānyuktānītyevametatsūtraṃ sūnītaṃ bhavati / [079/17]
T07vakobhau:2936: apica yadyanāgatā jātirjanyasya janikā kimarthaṃ sarvamanāgataṃ yugapannotpadyate /
T07vakobhau:2941: sati sāmargya bhāvādasati cābhāvānna jāteriti hetupratyayā eva jana kāḥsantaḥ / [079/21]
T07vakobhau:2944: jātamityeva tu na syādasatyāṃ jātau ṣaṣṭhivacanaṃ ca rūpasyotpādaḥ iti yathā rūpasya rūpamiti / [079/23-079/24]
T07vakobhau:2946: tena tarhy anātmatvam apy eṣṭavyam anātmabuddhi-siddhyartham / [079/24-079/26]
T07vakobhau:2954: tasya viśeṣaṇārthaṃ rūpasyotpāda iti ṣaṣṭīṃ kurvanti yathā rupasaṃjñaka evotpādaḥ pratīyeta mā 'nyaḥ pratyāyīti / [080/02-080/03]
T07vakobhau:2957: yadi jātyā vinā jāyate kasmādasaṃskṛtamapyākāśādikaṃ na jāyate / [080/05]
T07vakobhau:2960: yathā ca dharmatayā na sarvaṃ jātimadiṣyate tathā na sarvaṃ jāyata ityeṣṭavyam / [080/06-080/08]
T07vakobhau:2961: yathā ca tulye jātimattve tadanye pratyayāstadanyasyotpādane na samarthā bhavantyevamevāsaṃskṛtasyotpādane sarve 'pyasamarthāḥ syuḥ / [080/08]
T07vakobhau:2962: siddhā eva tu dravyabhāvena jātyādaya iti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [080/09-080/10]
T07vakobhau:2963: nahi dūṣakāḥ santītyāgamā apāsyante nahi mṛgāḥ santīti yavā noṣyante nahi makṣikāḥ patantīti modakā na bhakṣyante / [080/10-080/11]
T07vakobhau:2971: vākyaṃ padaṃ yāvatā 'rthaparisamāptistadyathā “anityā vata saṃskārā” ityevamādi yena kriyāguṇakālasaṃbandhaviśeṣā gamyante / [080/16-080/17]
T07vakobhau:2974: na vai lipyavayavānāṃ pratyāyanārthamakṣārāṇi praṇītānyakṣarāṇāmeva tu pratyāyanārthaṃ lipyavayavāḥ praṇītāḥ / [080/19]
T07vakobhau:2981: padakāyaḥ tadyathā “sarvasaṃskārā anityāḥ sarvadharma anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇami” tyevamādi / [080/23-080/24]
T07vakobhau:2982: vyañjanakāyastadyathā ka kha ga gha ñetyevamādi / [080/24-080/25]
T07vakobhau:2983: nanu caite vāksvabhāvatvācchabdātmakā iti rūpasvabhāvā bhavanti / [080/25]
T07vakobhau:2986: ghoṣo hi vāk naca ghoṣāmātrenārthāḥ pratīyante / [080/26]
T07vakobhau:2988: vāṅnāmni pravrttate nāmārthaṃ dyotayati naiva ghoṣamātraṃ vāg yena tu ghoṣeṇārthaḥ pratīyate sa ghoṣo vāk / [080/28]
T07vakobhau:2993: yo 'pi hi manyate nāmārthaṃ dyotayatīti tenāpyetadavaśyamabhyupagantavyaṃ yadi pratīpadārthakaṃ bhavatīti / [081/05-081/06]
T07vakobhau:2994: taccaita cchabdamātrādeva pratītapadārthakāt sidhyatīti kimartharaṃ nāma kalpayitvā / [081/06]
T07vakobhau:2995: idaṃ cāpi na jñāyate kathaṃ vāṅnāmni pravarttata iti / [081/06-081/07]
T07vakobhau:2998: ghoṣasvavatvādvācaḥ sarvaṃ ghoṣamātraṃ nāmotpādayiṣyati yādṛśo vā ghoṣaviāśeṣa iṣyate nāmna utpādakaḥ sa evārthasya dyotako bhaviṣyati / [081/09]
T07vakobhau:3000: ghoṣasvabhāvatvādvācaḥ sarvaṃ ghoṣamātraṃ nāma prakaśayiṣyati yādṛśo vā ghoṣaviśeṣa iṣyate nāmnaḥ parakāśakaḥ sa evārthasya dyotako bhaviṣyati
T07vakobhau:3002: na caikasya bhāgaśa utpādo yukta iti kathamutpādayantī vāṅnāmotpādayet / [081/12-081/13]
T07vakobhau:3004: evaṃ tarhi paścima eva de nāmna utpādādyo 'pi tamevaikam śṛṇoti so 'pyarthaṃ pratipadyeta / [081/14-081/15]
T07vakobhau:3005: athāpyevaṃ kalpyeta vāgvyañjanaṃ janayati vyañjanaṃ tu nāmeti / [081/15-081/16]
T07vakobhau:3006: atrāpi sa eva prasaṅgo vyañjanāṃ sāmargyābhāvāt / [081/16]
T07vakobhau:3007: eṣa eva ca prasaṅgo nāmnaḥ prakāśakatve vācaḥ / [081/16-081/18]
T07vakobhau:3008: vyañjanāṃ pi vāgviśiṣṭaprajñā apyavahitacetaskā lakṣaṇataḥ paricchettum notsahanta iti vyañjayāpi vāk naivotpādikā na prakāśikā yujyate / [081/18-081/19]
T07vakobhau:3010: evaṃ satyatītānāgatasyārthasya varttamānaṃ nāma na syād / [081/19-081/21]
T07vakobhau:3011: apatyānāṃ pitṛbhiryatheṣṭaṃ nāmāni kalpyanta iti katamannāma tatsahajaṃ syāt asaṃskṛtānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ kena sahajaṃ nāma syādityaniṣṭireveyam
T07vakobhau:3014: atrārtheṣu kṛtāvadhiḥ śabdo nāma nāmnā ca racanāviśeṣo gātheti nāmasaṃnitābhavati racanāviśeṣāśca dravyāntaraṃ nopapadyate / [081/25]
T07vakobhau:3018: santyeva tu viprayuktasaṃskārabhāvanā nāmakāyā dravyata iti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [081/28]
T07vakobhau:3020: atha kiṃpratisaṃyuktā ete nāmakāyādayaḥ sattvākhyā asattvākhyā vipākajā aupacayikā naiḥṣyandikāḥ kuśalā akuśalā avyākṛtā iti vaktavyam / [082/02]
T07vakobhau:3024: ārupyāptā api santi te tvanabhilāpyā ityapare / [082/05]
T07vakobhau:3026: yaśca dyotayati sa taiḥ samanvāgato na yo dyotyate / [082/05-082/06]
T07vakobhau:3028: yathā caite nāmakāyādayaḥ sattvākhyā naiḥṣyandikā anivṛtāvyākṛtāśca / [082/08]
T07vakobhau:3044: yaktūktaṃ “janyasya janikā jātirna hetupratyayairvinā” iti ka ime hetavaḥ keca pratyayāḥ / [082/21-082/22]
T07vakobhau:3048: kāraṇahetuḥ sahabhūhetuḥ sabhāgahetuḥ saṃprayuktakahetuḥ sarvatragahetuḥ vipākaheturiti / [082/24]
T07vakobhau:3051: saṃskṛtasya hi dharmasya svabhāvavrjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ kāraṇaheturutpādayati / [082/27]
T07vakobhau:3053: nanu ca ye 'syājānata udapatsyantāsravā jānato 'sya te notpadyanta iti jñānameṣāṃ
T07vakobhau:3054: vighnamuatpattau karoti sūryaprabhāvajjyotiṣāṃ darśanasyeti kathaṃ svabhāvavarjyāḥ
T07vakobhau:3058: tadyathā anupadrotāraṃ bhojakamadhikṛtya grāmīṇā bhavanti vaktāraḥ svāminā smaḥ sukhitā iti / [083/04-083/06]
T07vakobhau:3059: yasya punarnāstyeva śaktirvighnayituṃ tasya kathaṃ hetubhāvastadyathā nirvāṇasyānutpattidharmakāṇāṃ ca sarvotpattau nārakādīnāṃ carūpyasattva skandhotpattau / [083/06-083/07]
T07vakobhau:3060: asanto 'pi hyete tathaiva vidhnaṃ karttumasamarthaḥ syuḥ / [083/07-083/08]
T07vakobhau:3061: asamarthe 'pi hi bhojake tathā vaktāro bhavantīti sa evātra dṛṣṭāntaḥ sāmānyenaiva nirdeśaḥ / [083/08-083/09]
T07vakobhau:3062: yastu pradhānaḥ kāraṇahetuḥ sa utpādane 'pi samartho yathā cakṣūrūpe cakṣurvijñānasya āhāraḥ śarīrasya vījādayo 'ṅkurādīnāmiti / [083/10-083/11]
T07vakobhau:3063: yastvevaṃ codayati anāvaraṇabhāvena cetsarva dharmahetavo bhavanti kasmānā sarvasyotpādo yugapadbhavati prāṇātipātena ca ghātakavat sarve tadbhājo bhavantīti / [083/11-083/12]
T07vakobhau:3065: yasmādanāvaraṇabhāvena sarvadharmāḥ hetuḥ pratijñāyante na kārakabhāveneti / [083/13]
T07vakobhau:3069: tena hyālambanāt manovijñānamutpadyate kuśalākuśālaṃ yataḥ krameṇa paścāccakṣurvijñānamiti kāraṇaparaparayā tasyāpi pratyayībhāvādasti sāmarthyam
T07vakobhau:3074: mithaḥ pāraṃparyeṇa ye dharmāḥ parasparaphalāste parasparaḥ sahabhūheturyathā /
T07vakobhau:3080: evaṃ ca kṛtvā sarvameva saṃskṛtaṃ sahabhūheturyathāyogam / [083/23-083/24]
T07vakobhau:3081: vināpi cānyonyaphalatvena dharmo 'nulakṣaṇānāṃ sahabhūheturna tāni tasyetyupasaṃkhyātavyam // [083/25]
T07vakobhau:3083: caittā dvau saṃvarau teṣāṃ cetaso lakṣaṇāni ca / [083/27]
T07vakobhau:3105: satkāyadṛṣṭestatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitimanityatāṃ ca sthāpayitvā yattadanyat kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerhetuḥ / [084/13]
T07vakobhau:3107: ye tarhi “tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇā mi” tyetanna pathanti tairapyetat pathitavyam arthato vaivaṃ boddhavyamiti kāśmīrāḥ / [084/15]
T07vakobhau:3112: anuparivarttyanulakṣanāni caivaṃ cittasya tāni cānyonyaṃ sapratighaṃ copādāyarūpamanyonyamapratighaṃ
T07vakobhau:3113: ca kiñcit sarvaṃ ca bhūtaiḥ prāptayaśca sahajāḥ prāptimataḥ sahabhuvo na sahabhūheturanekaphalavipāka niṣyandatvāt / [084/19-084/20]
T07vakobhau:3116: kiṃ tu prasiddhahetuphalabhāvānāṃ bījādīnāmeṣa nyāyo na dṛṣṭa iti vaktavyametat kathaṃ sahotpannānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ hetuphalabhāva iti / [084/22]
T07vakobhau:3118: saṃpradhāryaṃ tāvadetatkiṃ prabhāyāḥ pradīpo heturāhosvit pūrvotpannaiva sāmagrī saprabhasya pradīpasya sacchāyasyāṅdurasyotpattau heturiti
T07vakobhau:3121: yasya bhāvābhāvayoḥ yasya bhāvābhāvau niyamataḥ sa heturitaro hetumāniti / [084/26-085/01]
T07vakobhau:3122: sahabhuvām ca dharmāṇāmekasya bhāve sarveṣāṃ bhāva ekasyābhāve sarveṣāmabhāva iti yukto hetuphalabhāvaḥ / [085/01]
T07vakobhau:3124: atha evāha evaṃ tarhyavinirbhāviṇo 'pyupādāyarūpasyānyonyameṣa prasaṅgaḥ bhūtaiśca sārdhaṃ cittānulakṣaṇādīnāṃ ce cittādibhiḥ / [085/03-085/04]
T07vakobhau:3127: kimeṣāṃ sahotpannabalenāvasthānamāhosvit pūrvasāmagrīvaśāttathaivotpāda iti annyadapi ca tatra kiñcidbhavati sūtrakaṃ śaṅkuko vā pṛthivī vā dhārikā / [085/06-085/07]
T07vakobhau:3128: eṣāmapi nāmānye 'pi sabhāgahetutvādayo bhavantīti siddhaḥ sahabhūhetuḥ / [085/08]
T07vakobhau:3131: sadṛśā dharmāḥ sadṛśānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sabhāgahetustadyathā kuśalāḥ pañca skandhāḥ kuśalānāmanyoyyaṃ kliṣṭāḥ kliṣṭānāmavyākṛtā avyākṛtānāṃ rūpamavyākṛtaṃ pañcānām / [085/12]
T07vakobhau:3136: bāhyeṣvapi yavo yavasya śāliḥ śāleriti vistareṇa yojyam / [085/15-085/16]
T07vakobhau:3137: ye tu rūpaṃ rūpasya necchanti sabhāgahetuṃ teṣāmeṣa granthaḥ icchāvighātāyasaṃpravarttate “atītāni mahābhūtānyanāgatānāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ heturadhipati” riti / [085/17]
T07vakobhau:3142: svo nikāyo bhūścaiṣāṃ ta ime svanikāyabhuvaḥ / [085/19-085/20]
T07vakobhau:3148: te 'pi kāmāvacarāḥ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikāḥ prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ yāvat bhavāgrabhūmikāstadbhūmikānāmevaṇānyaṣām / [085/24]
T07vakobhau:3157: pūrvotpannāni kuśalamūlānipaścādutpannānāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ svadhātau sabhāgahetunā hetuḥ / [086/02]
T07vakobhau:3160: idapi śāstraṃ “yo dharmo yasya dharmasya hetuḥ kadācitsa dharmastasya na hetuḥ / [086/04]
T07vakobhau:3163: yastu manyate anāgato 'pi sa dharma utpadyamānāvasthāyāṃ sabhāgahetutve niyatībhūto bhavatyatastāṃ caramāvasthāmabhisaṃdhāyoktaṃ “na kadācinna heturi“ti / [086/06-086/08]
T07vakobhau:3164: tasyā yamaparihāro yasmātsa dharma utpadyamānāvasthāyāḥ pūrvaṃ sabhāgaheturabhūtvā paścāt bhavati / [086/08-086/10]
T07vakobhau:3165: ihapi ca praśne yo dharmo yasya dharmasya samanantaraḥ kadācit sa dharmastasya dharmasya na samanantara iti śakyamanayā kalpanayā vaktuṃ syānna kadāciditi / [086/10]
T07vakobhau:3167: yadi sa dharmo notpanno bhavatīti dvimukhasaṃdarśanārthaṃ yathā tatra tathehāpi karttavyam / [086/11]
T07vakobhau:3169: evaṃ sati ko guṇo labhyata ityakauśala mevātra śāstrakārasyaiva saṃbhāvyeta / [086/12-086/13]
T07vakobhau:3171: yattarhīdamuktam “anāgatānāṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvā
T07vakobhau:3172: yattadanyat kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ tatsatkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerheturyattu
T07vakobhau:3174: anāgatasatkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvetyevametat karttavyamarthato 'pi caivaṃ boddhavyamiti / [086/16-086/18]
T07vakobhau:3175: idaṃ tarhi prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate “sarvadharmāścatuṣke niyatā hetauphale āśraye ālamvane niyatā” iti / [086/18]
T07vakobhau:3179: nanu caivaṃ sati sabhāga heturabhūtvā heturbhavatīti prāptam / [086/20-086/21]
T07vakobhau:3182: kiṃ punaḥ syādyadi vipākahetuvadanāgato 'pi sabhāgahetuḥ syāt / [086/22]
T07vakobhau:3193: vīpākaphalasya pūrvaṃ saha cāyogādanāgate cādhvati pūrvapaścimatā 'bhāvāt / [086/27]
T07vakobhau:3200: yaduktaṃ svabhūmikaḥ sabhāgaheturbhavatīti kimeṣa niyamaḥ sarvasya sāsravasyaiṣa niyamaḥ / [087/05]
