T07vakobhau:3203: anāgamye dhyānāntarikāyāṃ caturṣuraneṣu triṣu cārūpyeṣu mārgasatyamanyo 'nyaṃ sabhāgahetuḥ / [087/07]
T07vakobhau:3205: āgantuko hyasau tāsu bhūmiṣu na taddhātupatitastadbhami kābhistṛṣṇābhirasvīkṛtatvāt / [087/08-087/09]
T07vakobhau:3210: tadyathā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntistasyā evānāgatāyāḥ sabhāgahetuviśiṣṭasyaca yāvadanutpādajñānasya / [087/12-087/13]
T07vakobhau:3217: kathaṃ punarūrdhvaṃbhūmikasyādhobhūmmikomārgaḥ samo vā bhavati viśiṣṭo vā / [087/17]
T07vakobhau:3221: kiṃ punaḥ mārga eva samaviśiṣṭayoḥ sabhāgaheturbhavati /
T07vakobhau:3228: ete hi prāyogikāḥ śrutacintābhāvanāmayā guṇāḥ samaviśiṣṭayoreva heturnanyūnānām / [087/26-087/27]
T07vakobhau:3234: teṣāmapi navaprakārabhedāt mṛdumṛdavaḥ sarveṣāṃ mṛdumadhyā aṣṭānāmityeṣānītiḥ / [088/01-088/02]
T07vakobhau:3235: upapattipratilambhikāstu kuśalā dharmāḥ sarve navaprakārāḥ paraspara sabhāgahetuḥ / [088/02]
T07vakobhau:3239: te yathākramaṃ catustrīdvekeṣāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ nirmāṇacittamapoi kāmāvacara caturdhyanaphalam / [088/05]
T07vakobhau:3242: tadyathā śāliryavādīnāṃ mā bhūnniṣphalaḥ prayatna iti / [088/07-088/08]
T07vakobhau:3243: ata eva cāhuḥ syādutpanno 'nāsravo 'nutpannasyāsravasya na hetuḥ syāttadyathā duḥkhe dharmajñānamutpanāmanutpannānāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntīnām/
T07vakobhau:3244: sarvaṃ ca viśiṣṭaṃ nyūnasya na hetuḥ / [088/09-088/10]
T07vakobhau:3246: syādanāgatāḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntayo duḥkhe dharmajñānasyayasmānna pūrvataraṃ phalamastyanāgato vā sabhāgahetuḥ / [088/11-088/12]
T07vakobhau:3247: syāt pūrvotpanno 'nāsravo dharmaḥ paścādutpannasyānāsravasya na hetuḥ / [088/12]
T07vakobhau:3249: tadyathottaraphalaparihīṇasyāvara phalasaṃmukhībhāve duḥkhe dharmajñānaprāptiścottarottara kṣaṇa sahotpannānāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiprāptīnāṃ nyūnatvāditi / [088/14]
T07vakobhau:3256: evaṃ tarhi sati bhinnasantānajānāmapi prasaṅgo navacandrādīni paśyatām / [088/18]
T07vakobhau:3259: samāna āśrayo yeṣāṃ te cittacaittāḥ anyonyaṃ saṃprayuktakahetuḥ / [088/20-088/22]
T07vakobhau:3260: samāna ityabhinnastatadyathā ya eva cakṣurindriyakṣaṇaścakṣurvijñānasyāśrayaḥ sa eva tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ vedanādīnāmeva yāvanmanaḥ / [088/22]
T07vakobhau:3268: ekenāpi hi vinā sarveṇa na saṃprayujyanta ityayameṣāṃ hetubhāvaḥ / [088/27]
T07vakobhau:3272: svabhūmikāḥ pūrvotpannāḥ sarvatragā dharmāḥ paścimānāṃ kliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sarvatragahetuḥ / [089/04]
T07vakobhau:3275: nikāyāntarīyāṇāmapi hetutvādeṣāṃ hi prabhāveṇānyanaikāyikā api kleśā upajāyante / [089/06-089/07]
T07vakobhau:3277: sarva eva kliṣṭā dharmā darśanaprahātavyahetukā iti kāśmīrāḥ / [089/08-089/09]
T07vakobhau:3279: kliṣṭā dharmāḥ yaśca darśanaprahātavyānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vipāka iti / [089/09-089/10]
T07vakobhau:3282: duḥkhasatyaṃ syāt satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerheturiti vistaro yāvanna satkāyadṛṣṭeḥ
T07vakobhau:3283: teṣāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitimanityatāṃ ca sthāpayitvā yattadanyat kliṣṭam duḥkhasatya“miti / [089/13]
T07vakobhau:3284: idaṃ tarhi prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate “syāddharmo 'kuśalo 'kuśalahetuka eva / [089/14-089/15]
T07vakobhau:3285: syādāryapudgalaḥ kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇo yāṃ tatprathamataḥ klilṣṭāñcetanāṃ saṃmukhīkarotī“ti / [089/15]
T07vakobhau:3302: kathamidaṃ vijñātavyaṃ vipākasya heturvipākaheturāhosvidvipāka eva heturvipākahetuḥ / [089/24]
T07vakobhau:3304: yadi vipākasya heturvipākahetuḥ “vīpākajaṃ cakṣuri“ti etanna prāpnoti / [089/25-089/26]
T07vakobhau:3305: atha vipāka eva heturvipākahetuḥ “karmaṇo vipāka” ityetanna prāpnoti / [089/26]
T07vakobhau:3321: dviskandhaka ekaphalaḥ prathame dhyāne vijñaptiḥ saha jātyādibhiḥ / [090/08-090/09]
T07vakobhau:3326: asti karma yasyaikameva dharmāyatanaṃ vīpāko vipacyate jīvitendriyam / [090/12]
T07vakobhau:3327: yasya mana āyatanaṃ tasya dve manodharmāyatane / [090/12-090/13]
T07vakobhau:3328: evaṃ yasya spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ yasya kāyāyatanaṃ tasya trīṇi kāyaspraṣṭavyadharmāyatanāni / [090/13-090/14]
T07vakobhau:3332: asti tat karma yasya pañca ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau nava daśaikādaśāyatanāni vipāko vipacyate / [090/16-090/17]
T07vakobhau:3338: na tu dvaiyadhvikasyāpyekādhviko mā bhūdatinyūnaṃ hetoḥ phalamiti / [090/20-090/21]
T07vakobhau:3340: na ca karmaṇā saha vipāko vipacyate nāpyanantaraṃ samanantarapratyayākṛṣṭatvāt samanantarakṣaṇasya / [090/22]
T07vakobhau:3343: ukta eṣāmarthato 'dhvaniyamaḥ natu sūtrita ityataḥ sūtryate / [090/25]
T07vakobhau:3357: evaṃ tarhi phalatvādasaṃskṛtasya hetunā bhavitavyaṃ yasya tat phalaṃ hetutvācca phalena bhavitavyaṃ yasya taddhetuḥ / [091/04]
T07vakobhau:3363: yāsmāt sa utpādāvighnabhāvena vyavasthāpito na cāsaṃskṛtamutpattimat / [091/08]
T07vakobhau:3364: kasyedānīṃ tatphalaṃ kathaṃ vā mārgasya phalam / [091/09]
T07vakobhau:3382: anityān khalu hetupratyayān pratītyotpannaṃ rūpaṃ kuto nityam bhaviṣyati“ [091/18]
T07vakobhau:3388: ityuktaṃ natūktaṃ ye vijñānasya pratyayāḥ tepyanityā iti / [091/21-091/23]
T07vakobhau:3389: nanu ca hetavo 'pi ya utpādāya ta evānityā iti vacanādasaṃskṛtasyānāvaraṇabhāvamātreṇa kāraṇahetutvāpratiṣedhaḥ / [091/23-091/24]
T07vakobhau:3390: ukta ālambanapratyayaḥ sūtre na tvanāvaraṇaheturiti na sūtre sidhyatyasaṃskṛtasya hetubhāvaḥ / [091/24]
T07vakobhau:3392: sūtrāṇi ca bahūnyantarhitānīti kathametannirdhāryate nokta iti / [091/26]
T07vakobhau:3395: tadānīṃ “pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ katamo yo visaṃyoga” ityuktamidānīṃ isaṃyogaḥkathamaḥ / [092/01]
T07vakobhau:3400: etāvaktu śakyate vaktum nityaṃ kuśalaṃ cāsti dravyāntaram / [092/03-092/04]
T07vakobhau:3413: yastu punaḥ duḥkhasyānutpādaḥ saḥ utpādakāraṇānuśayavaikalyādeveti na tasminprajñāyāḥ sāmarthyamastyato 'sāvapratisaṃkhyānirodha iti / [092/12]
T07vakobhau:3414: so 'pi tu nāntareṇa pratisaṃkhyāṃ sidhyatīti pratisamkhyānirodha evāsau / [092/12-092/13]
T07vakobhau:3415: ya evotpannasya paścādabhāvaḥ sa eva svarasa nirodhādapratisaṃkhyānirodha ityapare / [092/13-092/14]
T07vakobhau:3419: na vai sa pratisaṃkhyāpūrvako nahi poūrvaṃ pratisaṃkhyā paścādanutpannānāmanutpādaḥ / [092/16]
T07vakobhau:3422: vinā tu pratisaṃkhyayā ye dharmā utpatsyante tadutpannāyāṃ pratisaṃkhyāyāṃ punarnopapadyanta iti / [092/18-092/19]
T07vakobhau:3424: yadi narhi anutpāda eva nirvāṇamidaṃ sūtrapadaṃ kathaṃ nīyate “pañcemānīndriyāṇi āsevitāni bhāvitāni bahulīkṛtānyatītānāgatapratyūtpannasya duḥkhasya prahāṇāya saṃvarttanta” iti / [092/21-092/22]
T07vakobhau:3427: kiṃ tu tadālambanakleśaprahāṇāt duḥkhasya prahāṇamuktaṃ bhagavatā “yo rūpe cchandarāgastaṃ prajahīta / [092/24-092/25]
T07vakobhau:3428: cchandarāge prahīṇe evaṃ vastadrūpaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhaviṣyati pārijñātaṃ vistareṇa yāvad vijñānami“ti / [092/25]
T07vakobhau:3432: athavā 'yamabhiprāyo bhavedatītaḥ kleśaḥ paurvajanmikaḥ pratyutpannaḥ kleśa aihajanmiko
T07vakobhau:3435: tenā ca kleśadvayenāsyāṃ santatau bījabhāva āhito 'nāgatasyotpattaye / [093/01]
T07vakobhau:3438: anāgatasya punarduḥkhasya kleśasya vā bījābhāvāt atyantamanutpādaḥ prahāṇam / [093/03-093/04]
T07vakobhau:3440: nahi niruddhe nirodhābhimukhe ca yatnaḥ sārthako bhavatīti / [093/04-093/06]
T07vakobhau:3442: yaduktaṃ bhagavatā “ye keciddharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vā 'saṃskṛtā vā virāgasteṣāmagra ākhyāyate” iti kathamasatāmasannagro bhavitumarhati / [093/06-093/07]
T07vakobhau:3445: tadyathā asti śabdasya prāgabhāvo 'sti paścādabhāva ityucyate / [093/08]
T07vakobhau:3448: abhāvo 'pi ca kaścit praśasyatamo bhavati yaḥ sakalasyopadravasyātyantamabhāva ityanyeṣāṃ so 'gra iti praśaṃsāṃ labdhumarhati / [093/10]
T07vakobhau:3454: ubhayamapi caitadaviparītaṃ dṛṣṭamāryairyaduta duḥkhaṃ ca duḥkhameveti duḥkhābhāvaścābhāva eveti ko 'syāryasatyatve virodhaḥ kathamabhāvaśca nāma tṛtīyaṃ cāryasatyaṃ syāt / [093/14-093/15]
T07vakobhau:3455: ustaṃ yathāryasatyaṃ dvitīyasyānantaraṃ dṛṣṭamuddṛṣṭaṃ ceti tṛtīyaṃ bhavati / [093/15-093/16]
T07vakobhau:3461: devatā enaṃ pālayiṣyanti pālanīyaṃ cet maṃsyate / [093/19]
T07vakobhau:3464: nahi tasya rūpavedanādivat svabhāva upalabhyate nacāpi cakṣurādivatkarma / [093/20-093/21]
T07vakobhau:3465: amuṣya ca vastuno 'yaṃ nirogha iti ṣaṣṭhīvyavasthā kathaṃ prakalpyate / [093/21-093/22]
T07vakobhau:3466: nahi tasya tena sārdhaṃ kaścitsaṃbandho hetuphalādibhāvāsaṃbhavāt / [093/22]
T07vakobhau:3468: bhāvāntaratve 'pi yasya kleśasya prāptivicchedāydyo nirodhaḥ prāpyate sa tasyeti vyavadiśyate / [093/24]
T07vakobhau:3475: “yat svalpasya duḥkhasyāśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupakṣamo 'staṅgamaḥ anyasya ca duḥkhasyāprati sandhiranutpādo 'prādurbhāvaḥ / [094/01-094/02]
T07vakobhau:3476: etatkāntametatpraṇītaṃ yaduta srvopādhipraniniḥ sargastṛṣṇākṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇa” miti / [094/02-094/03]
T07vakobhau:3480: nāsminprādurbhavatīti yadi satītyabhisaṃbadhyate nityamevāprādurbhāvaprasaṅgo nirvāṇasya nityatvāt / [094/05-094/06]
T07vakobhau:3481: atha prāpta ityabhisaṃbadhyate yata eva tatprāptiḥ parikalpyate tasminneva saṃmukhībhūte prāpte vā duḥkhasyeṣyatāmaprādurbhāvaḥ / [094/06-094/07]
T07vakobhau:3482: ayaṃ ca dṛṣṭānta evaṃ sūpanīto bhavati / [094/08]
T07vakobhau:3484: yathā pradyotasya nirvāṇamabhāva evaṃ bhagavato 'pi cetaso vimokṣa iti / [094/09-094/10]
T07vakobhau:3491: svabhāvavastu yathoktaṃ “yadvastu pratilabdhaṃ samanvāgataḥ sa tena vastune“ti / [094/12]
T07vakobhau:3495: yathoktaṃ “yasmin vastuni anunayaḥ saṃyojanena saṃprayuktaḥ pratighasaṃyojanenāpi tasminni“ti / [094/14-094/15]
T07vakobhau:3501: tasya tu hetuphale na vidyete iti /
T07vakobhau:3503: athaiṣāṃ phalānāṃ katamat phalaṃ kasya hetoḥ / [094/19]
T07vakobhau:3511: etadeva aṅgībhāvo 'pi cāsti kāraṇahetostadyathā “pañcasu vijñānakāyeṣudaśānāmāyatanānāṃ bhājanaloke ca karmaṇām / [094/24-094/25]
T07vakobhau:3526: yasmātsahotpannaṃ vā samanantarotpannaṃ vā puruṣakāraphalaṃ bhavati / [095/07]
T07vakobhau:3530: kiṃ punaridaṃ vipākaphalaṃ nāma kiṃ yāvadadhipatiphalam / [095/10]
T07vakobhau:3538: tasmādya utarakālaṃ bhavati na saha nāntaraṃ sa vipākaḥ / [095/16]
T07vakobhau:3550: yadi sarvatragahetorapi samānaṃ phalaṃ kasmānna sabhāgahetoreveṣyate / [095/22-095/23]
T07vakobhau:3551: yasmāt bhūmitaḥ kliṣṭatayā cāsya sādṛśyaṃ natu prakārataḥ / [095/23-095/24]
T07vakobhau:3552: yasya tu prakārato 'pi sādṛśyaṃ so 'bhyupagamyata eva sabhāgahetuḥ / [095/24-095/25]
T07vakobhau:3553: atha eva yo yasya sabhāgahetuḥ sarvatragaheturapi sa tasyeti catuṣkoṭikaḥ kriyate / [095/25]
T07vakobhau:3563: tadyathā adharabhūmikasya prayogacittasyoparibhūmikaḥ samādhiḥ sāsravasyānāsravo dhyānacittasya nirmāṇacittamityevamādi / [096/05-096/06]
T07vakobhau:3572: athaiṣāṃ hetūnāṃ katammo hetuḥ kasminkāle phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti dadāti vā / [096/12]
T07vakobhau:3576: sa tu nāvaśyaṃ saphala iti nocyate / [096/15]
T07vakobhau:3585: nivṛtte tu phale tau cābhyatītau bhavataḥ / [096/21]
T07vakobhau:3586: phalaṃ cāpi dattaṃ na punastadeva dattaḥ / [096/21-096/22]
T07vakobhau:3587: asti kuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti na dadātīti catuṣkoṭikaḥ / [096/22-096/23]
T07vakobhau:3588: prathamā koṭiḥ kuśalamūlāni samucchindan yāḥ prāptīḥ sarvapaścādvijahāti / [096/23-096/24]
T07vakobhau:3589: dvitīyā kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdadhāno yāḥ sarvaprathamaṃ pratilabhate / [096/24]
T07vakobhau:3591: syāttā eva pratisaṃdadhānasya tṛtīyā asamucchinnakuśalamūlasya śeṣāsvavasthāsu / [096/25]
T07vakobhau:3594: kāmavairāgyamanuprāpnuvan yāḥ prāptīḥ sarvapaścādvijahāti dvitīyā kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇo yāḥ sarvaprathamaṃ pratilabhate / [096/28]
T07vakobhau:3604: kuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhlāti na dadātīti /
T07vakobhau:3606: prathamā koṭiḥ kuśalacittānantaraṃ kliṣṭamavyākṛtaṃ vā cittaṃ saṃmukhīkarotīti / [097/06]
T07vakobhau:3615: yasmānna saha vā samanantaro vā 'sti vipākaḥ / [097/11]
T07vakobhau:3627: tatra katame dharmāḥ katibhiḥ hetubhirutpadyanta ityāha samāsata ime caturvidhā dharmāstadyathā kliṣṭā dharmā vipākajāḥ prathamānāsravāstebhyaśca śeṣāḥ / [097/17-097/18]
T07vakobhau:3632: vipākaṃ sarvagaṃ hitvā tau sabhāgaṃ ca śeṣajāḥ // VAkK_2.60 // [097/22]
T07vakobhau:3633: kliṣṭā dharmā vipākahetuṃ hitvā śeṣebhyaḥ pañcabhyo jāyante / [097/22-097/23]
T07vakobhau:3634: vipākajā sarvatragahetuṃ hetvā śeṣebhyaḥ pañcabhya eva / [097/23-097/24]
T07vakobhau:3635: śeṣā dharmāstau vipākasarvatragahetū hitvā śeṣebhyaścaturbhryo jāyante / [097/24-097/25]
T07vakobhau:3636: prathamānāsravāstau ca vipākasarvatragahetū sabhāgahetuṃ ca hitvā śeṣebhyaḥ tribhyo jāyante / [097/26]
T07vakobhau:3639: atha ye cittaviprayuktā rūpiṇaśca dharmāste kathamityāha / [097/29]
T07vakobhau:3641: prayuktakahetunaikena varjitāḥ anye 'pi kliṣṭādayo dharmāstathaivotpadyante yathā cittacaīttāḥ / [098/01]
T07vakobhau:3659: ata eva rūpaṃ na samanantarapratyayo viṣamotpatteḥ / [098/12-098/13]
T07vakobhau:3660: tathāhi kāmāvacarasya rūpasyānantaraṃ kadācit kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ cāvijñaptirūpamutpadyate kadācitkāmāvacaraṃ cānāsravaṃ ceti vyākulo rūpasaṃmukhībhāvaḥ
T07vakobhau:3661: avyākulastu samanantarapratyayaḥ aniruddha evaikasminnaupa cayikarūpasantāne dvitīyotpatteriti bhadantavasumitraḥ / [098/15]
T07vakobhau:3666: tadyathā vaṭanikāyāḥ krameṇa yāvadanekaśākhāvaroho nyagrodha iti / [098/17-098/18]
T07vakobhau:3673: sakala eva kalāpaḥ sakalasya kalāpāntarasya samanantarapratyayo natvalpakādvedanādidravyāt prabhūtaṃ vedanādi dravyamutpadyata ityetāvadevātrottam
T07vakobhau:3675: tadyathā cittaṃ cittasyaiva vedanā vedanāyā eve“ti vistaraḥ / [098/24-098/26]
T07vakobhau:3676: yadā tvakliṣṭāntaraṃ kliṣṭamutpadyate tasya kleśasya pūrvaniruddhaḥ kleśaḥ samanantarapratyayastadyathā nirodhasamāpatticittaṃ vyutthānacittasyeti
T07vakobhau:3682: kathaṃ tarhi bhagavān jānāti amuṣyānāgatattyānantaramidamanāgataṃ bhāvīti / [099/02]
T07vakobhau:3684: atītaṃ kilādhvānaṃ paśyati bhagavānevañjātīyakātkarmaṇaḥ evañjātīyako vīpākaḥ utpanno dharmādvā dharmaḥ / [099/04]
T07vakobhau:3686: tasmādato 'pyevañjātīyako vipāka utpatsyate dharmādvā dharma iti jānāti / [099/05]
T07vakobhau:3688: yasmādatītasāṃpratānumānena bhagavān vikīrṇānyanāgatāni dravyāṇi pratyakṣamīkṣitvā jānātyanena pudgalenaivaṃvidhaṃ karma kurvatedamanāgataṃ phalaṃ parigṛhītamiti / [099/07-099/08]
T07vakobhau:3689: evaṃ tarhi bhagavān pūrvāntamadṛṣṭvā 'parāntaṃ na jānīyāt / [099/08]
T07vakobhau:3691: phalacihnabhūtaḥ sattvānāṃ santatau cittaviprayuktaḥ saṃskāraviśeṣo 'sti yaṃ vyavalokya bhagavānanāgataṃ jānātyasaṃmukhīkṛtvāpi dhyānamabhijñāṃ ceti / [099/10-099/11]
T07vakobhau:3692: naimiktiko hi nāma bhagavān syādevaṃ sati na punaḥ sākṣātkārī / [099/11]
T07vakobhau:3695: atha asatyanāgatasya kramaniyamāvasthāne kasmādagradharmānantaraṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirevotpadyate nānyo dharmaḥ / [099/14]
T07vakobhau:3696: evaṃ yāvadvarjo pamānantaraṃ kṣayajñānamevotpadyate nānyo dharma iti / [099/15]
T07vakobhau:3701: nanu caivaṃ samanantaraniruddhaṃ cittaṃ mano bhavatītyanantara vijñānābhāvāt mano 'pi caramaṃ cittaṃ na prāpnoti / [099/18-099/19]
T07vakobhau:3704: kāritraprabhāvitastu samanantarapratyayastena yo dharmaḥ phalaṃ kpratigṛhītaḥ sa sarvairapi dharmaīḥ sarvaprāṇibhirvā na śakyaṃ pratibnddhuṃ yathā notpadyate / [099/21-099/22]
T07vakobhau:3707: prathamā koṭiracittakāyāḥ samāpattervyutthāna cittaṃ dvitīyādayaśca samāpattikṣaṇāḥ / [099/23-099/24]
T07vakobhau:3708: dvitīyā koṭiḥ prathamasya samāpattikṣaṇasya sacittakāyāścāvasthāyā jātyādayaḥ / [099/24-099/25]
T07vakobhau:3709: tṛtīyā koṭiḥ prathamaḥ samāpattikṣaṇaḥ sacittikā cāvasthā / [099/25-099/26]
T07vakobhau:3710: caturthī koṭi dvīrtīyādīnāṃ samāpattikṣaṇānāṃ jātyādayo vyutthānacittasya ca / [099/26-099/27]
T07vakobhau:3713: ye tṛtīyāvaturthyau te prathamādvitīye ye prathamādvitīye te tṛtīyācaturthyau karttavye / [100/01-100/02]
T07vakobhau:3724: yo dharmo yasya dharmasyālambanaṃ na kadācitsa dharmastaddharmasya nālambanam/ [100/07]
T07vakobhau:3727: ta ete cittacaitā dharmā āyatanadravyalakṣaṇaniyamenālambane yathāsvaṃ niyatāḥ / [100/09]
T07vakobhau:3734: ya eva kāraṇahetuḥ sa evā dhipatipratyayaḥ / [100/13-100/14]
T07vakobhau:3737: na jātu sahabhuvo dharmā ālambanaṃ bhavanti / [100/15-100/16]
T07vakobhau:3744: athaite pratyayāḥ kāritraṃ kurvantaḥ kimavasthe dharme kurvanti / [100/19-100/20]
T07vakobhau:3766: tatra hetupratyaya eṣāṃ sarve pañca hetavaḥ / [101/09-101/10]
T07vakobhau:3768: ālambanapratyayo yathāyogaṃ pañca viṣayāḥ sarve dharmāśca / [101/10-101/11]
T07vakobhau:3774: sahabhūhetuśca jātyādayaḥ sabhāgahetuśca pūrvotpannā samānabhūmikāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ / [101/15]
T07vakobhau:3780: anye tu viprayuktā rūpiṇaśca dharmā hetvadhipatipratyayābhyāṃ jāyante yathāvihitameva / [101/20-101/21]
T07vakobhau:3781: āha tu “pratyayebhyo bhāvā upajāyante na punaḥ sarvasyaiva jagataḥ īśvarapuruṣapradhānādikaṃ kāraṇamiti / [101/21]
T07vakobhau:3784: nanu ca atha evāsya vādasya vyudāsaḥ prāpnotyekaṃ kāraṇamīśvarādikaṃ sarvasyeti / [101/23]
T07vakobhau:3787: yadi hyekameva kāraṇamīśvaraḥ syādanyadvā yugapatsarveṇa jagatā bhavitavyaṃsyāt / [101/26]
T07vakobhau:3789: sa tarhi cchandavaśā dīśvarasya syādayamidānīmutpadyatāmayaṃ nirudhyatāmayaṃ paścāditi / [101/27]
T07vakobhau:3792: kāraṇāntarabhedāpekṣaṇe vā neśvara eva kāraṇaṃ syāt / [102/02-102/04]
T07vakobhau:3800: yadi prītistāṃ tarhi nāntareṇopāye śaktaḥ kartumiti na tasyāmīśvaraḥ syāttathaiva cānyasmin / [102/08-102/09]
T07vakobhau:3801: yadi ceśvaro narakādiṣu prajāṃ bahubhiścetibhirūpasṛṣṭāṃ sṛṣṭvā tena prīyate namo 'stu tasmai tādṛśāyeśvrāya / [102/09]
T07vakobhau:3805: ekaṃ khalvapi jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ parigṛhṇatā 'nyeṣāmarthānāṃ pratyakṣaḥ puruṣakāro nihgṛhṇtaḥ syāt / [102/13]
T07vakobhau:3806: sahāpi ca kāraṇaiḥ kāraka mīśvaraṃ kalpayatā kevalo bhaktivādaḥ syat / [102/14]
T07vakobhau:3813: svānyevaiṣāṃ karmāṇi tasyāṃ tasyāṃ jātau janayanti / [102/17-102/18]
T07vakobhau:3814: akṛtabuddhayastu varākāḥ svaṃ svaṃ vipākaphalaṃ cānubhavanta īśvaramaparaṃ mithyā parikalpayanti / [102/19]
T07vakobhau:3815: gatametadyattu khalu taduktaṃ “dvābhyāmanye tu jāyanta” iti / [102/20]
T07vakobhau:3838: bhūtānāṃ tu tadbhūtikaṃ rūpaṃ vipākahetureva yasya kāyavākkarmaṇo bhūtāni vipākāḥ / [103/09-103/10]
T07vakobhau:3839: abhedena cittacaittāḥ samanantarapratyaya uktā niyamastu noktaḥ kasya cittasyānantaraṃ kasyotpaktiriti / [103/10]
T07vakobhau:3857: kāmadhātau yatkuśalaṃ cittaṃ tasmādanantaraṃ nava cittānyutpadyante / [103/21]
T07vakobhau:3867: tatra punaḥ kāmāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ cittamaṣṭābhyaḥ samanantaramutpadyate / [103/26-103/27]
T07vakobhau:3873: śaikṣāśaikṣe hitvā kāmadhātau hi pratisandhimukhataḥ sarvebhyo rūpārūpyacittebhyaḥ samanantaramakuśalaṃ cittamutpadyate / [104/04]
T07vakobhau:3891: rūpe dhātau yatkukśalaṃ cittaṃ tasmādanantaramekādaśa cittānyutpadyante / [104/17-104/18]
T07vakobhau:3894: rūpāvacaraṃ tu kuśalaṃ cittaṃ navabhyaḥ samanantaramutpadyate / [104/20-104/21]
T07vakobhau:3918: ārūpyāvacaraṃ kukśalaṃ svebhyastribhyo rūpāvacarāt kukśalācchaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca / [105/13]
T07vakobhau:3920: ārūpyāvacarānnivṛtātsvabhūmikāni trīṇi rūpāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ nivṛtaṃ ca kāmāvacaraṃ kliṣṭadvayam / [105/16]
T07vakobhau:3937: prāyogikopapattyāptaṃ śubhaṃ bhittvā triṣu dvidhā // VAkK_2.71 // [106/04]
T07vakobhau:3938: triṣu dhātuṣu kuśalaṃ cittaṃ dvidhā bhidyate /
T07vakobhau:3961: svebhyaḥ kuśalakliṣṭebhyaḥ rūpāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogika kliṣṭābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca / [106/20-106/21]
T07vakobhau:3965: svebhyaḥ saptabhyaḥ pūrvavat rūpāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogikakliṣṭābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca / [106/23]
T07vakobhau:3972: svabhūmikāni ṣaḍanyatra prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyāṃ rūpārupyāvacāre ca kliṣṭe / [106/27-106/28]
T07vakobhau:3973: te punaḥ saptacittānantaraṃ svebhya eva pūrvavat / [106/28]
T07vakobhau:3983: kāmāvacare kuśale abhijñāphalaṃ ca svāni ṣaṭ ārupyāvacaraṃ ca prāyogikaṃśaikṣamaśaikṣaṃ ca / [107/05]
T07vakobhau:3985: kāmāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyāṃ svebhyaścaturbhyo 'nyatreryāpathikavipākajābhyāmārūpyāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogikakliṣṭābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca / [107/07]
T07vakobhau:3987: kāmāvacare kliṣṭe svāni pañcānyatrābhijñāphalāt ārupyāvacaraṃ kliṣṭam/ [107/08-107/09]
T07vakobhau:3992: kāmāvacarebhya utpattipratilambhikairyāpathika vipākajebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ pañcabhyo 'nyatrābhijñāphalāt ārūpyāvacarebhyastribhyo 'nyatra prāyogikāt
T07vakobhau:3994: kāmāvacare kliṣṭe svāni catvāryanyatra prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyāmārūpyāvacaraṃ ca kliṣṭam / [107/14-107/15]
T07vakobhau:4002: rūpāvacaraṃ prāyogikaṃ svāni catvāri śaikṣamaśaikṣaṃ ca / [107/18]
T07vakobhau:4009: svāni catvāri rūpāvacare prāyogikakliṣṭe kāmāvacāre kliṣṭe / [107/22]
T07vakobhau:4023: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prāyogikacittānantaraṃ vīpākajaiyāpathikaśailpasthānikānicittānyutpadyante na punrebhyaḥ prāyogikam / [108/02-108/03]
T07vakobhau:4041: trividhamanaskārānantaramāryamārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti tasmādapi trividhaṃ māskāram evaṃ sati yutamidaṃ bhavati “aśubhāsahagataṃ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅga bhāvayatī“ti / [108/16]
T07vakobhau:4044: aśubhayā tu cittaṃ damayitvā sāmānyamanaskārānantaraṃ mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti / [108/18]
T07vakobhau:4047: syāttāvadanāgamyāditribhūmisaṃniḥśrayeṇa niyāmāvakrāntau tanmārgānantaraṃ kāmāvacaraṃ sāmānyamanaskāraṃ saṃmukhīkuryād / [108/21]
T07vakobhau:4052: nahi prāptaphalasya tatprayogasaṃmukhībhāvo yukta iti anyo 'pyasya tajjātīyaḥ sāmānyamanaskāro bhāvanāṃ gacchati / [108/25-108/26]
T07vakobhau:4053: tadyathā “sarvasaṃkārā anityāḥ sarvadharmā anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇa“miti tatsaṃmukhī kariṣyati / [108/26]
T07vakobhau:4055: anāgamyaṃ niśrityārhattvaṃ prāpnuvataḥ tadbhūmikaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ vā vyutthānaṃ cittam / [108/27-108/28]
T07vakobhau:4068: yāni dvādaśa cittāni uktānyeṣāṃ katamasmiṃścitte katīnāṃ lābhaḥ / [109/05]
T07vakobhau:4069: kliṣṭe traidhātuke lābhaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dvayoḥ [109/06]
T07vakobhau:4070: kāmāvacare kliṣṭe citte saṃmukhībhūte ṣaṇṇāṃ cittānāṃ lābhaḥ / [109/06-109/07]
T07vakobhau:4072: akuśalanivṛtāvyākṛtayoḥ rūpāvacarasya ca kliṣṭasya dhātupratyāgamanāt parihāṇitaśca / [109/09]
T07vakobhau:4081: rūpāvacare kuśale trayāṇāṃ cittānāṃ lābhastasyaiva kuśalasya kāmarūpāvacarayoścānivṛtāvyākṛtayoḥ / [109/18]
T07vakobhau:4087: yatra citte lābhho na vyākhyātastatra tasyaiva lābho draṣṭavyo nānyasya / [109/23]
T07vakobhau:4089: “kliṣṭe citte navānāṃ hi lābhaḥ ityucyate budhaiḥ /
T07vakobhau:4090: ṣaṇṇāṃ tu kuśale citte tasyaivā vyākṛṭe khalu //“ [109/26]
T07vakobhau:4091: tatra saptānāṃ kuśale citta iti vaktavyam / [109/26-110/02]
T07vakobhau:4112: ṣaṭ ca devanikāyāstadyathā cāturmahārājakāyikā strāyastriṃśā yāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavarttinaścetyeṣa kāmadhātuḥ saha bhājanalokena
T07vakobhau:4117: saṃjīvaḥ kālasūtraḥ saṃghāto rauravo mahārauravastapanaḥ pratāpano 'vīciśceti / [111/12]
T07vakobhau:4120: ṣaṭ cānantaroktā devanikāyāḥ tiryaścaḥ pretāśca viṃśatiḥ sthānāni / [111/14-111/15]
T07vakobhau:4121: kāmadhātuḥ paranirmitavaśavartibhyo yāvadavīciḥ sabhājanagrahaṇena tu yāvadvāyumaṇḍalam / [111/15]
T07vakobhau:4132: caturthamanabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavāḥ bṛhatphalā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā ityetāni saptadaśa sthānāni rūpadhātuḥ / [111/25-111/26]
T07vakobhau:4134: brahmapurohiteṣveva kila sthānamutkṛṣṭataraṃ mahābrahmaṇaḥ parigaṇa ivābhinirvṛttamekanāyakaṃ natu bhūmyantaramiti / [112/01]
T07vakobhau:4137: atītānāgatāvijñaptyarūpiṇo hi dharmā ādeśasthā iti niyamaḥ / [112/03]
T07vakobhau:4143: yatraiva hi deśe tatsmāpattilābhinaścyavante tatraivopapadyante iti / [112/07-112/08]
T07vakobhau:4145: yathā rūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ rūpaṃ niśritya pravarttate cittasaṃtatirevamārūpyeṣu kiṃ niśritya pravrttate / [112/11]
T07vakobhau:4146: nikāyaṃ jīvitaṃ cātra niśritā cittasantatiḥ // VAkK_3.3 // [112/12]
T07vakobhau:4148: rupiṇāmapi tarhi sattvānāṃ kimartha na tadeva dvayaṃ niśritya pravarttate cittasantatiḥ / [112/14]
T07vakobhau:4153: tata eva tarhi balavattvāt pravarttiṣyate kim punarniśrayeṇa / [112/15-112/16]
T07vakobhau:4155: yathā rūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ rūpaṃ niśritya pravarttate nikāyasabhāgo jīvitendriyaṃ ca evamarūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ kiṃ niśritya pravarttate / [112/17]
T07vakobhau:4157: rūpiṇāmapi tarhi kimarthaṃ na tadeva dvayamanyonyam /
T07vakobhau:4162: tasmānnāstyarūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ cittasantateranyonyam niśraya iti sautrāntikāḥ / [112/21-112/23]
T07vakobhau:4163: api tu yasyāścittasantaterākṣepaheturavītatṛṣṇo rūpe tasyāḥ saha rūpeṇa saṃbhavādrūpaṃ niśritya pravṛttiryasyāstu heturvītatṛṣṇo rūpe tasyā anapekṣya rūpaṃ pravṛttiḥ / [112/23]
T07vakobhau:4167: kāmapratisaṃyuktodhātuḥ kāmadhātuḥ rūpapratisaṃyukto dhātū rūpadhāturmadhyapadalopādvajrabālakavat maricapānakavacca / [112/26]
T07vakobhau:4173: kāmānāṃ dhātuḥ kāmadhātuḥ kāmān yo dadhāti / [113/01]
T07vakobhau:4177: “na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgaḥ puruṣasya kāmaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4178: tiṣṭhanti citrāṇi tathaiva loke aṭhātra dhīrā vinayanti kāmam” //
T07vakobhau:4182: “na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgaṃ vadasīha kāmam /
T07vakobhau:4185: te cetkāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgo yadi te na kāmaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4186: śāstā 'pi te bhavitā kāmabhogī dṛṣṭvaiva rūpāṇi manoramāṇi”// [113/11-113/12]
T07vakobhau:4187: kiṃ punarye kecana dharmāḥ kāmarūpārupyadhātuṣu samudācaranti sarve te kāmarūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktāḥ / [113/12]
T07vakobhau:4215: pratibuddhotpādaṃ cāsaṃkhyeyasattvaparinirvāṇe 'pi nāsti sattvānāṃ parikṣaya ākāśavat / [113/25]
T07vakobhau:4217: tiryaksūtra uktaṃ tadyathā “īṣādhāre deve varṣati nāsti vīcirvā antarikā va antarīkṣādvāridhārāṇāṃ prapatantīnām / [113/27-113/28]
T07vakobhau:4218: evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi nāsti vīcirvā antarikā vā lokadhātūnāṃ saṃvarttamānānāṃ vivarttamānāṃ ca / [113/28-113/29]
T07vakobhau:4219: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi evaṃ dakṣiṇāsyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarasyāmi“ti / [113/29]
T07vakobhau:4227: yaśca prathamadhyānasaṃniśrayāddhi utpādayati sa yatra lokadhātau jāta utpādayati tatratyameva brahmalokamupāgacchati nānyam / [114/04-114/05]
T07vakobhau:4234: kiṃ punargatinirmuktāḥ santi dhātavo yata dhātuṣvityucyante / [114/10]
T07vakobhau:4242: prajñyaptipūktam “catasṛbhiryonibhiḥ pañca gatayaḥ saṃgṛhītā natu pañcabhirgatibhiścatasro yonayaḥ / [114/15]
T07vakobhau:4246: catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya yo rūpaprasādaścakṣuścakṣurindriyaṃ cakṣurāyatanaṃ cakṣurdhātunarikastairyagyonikaṃ paitṛviṣayiko devyo mānuṣyako bhāvanāmayo 'ntarābhavikaśce“ti / [114/18-114/19]
T07vakobhau:4249: “sapta bhavā narakabhavastiryagbhavaḥ pretabhavo devabhavo manuṣyabhavaḥ karmabhavo 'ntarābhava” iti / [114/20-114/21]
T07vakobhau:4250: atra hi pañca gatayaḥ sahetukāḥ sahāgamanāścoktāḥ / [114/21]
T07vakobhau:4255: teṣāmāyuṣman kāyavāṅmanovaṅkānāṃ kāyavāṅmanodoṣakaṣāyāṇā narakeṣu rūpaṃ saṃjñā vedanā saṃskāro vijñānaṃ vipāko vipacyate / [114/26-224/26]
T07vakobhau:4256: nirvṛtte vipāke nāraka iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati / [114/26-114/27]
T07vakobhau:4260: pratisaṃdhicittāni hi gatīnāṃ pañcaprakārāṇi santyataḥ sapraveśagatigrahaṇādadoṣa eva / [115/02-115/03]
T07vakobhau:4276: yadi hi gatiḥ syādantarābhava ityeva na syāt / [115/10-115/11]
T07vakobhau:4277: yatarhi sthaviraśāriputreṇoktaṃ “nirvṛtte vipāke nāraka iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatī“ti / [115/11-115/12]
T07vakobhau:4278: nirvṛtte vīpāka ityuktaḥ natu vipāka eveti / [115/12-115/13]
T07vakobhau:4280: gatigāminaḥ pudgaladravyasya pratiṣedhaṃ karoti nānyatra skandhebhya upalabhyate nāraka iti na tu skandhāntarapratiṣedham / [115/14-115/15]
T07vakobhau:4281: avyākṛtā eva tu gatayo varṇyante vaibhāṣikaiḥ / [115/15]
T07vakobhau:4288: sūtre uktaḥ “rupiṇaḥ santi sattvā nānātvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathāmanuṣyāstadekatyāśca devāḥ / [115/22]
T07vakobhau:4297: rūpiṇaḥ santi nānātvakāyā ekatvasaṃjñinastadyathā devā brahmakāyikā ye tatprathamābhinirvṛttāḥ / [115/27]
T07vakobhau:4299: te hi prathamābhinirvṛttāḥ sarva ekaikasaṃjñino bhavanti anena vayaṃ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā iti / [115/28-115/29]
T07vakobhau:4301: anyathaiva tu mahābrahmaṇa ārohapariṇāha ākṛtivigraho vāgbhāṣā cīvaradhāraṇaṃ ca anyathā tatparṣada iti nānātvakāyāḥ / [115/31-116/02]
T07vakobhau:4302: yadidamuktaṃ sūtre “teṣāmevaṃ bhavati imaṃ vayaṃ sattvamadrākṣma dīrghāyuṣaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ yāvadaho vatānye 'pi sattvā ihopapadyeranmama sabhāmatāyāmi“ti / [116/02]
T07vakobhau:4303: asya ca sattvasyaivañcetasaḥ praṇidhirvayaṃ cehopapannā iti / [116/02-116/03]
T07vakobhau:4306: tato hi te pracyutāḥ kathamidānīmalabdhāyāṃ dvitīyadhyānasamāpattau tadbhūmikaṃ pūrvenivāsamasmārṣuḥ labdhāyāṃ vā kathaṃ mahābrahmālambanāṃ śīlavrataparāmarśadṛṣṭiṃ niviṣṭāḥ / [116/05]
T07vakobhau:4309: kathaṃ teṣāmevaṃ bhavati sma “imaṃ vayaṃ sattvamadrākṣma dīrghāyuṣaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantami“ti / [116/08-116/09]
T07vakobhau:4310: tasmāttatrasthā eva te tasya pūrvavṛttāntaṃ samanusmaranta eva dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ dṛṣṭavanto dṛṣṭvā ca paścādadrākṣmetyeṣāṃ babhūva
T07vakobhau:4311: rupiṇaḥ santi sattvā ekatvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathā devā ābhāsvarāḥ / [116/10]
T07vakobhau:4314: anyathā hi parīttābhā apramāṇābhāśca kasyāṃ vijñānasthitau vyavasthāpyeran / [116/12-116/13]
T07vakobhau:4317: te kila maulyāṃ bhūmau saumanasyendriyaparikhinnāḥ sāmantakādupekṣendriyaṃ saṃmukhībhavanti / [116/15-116/16]
T07vakobhau:4318: sāmantake copekṣendriyaparikhinnāḥ punamaulyā bhumeḥ saumanasyendriyaṃ saṃmukhīkurvanti / [116/16-116/17]
T07vakobhau:4319: yathā kāmaratiparikhinnā īśvarā dharmaratiṃ pratyanubhavanti dharmaratiparikhinnāḥ kāmaratimiti / [116/17]
T07vakobhau:4323: śāntaṃ hi tatsukhamaśāntaṃ ca saumanasyaṃ cetasa utplāvakatvāditi sautrāntikā vyācakṣate / [116/19-116/20]
T07vakobhau:4325: tatra ye sattvā ābhāsvare devanikāye 'ciropapannā bhavanti naiva saṃvarttanīkuśalā na vivarttanīkuśalā asya lokasya te tāmarciṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītāḥ santa udvijante saṃvegamāpadyante / [116/22]
T07vakobhau:4327: tatra ye sattvā ābhāsvare devanikāye ciropapannāḥ saṃvarttanīkuśalā vivarttanīkuśalāścāsya lokasya te tān sattvān bhītānāśvāsayanti / [116/24-116/25]
T07vakobhau:4328: mā bhaiṣṭa māṛṣāḥ mā bhaiṣṭa mārṣāḥ / [116/25]
T07vakobhau:4330: ato 'rciṣa āgamavyapagamasaṃjñitvāt bhītā bhītasaṃjñitvācca te nānātvasaṃjñino na sukhāduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñitvāditi / [116/27-116/28]
T07vakobhau:4331: rūpiṇaḥ santi sattvā ekatvakāyā ekatvasaṃjñinastadyathā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ / [116/28]
T07vakobhau:4335: tatra prathame dhyāne kliṣṭayā saṃjñayā ekatvasaṃjñinaḥ / [117/02-117/03]
T07vakobhau:4336: dvitīye kuśalayā saṃjñayā nānātvasaṃjñinastṛtīye vipākajayā saṃjñayāekatvasaṃjñinaḥ / [117/03-117/04]
T07vakobhau:4345: atra hi vijñānaparibhedāḥ santyata eva na vijñānasthitiḥ / [117/08]
T07vakobhau:4346: kaḥ punaḥ paribhedaḥ yena vijñānaṃ paribhidyate [117/08-117/09]
T07vakobhau:4353: caturthe dhyāne sattvā uccalitamānasāḥ pṛthagjanā āsaṃjñikaṃ praveṣṭukāmā āryāḥ śuddhāvāsān bhavāgrānapaṭupracāratvānna vijñānasthitiriti /
T07vakobhau:4363: anyatra sūtre sapta vijñānasthitaya uktāḥ anyatra [117/21]
T07vakobhau:4366: rūpopagā vijñāna sthitirvedanopagā saṃjñopagā saṃskāropagā iti / [117/23]
T07vakobhau:4375: na ca visabhāgabhūmikeṣu skanheṣu vijñānaṃ tṛṣṇāvaśāt pratitiṣṭhatīti / [117/28-117/29]
T07vakobhau:4376: kasmānna vijñānaṃ vijñānasthitirucyate yathā saptasu vijñānasthitiṣu pañca skandhā iti / [117/29]
T07vakobhau:4380: yāṃśca dharmānabhiruhya vijñānaṃ vāhayati naunāvikanyāyena te dharmā vijñānasthitaya uktāḥ / [118/03]
T07vakobhau:4381: natu vijñānaṃ vijñānamevāruhya vāhayatyato noktamiti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [118/03-118/04]
T07vakobhau:4382: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ “vijñāne āhāre asti nandī asti rāga iti / [118/04-118/05]
T07vakobhau:4383: yatrāsti nandī asti rāgaḥ pratiṣṭhitaṃ tatra vijñānamadhirūḍhami“ti / [118/05]
T07vakobhau:4386: evaṃ tarhyabhedenopapattyāyatanasaṃgṛhīteṣu skandheṣu sābhirāmāyāṃ vijñānapravṛttau vijñānaṃ vijñānasthitiḥ / [118/07-118/08]
T07vakobhau:4387: pratyekaṃ tu yathā rūpādayo vijñānasya saṃkleśāya bhavanti / [118/08]
T07vakobhau:4391: api ca kṣetrabhāvena bhagavatā catasro vijñānasthitayo deśitāḥ / [118/11-118/13]
T07vakobhau:4392: vījabhāvena ca sopādānaṃ vijñānaṃ kṛtsnameveti na punarbījaṃ bījasya kṣetrabhāvena vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūvetyabhiprāyaṃ parikalapayāmāsa / [118/13-118/14]
T07vakobhau:4393: ye dharmāḥ sahavarttino vijñānasya te 'sya kṣetrabhāvena sādhīyāṃso bhavantīti ta evāsya sthitaya uktāḥ / [118/15-118/16]
T07vakobhau:4394: atha kathaṃ saptabhirvijñānasthitibhiścatasro vijñānasthitayaḥ saṃgṛhītāścātasṛbhirvā sapta / [118/16]
T07vakobhau:4395: naiva hi saptabhiścatasro nāpi catasṛbhiḥ sapta / [118/17]
T07vakobhau:4400: dvitīyā apāyeṣu caturthe dhyāne bhavāgre ca vijñānavarjyāḥ skandhāḥ / [118/20-118/21]
T07vakobhau:4417: ye sattvā avikalā ahīnendriyāḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetāḥ sakṛdupajāyante / [119/01-119/02]
T07vakobhau:4421: atha kasyāṃ gatau kati yonayaḥ saṃvidyanta ityāha [119/04]
T07vakobhau:4424: aṇḍajāstāvadyathā kroñcīniryātau śailopaśailau sthavirau mṛgāramātuśca dvātriṃśat putrāḥ pañcālarājasya ca pañca putraśatāni / [119/07]
T07vakobhau:4437: “pañca putrānahaṃ rātrau divā paña tathā parān / [119/16]
T07vakobhau:4438: bhakṣayāmi janitvā tān nāsti tṛptistathāpi me //“ [119/17]
T07vakobhau:4441: atha kimarthaṃ caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ prāptopapattivaśitve 'pi jarāyurjāṃ yorni bhajate / [119/18-119/19]
T07vakobhau:4444: cānyeṣāṃ bahumānādarāvarjanārthaṃ manuṣyabhūtā api caināṃ siddhiṃ gacchantīti vineyānā mutsāhārtham / [119/21-119/23]
T07vakobhau:4445: itarathā hyaprajñāyamānakulagotraḥ ko 'pyayaṃ māyāpuruṣa ityevaṃ parikalpayeyurdevaḥ
T07vakobhau:4446: piśāca iti vā yathā 'nyatīrthyā apabhāṣante kalpaśatasyātyayādevaṃvidho māyāvī loke
T07vakobhau:4449: śarīradhātūnāmavasthāpanārthaṃ yeṣumanuṣyā anye ca prajāṃ vijñāya sahasraśaḥ svargaṃ
T07vakobhau:4450: ca prāptā apavargaṃ ceti upapādukānāṃ hi sattvānāṃ bāhyabījābhāvān mṛtānāṃ kāyo nāvatiṣṭhate
T07vakobhau:4452: ādhiṣṭhānikīmṛddhiṃ bhagavata icchatāṃ na yukta ekṣa parihāraḥ / [119/27]
T07vakobhau:4454: yadyapyupapādukānāṃ kāyanidhanaṃ na prajñayate kathamuktaṃ sūtre “upapādukaḥ suparṇī upapādukaṃ nāgamuddharati bhakṣārthami“ti / [120/02]
T07vakobhau:4456: bhakṣayati vā yāvanna mṛto bhavati na pounrmṛtasyāsya tṛṣyatīti / [120/04]
T07vakobhau:4459: sā hi dvigatī tisṛṇāṃ ca pradeśaḥ sarve cāntarābhāvikā iti / [120/06]
T07vakobhau:4462: maraṇabhavasyopapattibhavasya cāntarā ya ātmabhāvo 'bhinirvarttate deśāntaropapattisamprāptaye so 'ntarābhava ityucyate / [120/09]
T07vakobhau:4477: santānavarttināṃ hi dharmāṇāmavicchedena deśāntareṣu prādurbhāvo dṛṣṭastadyathā vrīhisantānasya / [120/19-120/920]
T07vakobhau:4479: vicchinno 'pi dṛṣṭaḥ prādurbhāvastadyathā ādarśādiṣu bimbāt pratibimbasya / [120/21]
T07vakobhau:4486: tatraiva hi deśe ādarśarūpaṃ dṛśyate pratibimbaṃ ca / [120/26-120/27]
T07vakobhau:4487: na caikatra deśe rūpadvayasyāsti sahabhāva āśrayabhūtabhedāt / [120/27-120/30]
T07vakobhau:4489: 'nyaṃ pratibimbakamupalabhyate natvekatra rūpe dvayoḥ paśyatoḥ sahadarśanaṃ na bhavatīti
T07vakobhau:4492: upalabhyate ca chāyāstha ādarśe sūryasya prativimbakamiti na yukto 'sya tatra prādurbhāvaḥ / [121/02]
T07vakobhau:4495: anyatraiva hi deśe ādarśatalaṃ bhavatyanyatraivāntargataṃ candrapratibimbakaṃ dṛśyate kūpa ivodakam / [121/04-121/05]
T07vakobhau:4498: sāmagryāstu sa tasyāstādṛśaḥ prabhāvo yattathā darśanaṃ bhavati // [121/06]
T07vakobhau:4499: acintyo hi dharmāṇāṃ hi dharmāṇāṃ śaktibhedaḥ / [121/06-121/07]
T07vakobhau:4505: santānaṃ ca pratyavicchedena deśāntareṣu prādurbhāva udāhṛato nāsantānamityasāmyaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya pratibimbasya ca / [121/12]
T07vakobhau:4508: bimbāccādarśā cceti yat prādhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadāśrityotpadyate / [121/14-121/16]
T07vakobhau:4509: nacaivamupapattibhavasyāpi dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ saṃbhavo maraṇabhavāccānyataśca pradhānabhūtādityato 'pyayamasamāno dṛṣṭāntaḥ / [121/16]
T07vakobhau:4510: na ca yuktamuktaṃ bāhyameva cetanaṃ śukraśoṇitaṃ pradhānakāraṇamiti / [121/16-121/17]
T07vakobhau:4511: yatra cāndhakāṇa eva prādurbhāva upapādukānāṃ tatra kiṃ parikalpyate / [121/17-121/18]
T07vakobhau:4517: narakabhavastiryagbhavaḥ pretabhavo devabhavo manuṣyabhavaḥ karmabhavo 'ntarābhava iti / [121/21]
T07vakobhau:4522: mātā kalyā spi bhavati ṛtumatī ca / [121/24]
T07vakobhau:4531: kṣatriyo vā 'sau brāhmaṇo vā vaiśyo vā śūdro vā / [121/28-122/01]
T07vakobhau:4532: yadi vā pūrvasyā diśa āgato yadi vā dakṣiṇasyā paścimāyā uttrasyā” iti / [122/02]
T07vakobhau:4541: upapadyādayo 'pi hi nāma devā evaṃ sati prasajyate /
T07vakobhau:4548: tadyathā parīttaḥ sakalikāgnirabhinivarttamāna eva parinirvāyādevaṃ prathamaḥ / [122/12]
T07vakobhau:4551: nacaivamantarā nāma devāstriprakārāḥ kāladeśaprakarṣabhinnāḥ santīti kalpanaiveyaṃ kevalā // [122/14]
T07vakobhau:4553: āyupramāṇāntare vā devasamīpāntare vā yaḥ kleśān prajahāti so 'ntarāparinirvāyī / [122/16-122/17]
T07vakobhau:4554: sa punardhātugato vā parinirvāti saṃjñāgato vā vitarkagato vā / [122/17]
T07vakobhau:4556: prathamo vā rūpadhātau nikāyasabhāgaparigrahaṃ kṛtvā parinirvāti / [122/18]
T07vakobhau:4559: upapadyaparinirvāyī punaḥ prakarṣayuktāṃ saṃgītimanupraviśya parinirvāti bhūyasā vā āyurūpahatya nopapannamātra eveti ta ete sarve 'pi śakalikādidṛṣṭāntairna saṃvadhyante / [122/21]
T07vakobhau:4564: saṃjñayā ṣaṭṭikāṃ kṛtvā vargo bhavati samuditaḥ // [122/25]
T07vakobhau:4568: kimidānīṃ kurmo yacchāstā ca parinirvṛtaḥ śāsanaṃ cedamanāyakaṃ bahudhā bhinnaṃ bhidyate cādyāpi yathecchaṃ granthataścārthataśca / [123/01-123/02]
T07vakobhau:4569: yeṣāṃ tu tāvadayamāgamaḥ pramāṇaṃ teṣāmāgamato 'pi siddho 'ntarābhavaḥ / [123/02-123/03]
T07vakobhau:4570: yattarhi sūtra uttam “atha ca punardūṣī māraḥ svaśarīreṇāvicau mahānarake prapatita” iti / [123/03]
T07vakobhau:4574: atyudīrṇaparipūrṇāni hi karmāṇi kāyasya nikṣepaṃ na pratīkṣante / [123/06]
T07vakobhau:4575: ato 'sya dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma pūrvaṃ vīpakvaṃ paścādupapadyavedanīyamiti / [123/07-123/08]
T07vakobhau:4576: idamidānīṃ kathaṃ nīyate “pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi yāni kṛtvopacitya samanantaraṃ narakeṣūpapadyata” iti / [123/08]
T07vakobhau:4582: na kālāntaraṃ jīvitvā ko vā 'ntarābhavasyopapadyamānatvaṃ necchati / [123/10-123/11]
T07vakobhau:4588: vāso 'pi hi nāsti te 'ntarā pātheyaṃ ca na vidyate tave” ti // [123/15]
T07vakobhau:4598: ato yāṃ gatiṃ gantā bhavati tasyāṃ gatau ya āgamiṣyatpūrvakālabhavastasyaivāsyākṛtirbhavati / [123/23-123/25]
T07vakobhau:4599: evaṃ tarhi śunīprabṛtīnāmekasmin kukṣau pāñcagatiko 'ntarābhavo 'bhinirvarttate iti nārako 'ntarābhavaḥ kukṣiṃ nirdahet / [123/25-123/26]
T07vakobhau:4600: pūrvakālabhave 'pi tāvannārakā na nityaṃ prajvalitā bhavantyutsadeṣu bhramantaḥ kiṃ punarantarābhavikāḥ / [123/26]
T07vakobhau:4602: sa tu yathā na draṣṭuṃ śasyate tathā na spraṣṭumapyacchatvādātmabhāvasyetyacodyametat / [123/27-123/28]
T07vakobhau:4604: pramāṇaṃ tu yathā pañcaṣaḍvarṣasya dārakasya sa tu ṣaṭindriyo bhavati bodhisattvasya punaryathā saṃpūrṇayūnaḥ salakṣaṇānuvyañjanaśca / [124/01-124/02]
T07vakobhau:4605: ata evāntarābhavasthena mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśatā koṭīśataścāturdvīpikānāmavabhāsitaḥ / [124/03]
T07vakobhau:4606: yattarhi mātā bodhisatvasya svapne gajapotaṃ pāṇḍaraṃ kukṣiṃ praviśantamadrākṣīt / [124/03-124/04]
T07vakobhau:4610: aśucikapiḥ paṭakalahāviti daśa dṛṣṭā nṛpeṇa kṛkiṇā svapnāḥ” // [124/07]
T07vakobhau:4611: naiva cāntarābhavikaḥ kukṣiṃ bhittvā praviśatyapi tu māturyonidvāreṇa / [124/07-124/08]
T07vakobhau:4612: ata eva yamalayoryaḥ paścāt prajāyate sa jyāyānucyate yaḥ pūrvaṃ sa kanīyāniti / [124/08]
T07vakobhau:4619: kavīnāṃ ca kāvyaṃ samāyojayatāṃ kecit bhāvāḥ samāropitā gacchanti / [124/12]
T07vakobhau:4621: yathā 'sya mātā svapne taṃ praviśantamadrākṣittathā so 'pi gāthāmakārṣīditi / [124/13-124/14]
T07vakobhau:4624: bodhisattvasya savastraḥ śuklāyāśca bhikṣuṇyāḥ praṇidhānavaśādhyāvantameva pariveṣṭitā nirdagdhā / [124/15]
T07vakobhau:4633: tasmāt pareṇa maraṇakṣaṇaṃ paryudasyānyaḥ sarvo bhavaḥ pūrvakālabhavaḥ / [124/21]
T07vakobhau:4634: caramakṣaṇo maraṇabhabo yata ūrdhvamantarābhavo bhavati rūpiṣu cetsattveṣūpapadyate / [124/22]
T07vakobhau:4638: yeṣāṃ ca divyaṃ cakṣuḥ suviśuddhamabhijñāmayaṃ ta enaṃ paśyanti / [125/01]
T07vakobhau:4657: tathā hi pradīptāyaḥpiṇdabhede tanmadhyasaṃbhūtaḥ krimirūpalabdhaḥ śrūyate / [125/12]
T07vakobhau:4658: yasyāṃ ca gatau sa utpatsyamānastasyāḥ sarvathā / [125/13]
T07vakobhau:4673: yāvadupapattisāmagrīṃ na labhate nahi tasyāyuṣaḥ pṛthagevākṣepaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4676: yadyāsumeroḥ sthalaṃ māṃsasya syāttatsarva varṣāsu krimīṇāṃ pūryeta / [126/01-126/02]
T07vakobhau:4677: kimidānīṃ tatpratīkṣā eva teṣāmantarābhavā āsan kuto yā tadā tebhyo gatā iti vaktavyam / [126/02]
T07vakobhau:4681: te taṃ gandhaṃ ghrātvā gandharasābhigṛddhāḥ kālaṃ kurvantaḥ krimibhāvasaṃvarttanīyaṃ karma pravodhya tayā tṛṣṇayā krimiṣūpapadyanta iti / [126/05-126/07]
T07vakobhau:4682: athavā nūnaṃ tatpratyayapracūra eva kāle tatsaṃvarttanīyāni karmāṇi vīpākābhinirvṛttau vṛttiṃ labhnte nānyatra / [126/07-126/08]
T07vakobhau:4683: tathāhi cakravarttisaṃvarttanīyāni karmaṇi aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ vahutarāyuṣi vā cakravarttino jāyante nānyasyām / [126/08-126/09]
T07vakobhau:4684: ata eva coktaṃ bhagavatā “acintyaḥ sattvānāṃ karmavipāka” iti / [126/09]
T07vakobhau:4686: yadi tāvatā sāmagrīṃ na labhate tatraiva punaścyutyā jāyante / [126/10]
T07vakobhau:4689: sa hi saṃbhavaiṣitvātsamdhāvagatvā samdhiṃ badhnātīti yathātvasamagrāḥ pratyayā bhavanti / [126/12]
T07vakobhau:4690: niyataṃ cānena tasmin deśe tasyāṃ jātau janitavyaṃ bhavati / [126/12-126/13]
T07vakobhau:4692: athāniyātaṃ tato 'nyatra deśe tasyāṃ jātau jāyate sadṛśyā mityapare / [126/14-126/15]
T07vakobhau:4693: tadyathā gavāmūṣmasu maithunasya prācuryaṃ śaradi śunāṃ ṛkṣānāṃ hemante cākṣvānām / [126/15-126/17]
T07vakobhau:4694: gavayaśṛgālakharatarakṣāṇāṃ punaḥ kālo nāstīti yenānyatra kāle goṣūpapattavyaṃ sa
T07vakobhau:4695: gavayeṣūpapadyate yena śvas sa śṛgāleṣu yenāśvesu sa gardabheṣu yena ṛkṣeṣu sa tarakṣeṣūpapadyate iti / [126/17-126/18]
T07vakobhau:4696: na tvasya nikāyasabhāgāntarābhavo nānyatra nikāyasabhāge śakyamutpattumekakāmākṣepāditi vaktavyametat / [126/19]
T07vakobhau:4699: sa hi karmaprabhāvasaṃbhūtena cakṣuṣā sudūrastho 'pi svamupapattideśaṃ prekṣate / [126/21-126/22]
T07vakobhau:4700: tatrāsya mātāpitrostāṃ vipratipattiṃ dṛṣṭvā puṃsaḥ sataḥ pauṃsno rāga utpadyate mātari stryā satyā straiṇo rāgāḥ udpadyate pitari / [126/22-126/23]
T07vakobhau:4702: evaṃ paṭhacyate prajñaptau “gandharvasya tasmin samaye dvayościttayoranyatarānyataraccittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtaṃ bhavatyanunayasahagataṃ vā pratighasahagataṃ veti / [126/24-126/25]
T07vakobhau:4703: sa tābhyāṃ viparyasto rantukāmatayā tam deśamāśliṣya tāmavasthāmātmanyadhimucyate / [126/25-126/26]
T07vakobhau:4706: sa cetpumān bhavati māturdakṣiṇakukṣimāśritya pṛṣṭhābhimukha utkeṭukaḥ saṃbhavatyatha strī tato vāmakukṣimāśrityodarābhimukhī / [127/01]
T07vakobhau:4707: athedānīṃ napuṃsakaṃ tadyena rāgeṇāśliṣṭaṃ tathā tiṣṭhati / [127/01-127/02]
T07vakobhau:4709: athaḥ strībhūtaḥ puruṣabhūto vā 'nupraviśya yathāsthānaṃ tiṣṭhati paścāt garbha āpyāyamāno napuṃsakaṃ bhavatīti” / [127/03]
T07vakobhau:4714: anindriyaṃ hi śukraśoṇitamantarābhavena sārdhaṃ nirudhyate sendriyaṃ prādurbhavati / [127/06-127/07]
T07vakobhau:4716: evaṃ ca kṛtvedaṃ sūtrapadaṃ sūtre sūnītaṃ bhavati “mātāpitraśucikalalasaṃbhutasye“ti / [127/08-127/09]
T07vakobhau:4717: tathā “dīrgharātraṃ yuṣmābhirbhikṣivaḥ katasiḥ saṃvarddhitā rudhiravindurūpātta” iti / [127/09]
T07vakobhau:4721: evaṃ tāvadaṇḍajāṃ jarāyujāṃ ca yorni pratipadyate / [127/11]
T07vakobhau:4725: saṃsvedajāṃ yoniṃ pratipadyamāna upapattisthānaṃ gatvābhilāṣāt gacchatyamedhyaṃ medhyaṃ vā yathākramam / [127/15]
T07vakobhau:4729: sa hi śītavātavarṣābhiṣekairātmānaṃ bādhyamānaṃ paśyati narakeṣu cāgniṃ dīpyamānam / [127/17-127/18]
T07vakobhau:4731: punastaptavātātapāgnisaṃtāpairātmānaṃ bādhyamānamanupaśyan śaityaṃ ca narakeṣu śītābhilāṣāddhāvati / [127/19-127/20]
T07vakobhau:4732: yad avasthas tad upapattisaṃvarttanīyaṃ karmākārṣīt tadavasthātmānaṃ tāśca sattvān paśyan dhāvatīti pūrvācāryāḥ / [127/20-127/21]
T07vakobhau:4733: tatra punardevāntarābhava ūrdhvaṃ gacchatyā sanādivottiṣṭhan manuṣyatiryakpretānāṃ manuṣyādivat / [127/22]
T07vakobhau:4753: kaścit punaḥ sarvāṇyevāsaṃprajānan karoti praviśatyasaṃprajānan tiṣṭhati niṣkrāmatyapi / [128/10]
T07vakobhau:4757: aṇḍajaḥ sattvo nityaṃ mūḍha eva sarvāṇi karoti /
T07vakobhau:4761: tadyathā “saṃkṛtamabhisaṃskarotī“ti sūtre odanaṃ pacatīti saktum pinaṣṭīti loke / [128/16]
T07vakobhau:4763: kathaṃ punarasaṃprajānan mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśati yāvanniṣkrāmati kathaṃ vā saṃprajānan / [128/18-128/19]
T07vakobhau:4764: alpeśākhyasya tāvatsattvasya mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśataḥ evaṃ vīparītau saṃjñādhimokṣau pravarttete / [128/19]
T07vakobhau:4766: śītaṃ durdinaṃ mahato vā janakāyasya kolāhalaṃ hnta tṛṇagahanaṃ vā praviśāmi vanagahanaṃ vā tṛṇakuṭīṃ vā parṇakuṭīṃ vā vṛkṣamūlaṃ vā sarpāmi kuṇḍayamūlaṃ veti / [128/21-128/22]
T07vakobhau:4768: maheśākhyasya tu sattvasyārāmaṃ vā praviśāmyudyānaṃ vāprāsādaṃ vā 'bhirohāmi kūṭāgāraṃ vā paryaṅka veti / [128/23]
T07vakobhau:4771: saṃprajānaṃstu samyak prajānāti mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśāmyatraiva tiṣṭhāmi ata eva niryāmiti / [128/25-128/26]
T07vakobhau:4778: sa hi praviśatyeva saṃprajānan na tiṣṭhati nāpi niṣkrāmati / [128/30]
T07vakobhau:4786: ta eva tvete cakravarttyādaya evaṃbhūtā yujyante yathākramam / [129/04]
T07vakobhau:4789: yadi sattvo lokāntaraṃ saṃcaratīti pratijñāyate siddha ātmā bhavatīti / [129/06]
T07vakobhau:4792: kīdṛśa ātmā ya imān nikṣipatyanyāśca skndhān pratisaṃdadhātīti parikalpyate / [129/09]
T07vakobhau:4794: evaṃ tūktaṃ bhagavatā “asti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate ya imāṃśca skandhānnikṣipati anyāṃśca skandhān pratisaṃdadhātyanyatra dharmasaṃketāt
T07vakobhau:4795: tatrāyaṃ dharmasaṃketo yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇa pratītyasamutpādaḥ ”/ [129/12]
T07vakobhau:4799: evaṃ tarhi skandhā eva lokāntaraṃ saṃcarantīti prāptaṃ skandhamātraṃ tu nātra saṃcaratīti / [129/16]
T07vakobhau:4802: kṣaṇikā hi skandhāsteṣāṃ saṃcarituṃ nāsti śaktiḥ / [129/18-129/19]
T07vakobhau:4803: kleśaistu paribhāvitaṃ karmabhiśca kleśamātramantarābhāsaṃjñikayā saṃtatyā mātuḥ kukṣimāyāti / [129/19-129/20]
T07vakobhau:4804: tadyathā pradīpaḥ kṣaṇiko 'pi saṃtatyā deśāntaramiti nāstyeṣa doṣaḥ / [129/20-129/21]
T07vakobhau:4805: tasmātsiddhametadasatyapyātmani kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛṭaḥ skandhānāṃ saṃtāno mātuḥ kukṣimāpadyata iti / [129/21]
T07vakobhau:4809: nahi sarvasya skandhasantānasyākṣepastulyo bhavatyāyupyasya karmaṇo bhedāt / [129/24-129/25]
T07vakobhau:4810: ato yasya yāvānākṣpastasya tāvatī vṛddhiḥ krameṇa bhavati / [129/25]
T07vakobhau:4818: tasya khalu kālāntareṇa paripākaprāptasya garbhaśatlasyābhyantarāt mātuḥ kukṣau karmavipākajā
T07vakobhau:4819: vāyavo vānti ye taṃ garbhaśalyaṃ saṃparivarttya mātuḥ kāyāvakṣaradvārābhimukhamavasthāpayanti / [130/08-130/09]
T07vakobhau:4820: sakrūrapurīṣapiṇḍa ivātimātraṃ sthānāt pracyuto duḥkhaṃ saṃparivarttyate / [130/09-130/15]
T07vakobhau:4821: yadi punaḥ kadācinmāturāhāravihārakriyāpacāreṇa ca pūrvakarmāparādhena garbha eva
T07vakobhau:4822: vyāpādaṃ prāpnoti tata enaṃ tajjñāstriyaḥ kumārabhṛtyakā vā sukhoṣṇena sarpistailena
T07vakobhau:4823: supiṣṭena śālmalīkalkenānyena vā hastamabhyajya tīkṣṇaṃ tanukaṃ cātra śastrakamupanivadhya
T07vakobhau:4828: sa cāpyaparaparyāyavedanīyena karmaṇā pūrvakeṇa kāmapi gatiṃ nīyate / [130/16-130/20]
T07vakobhau:4829: atha punaḥ svasti prajāyate tata enaṃ mātā putrābhilāṣiṇī tatparikā vā striyaḥ sadyojātakaṃ
T07vakobhau:4830: taruṇavrṇāyamānātmānaṃ śastrakṣārā yamāṇasaṃsparśābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ parigṛhya snāpayanti
T07vakobhau:4831: stanyena sarpipā vāpyāyayanti audārikaṃ cāhāramāhartuṃ krameṇābhyāsayanti / [130/20-130/21]
T07vakobhau:4832: tasya vṛddheranvayādindriyāṇāṃ paripākānpunarapi kleśāḥ samudācaranti karmaṇi copacayaṃ gacchanti / [130/21-130/22]
T07vakobhau:4833: saḥ taiḥ kāyasya bhedādantarābhavasaṃtatyā pūrvavat paralokaṃ punaryāti / [130/23]
T07vakobhau:4835: etena prakāreṇa kleśakarmahetukaṃ janma taddhetukāni punaḥ kleśakarmāṇi tebhyaḥ punarjanmetyanādibhavacakrakaṃ veditavyam / [130/25-130/26]
T07vakobhau:4836: ādau hi parikalpyamāne tsyāhetukatvameteṣu sajyeta sati cāhetukatve sarvamevedamahetukaṃ prāduḥsyāt / [130/27-130/28]
T07vakobhau:4837: dṛṣṭaṃ cāṅkurādīṣu vījādīnāṃ sāmarthyaṃ deśakālapratiniyamādagnyādīnāṃ ca pākajādiṣviti nāsti nirhetukaḥ prādurbhāvaḥ / [130/28-131/01]
T07vakobhau:4844: tatra dvādaśāṅgāni avidyā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhavo jātirjarāmaraṇaṃ ca / [131/06-131/07]
T07vakobhau:4854: parīpūro 'syāstīti paripūro ya etāni sarvāṇyevāvasthāntarāṇi spṛśati so 'tra pudgalo 'bhipreto na tu yo 'ntarāla eva mriyate / [131/14]
T07vakobhau:4856: tathā hi mahānidānaparyāye kāmāvacara eva pudgalo nirdiṣṭaḥ / [131/15-131/16]
T07vakobhau:4858: yadā tu dvividhaḥ pratītyasamutpāda ucyate paurvāntikaścāparāntikaśceti tadā saptāṅgāni paurvāntiko yāvadvedanāntaḥ pañcāparāntikaḥ / [131/18]
T07vakobhau:4867: pūrvajanmanyeva yā puṇyādikarmāvasthā seha saṃskārā ityucyante yasya karmaṇa iha vipākaḥ / [131/26]
T07vakobhau:4869: mātuḥ kukṣī pratisaṃdhikṣaṇe pañca skandhā vijñānam / [132/01]
T07vakobhau:4872: saṃdhicittāt pareṇa yāvat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ notpadyate sā 'vasthā nāmarūpaṃ tāvat ṣaḍāyatanamityucyate / [132/04-132/05]
T07vakobhau:4875: utpanne ṣaḍāyatane sāvasthā tāvat ṣaḍāyatanamityucyate yāvadindriyaviṣayavijñānatrikasaṃnipātaḥ / [132/09]
T07vakobhau:4878: sa yāvadvedanātrayakāraṇaparicchedena samartho bhavati sā 'vasthā sparśa ityucyate / [132/11]
T07vakobhau:4884: upādānaṃ tu bhogānāṃ prāptaye paridhāvataḥ // VAkK_3.23 // [132/17-132/18]
T07vakobhau:4885: yasyāmavasthāyāṃ viṣayaprāptaye paryeṣṭimāpannaḥ sarvato dhāvatyasāvavasthā upādānamityucyate / [132/18]
T07vakobhau:4887: sa bhaviṣyat bhavaphalaṃ kurute karma tat bhavaḥ / [132/20]
T07vakobhau:4888: sa viṣayāṇāṃ prāptihetoḥ paridhāvan paunarbhavikaṃ karmopacinoti so 'sya bhavaḥ / [132/21]
T07vakobhau:4889: tena hi karmaṇā punaritaḥ pracyutasyāyatyāṃ pratisaṃdhirbhavati /
T07vakobhau:4912: teṣāṃ dharmāṇāmutsarjanaṃ jātiḥ parīpāko jarā bhaṅgo maraṇamiti / [133/08]
T07vakobhau:4920: yadyaṅgamaṅgaṃ pañca skandhāḥ kiṃ kāraṇamavidyādīneva dharmān kīrttayati sma / [133/13]
T07vakobhau:4923: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sūtre dvādaśāṅga uktaḥ prakaraṇeṣvanyathā “pratītyasamutpādaḥ katamaḥ / [133/16]
T07vakobhau:4926: tathāvasthikaḥ kṣaṇikaḥ prākarṣikaḥ sāṃbandhikaḥ sattvākhyo 'sattvākhyaśceti bhedaḥ / [133/18]
T07vakobhau:4930: tatra pūrvāntasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicikitsā kiṃ nva hamabhūvamatīte 'dhvani āhosvinnābhūvaṃ ko nvahamabhūvaṃ kathaṃ nvahamabhūvamiti / [133/22]
T07vakobhau:4931: aparāntasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicicitsā kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvanīti vistaraḥ / [133/23]
T07vakobhau:4932: madhyasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicikitsā kimsvididaṃ ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāma iti / [133/24-133/26]
T07vakobhau:4933: etasya trividhasya saṃmohasya vyāvarttanārthaṃ sattvākhya eva trikāṇḍaśca pratītyasamutpāda
T07vakobhau:4934: upadiṣṭaḥ sūtre yathākramamavidyā saṃskārāśca jātirjarāmaraṇaṃ ca vijñānaṃ yāvat bhavaśca / [133/26-134/02]
T07vakobhau:4935: tathāhi sūtra evoktaṃ “yataśca bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā pratītyasamutpādaśca pratītyasamutpannāśca dharmā evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā dṛṣṭā bhavanti
T07vakobhau:4936: sa na pūrvāntaṃ pratisarati kiṃ nvahamabhūvamatīte 'dhvanī“ti vistaraḥ / [134/03]
T07vakobhau:4938: tasyaiva hyete hetava iti sa punareṣa dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādastrisvabhāvo veditavyaḥ / [134/05]
T07vakobhau:4953: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ madhye phalahetū viśālitau / [134/15-134/16]
T07vakobhau:4959: madhyenaiva hi pūrvāntāparāntayorapi hetuphalavistaraḥ śakyo 'numānumiti noktaḥ / [134/20]
T07vakobhau:4961: yadi khalu dvādaśāṅga eva pratītyasamutpāda evaṃ satyavidyāyā anupadiṣṭahetukatvādādimān saṃsāraḥ prāpnoti jarāmaraṇasya cānupadiṣṭaphalatvādantavān
T07vakobhau:4965: kleśāt kleśaḥ kriyā caiva tato vastu tataḥ punaḥ /
T07vakobhau:4971: vastuno vastuvijñānānāmarūpaṃ yāvat sparśādvedanā jāteśca jarāmaraṇam / [135/02-135/03]
T07vakobhau:4973: yasmādeṣa nayo vyavasthito bhavāṅgānāṃ tasmādavidyā 'pi kleśasvabhāvā vastunaḥ kleśādveti jñāpitaṃ bhavati / [135/04-135/05]
T07vakobhau:4974: vedanāvaśācca jarāmaraṇavastunaḥ punaḥ kleśo bhāvīti nātra punaḥ kiñcidupasaṃkhyeyam / [135/05-135/06]
T07vakobhau:4975: “evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavatī“ti vacanāt / [135/06]
T07vakobhau:4983: satyapi cāntarbhāve kathamatredaṃ jñāpitaṃ bhavatyayoniśomanaskārahetukā avidyeti / [135/11-135/12]
T07vakobhau:4984: yadi tarhyantarbhāvenaiva hetuphalabhāvo vijñāyate tṛṣṇā 'vidyayorapi tarhi tatrāntarbhāvā daṅgantaratvaṃ śakyamakarttum / [135/12]
T07vakobhau:4988: “cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate āvilo manaskāro mohaja” iti / [135/14]
T07vakobhau:4991: ataḥ sparśakāle bhavannayoniśomanaskāro vedanāsahavarttinyā avidyāyāḥ pratyayabhāvena siddha iti nāstyahetukatvamavidyāyā na cāṅgāntaramupasaṃkhyeyam
T07vakobhau:4999: nahi niravadyā vedanā tṛṣṇāyāḥ pratyayībhavatyarhatāṃ na cāvīparītaḥ sparśaḥ kliṣṭāyā vedanāyāḥ / [135/21-135/22]
T07vakobhau:5000: naca punarniravadyasyārhataḥ sparśo viparīta ityanayā yuktyā / [135/22]
T07vakobhau:5002: yauvat yuktyā saṃbhavati tāvadanuktam gamyata iti / [135/23-135/24]
T07vakobhau:5008: pravṛttisaṃmūḍebhyo vineyebhyaḥ kathaṃ paralokādihaloka ihalokācca punaḥ paralokaḥ saṃbadhyata ityetāvato 'trārthasya vivakṣitatvāt / [135/27]
T07vakobhau:5011: uktaṃ bhagavatā “pratītyasamutpādaṃ vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi pratītyasamutpannāṃśca dharmānityathaka eṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ / [136/03]
T07vakobhau:5013: ubhyaṃ hi sarve saṃskṛtā dharmā iti / [136/04]
T07vakobhau:5018: te 'pi cetitāḥ kuśalayā cetanayā prāptiṃ prati /
T07vakobhau:5020: tajjātīyatvāttattatraivātideśo yathā naca tāvadrūpyate rūpaṃ cocyate tajjātīyatvādityadoṣaḥ / [136/08]
T07vakobhau:5027: yadapakṣaya pratītyasamutpādo na tadevāpekṣya pratītyasamutpannaṃ hetuphalavat pitṛputravacca / [136/13-136/14]
T07vakobhau:5028: sthavirapūrṇāśaḥ kilāha syāt pratīyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpannā dharmā iti / [136/14]
T07vakobhau:5035: kiṃ khalvetā iṣṭaya ucyante yā yasyeṣṭirāhosvitsūtrārthaḥ / [136/17]
T07vakobhau:5039: yattāvaduktamā “vasthika eṣa pratītyasamutpādo dvādaśa pañcaskandhikā avasthā dvādaśaṅgānī” tyetadutsūtram / [136/19]
T07vakobhau:5043: yacca nītārthaṃ na tat punarneyaṃ bhavatīti naiṣa sūtrārthaḥ / [136/21]
T07vakobhau:5044: na vai sarvaṃ nirdeśato nītārthaṃ bhavati / [136/21-136/22]
T07vakobhau:5051: yata eṣāmaparipūrṇo nirdeśaḥ syādapi tu keśādibhireva pṛthivīdhātuḥ tatra nirdeśyate / [136/25-136/26]
T07vakobhau:5052: na ca keśādīnabhyatītyāpyasti pṛthivīdhāturiti saṃpūrṇa evāsya nirdeśaḥ / [136/26-137/01]
T07vakobhau:5053: evamihāpyavidyādīnāṃ paripūrṇa eva nirdeśo na sāvaśeṣaḥ / [137/01-137/02]
T07vakobhau:5054: nanu cābhyatītyāpi keśādīnaśrukheṭa śiṅghāṇakā diṣvasti pṛthivīdhātuḥ / [137/02]
T07vakobhau:5056: yadva “punaranyadapyasmin kāye khakūkhaṭaṃ kharagatamiti vacanāt bhavatu vā tathaivāvidyāvaśeṣo yadi śakyate darśayitum / [137/04]
T07vakobhau:5058: yadyapi ca tāsvavasthāsu pañca skandhā vidyante yasya tu bhāvābhāvayoryasya bhāvābhāvaniyamaḥ tadevāṅgaṃ vyavasthāpayitum / [137/06-137/07]
T07vakobhau:5059: satyapi ca pañcaskandhake 'rhataḥ saṃskārā na bhavanti pañcaskandhahetukāḥ / [137/07]
T07vakobhau:5062: tathā puṇyāpuṇyāneñjyopagaṃ ca vijñānaṃ tṛṣṇā dayaśceti / [137/08]
T07vakobhau:5064: yadapyuktaṃ “heturatra samutpādaḥ samutpannaṃ phalaṃ yāvaccatuṣkoṭika” iti / [137/10]
T07vakobhau:5068: yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇoktvā iti yā 'tra dharmatā dharmasthititā yāvadaviparyastatā ayamucyate pratītyasamutpāda” iti / [137/12]
T07vakobhau:5069: dhrmatā ca nāma dharmajātiḥ dharmāṇāṃ śailiḥ / [137/13]
T07vakobhau:5070: ato yeyaṃ dharmatā ya eṣa niyamaḥ /
T07vakobhau:5073: yadapi catuṣkoṭikamuktaṃ tatra yadyanāgatāḥ dharmā na pratītyasamutpannāḥ sūtraṃ virudhyate / [137/15-137/16]
T07vakobhau:5081: yadyayamabhiprāya utpādadvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā nityamavidyādīn pratītya saṃskārādīnāmanutpādo na kadācidapratītyānyadvā pratītyāto nitya iti evametaditi pratigrāhyam / [137/21-137/22]
T07vakobhau:5082: athāyamabhiprāyaḥ pratītyasamutpādo nāma kiñcit bhāvāntaraṃ nityamastīti / [137/22-137/23]
T07vakobhau:5086: na ca nityaṃ bhāvāntaramanityasya lakṣaṇaṃ yujyate / [137/24-137/25]
T07vakobhau:5087: utpādaśca nāmotpatturbhavatīti ko 'syāvidyādibhirabhisambandho yatasteṣāṃ pratītyasamutpāda ityucyeta / [137/25-137/26]
T07vakobhau:5091: upasargavaśena dhātvarthapariṇāmāt prāpyeti yo 'rthaḥ so'rthaḥ pratītyeti / [138/03]
T07vakobhau:5096: ekasya hi kartturdvayoḥ kriyayoḥ pūrvakālāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ ktvāvidhirbhavati / [138/05]
T07vakobhau:5098: nacāsau pūrvamutpādāt kaścidasti yaḥ pūrvaṃ pratītyottarakālamutpadyate / [138/06-138/07]
T07vakobhau:5102: saha cet ktvā na siddho 'tra pūrvakālavidhānata” iti // [138/10]
T07vakobhau:5105: kimavastho dharmaḥ utpadyate varttamāna utāho 'nāgate iti / [138/11]
T07vakobhau:5110: athānāgata utpadyate kathamasataḥ kartṛtvaṃ siddhatyakartṛkā vā kriyeti / [138/13-138/14]
T07vakobhau:5111: ato yadavastha utpadyate tadavastha eva pratyeti / [138/14]
T07vakobhau:5115: aniṣpannaṃ cedaṃ yaduta śābdikīyaṃ kartṛkriyāvyavasthānaṃ bhavatītyeṣa karttā bhūtirityeṣā kriyā / [138/16-138/17]
T07vakobhau:5116: na cātra bhaviturarthāt bhūtimanyāṃ kriyāṃ paśyāmaḥ / [138/17]
T07vakobhau:5119: asmin satyasya bhāvaḥ asyotpādādidamutpadyata iti yo 'rthaḥ so 'rthaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti / [138/19]
T07vakobhau:5123: sahakāle 'pi ca ktvā 'sti dīpaṃ prāpya tamo gatam /
T07vakobhau:5124: āsyaṃ vyādāya śete ca paścāccetkiṃ na saṃvṛte //“ [138/24]
T07vakobhau:5129: tāṃ tāṃ kāraṇa sāmagrīṃ prati ityānāṃ samavāyenotpādaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti / [138/27]
T07vakobhau:5131: iha kathaṃ bhaviṣyati “cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānamiti“ti / [138/28-139/01]
T07vakobhau:5132: kimarthaṃ punarbhagavān paryāyadvayamāha “asmin satīdaṃ bhavati asyotpādādidamutpadyate” iti / [139/01-139/02]
T07vakobhau:5134: yathā 'nyatrāha “avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ saṃskārā bhavanti nānyatrāvidyāyāḥ saṃskārā” iti / [139/03]
T07vakobhau:5136: asminnaṅge satīdaṃ bhavati asya punaraṅgasyotpādādidamutpadyata iti / [139/04]
T07vakobhau:5138: pūrvānte sati madhyānto bhavati madhyāntasyotpādādaparānta utpadyata iti / [139/05-139/06]
T07vakobhau:5140: kadāciddhi samanantaramavidyāyāḥ saṃskārā bhavanti kadācit pāraṃparyeṇeti / [139/07]
T07vakobhau:5142: nāsati heto bhāvo bhavati na cānutpattimato nityāt prakṛtipuruṣādikātkiñcidutpadyata iti / [139/08-139/09]
T07vakobhau:5143: asyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ pūrvapadasya grahaṇamanarthakaṃ prāpnoti / [139/09]
T07vakobhau:5145: santi tarhi kecidya ātmani satyāśrayabhūte saṃskārādīnāṃ bhāvaṃ parikalpayanti avidyādīnāṃ cotpādāttadutpattim / [139/11-139/12]
T07vakobhau:5146: atastām kalpanāṃ paryudāsayitumidaṃ nirdhārayāṃvabhūva yasyaivotpādādyadutpadyate tasminneva sati tat bhavati nānyasmin / [139/12-139/13]
T07vakobhau:5147: yadutā “vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ yāvadevamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati“ti / [139/14]
T07vakobhau:5154: utpāde tvadhikṛte kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ sthitivacanasya bhinnakramaṃ ca bhagavān kimarthamācakṣita prāk sthitiṃ paścādutpoādam / [139/18-139/19]
T07vakobhau:5155: punarāha “asmin satīdaṃ bhavatī“ti “kārye sati kāraṇasya vināśo bhavatī“ti / [139/19-139/20]
T07vakobhau:5156: syānmata mahetukaṃ tarhi kāryamutpadyata ityata āha nāhetukam / [139/20-139/21]
T07vakobhau:5159: pūrvaṃ ca tāvat kāryasyotpādāne vācakṣata paścādasmin satīdaṃ na bhavatīti / [139/22-139/23]
T07vakobhau:5161: itarathā tu pratītyasamutpādaḥ katama ityāderarthe kaḥ prakramo vināśavacanasya / [139/24]
T07vakobhau:5163: kathaṃ puna “rvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvat jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇāmi“ti / [139/25]
T07vakobhau:5166: ātmanaḥ sukhārthamaduḥkhārthaṃ vā kāyādibhistrividhaṃ karmārabhate āyati sukhārthaṃ
T07vakobhau:5171: evaṃ ca kṛtvā tadupapannaṃ bhavati vijñānāṅganirdeśe “vijñānaṃ katamat / [140/04]
T07vakobhau:5173: vijñānapūrvakaṃ punastasyāṃ tasyāṃ gatau nāmarūpaṃ jāyate pañcaskandhakaṃ kṛtsnajanmānugatam / [140/06]
T07vakobhau:5188: yathā ca nirgranthādīnāṃ nagno ghavatyacelaka iti vistaraḥ / [140/13-140/14]
T07vakobhau:5197: yathokta “mātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatito natvatrātmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā” iti / [140/18-140/19]
T07vakobhau:5206: jātau satyāṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ yathā niriṣṭaṃ sūtre / [140/23]
T07vakobhau:5211: sa eva tu vaibhāṣikanyāyo yaḥ pūrvamuktaḥ / [140/26]
T07vakobhau:5220: yathā mitraviparyayeṇa tadvipakṣabhūtaḥ kaścidamitro bhavati na tu yaḥ kaścidanyo mitrānnāpi mitrābhāvaḥ / [141/03]
T07vakobhau:5237: sā ca dṛṣṭisvabhāvā iti nāvidyā yujyate / [141/11-141/12]
T07vakobhau:5238: yā tarhi na dṛṣṭiḥ sā bhaviṣyati / [141/12]
T07vakobhau:5242: avidyā cet prajñā 'bhaviṣyanna dṛṣṭistayā yujyate saṃprāyokṣyata / [141/14-141/15]
T07vakobhau:5246: “rāgopakliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ nāvamucyate avidyopakliṣṭā prajñā na viśudhyatī“tyuktam sūtre / [141/18]
T07vakobhau:5247: na ca saiva prajñā tasyāḥ prajñāyā upakleśo yukta iti / [141/18-141/19]
T07vakobhau:5248: yathā cittasyānyo bhinnajātīya upakleśo rāga evaṃ prajñāyā avidyā / [141/19]
T07vakobhau:5250: kliṣṭayā prajñayā kuśalā prajñā vyavkīryamāṇā na viśudhyati / [141/20-141/21]
T07vakobhau:5254: uapahataṃ tu tattathā rāgeṇa bhavati yanna vimucyate / [141/22-141/23]
T07vakobhau:5259: yo 'pi manyate “sarvakleśā avidye“ti tasyāpyata eva vyudāsaḥ / [141/25-142/01]
T07vakobhau:5260: sarvakleśasvabhāvā 'pi satī saṃyojanādiṣu pṛthagnocyeta dṛṣṭyā ca na saṃprayujyeta / [142/01-142/02]
T07vakobhau:5261: anyena vā kleśena dṛṣṭyādīnāṃ paraṃparāsaṃprayogāt cittamapi cāvidyopakleṣṭamevoktaṃ bhavet / [142/02-142/03]
T07vakobhau:5267: yadi yanna saṃprakhyānaṃ saṃprakhyānābhāve 'pi tathaiva doṣo yathā avidyāyām / [142/06-142/07]
T07vakobhau:5269: tadidaṃ tathaiva na jñāyate kiṃ taditi / [142/07-142/08]
T07vakobhau:5275: yā 'sau sūtra uktā “so 'hamevaṃ jñātvā evaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvāsāṃ tṛṣṇānāṃ sarvāsāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ
T07vakobhau:5276: sarvāsāṃ mayatānāṃ sarveṣāmahaṅkāramamakārāsmimānābhiniveśānuśayānāṃ prahāṇāt parijñānānniśchāyo nivṛta” iti / [142/12]
T07vakobhau:5279: yata eṣā nānyaḥ kleśaḥ śakyate vaktum /
T07vakobhau:5289: yadidaṃ loke pratītaṃ teṣāṃ teṣāmarthānāṃ pratyāyakaṃ gauraśvo rūpaṃ rasa ityevamādi / [142/19]
T07vakobhau:5291: teṣu teṣv artheṣu tasya nāmno namanāt / [142/19-142/20]
T07vakobhau:5292: iha nikṣipte kāya upapattyantare namanānnāmarupiṇaḥ skandhā ityapare // [142/21]
T07vakobhau:5305: sarve ca te trayo 'pi sparśotpattau praguṇā bhavantīti / [143/06]
T07vakobhau:5307: keciddhi sakṛnnipātameva sparśa vyācakṣate sūtraṃ cātra jñāpakamānayanti “iti ya eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃgatiḥ saṃnipātaḥ samavāyaḥ sa sparśaḥ” iti / [143/08-143/09]
T07vakobhau:5308: kecitpunaścittasaṃprayuktaṃ dharmāntarameva sparśa vyācakṣate sūtraṃ cātra jñāpakamānayanti “ṣaṭṣaṭko dharmaparyāyaḥ katamaḥ / [143/10]
T07vakobhau:5316: tatra ye saṃnipātameva sparśamāhusta evaṃ kparihāramāhuḥ / [143/13]
T07vakobhau:5320: na caivaṃ sparśabhūtāttrayādanyattrayamasti yasya śeṣasyātra grahaṇaṃ syāt / [143/16-143/17]
T07vakobhau:5321: yadyapi hīndriyārthau syātāmavijñānakau na tu punrvijñānamanindriyārthakam / [143/17]
T07vakobhau:5322: tasmāttriṣu nirdiṣṭeṣu punaḥ sparśasya grahaṇamanarthakaṃ prāpnoti / [143/18-143/19]
T07vakobhau:5323: na khalu sarve cakṣurūpe sarvasya cakṣurvijñānasya kāraṇaṃ nāpi sarvaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ sarvayoścakṣurūpayoḥ kāryam / [143/19-143/20]
T07vakobhau:5324: ato yeṣāṃ kāryakāraṇābhāvaste sparśabhāve vyavasthāpitā ityeke / [143/20-143/21]
T07vakobhau:5325: ye punaḥ saṃnipātādanyaṃ sparśamāhusta etatsūtra kathaṃ pariharanti “iti ya eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃgatiḥ saṃnipātaḥ samavāyaḥ sa sparśa” iti / [143/21]
T07vakobhau:5328: saṃgateḥ saṃnipātāt samavāyāditi paṭhanti kāraṇe va kāryopacāro 'yamiti bruvanti / [143/23]
T07vakobhau:5338: yathoktaṃ “cakṣurvijñānena nīlaṃ vijānāti no tu nīlaṃ manovijñānena nīlaṃ vijānāti nīlamiti ca vijānātī“ti / [144/04]
T07vakobhau:5343: tena saṃprayuktaḥ sparśo 'dhivacanasaṃsparśa ityeka āśrayaprabhāvito dvitīyaḥ saṃprayogaprabhāvitaḥ / [144/07]
T07vakobhau:5350: anāsravaḥ sparśo vidyāsaṃsparśaḥ kliṣṭo 'vidyāsaṃsparśo vidyā 'vidyābhyāṃ saṃprayuktatvāt / [144/13]
T07vakobhau:5361: athavā vedyate tadvedayituṃ vā śakyamiti vedanīyam /
T07vakobhau:5364: sukhaṃ vedanīyamasminniti sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśo yatra sukhaṃ veditamasti [144/21-144/22]
T07vakobhau:5369: tatra yaḥ pūrvaṃ ṣaḍvidhaḥ sparśa uktaḥ [144/24]
T07vakobhau:5378: atha kiṃ sparśāduttarakālaṃ vedanā bhavatyāhosvit samānakālam / [145/04-145/05]
T07vakobhau:5385: yadeva hīdaṃ sahotpannayorjanyajanakabhāvo nāstīti tadevedaṃ jāte dharme dharmasya nāstīti / [145/08]
T07vakobhau:5390: “cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa pratītya utpadyate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā na tu cakṣuḥpaṃsparśajāṃ vedanāṃ pratītyotpadyate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa” iti vacanāt
T07vakobhau:5392: yo hi dharmo yasya dharmasya janakaḥ prasiddhaḥ sa tasmāt bhinnakālaḥ prasiddhaḥ / [145/13-153/14]
T07vakobhau:5393: tadyathā pūrvaṃ vījaṃ paścādaṅkuraḥ pūrvaṃ kṣīraṃ paścāddadhi pūrvamabhighātaḥ paścācchandaḥ pūrvaṃ manaḥ paścāt manovijñānamityevamādi / [145/14-145/15]
T07vakobhau:5394: anyathā paraṃparāpekṣatvāt kāryakāraṇayoḥ sarvaṃ vā yugapadutpadyate na vā kadācit paścādviśeṣābhāvāt / [145/15-145/16]
T07vakobhau:5397: tadyathā cakṣurvajñānādīnāṃ cakṣurūpādibhirbhūtabhautikānāṃ ca tatrāpi pūrvamindriyārthau paścādvijñānam / [145/18-145/19]
T07vakobhau:5398: pūrvakācca bhūtabhautikasamudāyāduttara utpadyata itīṣyamāṇe kaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ // [145/19]
T07vakobhau:5399: yathā tarhi cchāyāṅkurayorevaṃ sparśavedanayo riti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [145/20]
T07vakobhau:5402: so 'sau trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sparśapratyayātpaścādvedanā tṛtīyakṣaṇa iti / [145/21-145/22]
T07vakobhau:5403: evaṃ tarhi na sarvantravajñāne vedanā prāpnoti na ca sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ sparśaḥ / [145/22]
T07vakobhau:5405: pūrvasparśahetukā hyuttaratra sparśe vedanā sarve ca sparśāḥ sarvavedanakāḥ sarvaṃ ca vijñānaṃ sparśa iti / [145/24]
T07vakobhau:5409: kathaṃ nāmānyajātīyālambanasparśasaṃbhūtā vedanā 'nyālambanā bhaviṣyati yena vā cittena saṃprayuktā tato bhinnālambaneti / [145/26-146/01]
T07vakobhau:5411: tasmācca yat pūrvaṃ vijñānaṃ savedanakaṃ tanna sparśaḥ / [146/02]
T07vakobhau:5419: na vā eṣa mahābhūmikārthaḥ sarvatra citte daśa mahābhūmikāḥ saṃbhavantīti / [146/06]
T07vakobhau:5422: savitarkā savicārā bhumiḥ avitarkā vicāramātrā avitarkā vicārā bhūmiḥ
T07vakobhau:5426: tadya etasyāṃ sarvasyāṃ bhūmau bhavanti te mahābhūmikāḥ / [146/09-146/10]
T07vakobhau:5432: yadi tarhi sparśāduttarakālalṃ vedanā sūtraṃ parihāryaṃ “cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sahajātā vedanā saṃjñā cetane“ti / [146/14-146/15]
T07vakobhau:5433: sahajātā ityucyate na sparśasahajātā iti kimatra parihāryam / [146/15-146/16]
T07vakobhau:5434: samanantare 'pi cāyaṃ sahaśabdo dṛṣṭastadyathā “maitrīsahagataṃ smṛtisaṃvodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayatī” tyajñāpakametat / [146/16-146/18]
T07vakobhau:5435: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ “yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā yā ca cetanā yacca vijñānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā ime dharmā nāsaṃsṛṣṭā” ityato nāsti vedanābhirasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ vijñānam / [146/18]
T07vakobhau:5437: tatra hi sūtra evamuktaṃ “yadvedayate taccetayate yaccetayate tastsaṃprajānīte yatsaṃprajānīte tadvijānātī“ti / [146/20-146/21]
T07vakobhau:5438: tanna vijñāyate kim tāvadayameṣāmālambananiyama ukta utāho kṣaṇaniyama iti / [146/21]
T07vakobhau:5440: yaccāpi sūtra uktaṃ “trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ” iti / [146/22-146/23]
T07vakobhau:5441: tat kathaṃ vijñānaṃ cāsti na ca trayāṇāṃ saṃnipāto na ca sparśa iti / [146/23-146/24]
T07vakobhau:5442: tasmādavaśyaṃ sarvatra vijñāne sparśaḥ sparśasahajā ca vedanaiṣṭavyā / [146/24]
T07vakobhau:5447: saiva caitasikī vedanā punarāṣṭadaśa manopavicāravyavasthānādaṣṭādadhā bhidyate / [146/27-146/28]
T07vakobhau:5473: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ “cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni rūpāṇyupavicarantītyevamādiḥ / [147/13]
T07vakobhau:5480: itrathā hi kāmadhātau rūpadhātvālambanā rūpādyupavicārā na syuḥ kāmadhātbalamvanāśca rūpadhātau gandharasaspraṣṭavyopavicārāḥ / [147/18-147/19]
T07vakobhau:5481: yathā tu yaktataraṃ tathoktaṃ yo 'pi rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā śabdānupavicarati so 'pi manopavicāraḥ / [147/20]
T07vakobhau:5485: athaiṣāṃ manopavicārāṇāṃ kati kāmapratisaṃyuktāsteṣāṃ ca kati kimālambanā evaṃ yāvadārūpyapratisaṃyuktā vaktavyāḥ / [147/24]
T07vakobhau:5488: āmadhātau sarve 'ṣṭādaśa santi sa ca teṣāṃ sarveṣāmālambanam /
T07vakobhau:5532: yeṣāṃ tat vyavacchinnālambanamasti yeṣāṃ punaḥ paripiṇḍitālambanaṃ teṣāṃ tatraika eva saṃbhinnālambano dharmopavicāraḥ / [149/09]
T07vakobhau:5545: kāmadhātūpapanno rūpāvacarasya kuśalasya cittasyālābhī kāmāvacaraiḥ sarvaiḥ prathamadvitīyadhyānabhūmikairaṣṭābhiḥ
T07vakobhau:5547: kliṣṭenaivālābhī rūpāvacarasya kuśalasya cittasyā vitarāgaḥ sarvaiḥ kāmāvacaraiḥ
T07vakobhau:5557: nahi yo yasmādvītarāgaḥ sa tadālambanamupavicaratīti yuktam / [150/02-150/03]
T07vakobhau:5558: ataḥ sāsravā api na sarve saumanasyādayo manopavicārāḥ / [150/03]
T07vakobhau:5562: anunīyate ca pratihanyate cāpratisṅkhyāya copekṣate yeṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa ṣaṭ sātatā vihārā bhavanti / [150/05-150/07]
T07vakobhau:5563: cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā naiva sumanā bhavati na durmanā upekṣako viharati smṛtimān saṃprajānan evaṃ yāvanmanasā dharmān vijñāyeti / [150/07-150/08]
T07vakobhau:5564: nahyarhato laukikaṃ nāsti kuśalaṃ dharmālambanaṃ saumanasyaṃ yattu tatsāṃkleśikaṃ manasa upavicārabhutaṃ tasyaiva pratiṣedho lakṣyata iti /
T07vakobhau:5581: sa caiṣa pratītyasamutpādaḥ samāsataḥ kleśakarmavastūnīti prāk jñāpitam / [150/20]
T07vakobhau:5585: tadyathā vījādaṅkurakāṇḍapatrādīnāṃ prabhavo bhavatyevaṃ kleśāt kleśakarmavastūnām / [150/23-151/01]
T07vakobhau:5586: yathā nāgādhiṣṭitaṃ saro na śuṣyatyevaṃ kleśanāgādhiṣṭhitaṃ janmasaraḥ / [151/01-151/02]
T07vakobhau:5587: yathā cānapoddhṛtamūlā vanaspatayaśchinnāśchinnāḥ punarapi prarohantyevamanapoddhṛtakleśamūlā gatayaḥ / [151/02-151/03]
T07vakobhau:5588: yathā ca vṛkṣāḥ kālena kālalṃ puṣpaphalānāṃ prasotāro bhavantyevaṃ kleśā apyasakṛt kleśakarmavastūnāṃ heturbhavanti / [151/03-151/06]
T07vakobhau:5589: yathā ca tuṣāvanaddhāstaṇḍulāḥ prarohaṇasamarthā bhavanti na kevalā evaṃ kleśaprāptatuṣāvanaddhaṃ
T07vakobhau:5590: karma janmāntaravirohaṇe samarthaṃ bhavati na kevalamityevaṃ tāvat kleśo bījādivadveditavyaḥ / [151/07]
T07vakobhau:5595: santyoṣadhayaḥ phalapākāntā evaṃ karmāṇi vipacya punarvipākānabhinirvarttayante / [151/10-151/11]
T07vakobhau:5596: yathā ca puṣpaṃ phalotpattavāsannaṃ kāraṇamevaṃ karmāṇi vipākotpatto veditavyāni / [151/12]
T07vakobhau:5598: pathā siddhamannaṃ pānaṃ ca kevalaṃ paribhogāya kalpyate na punarvirohāya evaṃ vipākākhyaṃ vastu / [151/14]
T07vakobhau:5600: yadi hi pravardheta mokṣo na syāt / [151/15-151/16]
T07vakobhau:5601: na khalveṣa janmasaṃtāna evaṃ pratītyasamutpadyamāno bhavacatuṣṭayaṃ nātikrāmati / [151/16]
T07vakobhau:5610: nahi sa kleśo 'sti yena pratisamdhibandhaḥ pratividyate ityābhidharmikāḥ / [151/23-151/24]
T07vakobhau:5612: yadyapi sā 'vasthā mandikā yastu yatrābhīkṣṇaṃ carita āsannaśca tasya tadānīṃ sa eva kleśa upatiṣṭhate / [151/25]
T07vakobhau:5621: kāmarūpadhātvoraparisaṃkhyānāt sarva eva catvāro bhavāḥ santītyanujñāpitaṃ bhavati / [152/05-152/06]
T07vakobhau:5625: eko dharmo bhagavatā svayamabhijñāyābhisaṃbadhyākhyāto “yaduta sarvasttvā āhārasthitikā” iti sūtrapadam / [152/10]
T07vakobhau:5647: yānyapi tu nābhyavahniyante sthitiṃ cāharanti tānyapi sūkṣma āhāraḥ / [152/22]
T07vakobhau:5652: āhāro hi nāma ya indriyamahābhūtānāmanugrahāya saṃvarttate / [152/25-152/26]
T07vakobhau:5653: rūpāyatanaṃ cābhyavaharaṇakāle svamindriyaṃ tanmahābhūtāni vā nānugṛhṇāti / [152/26]
T07vakobhau:5655: yadāpi ca dṛśyamāne sukhasaumanasye ādadhāti tadāpi tadālambanaḥ sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśa āhāro bhavati na rūpam / [153/02-153/03]
T07vakobhau:5659: cetanā manaskarma vijñānaṃ ca sāsravāṇyevāhārāḥ triṣvapi dhātuṣu saṃvidyante / [153/06]
T07vakobhau:5663: api tu sūtra uktaṃ “catvāra ime āhārā bhūtānāṃ sattvānāṃ sthitaye yāpanāyai saṃbhavaiṣiṇāṃ cānugrahāye“ti / [153/09]
T07vakobhau:5665: bhūtā hi tāvatsattvā upapannā iti vijñāyante /
T07vakobhau:5676: “tathāsti pudgalo yasyābhinirvṛttisaṃyojanaṃ prahīṇaṃ nopapattisaṃyojanam” iti sūtra catuḥkoṭikāt / [153/18]
T07vakobhau:5682: atha katyāhārāḥ sattvānāṃ sthitaye kati saṃbhavaiṣiṇāmanugrahāya / [153/21-153/22]
T07vakobhau:5686: bhagavatā “atvāra ime āhārā rogasya mūlalṃ gaṇḍasya śalyasya jarāmaraṇasya pratyaya” iti / [153/24]
T07vakobhau:5688: evaṃ hi varṇayanti durbhikṣābhyāhatena kīla pitrā putrakau saktava iti bhasmanā bhastrāṃ paripūrya kīlake āsajyāśvāsitau / [153/26-153/27]
T07vakobhau:5689: tau ca tāṃ parikalpayantau ciramapyāsitau kenāpi codghāṭitāyāṃ bhasmeti nairāśyamāpannau vyāpannāviti / [153/27-154/02]
T07vakobhau:5690: punaśca mahāsamudre bhagnayānapātrāḥ puruṣāḥ sthalamiti mahāntaṃ phenapiṇḍaṃ pradrutāḥ āmṛśya cainaṃ nirāśā uparemuriti / [154/02-154/04]
T07vakobhau:5691: saṃgītiparyāye coktaṃ mahāsamudrādaudārikāḥ prāṇino jalāt sthalamabhiruhya sikatāsthale 'ṇḍāni sthāpayitvā sikatābhiravaṣṭabhya punarapi mahāsamudre 'vataranti / [154/04-154/05]
T07vakobhau:5692: tatra yāsāṃ mātṛṇāmaṇḍānyārabhya smṛtirna muṣyate tānyaṇḍāni na pūtībhavanti yāsāṃ tu muṣyate tāni pūtībhavanti / [154/05]
T07vakobhau:5696: yeṣāmaṇḍānāṃ mātaramārabhya smṛtirna muṣyate tāni na pūtībhavanti / [154/07-154/08]
T07vakobhau:5700: nanu ca sarva eva sāsravā dharmā bhavānāṃ poṣakāḥ / [154/10]
T07vakobhau:5708: manaḥsaṃcetanayā punarbhavasyākṣepaḥ ākṣiptasya punaḥ karmaparibhāvitādvijñānavījādabhinirvṛttirityanayoranutpannasya bhavasyākaraṇe prādhānyam
T07vakobhau:5710: pūrvakau hi dvau dhātrīsthānīyau jātasya poṣakatvāt / [154/17]
T07vakobhau:5712: yaḥ kaścit kavaḍīkāraḥ sarvaḥ sa āhāraḥ / [154/18-154/19]
T07vakobhau:5714: prathamā koṭiryaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmapacayo bhavati mahābhūtānāṃ ca paribhedaḥ / [154/20]
T07vakobhau:5716: tṛtīyā yaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo bhavati mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhiḥ / [154/21-154/22]
T07vakobhau:5719: syāt sparśādīn pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhirna ca ta āhārāḥ / [154/24]
T07vakobhau:5721: yo 'pi hi paribhukto bhokturbādhāmādadhāti so 'pyāhāra eva / [154/25]
T07vakobhau:5723: dvayorhi kālayorāhāra āhārakṛtyaṃ karoti paribhujyamāno jīryaṃśceti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [154/26]
T07vakobhau:5729: yadyūpaghātako 'pyāhāro bhavati catuḥkoṭikaṃ bādhyate prakaraṇagranthaśca “kavaḍīkāra āhāraḥ katamaḥ / [155/01-155/03]
T07vakobhau:5730: yaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo bhavati mahābhutānāṃ ca vṛddhiryāpanā 'nuyāpaneti vistareṇa yāvadvijñānam /“ [155/03]
T07vakobhau:5733: so 'pi hi jighatsāṃ pipāsāṃ hantuṃ samartha iti / [155/04-155/05]
T07vakobhau:5735: uktaṃ bhagavatā “yaśca bāhyakānāmṛṣīṇāṃ kāmebhyo vītarāgāṇāṃ śataṃ bhojayedyaścaikaṃ jambūṣaṇḍagataṃ pṛthagajanam / [155/07]
T07vakobhau:5741: syādyadi bhūyasaḥ pṛthagjanān bhojayitvā bhūyaḥ puṇyaṃ syāt nālpīyaso vītarāgāniti / [155/10]
T07vakobhau:5743: tadetanna varṇayanti “bahutaraṃ hi tasmai datvā puṇyaṃ nārhatkoṭibhya” iti / [155/11-155/12]
T07vakobhau:5744: ato nirvedhabhāgīyalābhī pṛthagjana eṣo'bhipretaḥ iti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [155/12-155/13]
T07vakobhau:5745: natviyamanvarthā saṃjñā nāpikvacitparibhāṣitā sūtre śāstre vā / [155/13-155/14]
T07vakobhau:5747: bodhisattva eva tveṣu jambūdvīpaṣaṇḍeṣu niṣaṇṇo yujyate / [155/14-155/15]
T07vakobhau:5748: sa hi pṛthagjana kāmavairāgyasaṃbandhena tadānīṃ tebhyo viśiṣyamāṇa ukta iti / [155/15-155/16]
T07vakobhau:5751: itthaṃ caitadevaṃ yadevaṃ paryudasya bāhyakebhya eva srotāpatti phalapratipannakaṃ viśeṣayāṃbabhūva / [155/17-155/18]
T07vakobhau:5753: ukto yathā sattvānāṃ pratītyasamutpādo yathāvasthitiścyutirapyuktā yathāyuḥkṣayādibhiḥ / [155/20]
T07vakobhau:5755: katamasmin vijñāne vartamāne cyutyupapattī bhavata ityāha [155/21]
T07vakobhau:5759: ete ṣaṭ dharmā manovijñāna eveṣyante nānyatra / [155/24-155/25]
T07vakobhau:5773: yadā cāsyāśrayo vipariṇantumārabhate tadāvaśyamasya tadāśrayapratibaddhaṃ cittaṃ saṃmukhībhūya paścāt pracyaveta nānyathā / [156/09-156/10]
T07vakobhau:5783: atha mriyamāṇasya kasmin śarīrapradeśe vijñānaṃ nirudhyate / [156/16-156/17]
T07vakobhau:5791: teṣāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pādayornābhyāṃ hṛdaye ca vijñānaṃ saṃnirudhyate / [156/22]
T07vakobhau:5795: kāyendriyasya teṣu nirodhāt kāyendriyaṃ hi mriyamāṇasya tapta ivopale jalaṃ niṣṭhyūtaṃ saṃkocamāpadyamānaṃ pādādiṣvantardhīyata iti / [156/24-156/25]
T07vakobhau:5802: chidyanta iva na ca punastāni kāṣṭhādivacchidyante chinnabadvā punarna ceṣṭanta iti cchinnānyucyante / [157/03-157/04]
T07vakobhau:5809: kiṃ tu cyavanadharmaṇo devaputrasya pañcopanimittāni prādurbhavanti / [157/07-157/09]
T07vakobhau:5810: vastrāṇāmābharaṇānāṃ ca manojñaḥ śabdo niścarati śarīraprabhā mandībhavati snātasyodabindavaḥ
T07vakobhau:5811: kāye saṃtiṣṭhante capalātmanā 'pyekatra viṣaye buddhiravatiṣṭhate unmeṣanimeṣau cākṣṇoḥ saṃbhavataḥ / [157/09]
T07vakobhau:5814: vāsāṃsi kliśyanti mālā mlāyanti kakṣābhyāṃ svedo mucyate daurgandhyaṃ kāye'vakrāmati sve cāsane devaputro nābhiramate / [157/11-157/12]
T07vakobhau:5815: so'yaṃ sattvaloka evamutpadyamānastiṣṭhan cyavamanaśca triṣu rāśiṣu sthāpito bhagavatā / [157/12-157/13]
T07vakobhau:5821: yattatparyādāya rāgaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya dveṣaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya mohaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya sarvakleśaprahāṇamidamucyate samyaktva“miti sūtram / [157/17]
T07vakobhau:5826: ete hi kleśakṣaye niyatatvāt samyaktvaniyatāḥ mokṣabhāgīyalābhino 'pyavaśyaṃ parinirvāṇadharmāṇa iti / [157/20]
T07vakobhau:5829: na ca te kālaniyamena samyaktve niyatā yathā saptakṛtvaḥ paramādayaḥ / [157/22]
T07vakobhau:5840: karmādhipatyena tasya yojanalakṣāṇāṃ ṣoḍaśakamudvedhaḥ pariṇāhenāsaṃkhyaṃ tathā ca dṛḍhaṃṃ yanmahālagno'pi vajreṇa bhettumaśaktaḥ / [158/04]
T07vakobhau:5849: yathā hi bhuktaṃ pītamannaṃ pānaṃ ca nāpakvaṃ pakvāśayamāpatatī tyeke / [158/10]
T07vakobhau:5856: sā kāñcanamayī mahī bhavatyapāmupariṣṭāt ukto jalakāñcanamaṇḍalocchrāyaḥ / [158/16-158/17]
T07vakobhau:5861: samantataḥ parikṣepeṇa tu parigaṇyamānaṃ triguṇaṃ jāyate ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣā daśasahasrāṇi sārdhāni ca trīṇi śatāni yojanānām / [158/21-158/22]
T07vakobhau:5880: suvarṇamayo rūpyamayo vaidūryamayaḥ sphaṭikamayaśca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ caturṣu pārśveṣu / [159/13-159/14]
T07vakobhau:5881: yacca yanmayaṃ pārśvaṃ sumerostasyānubhāvena tadvarṇa tasyāṃ diśi nabho dṛśyate / [159/14-159/15]
T07vakobhau:5883: tasyeha prabhānurāgeṇa vaidūryamayaṃ nabho dṛśyata iti / [159/17]
T07vakobhau:5886: tā hyāpo nānāvidhabījagarbhā bahuvidhaprabhāvabhinnairvāyubhirmathyamānāstāṃ tāṃ jātiṃ pariṇamayanti / [159/19-159/20]
T07vakobhau:5887: evaṃ ca punaḥ pariṇamayanti yadbhinnajātīyasya kāryaviśeṣotpattāvasamavadhānena pratyayībhavanti / [159/20-159/21]
T07vakobhau:5888: na tu khalu yathā sāṃkhyānāṃ pariṇāmaḥ / [159/21]
T07vakobhau:5892: sa eva hi dharmī na saṃvidyate yasyāvasthitasya dharmāṇāṃ pariṇāmaḥ kaspyeta / [159/23-159/24]
T07vakobhau:5897: tadeva cedaṃ na cedaṃ tatheti apūrvaiṣā vāyo yuktiḥ / [159/25-159/26]
T07vakobhau:5898: evaṃ ca punaḥ saṃbhūtāḥ suvarṇādayaḥ karmaprabhāvāt preritairvāyubhiḥ samāhṛtya rāśīkriyante / [159/26-159/27]
T07vakobhau:5903: kāñcanamayyāḥ pṛthivyā uparyaśītiyyojanasahasrāṇyudakaṃ tatra te magnāḥ / [160/04]
T07vakobhau:5905: iti hi meroḥ ṣaṣṭi yojanaśatasahasraṃ samucchrayaḥ / [160/06]
T07vakobhau:5908: tato 'rdhena īśādhara ityevamanyeṣvapyardhārdhahānirveditavyā yāvannimindharārdhenārdhatrayodaśottarāṇi trīṇi yojanaśatāni cakravāḍaḥ / [160/10]
T07vakobhau:5910: yāvāneva caiṣāṃ jalādūrdhvaṃ samucchrāyastāvāneva ghano vistāra ityarthaḥ / [160/12]
T07vakobhau:5912: eṣāṃ ca nimindharāntanāṃ parvatānāṃ saptāntarāṇi sapta śītā ucyante pūrṇā aṣṭāṅgopetasya pānīyasya / [160/14-160/15]
T07vakobhau:5913: taddhi pānīyaṃ śītalaṃ ca svādu ca laghu ca mṛdu cācchaṃ ca niṣpratikaṃ ca pibataśca kaṇṭhaṃ na kṣiṇoti pītaṃ ca kukṣiṃ na vyābādhate / [160/16]
T07vakobhau:5923: pārśvatasriguṇo bhavati yugandharatīreṇa gaṇyamānaḥ catvāriṃśat sahasrāṇi lakṣadvayaṃ ca / [161/01]
T07vakobhau:5925: yugandharasyeṣādhārasya cāntaraṃ dvitīyā śītā ardhena prathamāyāścatvāriṃśat yojanasahasrāṇi / [161/03-161/04]
T07vakobhau:5932: taddhi bāhyo mahāsamudro lavaṇaṃ pūrṇaḥ hṣārodakasya / [161/08]
T07vakobhau:5939: tasya ca madhye kāñcanamayyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ vajrāsanamabhinirvṛttaṃ yasminniṣadya sarve bodhisattvā vajropamaṃ samādhimutpādayanti // [161/15]
T07vakobhau:5940: nahi tamanya āśrayaḥ pradeśo vā soḍhuṃ samarthaḥ / [161/16]
T07vakobhau:5945: itaḥ pūrveṇa sumerupārśve pūrvaṃ videho dvīpaḥ /
T07vakobhau:5953: itaḥ paścimena sumerupārśve 'paragodānīyo dvīpaḥ sārdhāni sapta yojanasahasrāṇi sākalyena / [162/02]
T07vakobhau:5961: sarveṣu ca pārśveṣu samo yathaikaṃ pārśvaṃ dviyojanasahasre / [162/08]
T07vakobhau:5963: yaśca dvīpo yadākṛtistadākṛtīnyeva tatra manuṣyāṇāṃ mukhāni / [162/10]
T07vakobhau:5975: ihaiva jambūdvīpe uttareṇāsya jambūdvīpasya kṛṣṇaparvatāstrayastānatikramyāpare trayaḥ punaśca traya iti navabhyaḥ kīṭaparvatebhyaḥ pareṇa himavān parvataḥ / [162/20]
T07vakobhau:5978: tasmāddhimavataḥ pareṇānavataptaṃ nāma saro gandhamādanādarvāk yataścatasro nadyaḥ sravnti gaṅga sindhuḥ śītā vakṣuśca / [162/23-162/24]
T07vakobhau:5982: tasyaiva cāntike jambūrabhinirvṛttā madhurasvādūni yasyāḥ phalāni tasyā adhikāreṇāyaṃ jambūdvīpa iti khyātaḥ / [162/26-162/27]
