T07vakobhau:5986: asyaiva jambūdvīpasyādho viṃśatyā yojanasahasrairavīcirmahānarako viṃśatisahasrapramāṇa evodvedhavistārābhyāmevamasyādharatalamitaścatvāriṃśatā yojanasahasrairbhavati / [163/03-163/04]
T07vakobhau:5988: anyeṣu sāntaraṃ duḥkham taddyathā saṃjīve cchinnāvabhinnasaṃpiṣṭaśarīrāṇāṃ śītalā vāyavo vānti punarapi tān sattvān saṃjīvayanti / [163/05-163/06]
T07vakobhau:5995: pratāpanastāpano mahārauravo rauravaḥ saṃghātaḥ kālasūtraḥ saṃjīvaśca / [163/10]
T07vakobhau:6011: yatra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nikṣipte saṃśīryate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitamutkṣipte pāde punarapi saṃjāyate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitam / [163/24-163/25]
T07vakobhau:6012: kuṇapaṃ gūthamṛttikā yatra nyaṅkuṭā nāma prāṇinaḥ prativasanti sarvaśvetāḥ kṛṣṇaśirasaḥ sūcimukhāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yāvadasthīni bhindanti / [163/25-164/01]
T07vakobhau:6013: kṣuradhārācito mahāpathaḥ yatra teṣāṃ sattvānā manvākrāmatāṃ nikṣipte pāde saṃchidyate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitamiti pūrvavat / [164/01-164/02]
T07vakobhau:6014: asipatravanaṃ yatra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tīkṣṇā asayaḥ saṃnipatanti aṅgapratyaṅgānyavakṛntanti śyāmaśabalāśca śvāno bhakṣayanti / [164/02-164/03]
T07vakobhau:6016: teṣāṃ sattvānāmabhirohatāṃ kaṇṭakā avāṅmukhībhavantaḥ kāyaṃ bhindanti avataratāṃ cordhvībhavantaḥ / [164/04-164/05]
T07vakobhau:6019: caturtha utsado nadī vaitaraṇi pūrṇa taptasya kṣārodakasya yasyāṃ te sattvā asiśaktiprāsahastaiḥ
T07vakobhau:6020: puruṣairubhābhyāṃ tīrābhyāṃ prativāryamāṇā ūrdhvamapi gacchantaḥ svidyante pacyante
T07vakobhau:6024: ta ete catvāra utsadā digbhedena ṣoḍaśocyante / [164/11]
T07vakobhau:6029: kiṃ te narakapālāḥ sattvasaṃkhyātā utāho neti / [164/14]
T07vakobhau:6035: duḥkhiteṣu ca nandanti jāyante yamarākṣasā” iti // [164/18-164/19]
T07vakobhau:6036: ye te yamenānuśiṣṭāḥ sattvān narakeṣu prakṣipanti ta ete yamarākṣasā uktā na tu ye kāraṇāḥ kārayantīti / [164/19]
T07vakobhau:6039: teṣveva narakeṣu hi ānantaryakāriṇāṃ vipākāvakāśastatra teṣāṃ ko vipratibandhaḥ / [164/21]
T07vakobhau:6046: tadyathā arvudo nirarvudaḥ aṭato hahavaḥ huhuvaḥ utpalaḥ padmo mahāpadmaśca / [165/01-165/02]
T07vakobhau:6055: teṣāmanekaprakalpo bhedaḥ sthānaṃ cāniyataṃ nadīparvatamarupradeśeṣvanyeṣu vā 'dhaśca bhāvāt / [165/07-165/08]
T07vakobhau:6058: teṣāṃ kila mūlaṃ sthānaṃ mahāsamudrastato 'nyatra visṛtā iti / [165/09]
T07vakobhau:6060: tasya jambūdvīpasyādhastāt pañcayojanaśatāntaraparicchinnā rājadhānī teṣāṃ mūlasthānaṃ tato 'nyatra visṛtāḥ / [165/11]
T07vakobhau:6077: sūryavimānasyādhastāt vahiḥ sphaṭikamaṇḍalaṃ taijasamabhinirvṛttaṃ tāpanaṃ prakāśanaṃ ca / [165/21-165/22]
T07vakobhau:6081: kiṃ punaścaturdvīpeṣu sūryo yugapat kṛtyaṃ karoti / [165/24]
T07vakobhau:6086: yadottarakurāvardharātraṃ tadā pūrvavidehe sūryasyāstaṅgamanaṃ jambūdvīpe madhyāhno godānīye udayaḥ / [165/27]
T07vakobhau:6091: varṣāṇāṃ dvitīye māse bhādrapade dvitīyasya pakṣasya navamyāṃ vardhate rātriḥ / [166/03]
T07vakobhau:6104: jambūdvipasya dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ gacchati bhāskare rātrivṛddhiḥ uttaraṃ gacchatyaharvṛddhiḥ / [166/13]
T07vakobhau:6108: yadā hi saurasya vimānasyāsanne cāndramasaṃ vimānaṃ vahati tadā kila sauryo bhāsastasmin vimāne patanti / [166/16-166/17]
T07vakobhau:6109: tato 'parapārśve chāyā patantī vikalaṃ maṇḍalaṃ darśayatīti prājñaptiko nirdeśaḥ / [166/17-166/18]
T07vakobhau:6110: vāhayogaḥ sa tādṛśo bhavati yatkadācidvimānasyārdhaṃ dṛśyata iti pūrvācāryāḥ / [166/18-166/19]
T07vakobhau:6122: ṣoḍaśāṣṭau sahasrāṇi catvāri dve ca nirgatāḥ // VAkK_3.63 // [167/02]
T07vakobhau:6123: prathamā pariṣaṇḍā ṣoḍaśa sahasrāṇi yojanānāṃ sumerornirgatā / [167/03]
T07vakobhau:6127: prathamāyāṃ pariṣaṇḍāyāṃ karoṭapāṇayo nāma yakṣāḥ prativasanti / [167/06-167/07]
T07vakobhau:6130: caturthyāṃ tu catvāro mahārājāḥ svayaṃ prativasanti tatparicārāśca / [167/08-167/09]
T07vakobhau:6147: tāsu pañcayojanaśatapramāṇāścatvāraḥ kūṭā abhyudgatā yeṣu vajrapāṇayo nāma yakṣāḥ prativasanti / [167/20]
T07vakobhau:6150: puraṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma haimaṃ citratalaṃ mṛdu // VAkK_3.66 // [167/23-167/24]
T07vakobhau:6151: sumerutalasya madhye sudarśanaṃ nāma nagaram dairdhye sārdhatṛtīyayojanasahasre ekaikaṃ parśvamucchrāyeṇādhyardhayojanam / [167/24-167/25]
T07vakobhau:6153: tacca bhūmitalaṃ tūlapicuvat mṛdusaṃsparśaṃ pādakṣepotkṣepābhyāṃ natonnataṃ śakrasya devānāmindrasya rājadhānī / [168/01]
T07vakobhau:6155: śakrasya devānāmindrasya vaijayanto nāma prāsādo nagarasya madhye nānāratnasthānavidhānasaṃpadā sarvānyabhavanaśrīmahimnā hrepaṇo dairdhyeṇārdhatṛtīye yojanaśate pārśvaṃ pārśvam / [168/04]
T07vakobhau:6159: tasya hi nagarasya bahiścaturṣu pārśveṣu catvāryudyānādīni devānāṃ kriḍābhūmayaḥ / [168/08]
T07vakobhau:6163: eṣāṃ codyānānāṃ caturdiśaṃ catvāri sumūmīni viṃśatiyojanāntaritāni krīḍāsthānānyeva devānāṃ parasparaspardhayaiva śobhāṃ vitanvanti / [168/12]
T07vakobhau:6169: tasya khalu sarvapariphullasya yojanaśatamanuvātaṃ gandho vāti pañcāśadyojana yojanāni prativātam / [168/17]
T07vakobhau:6174: tasyaiva tu sā gandhasya tādṛśo prabhāvasaṃpadeṣṭavyā yāt pratibadhyamāno'pi divyairmṛdumārutairgandhāntaraṃ saṃtanoti / [168/20-168/21]
T07vakobhau:6175: mandataratamasamārambhāttu saṃtāna āśveva samucchidyate yato na tathā viprakṛṣṭamadhvānaṃ prasarpati / [168/21-168/22]
T07vakobhau:6176: kiṃ punaḥ svabhūtāśrita evamapuṣpagandhasaṃtāno vartate utāho vāyuradhivāsito jāyate / [168/22]
T07vakobhau:6181: satāṃ tu gandhaḥ prativātameti sarvā diśaḥ satpuruṣaḥ pravātī“ti / [169/01]
T07vakobhau:6184: na ca tasya tādṛśī śaktiḥ mahīsāsakāstu pathanti “yojanaśatamanuvātaṃ gandho vāti pañcāśadyojanāni prativātamiti / [169/03-169/04]
T07vakobhau:6185: sudharmā nāma devasabhā dakṣiṇapaścime digbhāge yasyāṃ niṣadya devāḥ kṛtyākṛtyaṃ samarthayanti / [169/04]
T07vakobhau:6189: te punaryāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaśca brahmakāyikādayaśca pūrvoktāḥ ṣoḍaśasthānāntaragatāḥ / [169/08]
T07vakobhau:6190: ityete dvāviṃśatidevanikāyāḥ samāsena yeṣāṃ bhājanaṃ prajñāyate / [169/09]
T07vakobhau:6192: teṣāṃ tu ṣaṭ kāmāvacarā devanikāyāḥ kāmān paribhuñjate na śeṣāḥ / [169/10-169/11]
T07vakobhau:6200: pāṇisaṃprāptyā tuṣitānāṃ hasitena nirmāṇaratīnāṃ prekṣitena paranirmitavaśavartinām / [169/16-169/17]
T07vakobhau:6204: yasya devasya devyā vā utsaṅge devakumāro devakanyā vā jāyate sa tayoḥ putro bhavati sā ca duhitā / [169/19-169/20]
T07vakobhau:6211: rūpāvacarā devāḥ saṃpūrṇakāyāḥ vastreṇa saṃvītā upapadyante / [170/01-170/02]
T07vakobhau:6216: santi sattvāḥ pratyupasthitakāmāḥ pratyupasthiteṣu kāmeṣvaiśvaryaṃ vaśe vartayanti / [170/05]
T07vakobhau:6219: santi sattvā nirmitakāmā nirmāya kāmānaiśvarya vaśe vartayanti / [170/06-170/07]
T07vakobhau:6221: santi sattvāḥ paranirmitakāmāḥ paranirmiteṣu kāmeṣvaiśvarya vaśe varttayanti / [170/08]
T07vakobhau:6223: tā etā yathot pannaparibhogitvāt yathecchātmanirmitaparibhogitvādyathecchātmapara nirmitaparibhogitvācca tisraḥ kāmopapattaya ityucyante / [170/10]
T07vakobhau:6226: triṣu dhyāneṣu yā nava bhūmayaḥ tāstisraḥ sukhopapattayaḥ / [170/12-170/14]
T07vakobhau:6227: te hi devā vivekajena samādhijena ca prītisukhena ca niṣprītikena ca sukhena sukhaṃ viharanto dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhanti / [170/14]
T07vakobhau:6234: jambūdvīpāt prabhṛti yaduttaraṃ sthānaṃ tasmādyāvadadho jambūdvīpastāvat punastasmādūrdhvaṃ sthānāntaram / [170/20-170/21]
T07vakobhau:6235: tadyathā caturthī pariṣaṇḍā caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ mūlasthānamitaścatvāriṃśadyojanasahasrāṇi / [170/21-170/22]
T07vakobhau:6236: tasmādyāvadadhojambūdvīpastāvadūrdhvaṃ tridaśānāṃ sthānam tasmādapi yāvadadho jambūdvīpastāvadūrdhvaṃ yāmānāṃ sthānam / [170/23]
T07vakobhau:6238: evaṃ vistareṇa sarvamanukramya sudarśanebhyo yāvadadho jambūdvīpastāvadūrdhvaṃmakaniṣṭhānāṃ sthānam / [170/25]
T07vakobhau:6243: kiṃ punaradharasthānopapannā urdhvāni vimānāni gatvā paśyanti [171/01]
T07vakobhau:6247: parāśrayeṇa vā yadvṛddhimatā nīyeran devena vā tatratyena / [171/03]
T07vakobhau:6252: kiṃ tarhi nirmitenādharabhūmikena tadicchayā paśyedihatyamiveti nikāyāntarīyāḥ / [171/07]
T07vakobhau:6262: atha ko'yaṃ sāhasraścūḍiko lokadhātuḥ ko dvisāhasrastrisāhasro vā / [171/13-171/14]
T07vakobhau:6266: candrāṇāṃ sumerūṇāṃ sahasraṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartināṃ
T07vakobhau:6269: teṣāṃ cūḍikānāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ sahasraṃ dvisāhasro madhyamo lokadhātuḥ / [171/20]
T07vakobhau:6271: teṣāṃ dvisāhasrāṇāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ sahasraṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ / [171/21-171/22]
T07vakobhau:6276: kiṃ khalu yathā bhājanānāṃ pramāṇabheda evaṃ tadvāsināmapi sattvānāṃ pramāṇabhedo'sti / [171/26]
T07vakobhau:6282: pūrvavidehakā godānīkā uttarakauravāśca manuṣyā aṣṭaṣoḍaśadvātriṃśaddhastakā yathākramam / [172/04]
T07vakobhau:6286: tanmātraṃ śarīraṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ dvau pādau trāyastriṃśānāṃ trayo yāmānāṃ catvārastuṣitānāṃ pañca nirmāṇaratīnāṃ adhyardhaḥ krośaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinām
T07vakobhau:6288: rūpiṇāṃ devānāṃ prathame sthāne brahmakāyikānāmardhayojanamātraṃ śarīram / [172/11]
T07vakobhau:6291: triṣu sthānesu brahmapurohitānāṃ yojanaṃ mahābrahmaṇo 'dhyardhaṃ parīttābhānāṃ dve yojane / [172/14-172/15]
T07vakobhau:6297: anabhrakāṇāṃ tato yojanatrayeṇa hīnaṃ dviguṇaṃ pañcaviṃśatiyojana śatam / [172/18-172/19]
T07vakobhau:6298: tasmāt pareṇa punaḥ puṇyaprasavānāṃ dviguṇaṃ dviguṇaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhānāṃ ṣoḍaśayojanasahasrāṇi śarīram / [172/20]
T07vakobhau:6307: jambūdvīpe nāstyāyuṣo niyamaḥ kadācit bhūyo bhavati kadācidalpīyaḥ / [173/03]
T07vakobhau:6315: taccāhorātraṃ vyavasthāpya śakyaṃ vaktumiti sa eva caiṣāṃ vyavasthāpyate / [173/10-173/11]
T07vakobhau:6318: yāni manuṣyāṇāṃ pañcāśadvarṣāṇi tāni kāmadhātāvadharāṇāṃ devānāṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāmekaṃ rātrindivam / [173/14]
T07vakobhau:6320: tena tatastenāhorātreṇa teṣāṃ triṃśadrātrakeṇa māsena dvādaśamāsakena saṃvatsareṇa divyāni pañcavarṣaśatānyāyuḥ pramāṇam / [173/17]
T07vakobhau:6327: mānuṣyakāṇi dve catvāryaṣṭau ṣoḍaśa varṣaśatānyekaṃ rātrindivam / [173/21-173/22]
T07vakobhau:6328: tena rātrindevena dve catvāryaṣṭau ṣoḍaśa divyāni varṣasahasrāṇyāyuṣaḥ pramāṇam / [173/22]
T07vakobhau:6331: puṣpāṇāṃ saṃkocavikāsātkumudabandhu vat śakunīnāṃ kūjanākūjanāt middhāpagamāgamācca ālokakṛtyaṃ svayaṃprabhatvāt / [173/25]
T07vakobhau:6337: evaṃ yasya yāvadyojanamāśrayastasya tāvatkalpamāyuryavadakaniṣṭhānāṃ ṣoḍaśakalpasahasrāṇyāyuḥ pramāṇam / [174/06]
T07vakobhau:6343: evaṃ teṣāṃ yathākramaṃ viṃśatiścatvāriṃśat ṣaṣṭiraśītiḥ kalpasahasrāṇyāyuḥpramāṇam / [174/11-174/12]
T07vakobhau:6344: katamo'tra kalpo veditavyaḥ kimantarakalpo'tha saṃvartakalpo'tha vivarttakalpo'tha mahākalpaḥ / [174/13]
T07vakobhau:6349: yacca loko viṃśatimantarakalpān vivartate yacca loko viṃśatimantarakalpānvivarta
T07vakobhau:6350: āste yacca viṃśatimantarakalpānsaṃvartate ime ṣaṣṭirantarakalpā mahābrahmaṇo'dhyardhaḥ kalpaḥ uktaḥ / [174/17-174/18]
T07vakobhau:6351: evaṃ ca kṛtvā mahākalpasyārdhaṃ catvāriṃśadantarakalpān kalpīkṛtya teṣāmāyuḥ pramāṇamuktam / [174/19]
T07vakobhau:6357: yāvat ṣaṇṇāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devanikāyānāmāyuruktaṃ tena tulyā ahorātrāḥ ṣaṭṣu narakeṣu yathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ / [174/24-174/25]
T07vakobhau:6358: saṃjīve kālasūtre saṃghāte raurave mahāraurave tāpane ca / [174/26]
T07vakobhau:6360: tairidānīṃ svairahorātraisteṣāṃ yathā ṣaṇṇāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāmāyustathaiva yathākramaṃ veditavyam / [174/28]
T07vakobhau:6362: yaddhi cāturmahārājakāyikānāmāyuḥ pramāṇaṃ tatsaṃjīvane mahānarake ekaṃ rātrindivaṃ / [174/29-175/01]
T07vakobhau:6363: tena yāvat dvādaśamāsakena saṃvatsareṇa tatratyāni pañcavarṣaśatānyāyuḥ / [175/01-175/02]
T07vakobhau:6364: yattrāyastriṃśānāmāyuḥ pramāṇaṃ tat kālasūtre mahānarake ekaṃ rātrindivam / [175/02-175/03]
T07vakobhau:6366: evamanyeṣvapi yathāyogaṃ yojyaṃ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartināmāyuḥpramāṇaṃ tattulyenāhorātreṇa tāpane ṣoḍaśa varṣasahasrāṇyāyuḥpramāṇam / [175/05]
T07vakobhau:6374: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā “aṣṭāvime bhikṣavo nāgā mahānāgāḥ kalpasthā dharaṇidharā” iti vistaraḥ / [175/14]
T07vakobhau:6381: upamānamātreṇa teṣvāyurākhyātaṃ bhagavatā “tadyathā bhikṣavaḥ iha syādviṃśatikhārīko māgadhakastilavāhaḥ pūrṇastilānāṃ cūḍikāvaddhaḥ / [175/20-175/22]
T07vakobhau:6382: tataḥ kaścideva varṣaśatasyātyayādekaṃ tilamapanayate kṣiprataraṃ bhikṣavaḥ saviṃśatikhārīko māgadhastilavāho'nenopakrameṇa parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet / [175/22]
T07vakobhau:6384: yathā khalu bhikṣavo viṃśatirvudā evameko nirarvudo vistareṇa yathā khalu bhikṣavo viṃśatiḥ padyā evameko mahāpadma” iti / [175/25]
T07vakobhau:6391: tuṣitastharsyakajātibaddhasya bodhisattvasya caramabhavikasattvasya jinādiṣṭasya jinabhutasya śraddhādharmānusāriṇo bodhisattvacakravarttimātrośca tadgarbhayorityevamādinām / [176/06-176/07]
T07vakobhau:6392: yojanapramaṇena sthānāni śarīrāṇi cotkāni varṣapramāṇenāyuruktaṃ tayośca pramāṇaṃ noktamiti vaktavyaṃ nānā ca sarveṣāṃ vavasthānamatastasyāpi paryanto vaktavyaḥ / [176/08]
T07vakobhau:6397: kālasya paryantaḥ kṣaṇo nāmnaḥ paryanto'kṣaraṃ tadyathā gauriti / [176/12]
T07vakobhau:6399: samagreṣu pratyayeṣu yāvatā dharmasyātmalābhaḥ gacchanvā dharmo yāvatā paramāṇoḥ paramāṇvantaraṃ gacchati / [176/13-176/14]
T07vakobhau:6408: tāni sapta gorajaḥ tāni sapta vātāyanacchidrarajaḥ / [176/20]
T07vakobhau:6411: sapta yavā aṅgulīparva trīṇi parvāṇyaṅgurīti prasiddhameveti noktam / [176/22]
T07vakobhau:6416: pañcaśatānyeṣāṃ krośo raṇyaṃ ca tanmatam // VAkK_3.87 // [177/05]
T07vakobhau:6434: catvāro māsā hemantānāṃ catvāro grīṣmāṇāṃ catvāro varṣāṇāmityete dvādaśa māsā saṃvatsaraḥ sārdhamūnarātraiḥ / [177/20]
T07vakobhau:6445: narakeṣu hi sattvāsaṃbhavāt prabhṛti yāvat bhājanasaṃkṣayaḥ /
T07vakobhau:6450: bhavati sa kālo yannarakeṣu sattvāścyavante nopapadyante /
T07vakobhau:6452: yadayaṃ loko viṃśatyantarakalpān vivṛtto'sthāt tanniryātaṃ vaktavyam / [178/08-178/09]
T07vakobhau:6454: yadā narakeṣvekasattvo nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā 'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati / [178/10-178/11]
T07vakobhau:6455: yaduta narakasaṃvarttanyā yasya tadānīṃ niyataṃ narakavedanīyaṃ karma ghriyate sa lokadhātvantaranarakeṣu kṣipyate / [178/11-178/12]
T07vakobhau:6459: sa kālo yanmanuṣyeṣvanyatamaḥ sattvaḥ svayamanācāryakaṃ dharmatāprātilambhikaṃ prathamaṃ
T07vakobhau:6460: dhyānaṃ samāpadyate sa tasmāt vyutthāya vācaṃ bhāṣate sukhaṃ vata vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ
T07vakobhau:6462: taṃ ca śabdaṃ śrutvā anye'pi sattvāḥ samāpadyante / [178/17]
T07vakobhau:6464: yadā jambūdvīpa ekasattvo'pi nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta jambūdvīpasaṃvartanyā / [178/18-178/19]
T07vakobhau:6466: yadā manuṣyeṣvekasattvo'pi nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta manuṣyagatisaṃvarttanyā / [178/20-178/21]
T07vakobhau:6469: evaṃ cāturmahārājakāyikeṣvapi deveṣu prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadya brahmaloka upapadyante / [178/22-178/24]
T07vakobhau:6470: yadā tatraikasattvo'pi nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta cāturmahārājakāyikasaṃvartanyā / [178/24-178/25]
T07vakobhau:6472: yadaikasattvo'pi kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta kāmadhātusaṃvartanyā / [178/26-178/28]
T07vakobhau:6473: brahmaloke'pyanyatamaḥ sattvo dharmatāprātilambhikaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyotthāya vācaṃ bhāṣate sukhaṃ vata samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ śāntaṃ vata samādhijaṃ prītisukhamiti / [178/28-179/01]
T07vakobhau:6474: taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā'nye'pi sattvāḥ samāpadyante kālaṃ ca kṛtvā ābhāsvareṣu deveṣūpapadyante / [179/01-179/02]
T07vakobhau:6475: yadā brahmaloka ekasattvo'pi nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta sattvasaṃvartanyā / [179/02-179/04]
T07vakobhau:6476: tataḥ śūnye bhājane ita eva sāmantakāt sattvānāṃ tadākṣepake karmaṇi parikṣīṇe sapta sūryāḥ prādurbhūya krameṇa yāvat pṛthivīṃ sumeruṃ ca niḥśeṣaṃ dahanti / [179/04-179/05]
T07vakobhau:6477: tasmādevaṃ prajvalitādarcirvāyunā kṣiptaṃ śūnyaṃ brāhmaṃ vimānaṃ nirdahat paraiti / [179/05]
T07vakobhau:6483: narakeṣu sattvānāṃ cyutyanutpādāt prabhṛti yāvat bhājanānāṃ saṃkṣaya eṣa kālaḥ / [179/10]
T07vakobhau:6485: thamādvāyoḥ prabhṛti yāvannarakeṣu sattvasambhavaḥ eṣa kālo vivartakalpa ityucyate / [179/12-179/14]
T07vakobhau:6486: tathā saṃvṛte hi loka ākāśamātrāvaśeṣaścira kālaṃ tiṣṭhati yāvat punarapi sattvānāṃ karmādhipatyena bhājanānāṃ pūrvanimittabhūtā ākāśe mandamandā vāyavaḥ syandante / [179/14-179/15]
T07vakobhau:6487: tadā yadayaṃ loko viṃśatimantarakalpān saṃvṛtto'sthāttanniryātaṃ vaktavyam / [179/15]
T07vakobhau:6489: tataste vāyavo vardhamānā yathoktaṃ vāyumaṇḍalaṃ jāyate / [179/16-179/17]
T07vakobhau:6490: tataḥ śanairyathoktakramavidhānaṃ sarvaṃ jāyate apmaṇḍalaṃ kāñcanamayī mahāpṛthivī dvīpāḥ sumervādayaśca / [179/17-179/18]
T07vakobhau:6493: iyatā'yaṃ loko vivṛtto bhavati yaduta bhājanavivartanyā / [179/19-179/20]
T07vakobhau:6494: athānyataraḥ sattva ābhāsvarebhyaścyutvā śūnye brāhme vimāna utpadyate / [179/20-179/21]
T07vakobhau:6497: krameṇa yāvaduttarakurau godānīye pūrvavidehe jambūdvīpe preteṣu tiryakṣu narakeṣūpapadyante / [179/22-179/23]
T07vakobhau:6498: dharmatā hyeṣā yat paścāt saṃvartate tat pūrvaṃ vivarttate / [179/23-179/24]
T07vakobhau:6499: yadā narakeṣvekaḥ sattvo'pi prādurbhūto bhavati tadā yadayaṃ loko viṃśatimantarakalpān vivartate tanniryātaṃ bhavati / [179/24-179/25]
T07vakobhau:6502: vivartamāne loke ekānna viṃśatirantarakalpā aparimitāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmatikrāmanti / [180/01-180/02]
T07vakobhau:6509: tebhyo hi daśavarṣāyuṣkebhya utkarṣaṃ gacchantaḥ krameṇāśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣo bhavanti / [180/07]
T07vakobhau:6518: nātaḥ pareṇa vardhante yāvāneva cānyeṣāmantarakalpānāmutkarṣāpakarṣakālastāvāneva prathamasyāpakarṣakālaḥ paścimasya cotkarṣakāla iti samānakālāḥ sarve bhavanti / [180/15]
T07vakobhau:6519: iti loko vivṛtto'yaṃ kalpāṃstiṣṭhati viṃśatim // VAkK_3.92 // [180/16]
T07vakobhau:6523: viṃśatimevāntarakalpān vivartate viṃśatiṃ saṃvartate viṃśatiṃ saṃvṛtta āste / [180/19-180/20]
T07vakobhau:6524: yadyapi tadānīmutkarṣā apakarṣāśca na pravartante kālastu samānaḥ parisaṃkhyāyate / [180/20-180/22]
T07vakobhau:6525: tatraikenāntara kalpena bhājanānyabhinivartante ekānnaviṃśatyā 'ntarakalpairāvāsyante ekenāntarakalpena bhājanāni vidhvasyante ekānnaviṃśatyā śūnyī bhavanti / [180/22-180/23]
T07vakobhau:6531: yaducyate tribhirasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpānāṃ budhatvaṃ prāpyata” iti / [181/01]
T07vakobhau:6597: na tu naiva parisaṃkhyātuṃ śakyanta iti / [182/03]
T07vakobhau:6598: kintu khalu kālaprakarṣeṇaiva kṛtapraṇidhānā bodhisattvā bodhimabhisaṃbudhyante / [182/04]
T07vakobhau:6600: mahatāṃ hi puṇyajñānasaṃbhāreṇa ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ bahubhirduṣkaraśatasahasraistribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante bodhisattvāḥ / [182/06]
T07vakobhau:6601: yadyapyanyathā'pyasti mokṣāvakāśaḥ kimarthaṃ ta iyantaṃ yatnamārabhante / [182/06-182/07]
T07vakobhau:6602: parārthaṃ ta iyantaṃ yatnamārabhante kathaṃ parānapi mahato duḥkhaughāt paritrātuṃ śaknuyāmiti / [182/07-182/08]
T07vakobhau:6604: eṣa eva teṣāṃ svārtho yaḥ parārthastasyābhimatatvāt / [182/08-182/09]
T07vakobhau:6607: kāruṇikaistu śraddhitamevaitat yathā ceha kecidabhyastanairdhṛṇyā asatyapi svārthe paravyasanābhiratā upalabhyante / [182/11-182/12]
T07vakobhau:6608: tathā punarabhyastakāruṇyā asatyapi svārthe parahitakriyābhirāmāḥ santīti saṃbhāvyam / [182/12-182/15]
T07vakobhau:6610: niveśya taddhetorduḥkhānyudvahanti evaṃ punarabhyāsavaśādātmasnehaṃ tebhyo nirvartya
T07vakobhau:6612: gotrāntarameva hi tattathājātīyaṃ nirvartate yat pareṣāṃ duḥkhena duḥkhāyate sukhena sukhāyate nātmana iti / [182/16]
T07vakobhau:6616: madhyo duḥkhanivṛttimeva na sukhaṃ duḥkhāspadaṃ tadyataḥ /
T07vakobhau:6621: aśītivarṣaśatāyupi prajāyāmapakarṣe ārabdhe yāvadvarṣaśatāyuṣo manuṣyā bhavantyetasminnantare buddhā utpadyante / [182/24]
T07vakobhau:6625: tadā hi pañca kaṣāyā abhyutsadā bhavanti / [183/02-183/03]
T07vakobhau:6627: apakarṣasyādhastāt pratyavarā āyurādayaḥ kiṭabhūtatvāt kaṣāyā ucyante / [183/04]
T07vakobhau:6640: tathāhi pūrvayogaṃ paṭhanti “parvate kila pañcaśatāni tāpasānāṃ kaṣṭāni tapāṃsi tapyante
T07vakobhau:6641: sma yāvat pratyekabuddhasahoṣitena markaṭenāgamya tadīryāpathasaṃdarśanāt pratyekabodhimabhisaṃbanddhā” iti / [183/14]
T07vakobhau:6646: mahākalpānāṃ śataṃ bodhisaṃbhāreṣu caritaḥ khaḍgaṃ viṣāṇakalpo bhavati / [183/18]
T07vakobhau:6651: śakyaṃ ca taiḥ pūrvabuddhānāṃ śāsanamanusmṛtyāpi dharmaṃ deśayitum / [183/21]
T07vakobhau:6658: anusroto gāminīnāṃ hi prajānāṃ duṣkaraṃ pratisroto nayanam / [183/24-183/25]
T07vakobhau:6662: amite cāyuṣi manuṣyāṇāṃ yāvadaśītisahasrake cotpattiścakravarttināṃ nādhaḥ / [184/03-184/04]
T07vakobhau:6668: prathama eṣāmuttamo dvitīya upottamaḥ tṛtīyo madhyamaścaturtho 'dhamaḥ / [184/09]
T07vakobhau:6677: “yasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tadaīva poṣadhe pañcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnātasyopoṣadho
T07vakobhau:6679: sahasrāraṃ sanābhikaṃ sanemikaṃ sarvākāraparipūrṇaṃ śubhakarmārakṛtaṃ divyaṃ sarvasauvarṇaṃ
T07vakobhau:6683: sūtra ukta” masthānamanavakāśo yadapūrvācaramau dvau tathāgatāvarhantau samyaksaṃbuddhau loka utpadyeyātāṃ nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate sthānametadvidyate yadaikastathāgataḥ / [184/20-184/21]
T07vakobhau:6686: kimatra trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturloka iṣṭa utāho sarvalokadhātava iti / [184/22-184/23]
T07vakobhau:6690: eka eva hi bhagavān sarvatra śaktaḥ / [184/24-184/25]
T07vakobhau:6691: yatra buddha eko na śaktaḥ syād vineyān vinetuṃ tatrā'nyo'pi na śakta iti / [184/25-184/27]
T07vakobhau:6692: uktaṃ ca sūtre “sa cettvāṃ śāriputra kaścidupasaṃkramyaivaṃ pṛcchet asti kaścidetarhi śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā samasamaḥ śramaṇena gotamena yadutābhisaṃbodhāya
T07vakobhau:6694: sa cenmāṃ bhadanta kaścidupasaṃkramyevaṃ pṛcchettasyāhaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vyākuryā nāsti kaścidetarhhi śṛamaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā samasamo bhagavatā yadutābhisaṃbodhāya
T07vakobhau:6696: saṃmukhaṃ me bhagavato'ntikācchrutaṃ saṃmukhamudgṛhītaṃ asthānamanavakāso yadapūrvācaramau tathāgatau loka utpadyeyātāṃ nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata” iti / [185/03-185/04]
T07vakobhau:6697: yattarhi bhagavatoktaṃ brahmasūtre “yāvattrisāhasramahāsāhasrako loko vaśe me'tra vartata” iti / [185/04]
T07vakobhau:6703: bahavo hi samaṃ saṃbhāreṣu pravartamānā dṛśyante / [185/07-185/09]
T07vakobhau:6704: na caikatra bahūnāṃ buddhānāṃ yugapat yoga utpattuṃ na cāsti tadut pattau kakścit pratibandhaḥ iti niyataṃ lokadhātvantareṣūtpadyante / [185/09-185/10]
T07vakobhau:6705: anantā lokadhātava iti na śakyaṃ bhagavatā kalpamapyāyurvirbhratā yitheha tathā'nyeṣvapi ananteṣu lokadhātuṣu vyāpartuṃ kiṃ punaḥ puruṣāyuṣam
T07vakobhau:6707: asya pudgalasyedamindriyam iyatā kālelāmuṣmin deśe amuṃ pudgalamāgamyāsya doṣasya
T07vakobhau:6708: parihārādasyāṅgasyopasaṃhārādanena prayogeṇānutpannaṃ votpatsyate aparipūrṇaṃ vā paripūrayiṣyatīti / [185/13-185/15]
T07vakobhau:6710: loka utpadyeyātāmi“ti tadevedaṃ saṃpradhāryate kimidamekaṃ lokadhātumadhikṛtyoktamāhosvit sarvāniti / [185/15-185/16]
T07vakobhau:6713: athaitat kṣamyate idaṃ tu kasmānna kṣamyate “puṇyastu buddhānāṃ loka utpāda” iti / [185/17-185/18]
T07vakobhau:6714: yadi bahūnāṃ bahuṣu syānna doṣaḥ syāt / [185/18]
T07vakobhau:6716: athaiṅkasminnapi kasmāt dvau tathāgatau na sahotpadyete / [185/19]
T07vakobhau:6718: evaṃ hi bodhisattvāḥ praṇidhānaṃ kurvanti aho vatāhamandhe loke 'pariṇāyake buddho loka utpadyeyamanāthānāṃ nātha iti / [185/21]
T07vakobhau:6720: ekasminhi buddhe sutarāmādriyante durlabha īdṛśo'nya iti manyamānāḥ sutarāṃ cābhitvarante śāsanapratipattau mā'smin gate parinirvṛte vā 'nāthā bhūmeti / [185/24]
T07vakobhau:6721: athaite cakravartinaḥ suvarṇādimayaiścakraiḥ pṛthivīṃ jayantaḥ kathaṃ jayanti /
T07vakobhau:6724: yasya sauvarṇa cakraṃ bhavati taṃ koṭarājānaḥ svayaṃ pratyudgacchanti / [185/26-186/01]
T07vakobhau:6725: ime devasya janapadāḥ ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāśca subhikṣāścākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca / [186/01-186/02]
T07vakobhau:6728: yasya rūpyamayaṃ sa svayameva teṣāmantikaṃ yāti paścādasya prahvībhavanti / [186/03-186/04]
T07vakobhau:6729: yasya tāmramayaṃ sa teṣāmantikaṃ gatvā kalahāyate paścāt prahvībhavanti / [186/04-186/05]
T07vakobhau:6730: yasya śastramayaṃ sa teṣāmantikaṃ gacchati anyonyaṃ śastrāṇyāvahanti paścānnamanti / [186/05]
T07vakobhau:6733: śastreṇāpi jayatāṃ badho na pravartate nirjitya ca sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayanti / [186/08]
T07vakobhau:6735: sūtra uktaṃ “rājñaścakravartino loke prādurbhāvātsaptānāṃ ratnānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati / [186/10-186/11]
T07vakobhau:6736: tadyathā cakraratnasya hastiratnasyāśvaratnasya maṇiratnasya strīratnasya gṛhapatiratnasya pariṇāyakaratnasye“ti / [186/11]
T07vakobhau:6739: yena tu sattvena tatsaṃbandha saṃvartanīyaṃ karmopacitaṃ tasminnutpanne svānyevainaṃ karmāṇyutpādayanti / [186/13-186/14]
T07vakobhau:6747: kiṃ khalu prāthamakalpikā api manuṣyāḥ sarājakā āsan /
T07vakobhau:6752: sūtra uktaṃ “te bhavanti rūpiṇo manomayāḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā āvikalā ahīnendriyāḥ
T07vakobhau:6753: śubhā varṇasthāyinaḥ svayaṃ prabhā vihāyasaṃgamāḥ prītibhakṣaḥ prītyāhārā dīrghāyuṣo
T07vakobhau:6758: tasyānyatamo lolupajātīyaḥ sattvo gandhaṃ ghrātvā rasaṃ svāditavān bhakṣitavāṃśca / [187/01-187/02]
T07vakobhau:6761: teṣāṃ tadāhārābhyāsāt kharatvaṃ gurutvaṃ ca kāye'vakrāntaṃ prabhāvā antarhitāḥ / [187/03-187/04]
T07vakobhau:6763: so'pyeṣāṃ bhūmirasa āsvādagṛddhānāṃ krameṇāntarhito bhūmiparpaṭakaṃ prādurbhūtam / [187/05]
T07vakobhau:6768: tasyedānīmaudārikatvānniḥsyandanirvāhārthaṃ sattvānāṃ mūtrapurīṣamārgau saha strīpuruṣendriyābhyāṃ prādurbhūtau saṃsthānaṃ ca bhinnam / [187/08-187/09]
T07vakobhau:6769: teṣāmanyonyaṃ paśyatāṃ pūrvābhyāsavaśādayoniśomanaskāragrāhagrāsatāṃ gatānāṃ kāmarāga udīrṇo yato vipratipannāḥ / [187/09-187/10]
T07vakobhau:6771: te ca khalu taṃ śāliṃ sāyaṃ ca sāyamāśārthaṃ prātaśca prātarāśārthaṃ praveśayanti sma / [187/11]
T07vakobhau:6774: teṣāṃ tatra mamakāra utpanne sa śālirlūno lūno na punarjāyate sma / [187/13-187/14]
T07vakobhau:6775: tataḥ kṣetrāṇi pravibhajya sveṣvāgrahaṃ kṛtvā parakīyaṃ hartumārabdhāḥ / [187/14]
T07vakobhau:6777: taisteṣāmaṅkuśārthaṃ sametyānyatamaḥ puruṣaviśeṣaḥ kṣetrāṇi pālayituṃ ṣaṣṭhabhāgena bhṛtaḥ / [187/15-187/16]
T07vakobhau:6778: tasya kṣetrāṇāmadhipatiḥ kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriya iti saṃjñotpannā / [187/16-187/17]
T07vakobhau:6779: mahājanakāyasya saṃmataḥ prajāṃ ca rañjayatīti mahāsaṃmato rājeti samjñotpannā / [187/17]
T07vakobhau:6781: tatra ye gṛhebhyo vahirmanasaḥ saṃvṛttāsteṣāṃ brāhmaṇā iti saṃjñotpannā / [187/18-187/19]
T07vakobhau:6782: athānyatamasya rājño lobhāt samvibhāgamakurvantaḥ sattvānāṃ tāskaryaṃ prācuryamāpannaṃ sa tān śastreṇopasaṃkramate sma / [187/20]
T07vakobhau:6783: tato'nye naivaṅkārakāḥ sma iti mṛṣā vācaṃ vaktumārabdhāḥ iti [187/21]
T07vakobhau:6785: tata evaṃ karmapathānāṃ vṛddhau satyāṃ krameṇa hrasatāṃ manusyāṇāṃ daśavarṣāyuṣo manuṣyāḥ saṃbhavanti / [187/23]
T07vakobhau:6786: ato'sya kṛtsnasyānarthaughasya dvau dharmau mūlayoniḥ rasarāga ālasyaṃ ca / [187/24]
T07vakobhau:6792: antarakalpasya niryāṇakāle daśavarṣāyuṣo manuṣyāḥ adharmarāgaraktā bhavanti viṣamalobhāvibhūtā mithyādharmaparītāḥ / [188/02-188/03]
T07vakobhau:6793: teṣāṃ vyāpāda utkarṣa gato'nyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tīvramāghātacittaṃ vadhakacittaṃ ca pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati / [188/03-188/05]
T07vakobhau:6794: tadyathedānīṃ mṛgalubdhakasyāraṇyakaṃ mṛgaṃ dṛṣṭvā te yadyadeva gṛhṇanti kāṣṭham vā loṣṭaṃ vā tatteṣāṃ tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ prādurbhavati / [188/05]
T07vakobhau:6796: punaḥ kalpasya niryāṇakāle daśavarṣāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ taireva doṣairamanuṣyā īti mutsṛjanti / [188/06-188/07]
T07vakobhau:6798: punardaśavarṣāyuṣāṃ taireva doṣairdevā varṣaṃ notsṛjanti yato durbhikṣaṃ jāyate cañcaḥ śvetāsthi śalākāvṛttiḥ / [188/08]
T07vakobhau:6801: ya idānīṃ samavāyaḥ sa tadānīṃ cañca ityucyate / [188/09-188/10]
T07vakobhau:6803: te ca manuṣyā jighatsādaurbalyaparītāḥ sametya kālaṃ kurvanti samudreṣu cānāgatajanatā'nugrahārthaṃ bījānyavasthāpayanti / [188/11]
T07vakobhau:6807: teṣāṃ hi śuṣkarukṣakāyānāṃ kālaṃ kurvatāmāśvevāsthīni śvetāni bhavanti bubhukṣāhatāśca śvetānyasthīni saṃhṛtya kvāthayitvā pivanti / [188/14]
T07vakobhau:6810: te hi sattvāḥ śalākoddeśikayā gṛheṣvāmirṣaṃ samvibhajante adya gṛhasvāmī bhokṣyate
T07vakobhau:6811: śvo gṛhasvāminītyevamādi dhānyasthānavivarebhyaśca śalākayā dhānyaphalāni niṣkṛṣya
T07vakobhau:6814: yenaikāhamapi prāṇātīpātaviratiḥ samrakṣitā bhavati ekaharītakī vā saṃghāyaikapiṇḍapāto vā satkṛtyānupradatto bhavati sa teṣu śastrarogadurbhikṣāntarakalpeṣu notpadyata iti / [188/20]
T07vakobhau:6815: atha kiyantaṃ kālametāni śastrāghātarogadurbhikṣāṇi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bhavanti [188/21]
T07vakobhau:6816: divasān sapta māsāṃśca varṣāṇi ca ythākramam // VAkK_3.99 // [188/22]
T07vakobhau:6819: durbhikṣaṃ saptavarṣāṇi ca māsāṃśca divasāmśceti samuccayārthaścakāraḥ / [188/23-188/24]
T07vakobhau:6821: vyāpāda udrekaprāpto bhavati vaivastryadaurbalye jighatsāpipāse ca / [188/25]
T07vakobhau:6825: ekatra dhyāne sattvāḥ samaṃ saṃvartante etasyāmiti saṃvartanī / [189/02-189/03]
T07vakobhau:6826: saptabhiḥ sūryaistejaḥ saṃvartanī bhavati varṣodakenāpsaṃvartanī vāyuprakopādvāyusaṃvartanī / [189/04]
T07vakobhau:6832: nanu ca sattvānāṃ karmajaḥ prabhāvaviśiṣṭo vāyurbījamuktam / [189/07]
T07vakobhau:6834: “vāyunā lokāntarebhyo bījānyāhriyanta” iti mahīśāsakāḥ sūtre paṭhanti / [189/08-189/09]
T07vakobhau:6847: citro hi guṇadharmo dravyaṃ tu naivam / [189/14-189/15]
T07vakobhau:6848: samānajātīyebhyaḥ eva hi dravyebhyaḥ samānajātīyānāṃ dṛṣṭa utpādastadyathā vīraṇebhyaḥ kaṭasya tantubhyaḥ paṭasyeti / [189/15]
T07vakobhau:6852: anyo vīraṇebhyaḥ kaṭo'nyaśca tantubhyaḥ paṭa iti / [189/17-189/18]
T07vakobhau:6853: ta eva hi te yathāsaṃniviṣṭāstāṃ tāṃ saṃjñāṃ labhnte / [189/18]
T07vakobhau:6857: ko hi tadā sataḥ paṭasyopalabdhau pratibandhaḥ / [189/19-189/20]
T07vakobhau:6861: anekā śrayasaṃyogāpekṣaṇe daśāmātrasaṃyoge paṭopalabdhiḥ syānna vā kadācit / [189/21-189/22]
T07vakobhau:6866: citrarūpāditve vijātīyārambho'pi syāt acitre ca pārśvāntare paṭasyādarśanaṃ citradarśanaṃ vā / [189/26]
T07vakobhau:6869: paramāṇvatīndriyatve'pi samastānāṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ yathā teṣāṃ kāryārambhakatvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ ca taimirikāṇāṃ ca vikīrṇakeśopalabdhiḥ / [190/02]
T07vakobhau:6871: rūpādiṣveva ca paramāṇusaṃjñāniveśā ttadvināśe siddhaḥ paramāṇuvināśaḥ / [190/03-190/04]
T07vakobhau:6872: dravyaṃ hi paramāṇuranyacca rūpādibhyo dravyamiti na teṣaṃ vināśe tadvināśaḥ siddhyati / [190/04-190/05]
T07vakobhau:6873: ayuktamasyānyatvaṃ yāvatā na nirdhāryate kenacit imāni pṛthivyaptejāṃsi ima eṣāṃ rūpādaya iti / [190/06-190/07]
T07vakobhau:6874: cakṣuḥsparśanagrāhyāṇi ca prajñāyante dagdheṣu corṇākarpāsakusumbhakuṅkumādiṣu tadbuddhyabhāvādrūpādibhedeṣveva tadbuddhiḥ / [190/07-190/08]
T07vakobhau:6877: ko vā bālapralāpeṣvādaraḥ iti tiṣṭhatu tāvadevāpratiṣedhaḥ / [190/10]
T07vakobhau:6879: dhyānatrayaṃ dvitīyādi śīrṣa tāsām yathākramam // VAkK_3.100 // [190/12]
T07vakobhau:6881: tejaḥsaṃvartanyā dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ śīrṣaṃ bhavatyadho dahyate / [190/13]
T07vakobhau:6890: ata evatasmin kṛtsnakāyakrauryāpagamāt duḥkhendriyasya nirodha uktaḥ sūtre / [190/21]
T07vakobhau:6893: iti yasyāṃ dhyānasamāpattau yathābhuta ādhyātmiko'pakṣālastasyām dhyānopapattau tathābhūto bāhya iti / [190/22-190/23]
T07vakobhau:6895: pṛthivyeva hi bhājanākhyā tasyāṃ tejojalavāyubhirvirodho na pṛthhivyeti / [190/24]
T07vakobhau:6899: ato'tra bāhyo'pakṣālo na pravartata iti nāstyatra saṃvartanī / [190/27]
T07vakobhau:6901: nahi taiḥ śakyamārupyān praveṣṭuṃ nāpyanyatra gantumiti / [191/01-191/02]
T07vakobhau:6903: na nityaṃ saha sattvena tadvimānodayavyayāt // VAkK_3.101 // [191/04]
T07vakobhau:6918: etena krameṇāpsaṃvartanīnāṃ gate saptake punaḥ tejaḥsaṃvartanīnāṃ saptako bhavati / [191/14]
T07vakobhau:6922: yathiva hi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ samāpattiviśeṣādātmabhāvānāṃ sthitiviśeṣastathā bhājanānāmapāmiti tā etā bhavanti ṣaṭpañcāśattejaḥ saṃvartanyaḥ saptāpsaṃvarttanyaḥ ekā vāyusaṃvarttanī / [191/17-191/18]
T07vakobhau:6923: evaṃ ca prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ sunītaṃ bhavati “catuḥṣaṣṭi kalpāḥ śubhakṛtsnānāṃ devānāmāyuḥpramāṇami“ti / [191/19-191/20]
T07vakobhau:6925: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇa” // iti / [191/21]
T07vakobhau:6930: atha yadetatsattvabhājanalokasya bahudhā vaicitryamukta tat kena kṛtam / [192/03-192/04]
T07vakobhau:6935: yadi karmajaṃ kasmātsattvānāṃ karmabhiḥ kuṅkumacandanādayo ramyatarā jāyante na teṣāṃ śarīrāṇi / [192/07-192/08]
T07vakobhau:6936: karmāṇyeva tānyevañjātīyāti vyābhiśrakāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ yadāśrayāśca vraṇabhūtā jāyante bhogāśca ramyāstatpratīkārabhūtāḥ / [192/08-192/09]
T07vakobhau:6940: sūtra uktaṃ “dve karmaṇī cetanā karma cetayitvā ce“ti / [192/11-192/12]
T07vakobhau:6942: te ete dve karmaṇī trīṇi bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:6956: yattaccetanājanitaṃ cetayitvā karmetyuktaṃ kāyavākkarmaṇī te veditavye / [192/21]
T07vakobhau:6958: te tu kāyavākkarmaṇī pratyekaṃ vijñaptyavijñaptisvabhāve veditavye /
T07vakobhau:6962: cittavaśena kāyasya tathā tathā saṃsthānaṃ kāyavijñaptiḥ /
T07vakobhau:6971: sarva hi saṃskṛtamātmalābhā dūrdhvaṃ na bhavatīti yatraiva jātaṃ tatraiva dhvasyate / [193/04]
T07vakobhau:6984: so 'sāvākasmikok vināśo yadi bhāvasyotpannamātrasya na syāt paścādapi na syādbhāvasya tulyatvāt / [193/09-193/10]
T07vakobhau:6988: na hi sa eva tasmādvilakṣaṇo yujyate / [193/10-193/11]
T07vakobhau:6991: na ca sarvasyākasmiko vināśaḥ kathaṃ tāvat bhavān kāṣṭhādīnāmagnyādisaṃyogādvināśaṃ paśyāmīti manyate / [193/13]
T07vakobhau:6994: kimagnisaṃyogātkāṣṭhādayo vinaṣṭā ato na dṛśyante utāho svayaṃ vinaṣṭā anye ca punarnotpannā ato na dṛśyante / [193/15-193/16]
T07vakobhau:7002: kṣaṇikānāṃ ca buddhiśabdārciṣāṃ dṛṣṭa ākasmiko vināśa iti nāyaṃ hetumapekṣate / [193/20-193/21]
T07vakobhau:7006: na hi śaṃsayaniścayajñānayoryuktaṃ samavadhānaṃ sukhaduḥkhayo rāgadveṣayorvā / [193/22-193/24]
T07vakobhau:7007: yadā ca paṭubuddhiśabdānantaramapaṭubuddhiśabdāvutpadyete tadā kathamapaṭuḥ samānajātīyo dharmaḥ paṭīyāṃsaṃ hiṃsyāt / [193/24-193/25]
T07vakobhau:7008: antyayośca kathaṃ yo 'pyarciṣāmavasthānahetvabhāvāddharmādharmavaśādvā vināśaṃ manyate tadapyayuktam / [193/25]
T07vakobhau:7010: na cāpyutpādavināśahetvordharmārdharmayoḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe vṛttilābhapratibandhau bhavitumarhataḥ / [193/27]
T07vakobhau:7011: sakyaṣcaiṣa kāraṇa parikalpaḥ sarvatra samskṛte kartumityalaṃ vivādena / [194/01-194/02]
T07vakobhau:7012: yadi ca kāṣṭhādīnāmagnyādisaṃyogahetuko vināśaḥ syādevaṃ sati pākajānāṃ guṇānāṃ pakvataratamotpattau [194/03]
T07vakobhau:7016: ghāsādyagnisaṃbandhā guṇāḥ pākajā utpannāstata eva tādṛśādvā punaḥ pakvataratamotpattau teṣāṃ vināśa iti hetureva teṣāṃ vināśakaḥ syāddhetvaviśiṣṭo vā / [194/06-194/07]
T07vakobhau:7017: na ca yuktaṃ yata eva tādṛśāddvā teṣāṃ bhāvastata eva tādṛśācca teṣāṃ punarabhāva iti / [194/07-194/08]
T07vakobhau:7020: yattarhyāpaḥ kvāthyamānāḥ kṣīyante kiṃ tatrāgnisaṃyogāḥ kurvanti / [194/10-194/11]
T07vakobhau:7021: tejodhātuṃ prabhāvato vardhayanti yasya prābhāvādapāṃ saṃghātaḥ kṣāmakṣāmo jāyate yāvadatikṣāmatāṃ gato 'nte na punaḥ saṃtānaṃ saṃtanoti / [194/11-194/12]
T07vakobhau:7023: tasmānnāsti bhāvānāṃ vināśahetuḥ svayameva tu bhaṅguratvādvinaśyanta utpannamātrā vinaśyantīti siddha eṣāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgācca gatyabhāvaḥ
T07vakobhau:7027: ekadiṅmukhe hi bhūyasi varṇa utpanne dīrghaṃ rūpamiti prajñapyate / [194/16-194/17]
T07vakobhau:7032: tadyathā 'lātamekasyāṃ diśi deśāntareṣvanantareṣu nirantaramāśu dṛśyamānaṃ dīrghamiti pratīyate sarvato dṛśyamānaṃ maṇḍalamiti / [194/19-194/20]
T07vakobhau:7036: cakṣuṣā hi dṛṣṭvā dīrghamityavasīyate kāyendriyeṇāpi spṛṣṭveti dvābhyāmasya grahaṇaṃ prāpnuyāt / [194/23]
T07vakobhau:7038: yathā vā spraṣṭavye dīrghādigrahaṇaṃ tathā varṇe saṃbhāvyatām / [194/24]
T07vakobhau:7040: sa tu sāhacaryāt bhavati na tu sākṣāt grahaṇam / [194/25-194/26]
T07vakobhau:7041: yathā 'gnirūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyoṣṇatāyāṃ smṛtirbhavati puṣpagandhaṃ ca ghrātvā tadvarṇa iti / [194/26-195/01]
T07vakobhau:7042: yuktamatrāvyabhicāratvādanyenānyasya smaraṇaṃ natu kiñcit spraṣṭavyaṃ kvacit saṃsthāne niyataṃ yatastatra smaraṇaṃ niyamena syāt / [195/01-195/02]
T07vakobhau:7050: yaccāpi kiñcit sapratighaṃ rūpamasti tadavaśyaṃ paramāṇau vidyate / [195/07]
T07vakobhau:7052: na ca saṃsthānaṃ paramāṇau vidyate dīrghādi / [195/08-195/09]
T07vakobhau:7054: atha mattaṃ saṃsthānaparamāṇava eva tathā saṃniviṣṭā dīrghādisaṃjñāṃ labhanta iti / [195/10]
T07vakobhau:7057: na ca saṃsthānāvayavānāṃ varṇādivat svabhāvaḥ siddha iti kuta eṣāṃ saṃcayaḥ / [195/12]
T07vakobhau:7058: yattarhi varṇaścābhinno bhavati saṃsthānaṃ ca bhinnaṃ dṛśyate mṛdbhājanānām / [195/12-195/14]
T07vakobhau:7059: nanu coktaṃ yathā kṛtvā varṇe dīrghādisaṃjñā prajñapyate tathā ca pipīlikādīnāmabhede paṅkticakrādīnāṃ bhedaḥ prajñāyate tathā saṃsthānasyāpi
T07vakobhau:7060: yattarhi tamapi dūrādvā varṇamapaśyantaḥ sthāṇvādīnāṃ dairghyādīni paśyanti varṇameva te tatrāvyaktaṃ dṛṣṭvā dīrghādiparikalpaṃ kurvanti / [195/16]
T07vakobhau:7064: athedānīṃ kāyasya gatiṃ nirākṛṭya samsthānaṃ ca tatra bhavantaḥ sautrāntikāḥ kāṃ kāyavijñarptiṃ prajñapayanti / [195/19]
T07vakobhau:7067: tāṃ ca prajñapayantaḥ kathaṃ kāyakarma prajñapayanti / [195/20-195/21]
T07vakobhau:7068: kāyādhiṣṭhānaṃ karma kāyakarma yā cetanā kāyasya tatra tatra praṇetrī / [195/21]
T07vakobhau:7070: yattarhi “cetanā karma cetayitvā ce“tyuktaṃ saṃkalpacetanā pūrvaṃ bhavatyevaṃ saṃkalpacetanā pūrvaṃ bhavatyevaṃ caivaṃ ca kariṣyāmīti / [195/23]
T07vakobhau:7072: yayā kāyaḥ preryate sā 'sau cetayitvā karmetyucyate / [195/24-195/25]
T07vakobhau:7073: evaṃ tarhi vijñaptyabhāvādavijñaptirapi kāmāvacarī nāstīti mahānto doṣā anuṣajyante / [195/25-195/26]
T07vakobhau:7078: sā 'pi ca vijñaptiḥ satī tadākṣepe cetanāyā balaṃ nibhālayate / [196/01]
T07vakobhau:7080: dravyameva tu saṃsthānaṃ vaibhāṣikā varṇayanti saṃsthānātmikāṃ tu kāyavijñaptim / [196/03]
T07vakobhau:7097: yasmin rūpe 'tītānāgatapratyutpanno notpadyate 'nunayo vā pratigho vā yāvadyasminvijñāne / [196/13]
T07vakobhau:7099: na cā vijñaptiṃ virahayyāsti rūpamanidarśanamapratighaṃ nāpyanā sravam / [196/14]
T07vakobhau:7102: kuladuhiturvā carato vā svapato vā tiṣṭhato vā jāgrato vā satatasamitamabhivardhata
T07vakobhau:7106: akurvataśca svayaṃ paraiḥ kārayataḥ karmapathā na sidhyeyurasatyāmavijñaptau / [196/19]
T07vakobhau:7112: tatra kiṃ prayojanaṃ syādyadi dharmāyatanāntargatamavijñaptirūpaṃ naśyeta / [196/23]
T07vakobhau:7115: yattarhīdamuktaṃ “tasyaivaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyataḥ samyagdṛṣṭirbhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati samyak saṃkalpaḥ samyak vyāyāmaḥ samyak smṛtiḥ samyak samādhiḥ / [196/26-196/27]
T07vakobhau:7116: pūrvameva cāsya samyak vāvakrmāntājīvāḥ pariśuddhā bhavanti paryavadātā” iti / [196/27-196/28]
T07vakobhau:7119: na hi samādānādurdhvaṃ tadasti yenānyamanasko 'pyayaṃ bhikṣuḥ syāt bhikṣuṇī veti / [197/02]
T07vakobhau:7134: yadapyuktamanāsravarūpokteriti tad eva samādhiprabhāvasaṃbhūtaṃ rūpamanāsrave samādhāvanāsravaṃ varṇayanti yogācārāḥ / [197/09]
T07vakobhau:7140: paryāyeṇa tarhi tadeva sāsravaṃ cānāsravaṃ ca syāt /
T07vakobhau:7143: yathā tat sāsravaṃ tathā na kadācidanāsravamiti ko 'tra saṃkaraḥ / [197/13-197/15]
T07vakobhau:7144: yadi ca rūpāyatanādīni ekāntena sāsravāṇi syuriha sūtre kimartha viśeṣitāni syu“ryāni rūpāṇi sāsravāṇi sopādānīyāni cetaḥkhilamrakṣavastvi“ti vistaraḥ / [197/15-197/19]
T07vakobhau:7146: yathā dātṝṇāṃ dāyāḥ paribhujyante tathā tathā bhoktṝṇāṃ guṇaviśeṣādanugrahaviśeṣāccānyamanasāmapi
T07vakobhau:7147: dātṝṇāṃ tadālambanadānacetanā bhāvitāḥ saṃtatayaḥ sūkṣmaṃ pariṇāmaviśeṣaṃ prāpnuvanti
T07vakobhau:7149: “idamabhisaṃdhāyoktaṃ” bhavedabhivardhata eva puṇyamupajāyata eva puṇyam iti / [197/20-197/21]
T07vakobhau:7150: atha mataṃ kathamidānīṃ saṃtānāntaraviśeṣādanyamanaso 'pi saṃtānāntarasya pariṇāmaḥ setsyatīti / [197/21]
T07vakobhau:7152: kathamidānīṃ saṃtānāntaraviśeṣātsaṃtānāntare dharmāntaramavijñaptiḥ setsyatīti nirūpadhikeṣvidānīṃ puṇyakriyāvastuṣu kathaṃ bhaviṣyatīti / [197/23-197/24]
T07vakobhau:7154: avijñaptivādinastu niraupadhike yatra vijñaptirnāsti tatra kathāmavijñaptiḥ syāt / [197/25-197/26]
T07vakobhau:7156: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ “yasyograbhikṣuḥ śīlavān kalyāṇadharmā piṇḍakaṃ paribhujyāpramāṇaṃ
T07vakobhau:7158: puṇyābhiṣyandaḥ kuśalābhiṣyandaḥ sukhāsvādadhāraḥ pratikāṅkṣitavya” ityatra tadānīṃ
T07vakobhau:7161: yadapyuktaṃ “kārayataḥ kathaṃ karmapathāḥ setsyantī“ti tatrāpyevaṃ varṇayanti / [198/03-198/05]
T07vakobhau:7162: tatprayogeṇa pareṣāmupaghātaviśeṣātprayoktuḥ sūkṣmaḥ saṃtatipariṇāma viśeṣo jāyate
T07vakobhau:7163: yata āyatyāṃ samante 'pi bahutaraphalābhinirvarttanasamarthā bhavatīti svayamapi
T07vakobhau:7164: ca kurvataḥ kriyāphalaparisamāptāveṣa eva nyāyo veditavyaḥ / [198/05-198/06]
T07vakobhau:7168: upātteṣu skandheṣu trikālayā cetanayā prāṇātipātāvadhvena spṛśyata iti bhadantaḥ / [198/08-198/09]
T07vakobhau:7169: haniṣyāmi hanmi hatamiti cāsya yadā bhavatīti / [198/09]
T07vakobhau:7172: svayaṃ tu ghnata etāvāṃścetanāsamudācāra ityayamatrābhiprāyo yuktarūpaḥ syāt / [198/11-198/13]
T07vakobhau:7173: ka idānīmeṣa pradveṣo yadavijñaptiḥ prakṣipyate saṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣaścābhyupagamyate tathaivāprajñāyamānaḥ / [198/13]
T07vakobhau:7175: kintu cittānvayakāyaprayogeṇa kriyāparisamāptau tābhyāṃ pṛthagbhūtaṃ dharmāntaraṃ prayojayiturutpadyata iti notpadyate paritoṣaḥ / [198/15-198/16]
T07vakobhau:7176: yatkṛtaprayogasaṃbhūtā tu kriyāparisamāptistasyaiva tannimittaḥ saṃtatipariṇāmo bhavatīti bhavati paritoṣaḥ / [198/16]
T07vakobhau:7187: kimasau vācaṃ bhāṣyate kriyāṃ vā karoti cīvarādīn vā paryeṣate / [198/21]
T07vakobhau:7191: yasyāḥ pratilambhādvyutthito 'pi na punarmithyāvāgādiṣu pravartate samyagvāgādiṣu ca pravartate / [198/23-198/24]
T07vakobhau:7193: yadyevamihāpyevaṃ kiṃ na gṛhyate mārgasamāpanno vināpyavijñaptyā tadrūpamāśayaṃ ca
T07vakobhau:7194: āśrayaṃ ca pratilabhate yasya pratilambhāt vyutthito 'pi na punarmithyāvāgādiṣu pravartate
T07vakobhau:7196: ato nimitte naimittikopacāraṃ kṛtvā aṣṭau mārgāṅgāni vyavasthāpyanta iti / [199/01]
T07vakobhau:7201: tadyāthā 'ṣṭau lokadharmāḥ lābho 'lābhaḥ yaśo 'yaśaḥ nindā praśaṃsā sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti / [199/04]
T07vakobhau:7203: prātimokṣasaṃvaro 'pi syāt yayā cetanayā vidhipūrvaṃ kṛtvā 'bhyupagamaḥ pratiṣiddhātkarmaṇaḥ kāyavācau saṃvṛṇoti / [199/06]
T07vakobhau:7206: tadbhāvanayā kriyākāle smarataḥ tatpratyupasthānāt setubhāvo 'pi syādakriyāṃ pratijñāṃ saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya lajjito dauḥśīlyākaraṇāt ityarthameva ca tasyāḥ samādānam / [199/09-199/10]
T07vakobhau:7207: yadi punaravijñaptereva dauḥsīlyaṃ pratibadhnīyāt na kaścitmuṣitasmṛtiḥ śikṣāṃ bhindyāt / [199/10-199/11]
T07vakobhau:7209: yadyasti tacca mahābhūtānyupādāyetyuktam tat kim vijñaptimahābhūtānyevopādāyāvijñaptirutpadyate athānyāni / [199/13]
T07vakobhau:7211: na hi saiva sāmagrī sukṣmaphalā caudārikaphālā ca yujyate / [199/14-199/15]
T07vakobhau:7212: kiṃ khalu yadātanī vijñaptistadātanānyeva sā mahābhūtānyupādāya vartate / [199/15-199/16]
T07vakobhau:7213: sarvamupādāyarūpaṃ prāyeṇaivaṃ kiñcittu vartamānamanāgataṃ cātītāni mahābhūtānyupādāya / [199/16]
T07vakobhau:7223: kāmāvacaraṃ kāyavākkarmaṃ kāmāvacarāṇyeva mahābhūtānyupādāya evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānabhūmikaṃ tadbhūmikānyevopādāya / [199/26]
T07vakobhau:7225: asravaṃ tu kāyavākkarma yasyāṃ bhūmau jātastadutpādayati tadbhūmikānyupādāya tadveditavyam / [200/01]
T07vakobhau:7236: sā samādhisaṃbhūtānyaupacayikānyanupātāni ca mahābhūtānyupādāyotpadyate abhinnāni ca yānyeva ca bhūtānyupādāya prāṇātipātādviratirutpadyate tānyeva yāvat saṃbhinnapralāpāt / [200/12]
T07vakobhau:7242: kiṃ punariyaṃ vijñaptirutpadyamānā pūrvakasya saṃsthānasya saṃtānaṃ bādhitvotpadyate utāho na / [200/16]
T07vakobhau:7248: anyānyeva tāni naiḥṣyandikāni tadānīmupajāyante yānyupādāya vijñaptirbhavati / [200/19-200/20]
T07vakobhau:7249: evaṃ tarhi yadyadevāṅgaṃ niśrityotpadyate vijñaptistena tenāṅgena mahīyasā bhavitavyam / [200/20]
T07vakobhau:7251: anabhivyāpane ca punaḥ kathaṃ kṛtsnāṅgena vijñapayet / [200/21]
T07vakobhau:7253: tat khalvetat karma paryāyeṇa dvividhaṃ trividhaṃ pañcavidhaṃ cottam / [200/22-200/23]
T07vakobhau:7258: evaṃ vākkarma cetanā ceti pañcavidhaṃ bhavati / [200/25]
T07vakobhau:7263: avyākṛtaṃ hi cittaṃ durbalamato na śaktaṃ balavatkarmākṣeptuṃ yanniruddhe 'pi tasminnanuvadhnīyāt / [201/01]
T07vakobhau:7280: iha tarhi samāpannasya syādanāsravā vijñaptivat / [201/11] na /
T07vakobhau:7291: kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne na tata ūrdhvam / [201/18]
T07vakobhau:7296: sa hi svaparṣanmadhye āyuṣmato 'śvajitaḥ kṣepārthamātmānaṃ kṣiptavāt / [201/21-201/22]
T07vakobhau:7297: tata ūrdhvamasatyāṃ vāgvijñaptau kathaṃ tatra śabdāyatanaṃ bāhyamahābhūtahetukam / [201/22]
T07vakobhau:7302: na hi teṣūpapannastajjātīyamadhobhūmikaṃ cittaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti yena tāṃ vijñaptiṃ samutthāpayet / [201/25]
T07vakobhau:7305: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamūrdhvaṃ brahmalokānnāsti vijñaptiḥ kāmadhātau ca nivṛktāvyākṛtā nāsti / [202/01]
T07vakobhau:7308: tacca dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu nāsti bhāvanāprahātavyena cotthāpyate / [202/03]
T07vakobhau:7311: kiṃ khalu samutthānavaśādevaṃ dharmāṇāṃ kuśalākuśalatvaṃ veditavyam /
T07vakobhau:7314: caturbhiḥ prakāraiḥ paramārthataḥ svabhāvataḥ saṃprayogataḥ samutthānataśca / [202/07]
T07vakobhau:7324: taireva kuśalamūlahyar patrāpyaiḥ saṃprayuktā dharmāḥ saṃprayogeṇa kuśalāstairasaṃprayuktānāṃ kuśalatvābhāvādauṣadhamiśrapānīyavat / [202/16]
T07vakobhau:7326: kāyavāvakkarmaṇi cittaviprayuktāśca saṃskārajātyādayaḥ prāptinirodhāsaṃjñisamāpattayastaireva kuśalamūlādisaṃprayuktai dharmaḥ samupasthāpitāḥ samutthānena kuśalāḥ / [202/19]
T07vakobhau:7328: prāptīnāṃ tu visabhāgacittasamutthāpitānāṃ kathaṃ kuśalatvamiti vaktavyam / [202/20-202/21]
T07vakobhau:7338: evaṃ tarhi na kiñcitsāsravamavyākṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati kuśalaṃ vā /
T07vakobhau:7340: paramārthata evamuktaṃ vipākaṃ tu prati yatsāsravaṃ na vyākriyate tadavyākṛtamityucyate / [203/03]
T07vakobhau:7347: yadi samutthānavaśātkuśalākuśalatvaṃ kāyavākkarmaṇaḥ kiṃ na mahābhūtānām / [203/07]
T07vakobhau:7349: samāhitasyāvijñaptau nāstyabhiprāyo na cāsamāhitaṃ cittaṃ tasyāḥ samutthāpakaṃ visabhāgabhūmikatvāditi kathaṃ tasyāḥ kuśalatvam / [203/09-203/10]
T07vakobhau:7353: kiṃ tarhi bhagavatoktaṃ “tato 'pi mithyādṛṣṭermithyāsaṃkalpaḥ prabhavati mithyā vāgmithyākarmānta” mityevamādi / [203/12]
T07vakobhau:7362: tena hi vinā 'sau mṛtasyeva na syādā kṣiptā 'pi satī / [203/18]
T07vakobhau:7378: naivaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā na kuśalākuśalāni bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:7396: kiṃ khalu yathā pravartakaṃ tathaivānuvartakaṃ bhavati / [204/12]
T07vakobhau:7406: na tu kadācit kuślaṃ pravartakamanuvartakaṃ cāvyākṛtaṃ bhavati / [204/20]
T07vakobhau:7409: kuśalaikatānā hi buddhānāṃ saṃtatayo nityaṃ samāhitatvāt / [204/22]
T07vakobhau:7412: svapan samāhito nāgo niṣaṇṇo 'pi samāhita” iti / [204/25-204/26]
T07vakobhau:7413: anicchayā 'sya cittasyāvisaraṇādevamuktaṃ na tu na santyavyākṛtāni vipākajairyā pathikanirmāṇacittāni buddhānāmiti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [204/26-204/27]
T07vakobhau:7417: vipākajaṃ tu cittaṃ naiva pravartakaṃ nānuvartakaṃ nirabhisaṃskāravāhitvāt / [205/02-205/03]
T07vakobhau:7423: na vā sarvaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ pravartakamiti viśeṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam / [205/06-205/07]
T07vakobhau:7424: yathānuvartakaṃ cet akukśalāvyākṛtacittasya prātimokṣavijñaptiḥ kuśalā na prāpnoti / [205/07]
T07vakobhau:7425: yathā pravartakaṃ tathā vijñaptirnatu yathā darśanaprahātavyam / [205/07-205/08]
T07vakobhau:7427: yadi nānuvartakavaśādvijñapteḥ kuśalāditvaṃ na tarhīdaṃ vaktavyam / [205/09]
T07vakobhau:7446: bhikṣusaṃvaro bhikṣuṇīsaṃvaraḥ śikṣamāṇāsaṃvara śrāmaṇerasaṃvaraḥ śrāmaṇerīsaṃvaraḥ upāsakasaṃvara upāsikāsaṃvara upavāsasaṃvaraśca / [205/21-205/22]
T07vakobhau:7460: parivṛtte hi vyañjane bhikṣurbhikṣuṇītyucyate bhikṣuṇī ca punarbhikṣuḥ / [206/04-206/05]
T07vakobhau:7461: śrāmaṇerītyucyate śrāmaṇerī ca punaḥ śikṣamāṇā ca śrāmaṇeraḥ / [206/05]
T07vakobhau:7462: upāsaka upāsiketyucyate upāsikā ca punarūpāsaka iti / [206/05-206/06]
T07vakobhau:7463: na ca vyañjanaparivṛttau pūrvasaṃvaratyāge kāraṇamasti nāpyapūrvasaṃvarapratilambhe / [206/06-206/07]
T07vakobhau:7464: tasmādabhinna eṣāṃ caturṇā saṃvarāṇāṃ tribhyaḥ svabhāvaḥ / [206/08-206/10]
T07vakobhau:7465: ya upāsakasaṃvarācchrāmaṇerasaṃvaraṃ samādatte tasmācca punarbhikṣusaṃvaraṃ kiṃ te
T07vakobhau:7466: saṃvarā virativṛddhiyogādanyo 'nya ucyante pañcadaśa viṃśativat dīnāraśateravacca
T07vakobhau:7476: yathā yathā hi vahutarāṇi śikṣāpadāni samāditsate tathā tathā bahutarebhyo maddapramādapadebhyo
T07vakobhau:7477: nivartamāno bahutarebhyaḥ prāṇātipātādīnāṃ nidānebhyo nivartate viratīnāṃ ca nidāneṣu
T07vakobhau:7479: evaṃ cāsati bhikṣusaṃvaraṃ pratyācakṣāṇastrīnapi saṃvarānvijahyāddayorapi tatrāntarbhāvāt / [206/18]
T07vakobhau:7486: kathaṃ cāyamupāsako bhavati kathamupavāsastho yāvat bhikṣuḥ / [206/23-206/24]
T07vakobhau:7497: sarvebhya eva varjanīyebhyaḥ kāyavākkarmabhyaḥ viratisamādānāt bhikṣurityucyate / [207/07]
T07vakobhau:7508: na kurvanti tayā samāttayā lajjinaḥ pāpamityakriyetyucyate / [207/13]
T07vakobhau:7509: sāpi tu vijñapticittābhyāṃ kriyata iti kriyā bhavati / [207/14]
T07vakobhau:7520: dvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣui prātimokṣasaṃvara eva na prātimokṣaḥ / [207/21]
T07vakobhau:7551: tābhyāṃ dauḥśīlyasya tatsamutthāpakānāṃ ca kleśānāṃ prahāṇāt / [208/17-208/18]
T07vakobhau:7552: ata eva syāddhyānasaṃvaro na prahāṇasaṃvara iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate // [208/18-208/19]
T07vakobhau:7557: evaṃ syādanāsravasaṃvaro na prahāṇasaṃvara iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ yathāyogaṃ veditavyam / [208/22]
T07vakobhau:7560: manasā saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu sarvatra saṃvaraḥ / iti / [208/25]
T07vakobhau:7566: pratyekaṃ dvisvabhāvajñapanārthaṃ punardvigrahaṇaṃ mā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ vijñāyīti manaḥsaṃvaro 'pi smṛtisaṃprajñānasvabhāva iti / [209/03]
T07vakobhau:7569: kaḥ katamayā vijñaptyā 'vijñaptyā vā kiyantaṃ kālaṃ samanvāgata iti / [209/05]
T07vakobhau:7573: yaḥ prātimokṣāsaṃvarasthaḥ pudgala uktaḥ sa yāvattāmavijñaptir na tyajati tāvattayā vartamānayā nityaṃ samanvāgataḥ / [209/10]
T07vakobhau:7579: asaṃvarastho 'pi yāvadasaṃvaraṃ na tyajati tāvannityamavijñaptyā vartamānayā samanvāgataḥ / [209/15]
T07vakobhau:7584: prathame hi kṣaṇe sa janmāntaratyaktaṃ dhyānasaṃvaramatītaṃ labhate / [209/20]
T07vakobhau:7588: sa prathame kṣaṇe nātītayā samanvāgato mārgasya pūrvamanutpāditatvāt / [210/01]
T07vakobhau:7590: tau dhyānānāsravasaṃvarānvitau samāhitaryamārgasamāpannau vartamānayā avijñaptyā samanvāgatau yathākramaṃ na tu vyutthitau / [210/03-210/04]
T07vakobhau:7594: yo naiva saṃvare nāsaṃvare sthitaḥ sa madhyasthaḥ / [210/07-210/08]
T07vakobhau:7596: yasya tvasti dauḥśīlyaśīlāṅgādisaṃgṛhītā sa ādau madhyayā samanvāgataḥ / [210/09]
T07vakobhau:7601: kimasaṃvarasthaḥ kadācitkuśalayā vijñaptyā samanvāgato bhavati saṃvarastho vā punarakuśalayā bhavati / [210/13]
T07vakobhau:7606: kurvataḥ yena ca kleśavegena saṃvarasthasyākuśalā 'vijñaptirutpadyate vadhabandhanatāḍanādikriyāṃ
T07vakobhau:7608: sa ādye kṣaṇe vartamānayaivāvijñaptyā samanvāgato bhavatyanyeṣvatītayā 'pi / [210/19]
T07vakobhau:7610: vijñaptyā tu punaḥ sarve kurvanto madhyayānvitāḥ / [210/21]
T07vakobhau:7611: sarve saṃvarāsaṃvaramadhyasthā yāvadijñaptiṃ kurvanti tāvattayā vartamānayā samanvāgatāḥ / [210/22]
T07vakobhau:7615: anāgatayā tu vijñaptyā na kaścit samanvāgataḥ / [211/02]
T07vakobhau:7618: durbalasya hi dharmasya prāptirapi durbalā nānubandhībhavati /
T07vakobhau:7628: asaṃvaro duścaritaṃ dauḥśīlyaṃ karmaṃ tatpathaḥ // VAkK_4.24 // [211/10]
T07vakobhau:7638: mṛdvyā cetanayā kuśalamakukśalaṃ vā kurvannaivasaṃvaranāsaṃvarasthito vijñaptyaiva samanvāgato bhavati nāvijñaptyā prāgevāvyākṛte anyatraupadhikapuṇyakriyāvastukarmapathebhyaḥ
T07vakobhau:7640: avijñaptyaiva samanvāgato na vijñaptyā yenāryapudgalena janmāntaraparivṛttau na tāvadvijñaptaṃ vā punarvihīnam / [211/20-211/21]
T07vakobhau:7644: yadā dhyānabhūmikaṃ cittaṃ pratilabhyate maulīyaṃ sāmantakīyaṃ vā sāsravaṃ tadā dhyānasaṃvaro 'pi sahabhūtatvāt / [211/26]
T07vakobhau:7648: tatra ṣaṭ dhyānabhūmayo 'nāsravā bhavanti catvāri dhyānāni anāgamyasyānantaraṃ ceti paścātpravedayiṣyāmaḥ / [212/01]
T07vakobhau:7651: yadyenaṃ paro vijñapayati asau ca param / [212/03]
T07vakobhau:7656: svayaṃbhūtvena buddhānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca niyāmāvakrāntyā pañcakānām ehibhikṣukayā
T07vakobhau:7658: mahāprajāpatyāḥ dūtena dharmadinnāyāḥ vinayaddharapañcamena pratyantimeṣu janapadeṣu
T07vakobhau:7659: daśavargeṇa madhyeṣu janapadeṣu śaraṇagamanaṃ traivācikena ṣaṣṭibhadravargapūgopasaṃpāditānāmiti
T07vakobhau:7661: sa punareṣa prātimokṣāsaṃvaraḥ samādīyamānaḥ kiyantaṃ kālaṃ samādātavyaḥ / [212/11]
T07vakobhau:7663: saptanaikāyikasya prātimokṣasaṃvarasya yāvajjīvaṃ samādānam upavāsasaṃvarasyāhorātramityeṣa niyamaḥ / [212/13]
T07vakobhau:7674: athāhorātrādūrdhvaṃ pañcarātraṃ daśarātraṃ vā upavāsasamādānasya kaḥ pratibandho bahūnāmupavāsasaṃvarāṇāmutpattau / [212/19-212/20]
T07vakobhau:7677: kiṃ tāvadahorātrādūrdhvaṃ saṃvarasyānutpartti paśyatā tathāgatenāhorātrika upavāso deśita utāho durbalendriyāṇāmahorātrake 'pi saṃvarasamādānena saṃniyojanārthamiti / [212/22]
T07vakobhau:7686: na kila kaścidevamasaṃvaraṃ samādatte yathopavāsaṃ kaccidahamahorātramasaṃvṛtaḥ syāmiti / [213/03]
T07vakobhau:7688: evaṃ caiva na kaścidādatte kaccidahaṃ yāvajīvamasaṃvṛtaḥ syāmiti / [213/04]
T07vakobhau:7690: yadyapi naivamādatte tathāpyatyantavipannenāśayena tāṃ kriyāṃ prakurvannasaṃvaraṃ pratilabhate na kālāntaravipannena / [213/06]
T07vakobhau:7693: yadi punaḥ kaścidasaṃvareṇāpyarthī kālāntaramasaṃvaraṃ samādadīta so 'vaśyaṃ labheta / [213/08]
T07vakobhau:7703: yastu pūrvakṛtasamādāno nityamaṣṭabhyāmupaceṣyāmīti sa bhuktvāpi gṛhṇīyāt / [213/16-213/17]
T07vakobhau:7704: anyataśca grahītavyo na svayamevāparāpekṣayā satsvapi pratyayeṣvanatikramārtham / [213/17-213/18]
T07vakobhau:7705: nīcaiḥ sthitenotkuṭṭakena vā jānupātena vā kapotakamañjaliṃ kṛtvā 'nyatra sthāsyāt / [213/18-213/19]
T07vakobhau:7717: evaṃ ca kṛtvā aurabhrikapāradārikayo rātridivasopavāsakayoḥ sāphalyaṃ prayujyate / [213/25]
T07vakobhau:7721: “poṣaṃ dadhāti manasaḥ kuśalasya yasmāduktastato bhagavatā kila poṣadho 'yami“ti / [214/03]
T07vakobhau:7734: madyaṃ hi pivataḥ kāryā kāryasmṛtireva naśyet / [214/11-214/12]
T07vakobhau:7742: evaṃ tu sati sūtrapāṭho na yujyeta / [214/16-214/18]
T07vakobhau:7743: akālabhojanādvirati muktvā “anenāhamaṣṭamāṅgena teṣāmāryāṇāmarhatāṃ śikṣāyāmanuśikṣe anuvidhīya” iti / [214/18]
T07vakobhau:7746: yathā sthasyāṅgāni caturaṅgo balakāyaḥ pañcāṅgaṃ tūryaṃ tathā 'ṣṭāṅga upavāso draṣṭavyaḥ / [214/20-214/21]
T07vakobhau:7747: akālabhojanāt prativiratirūpavāsa upavāsāṅgaṃ ca yathā samyagdṛṣṭirmārgo mārgāṅgaṃ ca / [214/21-214/22]
T07vakobhau:7748: dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bodhirvodhyaṅgaṃ samādhirdhyānaṃ dhyānāṅgaṃ ceti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [214/22-214/23]
T07vakobhau:7749: natu teṣāmeva samyagdṛṣṭyādīnāṃ ta evāṅgatvāya kalpanta iti / [214/23-214/24]
T07vakobhau:7750: pūrvakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭyādaya uttareṣāmaṅgaṃ yadi syuḥ prathamakṣaṇotpanna āryamārgo nāṣṭāṅgaḥ syāt / [214/25]
T07vakobhau:7753: anupavāsako 'pi yastamahorātraṃ buddhadharmasaṃghān śaraṇaṃ gatvopavāsaṃ gṛhṇāti tasyotpadyate upavāsasaṃvaro nānyathā / [215/01]
T07vakobhau:7755: sūtra uktaṃ “yataśca mahānāman gṛhī avadātavasanaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣendriyeṇa samanvāgato
T07vakobhau:7756: buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati vācaṃ ca bhāṣate upavāsakaṃ ca māṃ dharaya / [215/04]
T07vakobhau:7770: yathaivaṃ bhikṣurlabdhasaṃvaro 'pi punaḥ śikṣāpadāni grāhyate śrāmaṇeraśca vyutpādanārthamita ścāmutaśca te saṃvara iti tathopavāsako 'pi na tu vinā saṃvareṇopāsako 'sti / [215/14]
T07vakobhau:7772: yadi sarva evopāsakā upāsakasaṃvarasthāḥ kathaṃ bhagavatā ekadeśakārī pradeśakārī yadbhūyaḥkārī pūripūrṇakārī copāsaka uktaḥ / [215/17]
T07vakobhau:7774: yo hi yacchikṣāpadaṃ pālayati sa tatkārītyuktaḥ /
T07vakobhau:7779: na hyevaṃ sūtrapāṭhaḥ ukto yathā mahānāmasūtre pāṭhaḥ / [215/21]
T07vakobhau:7782: tatra te dṛṣṭasatyā “avetyaprasādānvayaṃ prāṇairapi saddharmopagamanaṃ darśayanti sma / [215/23]
T07vakobhau:7787: ekadeśakāryādīṃstu khaṇḍitaśikṣānadhikṛtya praśna eva na yujyate / [216/02]
T07vakobhau:7789: ko hyapāsakasaṃvaraṃ jānan etanna jñāsyate yo hi yacchikṣāpadaṃ na khaṇḍayati sa tatkārī bhavatīti / [216/03-216/04]
T07vakobhau:7790: upāsakasaṃvarasya tu parimāṇānabhijñāṃstanmātraśikṣākṣamān pratyeṣa praśno yujyate / [216/04-216/05]
T07vakobhau:7791: “kiyatā bhadantopāsaka ekadeśakārī bhavati yāvat paripūrṇakārī bhavati /“ [216/05-216/06]
T07vakobhau:7792: yadi tarhi vinā saṃvareṇopāsakaḥ syādvikalena vā bhikṣuśrāmaṇerāvapi syātām / [216/06-216/07]
T07vakobhau:7796: vināpi hi saṃvareṇopāsakaḥ prajñaptito na tu bhikṣuśrāmaṇerāviti te tvetannecchanti kāśmīrāḥ / [216/09-216/10]
T07vakobhau:7800: evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'rhato 'pi mṛduḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ syāt pṛthagjanasyādhimātraḥ / [216/13-216/14]
T07vakobhau:7803: yo buddhadharmasaṃghāñcharaṇaṃ gacchati kimasau śaraṇaṃ gacchati / [216/16-216/17]
T07vakobhau:7805: nirvāṇaṃ ceti śaraṇaṃ yo yāti śāraṇatrayam // VAkK_4.32 // [216/18-216/20]
T07vakobhau:7806: yo buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati aśaikṣānasau budhakarakāndharmāñcharaṇaṃ gacchati yeṣāṃ prādhānyena sa ātmabhāvo budhā ityucyate yeṣāṃ vā lābhena sarvāvabodhasāmarthyādbuddho bhavati / [216/20]
T07vakobhau:7813: yaḥ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati śaikṣāśaikṣānasausaṃghakarakānharmān gacchati yeṣāṃ lābhenāṣṭau pudgalāḥ saṃghībhavanti / [216/23]
T07vakobhau:7817: yattu sūtra uktaṃ “yo 'pyasau bhaviṣyatyanāgate 'dhvani saṃgho nāma tamapi śaraṇaṃ gacchatami “ti / [216/26]
T07vakobhau:7819: yo dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati asau nirvāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati pratisaṃkhyānirodham / [216/27-216/28]
T07vakobhau:7821: yadyaśaikṣā dharmā eva buddhaḥ kathaṃ tathāgatasyāntike dukṣṭacittarudhirotpādanādānantaryaṃ bhavati / [216/29-217/01]
T07vakobhau:7823: śāstraṃ tu naivaṃ vācakamaśaikṣā dharmā eva buddha iti / [217/01-217/02]
T07vakobhau:7827: anyathā hi laukikacittastho na buddhaḥ syānna saṃghaḥ śīlameva ca bhikṣukarakaṃ bhikṣuḥ syāt / [217/04]
T07vakobhau:7828: yathā tu yo bhikṣūn pūjayati bhikṣukarakamasau śīlaṃ pūjayati / [217/04-217/05]
T07vakobhau:7829: evaṃ yo buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchatyaśaikṣānasau buddhakarakāndharmān śaraṇaṃ gacchati / [217/05-217/06]
T07vakobhau:7841: yastu buddhaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
T07vakobhau:7848: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamanyeṣu saṃvareṣvabrahmacaryādviratiḥ śikṣāpadaṃ vyavasthāpitam upāsakasya tu kāmamithyācārāt / [217/22]
T07vakobhau:7853: sukarā ca kāmamithyācārādviratirgṛhānadhyāvasatāṃ duṣkarātvabrahmacaryāditi duṣkaraṃ karttuṃ notsaheran / [217/25-217/26]
T07vakobhau:7855: janmāntareṣvapyanadhyācaraṇānnatvabrahmacryādityupāsakasyāpi tasmādeva viratiḥ śikṣāpadaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ mā bhūt parivṛttajanmāntaraḥ śaikṣa upāsakasaṃvarāṅgeṣvasaṃvṛta iti / [218/01-218/02]
T07vakobhau:7857: ya upāsakāḥ santo bhāryāḥ pariṇayanti kiṃ taistābhyo 'pi saṃvaraḥ pratilabdho 'tha na / [218/03]
T07vakobhau:7861: yathābhyupagamaṃ lābhaḥ saṃvarasya na saṃtateḥ // VAkK_4.33 // [218/06]
T07vakobhau:7865: na tvatra saṃtāne mayā brahmacaryaṃ na kartavyamityata evaiṣāṃ tadadhiṣṭhātkāmamithyācārāṅgādeva saṃvaralābho nābrahmacaryāditi nāsti bhāryībhūtāyāṃ saṃvarakṣobhaḥ / [218/09-218/10]
T07vakobhau:7866: atha kasmāt mṛṣāvādād viratirevopāsakasaṃvaraśikṣāpadaṃ na paiśunyādiviratiḥ / [218/10]
T07vakobhau:7870: sarvatra hi śikṣātikrame samanuyujyamānasyopasthitamidaṃ bhavati nāhamevamahārṣamiti
T07vakobhau:7871: mṛṣāvādasya prasaṅgo bhavatyato mṛṣāvādādviratirvidhīyate kathaṃ kṛtātikramo 'pyātmani māviṣkuryāditi / [218/15-218/16]
T07vakobhau:7872: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ pratikṣepaṇasāvadyācchikṣāpadasya na vyavasthāpitam / [218/17]
T07vakobhau:7880: śakyaṃ tu madyaṃ pratīkārabuddhyaiva pātuṃ yāvanna madayet / [218/22-218/23]
T07vakobhau:7882: na tat kliṣṭaṃ yadamadanīyamātrāṃ viditvā pibati / [218/24]
T07vakobhau:7887: idaṃ coktaṃ māṃ bhikṣavaḥ śāstāramuddiśadbhiḥ kuśāgreṇāpi madyaṃ na pātavyami” tyataḥ prakṛtisāvadyamiti jñāyate / [218/28]
T07vakobhau:7892: utsargavihitasyāpi glāneṣu prajñaptisāvadyasya punarmadyasyāpavādaḥ prasaṅgaparihārārthaṃ madnīyamātrānīyamanāt/ [219/02]
T07vakobhau:7897: ata evātra pramādasthānagrahaṇaṃ nānyeṣu teṣāṃ prakṛtisāvadyatvāt / [219/05]
T07vakobhau:7903: te ca kadācidaprāptacyutamadyabhāve bhavataḥ ityato madyagrahaṇam / [219/08-219/09]
T07vakobhau:7907: ya ime trayaḥ prātimokṣadhyānānāsravasaṃvarāḥ kimeṣāṃ yata eko labhyate tataḥ śeṣau / [219/12]
T07vakobhau:7911: vartamānebhya eva skandhāyatana dhātubhyaḥ kāmāpta iti prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ / [219/15]
T07vakobhau:7913: ubhayebhya iti sattvāsattvākhyebhyaḥ prakṛtipratikṣepaṇasāvadyebhyaśca vartamānebhya eva skandhāyatanadhātubhyo labhyate / [219/17]
T07vakobhau:7917: maulebhya eva karmapathebhyo dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau labhyete na prayogapṛṣṭhebhyaḥ
T07vakobhau:7918: kuta eva prajñaptisāvadyebhyaḥ sarvakālebhyaśca skandhāyatanadhātubhyo labhyete atītānāgatebhyo 'pi / [219/21]
T07vakobhau:7920: santi tāni skandha dhātvāyatanāti yebhyaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ eva labhyate na dhyānānāsravasaṃvarāviti vistaraḥ / [219/22-219/23]
T07vakobhau:7925: natu saṃvarakāle vartamānāḥ karmapathāḥ santīti vartamānādhiṣṭhānebhyaḥ iti vaktavyam / [220/02-220/03]
T07vakobhau:7927: atha kiṃ saṃvarāsaṃvarau sarvasattvebhya eva labhyete sarvāṅgebhyaḥ sarvakāraṇaiśca āhosvidasti bhedaḥ / [220/05]
T07vakobhau:7930: sarvasattvebhya eva saṃvaro labhyate kebhyaścit aṅgebhyastu vibhāṣā / [220/07-220/08]
T07vakobhau:7941: paścimaṃ paryāyaṃ niyamayyocyate asti saṃvarasthāyī sarvasattveṣu saṃvṛto na sarvāṅgaiḥ na sarvakāraṇaiḥ / [220/12-220/13]
T07vakobhau:7942: yo mṛdunā cittena madhyenādhimātreṇa vā upāsakovāsa śrāmaṇerasaṃvaraṃ samādatte / [220/13-220/14]
T07vakobhau:7943: asti sarvasattveṣu saṃvṛtaḥ sarvaṅgaiśca na tu sarakāraṇaiḥ / [220/14]
T07vakobhau:7944: yo mṛdunā cittena madhyenādhimātreṇa vā bhikṣusaṃvaraṃ samādatte / [220/15]
T07vakobhau:7947: asti sarvasattveṣu sarvakāraṇaiśca na tu sarvāṅgaiḥ / [220/16-220/17]
T07vakobhau:7950: yasmātsarvasattvānugate kalyāṇāśaye sthitaḥ saṃvaraṃ pratilabhate nānyathā pāpāśayasyānuparatatvāt / [220/19-220/20]
T07vakobhau:7961: yadi punaḥ śakyebhya eva saṃvaro labhyate cayāpacayayuktaḥ syāt / [220/25]
T07vakobhau:7963: evaṃ ca sati vināpi lābhatyāgakāraṇābhyāṃ saṃvarasya lābhatyāgau syātāmiti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [220/26]
T07vakobhau:7965: yathā hyapūrvatṛṇādyutpattau śoṣe vā saṃvarasya vṛddhihlāsau na bhavatastathā śakyāśakyasaṃcāre 'pi na syātām / [221/01]
T07vakobhau:7966: na sattvānāṃ pūrvaṃ paścācca bhāvāttṛṇādīnāṃ tvabhāvāt / [221/01-221/02]
T07vakobhau:7967: ko nvatra viśeṣo na vā bhavedasatsu tṛṇādiṣu saṃvarastadvadaśakyo vā bhavet / [221/02-221/04]
T07vakobhau:7968: yadā ca parinirvṛtā na bhavantyeva tadā kathaṃ saṃvarahlāso na syāditi naiṣa yuktaḥ parihāraḥ / [221/04]
T07vakobhau:7970: evaṃ tarhi pūrvabuddhaparinirvṛtebhya uttareṣāṃ buddhānāṃ pratimokṣasaṃvarasyā lābhātkathaṃ śīlanyūnatā na prasajyeta / [221/06]
T07vakobhau:7974: asamvarastu sarvebhyaḥ sarvāṅgebhyo na kāraṇaiḥ // VAkK_4.36 // [221/09]
T07vakobhau:7978: yo mṛdunā cittenāsaṃvaraṃ pratilabhate so 'dhimātreṇāpi cittena prāṇinaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayanmṛdunaivā saṃvareṇa samanvāgato bhavatyadhimātrayā tu prāṇātipātavijñaptyā / [221/12-221/13]
T07vakobhau:7980: tatreme āsaṃvarikāstadyathā aurabhrikāḥ kaukkuṭikāḥ saukarikāḥ śākunikā mātsikā mṛgalubdhakāścaurā vadhyaghātakā bandhanapālakā nāgabandhakāḥ śvapākā vāgurikāśca / [221/15-221/16]
T07vakobhau:7981: rājāno daṇḍanetāro vyāvahārikāścārthata āsaṃvarikāḥ asaṃvare bhavatvāt tatrashatayā asaṃvara eṣāmastīti āsaṃvarikā vā / [221/16-221/17]
T07vakobhau:7986: aurabhrikādīnāṃ tu mātāpitṛputradārādiṣvavipannāśayānāṃ jīvitahetorapyahantukāmānāṃ kathamasaṃvaraḥ sarvasattvebhyo yujyate / [221/20]
T07vakobhau:7988: na hi tāvatte ta eva iti vidvāṃso hanyuḥ / [221/21-212/22]
T07vakobhau:7989: āryībhūtānāṃ ca punaḥ paśu bhavituṃ nāstyavakāśa iti tebhyaḥ kathaṃ syāt / [221/22-221/23]
T07vakobhau:7990: yadi cā nāgatātmabhāvāpekṣayā varttamānādasaṃvṛtaḥ syādurabhrādīnapi te putrībhūtāt sarvathā na hanyuriti ina syāttebhyyo 'saṃvaraḥ / [221/23-222/01]
T07vakobhau:7991: kathaṃ hi nāma jighāṃsatāmeva tebhyo na syādasaṃvaraḥ / [222/01]
T07vakobhau:7993: kathaṃ hi nāmājighāṃsatāmeva tebhyaḥ syādasaṃvara iti / [222/02]
T07vakobhau:7997: mūko 'pi ca vākprāpaṇīyamarthaṃ kāyena prāpayituṃ śakta iti / [222/04-222/05]
T07vakobhau:7998: yastarhi dve trīṇi vā śikṣāpadāni samādatte / [222/05]
T07vakobhau:7999: sarvathā nāsti vikalaḥ prādeśikaścāsaṃvarika iti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [222/05-222/07]
T07vakobhau:8000: yathā bhyupagamaṃ vikalo 'pi syāt prādeśiko 'pyasaṃvaraḥ saṃvaraścānyatrāṣṭavidhāditi sautrāntikāḥ / [222/07]
T07vakobhau:8012: athavā samādānamādatte buddhamavanditvā na bhokṣye tithimāsārdhamāsabhaktāni vā nityaṃ kariṣyāmītyādi / [222/15-222/16]
T07vakobhau:8013: ādareṇa tadrūpeṇa kriyāmīhate kuśalāmakuśalāṃ vā yato 'syāvijñaptirutpadyate / [222/16-222/17]
T07vakobhau:8022: śikṣāpadānāṃ vijñapuruṣasyāntike pratyākhyānadāśayataḥ nikāyasabhāgatyāgāt yugapadu bhayavyañjanaprādurbhāvāt kuśalamūlasamucchedācca / [222/24]
T07vakobhau:8036: na hyekadeśakṣobhāt kṛtsna saṃvaratyāgo yukta iti / [223/09]
T07vakobhau:8041: āviṣkṛtāyāṃ tu tasyāmāpattau śīlavānbhavati na duḥśīlo yathā ṛṇaṃ śodhayitvā dhanavānbhavati na tvṛṇavāniti / [223/12]
T07vakobhau:8043: katamasya bhavati śrāmaṇyaṃ dhvastaṃ patitaṃ parājitamiti / [223/13-223/14]
T07vakobhau:8054: na cāsau pūrvaṃ paramārthabhikṣurāsīdyataḥ paścādabhikṣurbhavet yaccoktamekadeśakṣobhāditi
T07vakobhau:8056: abhavyo viruḍhiṃ vṛddhiṃ vipulatāmāptu” mityupamāṃ kurvatā / [223/21]
T07vakobhau:8058: evamekadeśa syāpi mūlabhūtasya cchedādabhavyaḥ saṃvaraśeṣo viroḍumiti / [223/22-223/24]
T07vakobhau:8059: sa ca gurvīṃ bhikṣubhāvamaryādābhedinīṃ maulīmāpattimāpadyamānastīvrānapatrāpyayogātsaṃvarasya mūlaṃ cchinattīti yuktaḥ kṛtsnasaṃvaratyāgaḥ
T07vakobhau:8060: yasya caikagrāsaparibhogo 'pyekapāda pārṣṇirpradeśaparibhogo 'pi ca nābhyanujñāyate sāṃghikayorāhāravihārayoḥ sarvabhikṣusaṃbhogabahiṣkṛtaśca śāstrā yaṃ cādhikṛtyoktaṃ / [224/03-224/04]
T07vakobhau:8068: “mārgajino mārgadeśiko mārge jīvati yaśca mārgadūṣī” astyetaduktam / [224/09-224/10]
T07vakobhau:8069: sa tveṣa ākṛtimātrāvaśeṣatvācchamaṇa ukto dagdhakāṣṭhaśuṣkahladaśukanāśā pūtivījālātacakramṛtasattvavat / [224/10-224/11]
T07vakobhau:8070: yadi hi dauḥśīlyādabhikṣuḥ syāt śikṣādattako na syāt / [224/11]
T07vakobhau:8071: na vayaṃ brūmaḥ sahādhyāpattyā sarvaḥ pārājikaḥ iti / [224/11-224/12]
T07vakobhau:8073: kaścittu saṃtānaviśeṣānna pārājika ekacittenāpyapraticchādanāditi vyavasthāpitaṃ dharmasvāminā / [224/13-224/14]
T07vakobhau:8074: yadi tarhi pārājiko na bhikṣuḥ kiṃ punarna pravrājyate / [224/14-224/15]
T07vakobhau:8075: tīvrānapatrāpyavipāditatvāt saṃtateḥ saṃvarābhavyatvānna tu khalu bhikṣubhāvāpekṣayā / [224/15]
T07vakobhau:8077: kaścāyamanarthe nirbandho yadyasau tathābhūto 'pi bhikṣurnamo 'stu tasmai tādṛśāya bhikṣutvāya / [224/17]
T07vakobhau:8082: sarvameva dhyānāptaṃ kuśalaṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ parityajyate / [224/21-224/22]
T07vakobhau:8083: upapattito vā bhūmisaṃcārādūrdhvaṃ cāvaśyaṃ parihāṇito vā samāpatternikāyasabhāgatvācca kiñcit / [224/23]
T07vakobhau:8084: yathā ca rūpāptaṃ kuśalaṃ bhūmisaṃcārahānibhyāṃ tyajyate [224/24]
T07vakobhau:8086: anāsravaṃ tu kuśalaṃ tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ parityakṣyate / [224/25-225/01]
T07vakobhau:8095: yadi saṃvaraṃ samādatte dhyānasaṃvaraṃ vā labhate / [225/05]
T07vakobhau:8104: ya āsaṃvarika upavāsaṃ gṛhṇāti kimasau tasmātsaṃvarātpunarasaṃvaraṃ gacchatyāhosvinnaivasaṃvaraṃ nāsaṃvaram / [225/10]
T07vakobhau:8111: yena hyasau prasādakleśavegenāvijñaptirākṣiptā bhavati tasya cchedātsā 'pi cchidyate / [225/16]
T07vakobhau:8120: yadā kuśalamūlāni samucchettumārabhata ityebhiḥ ṣadbhiḥ kāraṇairavijñaptirmadhyamā tyajyate / [225/22]
T07vakobhau:8126: yasyopakleśaprakārasya yaḥ prahāṇamārgastenāsau saparivāraḥ parityajyate nānyathā / [226/03]
T07vakobhau:8127: atha keṣāṃ sattvānāmasaṃvaro bhavati keṣāṃ saṃvaraḥ / [226/04]
T07vakobhau:8133: saṃvaro hi manuṣyāṇāmeva yathoktaṃ hitvā devānāṃ ceti gatidvaye saṃvaraḥ / [226/09-226/10]
T07vakobhau:8136: sūtra uktaṃ yataśca mahānāma gṛhī avadātavasanaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣendriyeṇa samanvāgato buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati yāvadvācaṃ bhāṣate upāsakaṃ māṃ dhāraya iyatā copāsako bhavatī“ti / [226/12-226/13]
T07vakobhau:8144: āpāyikānāmapi tīvraṃ hrīvyapatrāpyaṃ nāsti yadyogād yadvipādanācca saṃvarāsaṃvarau syātām / [226/18-226/20]
T07vakobhau:8145: api khalvāśraya eva sa teṣāṃ tādṛśa ūṣarakṣetrabhūtaḥ śaṇḍapaṇḍakobhayavyañjanottarakauravāpāyikānāṃ
T07vakobhau:8146: yatrāśraye saṃvaro pi na virohatyasaṃvaro 'pyūṣara iva kṣetre sasyamapyatimātraṃ kakvamapīti / [226/20-226/21]
T07vakobhau:8147: yattarhi sūtra uktam “aṇḍajo bhikṣavo nāgo 'ṣṭamyāṃ pakṣasya bhāvanādabhyudgamyāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatamupavāsamupavasatī“ti / [226/22]
T07vakobhau:8158: ārūpyopapannānāmapi teṣāṃ tu samanvāgamato 'sti na saṃmukhībhāvataḥ / [227/04]
T07vakobhau:8159: ataḥ paramidānīṃ karmanirdeśādhikārātsūtrīddiṣṭānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nirdeṣa ārapsyate / [227/05]
T07vakobhau:8165: kṣemaṃ karma kuśalaṃ yadiṣṭavipākaṃ nirvāṇaprāpakaṃ ca duḥkhaparitrāṇāt / [227/08-227/09]
T07vakobhau:8166: tatkālamatyantaṃ ca akṣemamakuśalaṃ kṣemapratidvandvabhāvena yasyāniṣṭo vipākaḥ / [227/09-227/10]
T07vakobhau:8167: tābhyāmitaratkarma naiva kṣemaṃ nākṣemaṃ yattatkuśalākuśalābhyāmitarat veditavyam / [227/10]
T07vakobhau:8170: puṇyāpuṇyamaviñjaṃ ca sukhavedyādi ca trayam // VAkK_4.45 // [227/12]
T07vakobhau:8178: nanu ca trīṇi dhyānāni señjitānyuktāni bhagavatā / [227/16-227/17]
T07vakobhau:8184: tadbhūmiṣu yataḥ karmavipākaṃ prati neñjati // VAkK_4.46 // [227/21]
T07vakobhau:8190: yadeva hi pramāṇabalavarṇakarmānyabhūmika sukhabhogādi saṃvartanīyaṃ karma deveṣu vipacyate tadeva kadācidanyapratyayavaśānmanuṣyatiryakapreteṣu vipacyate / [227/24-227/25]
T07vakobhau:8191: rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ tu karmānyabhūmikamanyasyāṃ bhūmau vipaktuṃ na jātūtsahate / [227/25-228/01]
T07vakobhau:8194: yaśca lokato 'rthaḥ prasiddhaḥ kiṃ tatra yatnena /
T07vakobhau:8200: eṣā hi bhūmiḥ sukhāyā vedanāyā yaduta kāmadhātustrīṇi ca dhyānāni / [228/07]
T07vakobhau:8215: itarathā hi dhyānāntarakarmaṇo vipāko na syāddhyānāntaraṃ vā kasyacitkarmaṇaḥ / [228/18-228/19]
T07vakobhau:8217: dhyānāntarakarmaṇo dhyāna eva sukhendrīyaṃ vipāka ityeke / [228/19-228/20]
T07vakobhau:8220: śāstre hi paṭhitaṃ “syātkarmaṇaścaitasikyeva vedanā vipāko vipacyeta / [228/21]
T07vakobhau:8229: evaṃ tarhi “sukhavedyaṃ śubhaṃ dhyānādātṛtīyā” “diṣṭa-vipākaṃ ca kuśala” mityasya virodhaḥ / [229/03]
T07vakobhau:8232: sukhavedanāyai hitaṃ sukhavedanoyaṃ sukho 'sya vedanīya iti vā / [229/05]
T07vakobhau:8235: sa hyasau vidyate sukhasya vā vedanīyaṃ yena sukhaṃ vedayate / [229/06]
T07vakobhau:8246: yathoktaṃ “cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā rūpapratisaṃvedī bhavati notu rūparāgapratisaṃvedī“tyevamādi / [229/13]
T07vakobhau:8251: yathoktaṃ “yasmin samaye sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate dve asya vedane tasminsamaye niruddhe bhavata” iti / [229/16-229/17]
T07vakobhau:8252: nahi yasminsamaye sukhā vedanā vartate tasminpunaranyā vedanā 'sti sa yāṃ tāṃ vedayate / [229/17]
T07vakobhau:8256: taccaitatsukhavedanīyādi trividhaṃ karma niyataṃ cāniyataṃ ca veditavyam / [229/20-229/21]
T07vakobhau:8260: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyamupapadyavedanīyamaparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ cetyetattrividhaṃ karma niyatamityetaccaturvidhaṃ karma bhavati sahāniyatavedanīyena
T07vakobhau:8265: tatra dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ yatra janmani kṛtaṃ tatraiva vipacyate / [230/01-230/02]
T07vakobhau:8271: asti hi karma saṃnikṛṣṭaphalaṃ na viprakṛṣṭaphalamasti viparyayādbāhyabījavat / [230/06-230/07]
T07vakobhau:8272: yathā tripakṣā suvarcalā tribhiḥ pakṣaiḥ phalaṃ dadhāti yavagodhūmādayaḥ ṣaḍbhirmāsairiti / [230/08]
T07vakobhau:8285: syāttriṣu paraṃ prayojya kāmamithyācāre svayaṃ prayuktasteṣāṃ yugapatsamāptau / [230/16]
T07vakobhau:8289: katamasmindhātau katividhaṃ karmākṣipyate kasyāṃ vā gatau / [230/20]
T07vakobhau:8291: sarveṣu triṣu dhātuṣu sarvāsu ca gatiṣu caturṇāṃ karmaṇāmākṣepaḥ kuśalānāmakuśalānāṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavam / [230/22]
T07vakobhau:8294: narakeṣu kuśalasya karmaṇastrividhasyā kṣepo na dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyasya / [230/24-230/25]
T07vakobhau:8297: yato bhūmeḥ vītarāgapṛthagjano bhavatyasau ca sthiro bhavatyaparihāṇadharmā sa tatropapadyavedanīyaṃ karma na karoti / [230/28]
T07vakobhau:8301: āryapudgalastu yato vītarāgo na ca parihāṇadharmā sa tatropapadyadanīyaṃ cāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ ca karma na karoti / [231/03-231/04]
T07vakobhau:8302: na hyasau bhavyaḥ punarādhastanīṃ bhūmimāyātumaniyataṃ kuryāddṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ cātropapannaḥ / [231/05]
T07vakobhau:8304: parihāṇadharmāpi tvāryapudgalaḥ kāmadhātorbhavāgrā dvītarāgaḥ tayorūpapadyāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ karmābhavyaḥ karttum / [231/07]
T07vakobhau:8323: eka eva hyasau nikāyasabhāga ekakarmākṣipto yaścāntarābhavo yāśca tadanvayā daśāvasthāḥ / [231/20]
T07vakobhau:8328: guṇakṣetre ca niyataṃ tatpitrorghātakaṃ ca yat // VAkK_4.54 // [231/25-232/01]
T07vakobhau:8329: yaddhi karma tīvreṇa kleśena kṛtaṃ yacca tīvreṇa prasādena yacca sātatyena gunakṣetre ca tanniyataṃ veditavyam / [232/01]
T07vakobhau:8332: tatra hyantareṇāpi tīvrakleśaprasādānāṃ sātatyaṃ ca kuśalamakuśalaṃ ca karma niyataṃ saṃpadyate / [232/03]
T07vakobhau:8334: tayoścāpi yatra ghātikaṃ karma yathā tathā vā tanniyataṃ saṃpadyate nānyat / [232/05]
T07vakobhau:8343: tasya vā karmaṇo yā bhūmiḥ kuśalasyākuśalasya vā tato 'tyantavairāgyāttatkarma dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma saṃpadyate / [232/12]
T07vakobhau:8346: yaddhi karma niyataṃ vipāke na tvavasthāyāṃ nāpyaniyataṃ tatyaiṣa niyamaḥ / [232/14-232/15]
T07vakobhau:8349: kīdṛśaṃ punaḥ kṣetraṃ yatrāvaśyaṃ dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma saṃpadyate /
T07vakobhau:8361: ata eteṣu kṛtānāṃ kārāpakārāṇāṃ phalaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme niyataṃ prāpyate / [233/01-233/03]
T07vakobhau:8362: śeṣasya tu bhāvanāmārgasyāparipūrṇasvabhāvaphalatvācca tadvyutthitānāṃ na tathā pratyagrāśrayaparivṛttiśuddhāśayasaṃtatirvartata iti na te tathā puṇyakṣetraṃ bhavati / [233/04]
T07vakobhau:8365: syāt karmaṇaścaitasikyeva vedanā vipāko vipacyeta na kāyikī / [233/05-233/06]
T07vakobhau:8369: avitarkaṃ karma dhyānāntarāt prabhṛti yāvat bhavāgre / [233/09-233/10]
T07vakobhau:8376: tasya hi duḥkhā vedanā vipākaścaitasikī ca duḥkhā vedanā daurmanasyaṃ na ca daurmanasyaṃ vipāka iti vyākhyātametat / [233/16]
T07vakobhau:8378: katamasminnasau citte bhavati kena vā kāraṇena / [233/17]
T07vakobhau:8385: ye hi dravyamantraprayogeṇa vā pareṣāṃ cittaṃ kṣepayanti akāmakaṃ vā viṣaṃ madyaṃ
T07vakobhau:8386: vā pāyayanti trāsayanti vā mṛgayādiṣvagnim vā dāveṣutsṛjanti prapātādvā pātayantyanyena
T07vakobhau:8387: vā kenacitpareṣāṃ smṛtiṃ bhraṃśayanti teṣāṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākenāyatyāṃ cittaṃ kṣipyate / [233/24]
T07vakobhau:8393: amanuṣyā eva kupitā manuṣyāṇāṃ marmasu praharanti / [234/01]
T07vakobhau:8399: kathaṃ na caitasikī vedanā vipākaḥ prāpnoti / [234/03-234/04]
T07vakobhau:8400: nahi brūmastadeva cittavipāka ityapi tu yo mahābhūtānāṃ prakopaḥ sa vipākaḥ / [234/04-234/05]
T07vakobhau:8402: karmajena hi dhātunā vaiṣamyeṇa vyākulamavaśaṃ bhraṣṭasmṛtikaṃ cittaṃ vartata iti kṣiptamityucyate / [234/06]
T07vakobhau:8404: asti cittaṃ kṣiptaṃ na vikṣiptamiti vistaraḥ / [234/07]
T07vakobhau:8406: kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ na kṣiptaṃ svasthacittasya kliṣṭam / [234/08]
T07vakobhau:8415: te hi vividhayātanāsahasravyatibhinnamarmāṇastīrvābhirvedanābhirabhitunnā ātmānamapi tāvannābhicetayanti kiṃ punaḥ kāryamakāryaṃ vā / [234/15]
T07vakobhau:8451: aśubhaṃ karma ekāntena kṛṣṇaṃ kliṣṭatvāt kṛṣṇavipākaṃ cāmanojñavipākatvāt / [235/07]
T07vakobhau:8455: yatra kila dvividho 'sti vipāka āntarābhavika aupapattibhavikaśca / [235/09-235/10]
T07vakobhau:8460: na hyevañjātīyakamekaṃ karmāsti vipāko vā yat kṛṣṇaṃ ca syāt śuklaṃ cānyonyavirodhāt / [235/13-235/14]
T07vakobhau:8461: nanu caivamakuśalasyāpi karmaṇaḥ kuśalavyavakīrṇatvāt kṛṣṇaśuklatvaṃ prāpnoti / [235/14]
T07vakobhau:8466: anasravaṃ karmaiṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ kṣayāya prahāṇāya saṃvartate / [235/16-235/17]
T07vakobhau:8469: uktaṃ tu bhagavatā mahatyāṃ śunyatāyā maśaikṣān dharmānārabhya “ime te ānanda dharmā ekāntakuśalā ekāntānavadyā” iti / [235/19]
T07vakobhau:8474: kiṃ punaḥ sarvamanāsravaṃ karma sarvasyāsya trividhasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayāya saṃvartate / [235/23]
T07vakobhau:8478: yā cetanā dvādaśadhā karma kṛṣṇakṣayāya tat // VAkK_4.61 // [236/03-236/04]
T07vakobhau:8479: darśanamārge catasṛṣu dharmajñānakṣāntiṣu kāmavairāgye cāṣṭāsvānantaryamārgeṣu yā cetanā seyaṃ dvādaśavidhā cetanā kṛṣṇasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇāya karma / [236/05]
T07vakobhau:8480: navame cetanā yā sā kṛṣṇaśuklakṣayāya ca / [236/06-236/07]
T07vakobhau:8481: navame kāmavairāgyānantaryamārge yā cetanā sā kṛṣṇaśuklasya kuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kṛṣṇasya cākuśalasya navamasya prakārasya prahāṇāya / [236/08]
T07vakobhau:8483: dhyānādvyānādvairāgyaṃ kurvato yo 'ntyo navama ānantaryamārgastatra yā cetanā iyaṃ caturvidhā cetanā śuklasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇāya / [236/10-236/11]
T07vakobhau:8484: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamantyenaivānantaryamārgeṇa kuśalasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇaṃ nānyena / [236/11-236/12]
T07vakobhau:8488: ato yāvadeko 'pi tadālambanakleśaprakāra āste tāvadasya prahāṇaṃ nopapadyate / [236/14]
T07vakobhau:8490: anye punarācāryāḥ paśyanti narakavedanīyaṃ narakāccānyakāmadhātuvedanīyaṃ karma yathākrama kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ ceti / [236/16-236/18]
T07vakobhau:8491: narake hyakuśalasyaiva karmaṇo vipākastena tadvedanīyaṃ kṛṣṇamityucyate ato 'nya kāmadhātau kuśalākuśalasya karmaṇo vipākastena tadvedanīyaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklamityuktam / [236/19]
T07vakobhau:8499: sūtra uktaṃ trīṇi mauneyāni kāyamauneyaṃ vāṅmauneyaṃ manomauneyaṃ ca / [236/24]
T07vakobhau:8504: aśaikṣaṃ tu mana eva manomauneyaṃ na manaskarmeti / [237/04]
T07vakobhau:8508: api khalu kāyavākkarmaṇī viratisvabhāvena na manaskarma / [237/05-237/06]
T07vakobhau:8522: eṣā ca deśanā mithyāmauna śaucādhimuktikānāṃ vivecānārtham / [237/13]
T07vakobhau:8528: akarmasvabhāvamapyasti trividhaṃ manoduścaritaṃ cetanārthāntarabhūtamabhidhyā vyāpādo mithyādṛṣṭiśca / [237/18]
T07vakobhau:8532: kim syādyadi kaścit kleśo 'pi karma syāt / [237/20]
T07vakobhau:8535: sūtre tu cetanāyāstanmukhena pravṛttestaistāṃ darśayatīti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [237/21-237/22]
T07vakobhau:8543: daśa karmapathā uktā yathāyogaṃ śubhāśubhāḥ // VAkK_4.66 // [238/05-238/06]
T07vakobhau:8544: teṣāmeva sucaritaduścaritānāṃ caudārikasaṃgraheṇa daśa karmapathāḥ sūtra uktāḥ yathāyogaṃ kuśalāḥ sucaritebhyo 'kuśalā duścaritebhyaḥ / [238/06-238/07]
T07vakobhau:8546: akukśaleṣu tatkarmapathesu kāyaduścaritasya pradeśo na saṃgṛhītaḥ prayogapṛṣṭhabhūtaḥ kliṣṭaścānyo 'pi bandhānādiḥ / [238/08]
T07vakobhau:8548: yaddhi kāyaduścaritaṃ pareṣāṃ jīvitabhogadārebhyaścyāvakaṃ tatkarmapatha uktaṃ tato vivecanārtham / [238/10]
T07vakobhau:8549: vāgduścaritamapi yadeva praśādaṃ tatkarmapatha uktaṃ tadarthameva / [238/10-238/11]
T07vakobhau:8551: kuśaleṣvapi kāyasucaritasya pradeśaḥ prayogapṛṣṭhamadyādiviratidānejyādiko vāksucaritasya priyavacanādiko manaḥ sucaritasya cetanā / [238/13]
T07vakobhau:8560: te 'pi ṣaṭ karmapathāḥ svayaṃ kurvato dvividhā bhavanti vijñaptiravijñaptiśca tatkālamaraṇe paścāt maraṇe tvavijñaptireva / [238/23]
T07vakobhau:8563: kuśalāḥ sapta rūpiṇaḥ karmapathā avaśyaṃ dviprakārā vijñaptiravijñaptiśca / [238/25-238/26]
T07vakobhau:8571: yadi tīvreṇa paryavasthānena pramādena vā ghanarasena prayogamārabheta syādavijñaptiranyathā na syāt / [239/09]
T07vakobhau:8576: yadi karmapathaṃ kṛṭvā punastasyānudharmaṃ ceṣṭeta tasya syāt vijñaptiranyathā na syāt / [239/12-239/13]
T07vakobhau:8578: yadā tāvadiha kaścit paśuṃ hantukāmo mañcakāduttiṣṭhati mūlyaṃ gṛhlāti gacchatyāmṛśati
T07vakobhau:8579: paśuṃ krīṇātyānayati puṣṇāti praveśayati nihantuṃ śāstramādatte prahāramekaṃ dadāti
T07vakobhau:8580: dvau vā yāvanna jīvitā dvacyaparopayati tāvat prayogaḥ / [239/16-239/17]
T07vakobhau:8581: yena tu prahāreṇa jīvitādvyaparopayati tatra yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā vā 'vijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapathaḥ / [239/17-239/18]
T07vakobhau:8582: dvābhyāṃ hi kāraṇābhyāṃ prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate prayogataḥ mṛte sati phalaparipūritaśca / [239/18-239/19]
T07vakobhau:8584: yāvacca taṃ paśuṃ kuṣṇāti śodhayati vikrīṇīte pacati khādayatyanukīrtayati vā tāvadasya vijñaptikṣaṇā api pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavanti / [239/21]
T07vakobhau:8586: abhidhyādīnāṃ nāsti prayogo na pṛṣṭhaṃ saṃmukhībhāvamātrātkarmapathaḥ / [239/23]
T07vakobhau:8588: kiṃ tāvat maraṇabhavasthe tasmin prāṇini ye vijñaptyavijñaptī te karmapatha āhosvinmṛte / [239/24]
T07vakobhau:8590: yadi tāvanmaraṇabhavasthe sahamṛṭasyāpio anturghātayiturvā prāṇātipātāvadyena yogaḥ prāpnoti / [239/25-240/01]
T07vakobhau:8593: yaduktaṃ “yena tu prahāreṇa jīvitādvacyaparopayati tatra yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā vā 'vijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapatha” iti tanā vaktavyam / [240/03]
T07vakobhau:8594: yaccāpīdaṃ śāstra uktaṃ “syāt prāṇī hataḥ prāṇātipātaścāniruddhaḥ / [240/03-240/06]
T07vakobhau:8595: syādyathā hi tatprāṇī jīvitādvyaparopito bhavati prayogaścāpratiprasragdha” ityatra pṛṣṭhaṃ prayogaśabdenoktamiti vaibhāṣikīyo 'rthavirodho maulasyaiva tadānīmaniruddhatvāt / [240/06]
T07vakobhau:8599: vijñaptistarhi tadā kathaṃ maulaḥ karmapatho bhavati / [240/07-240/08]
T07vakobhau:8603: tasmāt prayogaphalaparipūrikāle tadubhayaṃ karmapathaḥ syāt karmatpatho 'pyanyasya prayogaḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ ca bhavati / [240/10]
