T07vakobhau:8605: yathā ca śatrorvadhārthaṃ kṛtyaṃ samupasthāpayan paśunā valiṃ kuryāt parakīyaṃ kṛtvā
T07vakobhau:8606: dāreṣu cāsya vipratipadyeta taireva tadghātanārtham anṛtapiśunaparuṣasāntavaiścāsya
T07vakobhau:8607: mitrabhedaṃ kuryādyānyasya paritrāṇāya kalperan abhidhyāṃ ca tatsva kuryāttatraiva
T07vakobhau:8608: ca vyāpādaṃ tadvadhārthaṃ ca mithyādṛṣṭiṃ vṛṃhayediti / [240/14]
T07vakobhau:8613: sūtra uktaṃ “prāṇātipāto bhikṣavastrividho lobhajo dveṣajo mohajo yāvanmithyādṛṣṭi“riti / [240/17-240/18]
T07vakobhau:8614: tatra kīdṛśaḥ prāṇātipāto lobhaja ityevamādi vaktavyam / [240/18]
T07vakobhau:8618: tatra lobhajapraṇātipāto yathā taccharīrāvayavārthamarthārthaṃ krītārthaṃ ca prāṇinaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayati ātmasuhṛtparitrāṇāya / [240/22]
T07vakobhau:8620: mohajo yathā yājñikānāṃ dharmabuddhyā rājñāṃ ca dharmapāṭhakaprāmāṇyāddhiṃsatām / [240/23-240/24]
T07vakobhau:8621: duṣṭānāṃ kila nigrahaṃ kurvanto rājānaḥ puṇyabhājo bhavantīti / [240/24]
T07vakobhau:8627: lobhajamadattādānaṃ yo yenārthi sa tadvarati anyalābhasatkārayaśo 'rthaṃ vā ātmasukṛtaparitrāṇāya vā / [241/03]
T07vakobhau:8630: duṣṭanigrahārthaṃ yathā brāhmaṇā āhuḥ “sarvamidaṃ brahmaṇā brāhmaṇebhyo dattaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ daurbalyādvṛṣlāḥ paribhuñjate / [241/05-241/06]
T07vakobhau:8631: tasmādapaharan brāhmaṇaḥ sumādatte svameva brāhmaṇo bhuṅkte svaṃ vaste svaṃ dadāti ce” ti / [241/07]
T07vakobhau:8636: mohajo yathā pārasīkānāṃ mātrādigamanaṃ gosave ca yajñe / [241/10]
T07vakobhau:8638: upahā udakaṃ cūṣati tṛṇāni cchinatti upaiti mātaramupasvasāramupa sagotrā“miti / [241/11-241/12]
T07vakobhau:8651: lobhādanantaramutpannā lobhajāḥ dveṣādanantaraṃ dveṣajā mohādanantaraṃ mohajāḥ / [241/22-241/23]
T07vakobhau:8657: tasya ca avaśya malobhādibhiḥ saṃprayogāt tatrākuśala karmapathaprayogādviratiḥ kuśalakarmapathaprayogaḥ / [242/01]
T07vakobhau:8660: tadyathā śrāmaṇera upasaṃpādyamāno nānāvāsaṃ praviśati bhikṣūnvandate upādhyāyaṃ yācate yāvadekaṃ karmavācanaṃ kriyate dvitīyaṃ ca / [242/03]
T07vakobhau:8662: tṛtīya karmavācane yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā cāvijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapathaḥ / [242/04-242/05]
T07vakobhau:8663: tata ūrdhvaṃ yāvanniśrayā ārocyante tadadhiṣṭhānaṃ ca vijñapayati avijñaptica yāvadatuvartate idaṃ pṛṣṭham / [242/06]
T07vakobhau:8664: yaduktaṃ “na sarveṣāṃ karmapathānāṃ lobhādibhirniṣṭhe“tyatha kasya kena niṣṭhā / [242/07]
T07vakobhau:8676: eṣāṃ tribhirapi niṣṭhā lobhena dveṣeṇa mohena vā [242/18-242/19]
T07vakobhau:8677: ya ete karmapathāścaturbhiḥ kāṇḍairuktāstrayastraya ekastrayaśca eṣāṃ yathākramaṃ [242/20]
T07vakobhau:8678: sattvabhogāvadhiṣṭhānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ca nāma ca // VAkK_4.71 // [242/21]
T07vakobhau:8683: yaḥ paraṃ maraṇānniyamayya samaṃ tena pūrvaṃ vā mriyate kimasya maulaḥ karmapatho bhavatyutāho na / [242/25]
T07vakobhau:8684: samaṃ prāk ca mṛtasyāsti na maulaḥ [242/26-242/27]
T07vakobhau:8685: ata evocyate “syāt prayogaṃ kuryāt phalaṃ ca paripūrayenna ca prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate / [242/27]
T07vakobhau:8687: syāt yathāpi tadvyaparopavaḥ pūrvaṃ saha vā kālaṃ kuryā“diti kiṃ punastatkāraṇam nahi vadhye jīvati hantuḥ prāṇātipātāvadyenāsti yogo nāpi sahamṛtasya hantuḥ / [243/03]
T07vakobhau:8689: thenāśrayeṇa tatprayogaḥ kṛtaḥ sa ucchinno 'nya evāśrayo nikāyasabhāgabhinna utpannaḥ / [243/05]
T07vakobhau:8690: tasya prayoktṛtvāt karmapathena yogo na yuktaḥ / [243/05-243/06]
T07vakobhau:8691: yatsenāpātamṛgayāvaskandheṣu pareṣāṃ vadhārthaṃ bahavaḥ samagrāḥ patantyekaśca prāṇātipātaṃ karoti kastena samanvāgato bhavati / [243/07]
T07vakobhau:8693: yathaiva hi karttā tathā sarve samanvāgatā bhavantyekakāryatvāt / [243/08-243/09]
T07vakobhau:8695: yastarhi balānnīyate so'pi samanvāgato bhavatyanyatra ya evaṃ naścitya yāyāt yāvajjīvitahetorapi prāṇinaṃ na haniṣyāmīti / [243/12-243/13]
T07vakobhau:8696: kiyatā punaḥ prāṇātipātaṃ svayaṃ kurvataḥ karmapatho bhavati kiyatā yāvanmithyādṛṣṭiḥ karmapathaḥ iti lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ taducyate / [243/14]
T07vakobhau:8698: yadi mārayiṣyāmyenamiti saṃjñāya paraṃ mārayati tameva ca mārayati nānyaṃ bhramitvā / [243/16]
T07vakobhau:8700: yastarhi saṃdigdho mārayati kimayaṃ prāṇī na prāṇīti sa evānyo veti so 'pyavaśyametaṃ niścayaṃ labdhvā tatra praharati / [243/17-243/18]
T07vakobhau:8707: yadyekasyāpi jīvitakṣaṇasyotpadyamānasyāntarāyaṃ karoti prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate nānyathā / [243/22]
T07vakobhau:8713: tasmātsendriyaḥ kāyo jīvatītyucyate anindriyo mṛta iti / [243/26-243/27]
T07vakobhau:8714: abuddhipūrvādapi prāṇivadhāt karturadharmo yathā 'gnisaṃyogāddāha iti nirgranthāḥ / [243/27-244/01]
T07vakobhau:8716: nirgranthaśiroluñcane ca kaṣṭatapodeśane ca śāstuḥ tadvisūcikāmaraṇe ca dāturvaidyānāṃ cāturapīḍane maraṇe ca mātṛgabhasthayoścānyonyaṃ duḥkhanimittatvāt
T07vakobhau:8720: acetanānāṃ ca kāṣṭhādīnāṃ gṛhapāte prāṇivadhāt pāpaprasaṅgo na vā dṛṣṭāntamātrātsiddhiriti / [244/06]
T07vakobhau:8724: yadi balādvā cauryeṇa vā parasvaṃ svīkaroti yatraiva ca balacauryābhiprāyeṇānyatra saṃjñāvibhramāt iyatā 'dattādānaṃ bhavati / [244/09-244/10]
T07vakobhau:8728: asvāmikaṃ ca nidhimuddharato viṣayasvāmikāt parivartakaṃ harataḥ kṛte karmaṇi sīmāprāptebhyaḥ akṛte sarvabuddhaśaikṣyebhyaḥ / [244/13]
T07vakobhau:8731: agamyāṃ gacchati paraparigṛhītāṃ vā mātaraṃ duhitaraṃ vā mātṛpitṛsaṃbandhinīṃ vā / [244/15-244/16]
T07vakobhau:8732: anaṅge vā gacchati svāmapi bhāryām apāne mukhe vā / [244/16]
T07vakobhau:8733: adeśe vā gacchati prakāśe caitye vihāre vā / [244/17]
T07vakobhau:8736: garbhiṇīṃ vā gacchati pāyayantīṃ vā saniyamāṃ vā / [244/18]
T07vakobhau:8739: yadi svasaṃjñī parastriyaṃ yāyāt na syāt karmapathaḥ / [244/19-244/20]
T07vakobhau:8745: tasyāpi saniyamā svabhāryeva tu sā na gamyā / [244/23]
T07vakobhau:8746: kumārīṃ gacchato yasya nisṛṣṭā no cedyasya rakṣā 'ntato rājñaḥ / [244/24]
T07vakobhau:8748: yadi yamarthaṃ bravīti tasminnanyathāsamjñī bhavati yaṃ cādhikṛtya bravīti sa tasya vākyasyārthābhijño bhavati tadvākyaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ / [245/01]
T07vakobhau:8752: kadācicca bahavo varṇā vākyaṃ bhavantīti katamaḥ tatra karmapathaḥ / [245/03]
T07vakobhau:8756: ki tāvadabhijñātārthe śrotari āhosvit abhijñātuṃ samarthe / [245/05]
T07vakobhau:8758: yadyabhijñātārthe manovijñānaviṣayatvādvākyārthasya śrotravijñānena saha nirodhācca vāgvijñapteravijñaptireva syāt karmapathaḥ / [245/06-245/07]
T07vakobhau:8764: “adṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditā aśrute 'mate 'vijñāte vijñātavāditā dṛṣṭe adṛṣṭavāditā yāvad vijñāte 'vijñātavāditā itīme 'nāryā aṣṭau vyavahārāḥ / [245/11-245/12]
T07vakobhau:8765: dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditā yāvadvijñāte vijñātavāditā adṛṣṭ 'dṛṣṭavāditā yāvadavijñāte avijñātavāditā itīme āryā aṣṭau vyavahārāḥ / [245/12-245/13]
T07vakobhau:8778: sūtraṃ tāvat “tatkiṃ manyase māhakīmātaḥ yāni tvayā cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi na dṛṣṭāni na dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi na paśyasi nāpi te evaṃ bhavati paśyeyamiti /
T07vakobhau:8779: api nu te tannidānamutpannaśchando vā rāgo vā sneho vā yena vā ālayo vā nīyatiradhyavasānaṃ vā / [245/22]
T07vakobhau:8781: ye tvayā śrotreṇa śabdā na śrutā na śrutapūrvā vistareṇa yāvanmanasā dharmā na vijñātā vistareṇa yāvanno bhadanta / [245/24-245/25]
T07vakobhau:8782: atra ca te māhakīmātardṛṣṭe dṛṣṭamātraṃ bhaviṣyati śrute mate vijñāte vijñātapātramityu“ktam / [245/25-245/26]
T07vakobhau:8784: ata evaṃ cāniṣyamāṇe dṛṣṭādibhāvabāhyatvāt gandhādiṣu vyavahāro na syādityeṣā yuktiḥ / [245/27]
T07vakobhau:8786: na hyatra sūtre bhagavān vyavahārānāṃ lakṣāṇaṃ śāsti sma / [245/28]
T07vakobhau:8788: atra ca te ṣaḍvidhe viṣaye caturṣu vyavahāreṣu dṛṣṭādivyavahāramātraṃ bhaviṣyati na priyāpriyanimittādhyāropa ityayamatra sūtrārtho dṛśyate
T07vakobhau:8795: ete ca pañca viṣayāḥ pratyekaṃ dṛṣṭā iti vā kṛtvā vyavahrilyante / [246/05]
T07vakobhau:8809: syādvācā parākrameta syānna vācā parākrameta mṛṣāvādāvadyena ca spṛśyeta / [246/11-246/12]
T07vakobhau:8810: syāt kāyena parākrameta syānna kāyena na vācā parākrakmeta ubhayāvadyena ca spṛśyeta / [246/13]
T07vakobhau:8812: yadyubhayathā 'pi na parākrameta na cāvijñaptikāstyavijñaptiḥ kāmāvacarī kathaṃ tayoḥ karmapathaḥ siddhyati / [246/15]
T07vakobhau:8816: yat kliṣṭacittasya pareṣāṃ bhedāya vacanamaprītaye tat paiśunyam / [246/17-246/18]
T07vakobhau:8822: yat kliṣṭacittasya pareṣāmapriyavacanamarthābhijñe tatraiva ca yat vivakṣitaṃ tat pāruṣyam / [246/23]
T07vakobhau:8829: ato mṛṣāvādādikādvākkarmaṇo yadanyat kliṣṭaṃ vacanaṃ tatsaṃbhinnapralāpa ityapare / [247/03]
T07vakobhau:8832: tadyathā bhikṣurmithyājīvī lapanāṃ karoti raktāśca kecit gāyanti nāṭacye ca naṭāḥ pareṣāṃ rañjanārthaṃ pralapanti / [247/06]
T07vakobhau:8834: evaṃ paridevasaṃgaṇikādikamapi yadanyanmṛṣāvādādibhyaḥ kliṣṭaṃ vākkarma tatsaṃbhinnapralāpaḥ / [247/07-247/08]
T07vakobhau:8835: kathaṃ cakravartikāle gītaṃ cāsti na ca saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ / [247/08-247/09]
T07vakobhau:8836: naiṣkramyopasaṃhitāni hi tadānīṃ giyante sma na grāmyarasopasaṃhitāni / [247/09-247/10]
T07vakobhau:8839: aho vata yat pareṣāṃ tanmama syāditi parasvebhyo yā viṣameṇānyāyena spṛhā svīkaranecchā balādvā copāyādvā sā 'bhidhyā karmapathaḥ / [247/13-247/14]
T07vakobhau:8841: tathā hi nivaraṇādhikāre kāmacchandamadhikṛtyoktaṃ sūtre “so 'bhidhyāṃ loke prahāye” tyevamādi / [247/15-247/16]
T07vakobhau:8842: yadyapi sarvābhidhyā natu sarvā karmapatha audārikaduṣcaritasaṃgrahādityapare / [247/16-247/17
T07vakobhau:8848: śubhe cāśubhe ca karmaṇi yā nāstīti dṛṣṭiḥ sā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ / [247/22-247/24]
T07vakobhau:8849: tadyathā “nāsti dattaṃ nāstīṣṭaṃ nāsti hutaṃ nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamityevamādi yāvanna santi loke 'hanta” iti / [247/24-247/25]
T07vakobhau:8854: trayo hyatra panthānaḥ sapta karma ca // VAkK_4.78 // [248/03]
T07vakobhau:8855: abhidhyādayo hi trayaḥ karmaṇaḥ panthāna iti karmapathāḥ / [248/03-248/04]
T07vakobhau:8856: tatsaṃprayogiṇī hi cetanā teṣāṃ vāhena vahati teṣāṃ gatyā gacchati / [248/04]
T07vakobhau:8858: sapta tu prāṇātipātādayaḥ karma ca kāyavākkarmatvāt karmaṇaśca panthāna iti karmapathāstatsamutthānacetanāyāstānadhiṣṭhāya pravṛtteriti / [248/06]
T07vakobhau:8862: prayogapṛṣṭāni karmāṇi karmapathāḥ yasmāttadarthaṃ tanmūlikā ca teṣāṃ pravṛttiḥ / [248/09-248/09-]
T07vakobhau:8865: ye tarhi dārṣṭāntikā abhidhyādīneva manaskarmecchanti teṣāṃ te kathaṃ karmapathāḥ / [248/11]
T07vakobhau:8867: api tu śakyaṃ vaktuṃ karma ca te panthānaśca sugatidurgatīnāmiti karmapathāḥ / [248/12-248/13]
T07vakobhau:8869: ya ete daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ sarve ete kuśalānāṃ karmaṇāṃ samudācāravirodhinaḥ / [248/15]
T07vakobhau:8873: yairakuśalamūlaiḥ kuśalamūlāni samucchinatti kāmavairāgyaṃ cānuprāpnuvan yāni tatprathamata upalikhatī“ti / [248/18-248/20]
T07vakobhau:8874: akuśalamūlādhyāhṛtatvāt mithyādṛṣṭesteṣveva tatkarmāpadeśa eṣa kriyate tadyathāgnireva grāmaṃ dahani caurāstu tasyādhyāhārakā iti caurairgrāmo dagdha ityucyate / [248/21]
T07vakobhau:8887: yā ca hetumapavadate nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamiti yā ca phalaṃ nāsti sucaritaduścaritānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipāka iti / [249/06-249/07]
T07vakobhau:8889: sāsravālambanayaiva nānāsravālambanayā sabhāgadhātvālambanayaiva ca na visabhāgadhātvālambanayā / [249/08]
T07vakobhau:8902: yairakuśalamūlaiḥ kuśalāni samucchinnāni sarvapaścāt vijahāti yaiḥ vikīrṇaiḥ samucchinna kuśalamūla iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatī“ti / [249/18]
T07vakobhau:8908: eko 'pi hi prakāra steṣāmasamucchinnaḥ sarveṣāṃ punarutpattau hetuḥ syāditi / [249/21-249/22]
T07vakobhau:8911: pūrvaṃ saṃvaraṃ vijahāti paścāt kuśalamūlāni samucchinattītyeke / [249/23]
T07vakobhau:8939: yadā hi kuśalamūlānāṃ prāptirna punarutpadyate aprāptirapyutpadyate / [250/11-250/12]
T07vakobhau:8946: navaprakārāṇāṃ yugapat pratisaṃdhānaṃ krameṇa tu saṃmukhībhāva ārogyabalalābhavat / [250/17-250/18]
T07vakobhau:8950: tameva saṃdhāyoktam “abhavyo'yaṃ pudgalo dṛṣṭa eva dharme kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdhātuṃ niyatamayaṃ navakebhyaścyavamāno vā upapadyamāno vā kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdhāsyati” iti / [250/22-250/24]
T07vakobhau:8951: upapadyamāno 'ntarābhavasthaścyavamānaścyutyabhimukhastatra punaryo hetubalena samucchinatti sa cyavamānaḥ pratisaṃdadhāti yaḥ pratyayabalena sa upapadyamānaḥ / [250/24-250/25]
T07vakobhau:8954: ya āśayavipannaḥ samucchinatti sa dṛṣṭe dharme pratisaṃdadhāti / [250/26]
T07vakobhau:8956: evaṃ yo dṛṣṭivipanno dṛṣṭi śīlavipanna iti / [251/01]
T07vakobhau:8964: ānantaryakāriṇāṃ tu tatra vā 'nyatra vā narake / [251/05]
T07vakobhau:8966: tatra vaktavyaṃ katibhiḥ karmapathaiḥ saha cetanā yugapadutpannā vartata iti / [251/07]
T07vakobhau:8972: vyāpannacittasya prāṇivadhe abhidhyāviṣṭasya vā 'dattādāne kāmamithyācāre saṃbhinnapralāpe vā / [251/12]
T07vakobhau:8984: ṣaṭsu prayoggaṃ kṛtvā svayaṃ kāmabhithyācāraṃ kurvataḥ samaṃ niṣṭhāgamane / [251/19]
T07vakobhau:8987: kuśalaiḥ punaḥ karmapatharyāvat daśabhiḥ saha cetanā vartata ityutsargaṃ kṛtvā 'pavādaṃ karoti [251/22]
T07vakobhau:8989: ekenāṣṭābhi pañcabhiśca karmapathaiḥ saha na vartate /
T07vakobhau:8996: saptabhiḥ kuśale manovijñāne tatsamādāna eva akuśalāvyākṛtacittasya ca bhikṣusaṃvarasamādāne / [252/05]
T07vakobhau:8998: tatsamādāne kṣayānutpādajñānasaṃprayukte ca manovijñāne tasminneva ca dhyānasaṃgṛhīte / [252/06-252/07]
T07vakobhau:9000: sarvā ca dhyānānāsrava saṃvarasahavartinī cetanā 'nyatra kṣayānutpādajñānābhyām saṃvaranirmuktena tvekenāpi saha syādanya cittasyaikāṅgaviratisamādāne
T07vakobhau:9002: kasyāṃ gatau kati karmapathā akuśalā kuśalā vā saṃmukhībhāvataḥ samanvāgamato vā / [252/13]
T07vakobhau:9004: ityete trayaḥ karmapathā narake dvābhyāṃ saprakārābhyāṃ santi / [252/14-252/15]
T07vakobhau:9025: te khalu yayā striyā sārdhaṃ rantukāmā bhavanti tāṃ bāhau gṛhītvā vṛkṣamūlamupasarpanti / [253/03-253/04]
T07vakobhau:9026: gamyā cet vṛkṣaśchādayati tāṃ te gacchanti / [253/04]
T07vakobhau:9027: agamyā cenna chādayati tāṃ te na gacchanti / [253/05]
T07vakobhau:9030: narakottarakurubhyāmanyatra kāmadhātau daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ saṃmukhībhāvato 'pi vidyante / [253/07]
T07vakobhau:9033: yadyapi devo devaṃ na mārayati anyagatisthaṃ tu mārayati / [253/08-253/09]
T07vakobhau:9037: pañcasu gatiṣu traidhātuke sarvatrānabhidhyā 'vyāpādasamyagdṛṣṭyaḥ saṃmukhībhāvataḥ samanvāgamataśca vidyante / [253/13]
T07vakobhau:9039: kāyikavācikāḥ sapta kuśalā ārūpyeṣvasaṃjñisattveṣu samanvāgamata eva / [253/14-253/16]
T07vakobhau:9042: yadbhūmyā śrayamāryeṇānāsravaṃ śīlamutpāditaṃ nirodhitaṃ bhavati tenārūpyeṣvatītena samanvāgato bhavati / [253/18]
T07vakobhau:9048: tatraite sapta kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ saṃmukhībhāvato 'pi saṃvidyante 'nyatra narakottarakurubhyaḥ / [253/22-253/23]
T07vakobhau:9049: te punastiryakpreteṣu saṃvaranirmuktā rūpadhātau tu saṃvarasaṃgṛhītā anyatrobhayathā / [253/23-253/24]
T07vakobhau:9054: sa ceditthaṃ tvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāṃ praṇātipātenālpāyurbhavati adattādānena
T07vakobhau:9057: abhidhyayā tīvrarāgaḥ vyāpādena tīvradveṣaḥ mithyādṛṣṭyā tīvramohaḥ / [254/05]
T07vakobhau:9069: viṣamartupariṇāmāḥ abhidhyayā śuṣkaphalāḥ vyāpādena kaṭukaphalā mithyādṛṣṭyā 'lpaphalā aphalā vā / [254/12]
T07vakobhau:9079: prāṇātipātaṃ hi tāvatkurvatā māryamāṇasya duḥkhamutpāditaṃ māritamojo nāśimato 'sya [254/19]
T07vakobhau:9085: evaṃ kuśalānāmapi karmapathānāṃ phalatrayaṃ veditavyam prāṇātipātaviratyā āsevitayā bhāvitayā bahulīkṛtayā deveṣupapadyate / [254/24-254/25]
T07vakobhau:9086: sa ceditthantvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāṃ dīrghāyurbhavatītyakuśalaviparyayeṇa sarvaṃ yojayitavyam / [254/25-254/26]
T07vakobhau:9097: ata ājīvo duḥkhaśodha ityādarotpādanārthaṃ tatrāsau pṛthagnirdiṣṭaḥ / [255/06]
T07vakobhau:9105: śīlaskandhikāyāṃ hi bhagavatā hastiyuddha darśanādīnyapi mithyājīve nyastāni / [255/14]
T07vakobhau:9109: yāni pūrvaṃ pañca phalānyuktāni teṣāṃ katamat karma katibhiḥ phalaiḥ prahāṇam / [255/16]
T07vakobhau:9111: prahāṇārthaṃ mārgaḥ prahīyante vā 'nena kleśā iti prahāṇamārgaḥ ānantaryamārgaḥ / [255/18]
T07vakobhau:9112: tasminsāsrave yat karma tat pañcabhiḥ phalaiḥ saphalam / [255/18-255/19]
T07vakobhau:9121: anāsrave prahāṇamārge yatkarma taccaturbhiḥ phalaiḥ saphalaṃ vipākaphalaṃ hitvā / [255/25]
T07vakobhau:9123: yaccānyat prahāṇamārgātsāsravaṃ kuśalaṃ karmaṃ yaccākuśalaṃ tadapi caturbhirvisaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā / [256/03]
T07vakobhau:9124: anāsravaṃ punaḥ śeṣāṃ tribhiravyākṛtaṃ ca yat / [256/04]
T07vakobhau:9125: prahāṇamārgādanyadanāsravaṃ karma avyākṛtaṃ ca karma tribhirvipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā / [256/05]
T07vakobhau:9126: catvāri dve tathā trīṇi kuśalasya śubhādayaḥ // VAkK_4.88 // [256/06]
T07vakobhau:9128: kuśalsya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmāścatvāri phalāni vipākaphalaṃ hitvā / [256/07]
T07vakobhau:9133: akuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale / [256/11]
T07vakobhau:9136: avyākṛte hi satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭī akuśalānāṃ sarvatragāṇāṃ duḥkhadarśana heyānāṃ ca niḥṣyandaphalam / [256/14]
T07vakobhau:9137: avyākṛtasya dve trīṇi trīṇi caite śubhādayaḥ // VAkK_4.89 // [256/15]
T07vakobhau:9138: avyākṛtasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphalel / [256/15-256/16]
T07vakobhau:9154: svabhūmikasya karmaṇaḥ svabhūmikā dharmāścatvāri phalāni visaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā / [257/04]
T07vakobhau:9161: śaikṣasya karmaṇaḥ śaikṣā dharmāstrīṇi phalāni vipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā / [257/08-257/09]
T07vakobhau:9165: dharmāḥ śaikṣādikā ekaṃ phalaṃ trīṇyapi ca dvayam / [257/12]
T07vakobhau:9169: tābhyāmanyasya śaikṣādyā dve dve pañca phalāni ca // VAkK_4.92 // [257/15-257/16]
T07vakobhau:9170: śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāmanyasya karmaṇo naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣasya śaikṣā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale / [257/16]
T07vakobhau:9173: trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛgdheyasya tadādayaḥ / [257/18]
T07vakobhau:9177: te dve catvāryatha trīṇi bhāvanāheyakarmaṇaḥ // VAkK_4.93 // [257/21]
T07vakobhau:9178: bhāvanāheyasya karmaṇo darśanaheyā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale / [257/21-257/22]
T07vakobhau:9181: apraheyasya te tvekaṃ dve catvāri yathākramam / [257/24]
T07vakobhau:9191: ayogavihitaṃ kliṣṭaṃ vidhibhraṣṭaṃ ca kecana // VAkK_4.94 // [258/06]
T07vakobhau:9194: yena yathā gantavyaṃ sthātavyaṃ bhoktavyaṃ pravicaritavyamityevamādi / [258/08]
T07vakobhau:9200: kimekaṃ karma ekameva janmākṣipati atha naikamapi / [258/11-258/12]
T07vakobhau:9204: ekameva janmākṣipatyekameva ca karma nānekaṃ janmeti nikāyasabhāgasyākhyā / [258/14-258/15]
T07vakobhau:9206: yattarhi sthavirāniruddhenoktaṃ “so 'haṃ tasyaikapiṇḍapātasya vipākena saptakṛtvastrayastriṃśeṣu deveṣūpapanno yāvadetahyrādye śākyakule jāta” iti / [258/17]
T07vakobhau:9207: tena hyasau samṛdviṃ labdvā jātismaraḥ punaranyat puṇyaṃ kṛtavān / [258/17-258/18]
T07vakobhau:9209: yathā manuṣyo dīnārottho 'nena sahasraṃ nirviśyāha ekena dīnāreṇāhamaita dīśvaryaṃ prāpta iti / [258/19]
T07vakobhau:9211: tasya taṃ piṇḍapātamadhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā dānacetanānāṃ pravāho mahānutpannaḥ kayācit kiñcitphalaṃ parigṛhītamiti / [258/20-258/21]
T07vakobhau:9212: anekenāpyekamākṣipyate mā bhūt khaṇḍaśo nikāyasabhāgasyākṣepa iti / [258/22]
T07vakobhau:9213: ekena tu karmaṇā kliṣṭasya nikāyasabhāgasyeṣyate karma / [258/23]
T07vakobhau:9215: yathā citrakara ekayā vartyā rūpamālikhya vahvībhiḥ paripūrayati / [258/24-258/26]
T07vakobhau:9216: tathā hi tulye mānuṣye kaścit sakalendriyāṅgapratyaṅgo bhavativarṇakṛtipramāṇabalasaṃpadā vibhrājamānaḥ kaścideṣāṃ kenacidvikalaḥ / [258/26]
T07vakobhau:9221: nākṣepike samāpattī acitte prāptayo na ca // VAkK_4.95 // [259/02]
T07vakobhau:9231: tadyathā mātṛvadhaḥ pitṛvadho 'rhadvadhaḥ saṃghabhedaḥ tathāgataśrīre duṣṭacittarudhirotpādanam / [259/09]
T07vakobhau:9237: śakto hyadhimatravego 'pi kleśaḥ kādācitko nihantuṃ natu samūho 'pyājasrikaḥ / [259/12-259/13]
T07vakobhau:9238: ājasrike he kleśe tannirghātāya parākramakālaṃ na labhate / [259/13]
T07vakobhau:9241: tasmāt evāvaraṇaṃ trividhā durgatiḥ vipākāvaraṇaṃ sugateśca pradeśaḥ auttarakauravā asaṃjñisattvāśca / [259/15]
T07vakobhau:9243: āryamārgasyāryamārgaprāyogikāṇāṃ ca kuśalamūlānām anyānyapi hyapāyādiniyatāni aṇḍajasaṃsvedajastrītvāṣṭamabhavayatāni karmāṇi vaktavyāni syuḥ
T07vakobhau:9244: yānyeva tu pañcabhiḥkāraṇaiḥ sudarśakāni pajñakāni adhiṣṭhānataḥ phalato gatitaḥ upapattitaḥ pudgalataśca tānyevoktāni nānyāni / [259/19]
T07vakobhau:9247: tāmyāṃ hi dvitīye 'pi janmanyacikitso bhavatyuttarottarāvāhanāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ / [259/21]
T07vakobhau:9249: nāntarāyituṃ śakyāni vipākaṃ prati janmāntaraphalena karmāntareṇetyānantaryāṇi / [259/22]
T07vakobhau:9251: na vā tatkāriṇaḥ pudgalasyetaścyutasyāntaramasti narakopapattigamanaṃ pratītyanantaraḥ / [259/23]
T07vakobhau:9269: teṣāmapi na tīvraṃ hyapatrāpyaṃ mātāpitrorantike pratyupasthitaṃ yadvipādanādānantaryeṇa spṛśyeran / [260/08]
T07vakobhau:9280: catvāri kāyakarma ekaṃ vākkarma trīṇi prāṇātipāta ekaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ ekaṃ prāṇātipātaprayogaḥ / [260/14-260/15]
T07vakobhau:9287: sa kimānantaryaṃ bhaviṣyati naiva ca tena bhettā samanvāgataḥ / [260/20]
T07vakobhau:9290: yo hi bhinnastasya bhedo na bhettuḥ /
T07vakobhau:9300: atha yena bahunyānantaryāṇi kṛtāni bhavanti anantarameva tāni vipacyante / [261/03-261/04]
T07vakobhau:9303: sahi bhūyobhirānantaryaistasminnavīcau ghanataraṃ sukumārataraṃ cāśrayaṃ labhate kāraṇāśca bahutarāstīvratarāśca yena dvitricatuṣpañcaguṇāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate / [261/07-261/08]
T07vakobhau:9307: sa ca dṛṣṭicarita eva na tṛṣṇācaritaḥ / [261/11]
T07vakobhau:9320: yadā tebhyastathāgatādanyaḥ śāstā kṣamate tadupadiṣṭācca mārgādanyo mārga iyatā bhinnaḥ saṃgho vaktavyaḥ / [261/21]
T07vakobhau:9324: aparyuṣita eva hi saṃghabhede saṃgho 'vaśyaṃ pratisaṃdhīyate /
T07vakobhau:9327: dharmacakraṃ hi tadā bhagavato bhinnaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:9351: sīmāyāṃ cāpyabaddhāyāṃ cakrabhedo na jāyate // VAkK_4.102 // [262/13]
T07vakobhau:9355: madhye 'pyarbudāt pūrvaṃ na bhidyate yāvacchāsane śīlārbudaṃ dṛṣṭyarbudaṃ ca notpannaṃ bhavati / [262/15-262/16]
T07vakobhau:9356: yugācca pūrvaṃ na bhidyate yāvacchrāvakāgrayugaṃ notpannaṃ bhavati / [262/16]
T07vakobhau:9359: sīmāyāmabaddhāyāṃ yāvat sīmā na baddhā bhavati / [262/18-262/19]
T07vakobhau:9360: ekasīmāyāṃ hi pakṣadvayāvasthānātsaṃghabheda ityeṣu kālesu cakrabhedona bhavati / [262/19]
T07vakobhau:9361: na ca punaḥ sarveṣāṃ baddhānāṃ cakrabhedaḥ /
T07vakobhau:9371: yadi punarmāturvyañjanaṃ parivṛttaṃ syāt piturvā tatraikasminnāmnāyo [263/01]
T07vakobhau:9373: ata evocyate “syāt puruṣaṃ jīvitādvacyaparopayenna pitaraṃ nārhantam / [263/02-263/03]
T07vakobhau:9376: syāt strīṃ jīvitādvyaparopayenna mātaraṃ nārhantīm ānantaryāvadyena ca spṛśyeta / [263/04-263/05]
T07vakobhau:9378: anyasyāḥ striyāḥ kalalaṃ prasrutamanyayā yonyā pītam / [263/05-263/06]
T07vakobhau:9379: katarā tasya mātā yāṃ ghnataḥ syādānantaryam / [263/07]
T07vakobhau:9381: yasyāḥ śoṇitādasāvudbhūtaḥ sattvaḥ sā 'sya mātā dvitīyā tu sarvakṛtyeṣvavalokyā / [263/09]
T07vakobhau:9383: yadi mātari prayogaṃ kṛtvā 'nyāṃ mārayenna syādānantaryam / [263/10]
T07vakobhau:9385: mañcatalāvalīnamātṛmāraṇaṃ cātrodāhārya dhāvakasya ca putreṇa masaka prayogeṇa piturmāraṇaṃ ca / [263/11-263/12]
T07vakobhau:9386: ekena prahāreṇa mātaramanyāṃ ca mārayato dve avijñaptī bhavataḥ / [263/12]
T07vakobhau:9392: idamavadānaṃ kathaṃ nīyate “gaccha śikhaṇḍinaṃ brūhi dve ānantarye bhavatā kṛte / [263/16-263/17]
T07vakobhau:9404: kimānantarye prayogaṃ kṛtvā tasminnavyāvartite vairāgyaṃ phalaṃ vā na prāpnuyāt / [263/25]
T07vakobhau:9406: anyakarmaphalapathaprayogaṃ tu kṛtvāryamārgotpattau na punaḥ karmapathotpattirāśrayasyātyantaṃ tadviruddhatvāt / [264/03]
T07vakobhau:9409: yaḥ saṃghabhedanimittaṃ mṛṣāvādo dharmādharmajñasya viparyayadyotanāt sa sarveṣāṃ duścaritānāṃ mahāvadyatamaḥ / [264/06]
T07vakobhau:9414: vimanaskaṃ vartate yāvat punarna pratisaṃdhito bhavatiyasmāccāvicau kalpaṃ vipākaḥ / [264/10-264/11]
T07vakobhau:9415: śeṣāṇāmānantaryāṇāṃ yathākramaṃ pañcamatṛtīyaprathamāni gurutarāṇi sarvalaghuḥ pitṛvadhaḥ / [264/11-264/13]
T07vakobhau:9416: yattarhi bhagavatā trayāṇāṃ daṇḍānāṃ manodaṇḍo mahāsāvadya uktaḥ punarmithyādṛṣṭiḥ paramavadyānāmityuktam ānantaryāṇi niyamasya saṃghabhedo mahāsāvadya uktaḥ / [264/13-264/14]
T07vakobhau:9417: trīṇi karmāṇi niyamayya manodaṇdaḥ dṛṣṭīrniyamayya mithyādṛṣṭiḥ / [264/14-264/15]
T07vakobhau:9418: athavā vipākavistaraṃ mahājanavyāpādanaṃ kuśalamūlasamucchedaṃ cādhikṛtya yathākramam / [264/16]
T07vakobhau:9421: kuśale punaḥ karmaṇi bhavāgracetanā sarveṣāṃ mahāphalatamā / [264/18-264/19]
T07vakobhau:9424: visaṃyogaphalaṃ tvadhikṛtya vajropamasamādhicetanā sarveṣāṃ mahāphalā sarvasamyojanaparyādānaphalatvāt / [264/21]
T07vakobhau:9434: yadi mātaramarhantīṃ dūṣayatyabrahmacaryakaraṇāt niyatipatītaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mārayati śaikṣaṃ mārayati saṃghasya sukhāyadvārikaṃ harati stūpabhedaṃ karoti / [265/04-265/05]
T07vakobhau:9435: anyadapi tu karma savipākaṃ triṣu kāleṣvatyarthaṃ vighnayati / [265/05]
T07vakobhau:9440: yathā puruṣasya deśatyāgaṃ kurvato dhanikā upatiṣṭhante / [265/08-265/10]
T07vakobhau:9441: anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnuvataḥ kāmāvacarāṇi vighnāyopatiṣṭhante tathaiva sthāpayitvā dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma / [265/10]
T07vakobhau:9447: yataḥ prabhṛti lakṣaṇavipākāni karmāṇyārabhate kartuṃ sa hi tadānīṃ niyatipatito bhavati / [265/16]
T07vakobhau:9449: sa hi tasmāt kālāt prabhṛti nityaṃ bhavati / [265/17]
T07vakobhau:9452: tasyāṃ ca sugatau kṣatriyabrāhmaṇagṛhapatimahāśālakulajo bhavati nānyaḥ kulīnaḥ / [265/19]
T07vakobhau:9455: puruṣa eva na strī kuta eva śaṇḍhādiḥ / [265/21]
T07vakobhau:9462: bodhisattvāste te hi mahātmānaḥ sarvasaṃpatprakarṣaviśeṣaprāptā api santo niṣkāraṇakaruṇāpāratantryātsarvasattveṣu
T07vakobhau:9467: cintāmayaṃ kalpaśate śeṣa ākṣipate hi tat // VAkK_4.109 // [266/03]
T07vakobhau:9472: saṃmukhībhūta eva śāstari buddhālambanayaiva cetanayā cintāmayaṃ tatkarma na śrutamayaṃ na bhāvanāmayam / [266/05-266/06]
T07vakobhau:9473: kalpaśate ca śeṣa ākṣipati na bahubhavesu / [266/06-266/07]
T07vakobhau:9474: bhagavatā tu śākyamuninottaptavīryatayā nava kalpā apāvartitā ekanavatyā kalpairākṣiptam / [266/07-266/09]
T07vakobhau:9475: ata eva cokta “mito 'haṃ grāmaṇīrekanavataṃ kalpamupādāya na samanusmarāmi nābhijānāmi yadekakulamapi pakṣabhikṣāpradānahetoḥ kṣataṃ vā syādupahataṃ ve“ti / [266/09-266/11]
T07vakobhau:9476: tataḥ prabhṛti prakṛtijātismaratvāt prathamakalpāsaṃkhyeyaniryāta eva bodhisattva etāṃścaturo doṣān vyāvartayati dvau ca guṇo pratilabhata iti pūrvācāryāḥ / [266/11]
T07vakobhau:9481: yāvat sarvasattvānāṃ karmādhipatyena trisāhasramahāsāhasrako loko 'bhinivartata ityapare / [266/15]
T07vakobhau:9483: atha bodhisattvabhūto bhagavān kiyato buddhān paryupāsayāmāsa / [266/16-266/17]
T07vakobhau:9484: pratheme kalpāsaṃkhyeye pañcasaptatisahasrāṇi dvitīye ṣaṭsaptatiṃ tṛtīye saptasaptatim / [266/18]
T07vakobhau:9485: atha kasya kalpāsaṃkhyeyasyānte katamo buddha āsīt / [266/18-266/19]
T07vakobhau:9495: yatra bhagavatā bodhisattvabhūtenādyaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam evaṃprakāra evāhaṃ buddho
T07vakobhau:9496: bhaveyamiti no 'pyevaṃ kaliyuga evotpannavānāryavattasyāpyevaṃ varṣa sahasrāntaṃ śāsanaṃ babhūva / [267/03]
T07vakobhau:9497: atha kasyāmavasthāvāṃ bodhisattvaḥ kāṃ pāramitāṃ paripūrayate / [267/04]
T07vakobhau:9499: yadā sarvasmai sarvaṃ dadāti ā akṣṇaḥ ā majjāyāḥ kāruṇyānnābhyudayaviśeṣaṃ lipsamānaḥ iyatā dānapāramitā paripūrṇā bhavati / [267/07]
T07vakobhau:9501: yadā 'yamavītarāgo 'pi cchidyamāneṣvaṅgeṣu nālpamapi kupyati tadā 'sya kṣāntiśīlapāramite paripūrṇe bhavataḥ / [267/10]
T07vakobhau:9503: tiṣyaṃ tathāgataratnaguhāyāṃ tejodhātusamāpannadṛṣṭyā bhagavān bodhisattvabhūta ekena pādena sthitvā sapta divasān stutavānekagāthayā [267/13-267/16]
T07vakobhau:9504: “na divi bhuvi vā nāsmin loke na vaiśravaṇālaye /
T07vakobhau:9505: na marubhavane divye sthāne na dikṣu vidikṣu vā //
T07vakobhau:9508: tadā kila vīryapāramitā paripūrṇā nava ca kalpāḥ pratyudāvartitāḥ / [267/18]
T07vakobhau:9510: bodheḥ pūrvasamanantaraṃ dhyānaprajñāpāramitayoḥ paripūrirvajropamasamādhau svasyāḥ saṃpadaḥ pāragamanāt pāramitāḥ / [267/21]
T07vakobhau:9514: puṇyaṃ kriyā 'tha tadvastu trayaṃ karmapathā yathā // VAkK_4.112 // [267/24]
T07vakobhau:9516: tadyathā karma ca te panthānaśca panthāna eva ca karmaṇa iti karmaṃpathā uktāḥ / [268/01-268/02]
T07vakobhau:9517: tatra dānamaye tāvat puṇyakriyāvastuni kāyavākkarma tridhā bhavati / [268/02-268/03]
T07vakobhau:9518: tatsamutthāpikā cetanā puṇyaṃ ca kriyā ca / [268/03]
T07vakobhau:9521: bhāvanāmayo maitrī puṇyaṃ ca puṇyakriyāyāśca vastu / [268/04-268/06]
T07vakobhau:9522: tatsaṃprayuktāyāścetanāyā maitrīmukhenābhisaṃskaraṇāt tatsahabhuvaścetanā śīlaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca kriyā ca / [268/06-268/07]
T07vakobhau:9523: anye tatsahabhuvaḥ puṇyameva puṇyasya vā kāraṇaṃ puṇyakriyā puṇyaprayogastasyā etāni trīṇi vastūni / [268/07]
T07vakobhau:9542: śubhena manasā dravyaṃ svaṃ dadāti yadā pumān /
T07vakobhau:9543: tat kṣaṇaṃ kuśalāḥ skandhāḥ dānamityabhidhīyate //” iti / [268/18]
T07vakobhau:9550: tatra yadavītarāgaḥ āryaḥ pṛthagjano vā vītarāgaścaitye dānaṃ dadāti tadasyātmana evārthāya / [268/23]
T07vakobhau:9552: yadāryo vītarāgaḥ parasattvebhyo dānaṃ dadāti sthāpayitvā dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ tatra dānaṃ pareṣāmarthāya / [269/01-269/02]
T07vakobhau:9556: yadavītarāgaḥ pṛthagjano vā vītarāgaḥ parasattvebhyo dadāti taddānamubhayeṣāmarthāya / [269/03-269/04]
T07vakobhau:9557: yadāryo vītarāgaścaitye dadāti sthāpayitvā dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ taddānamubhayeṣāṃ nārthāya / [269/04-269/05]
T07vakobhau:9570: ato 'sya dātustattādṛśaṃ dānaṃ dattvā yathākramaṃ catvāro viśeṣā bhavanti / [269/15-269/16]
T07vakobhau:9576: uktaṃ yathā dātā viśiṣyate tadviśeṣācca dānaviśeṣaḥ / [269/20]
T07vakobhau:9591: sparśasaṃpannaṃ dattvā sukumārāṅgāśca bhavati ṛtusukhasparśāni cāsyāṅgāni bhavanti yathā strīratnasya / [270/04]
T07vakobhau:9595: tathā hyuktaṃ bhagavatā “tiryagyonigatāya dānaṃ dattvā śataguṇo vipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ / [270/07-270/08]
T07vakobhau:9596: duḥśīlāya manuṣyabhūtāya dānaṃ dattvā sahasraguṇa” iti / [270/08]
T07vakobhau:9600: śītalikādiṣu ca dānamuktvoktame” bhiḥ saptabhiḥ auṣadhikaiḥ puṇyakriyāvastubhiḥsamanvāgatasya śrāddhasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā na labhyaṃ puṇyānāṃ pramāṇamudgrahītumi“ti / [270/12-270/13]
T07vakobhau:9602: guṇaviśeṣādyathā” śīlavate dattvā śatasahasraguṇo vipāka” ityevamādi / [270/14]
T07vakobhau:9608: tat sthāpayitvā yāni bhagavato 'nyānyaṣṭau dānānyuktāni teṣām [270/20]
T07vakobhau:9612: āsādya dānaṃ bhayadānam adānme dānaṃ dāsyati me dānaṃ dattpūrvaṃ me dānaṃ pitṛbhiśca
T07vakobhau:9613: pitāmahaiśceti dānaṃ dadāti svargārthaṃ dānaṃ kīrtyarthaṃ dānaṃ cittālaṅkārārthaṃ
T07vakobhau:9614: dānaṃ cittapariṣkārārthaṃ yiogasaṃbhārārthamuttamārthasya prāptaye dānaṃ dadāti / [270/24]
T07vakobhau:9615: tatrāsādya dānaṃ yat āsannebhya upagatebhyo dānaṃ dadātīti paurāṇāḥ / [270/25]
T07vakobhau:9616: bhayadānaṃ yadvināśābhimukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā varaṃ dadāmīti dadāti / [270/25-270/26]
T07vakobhau:9623: ebhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ pṛthagjanabhūtebhyo 'pyaprameyā phalato dakṣiṇā bhavati / [271/03-271/04]
T07vakobhau:9627: sa hi mahākalyāṇamitram avidyāndhāyāṃ prajāyāṃ prajñācakṣuṣo dātā samaviṣamasya prakāśayitā anāsravasya dharmakāyasyātinivartayitā samāsato buddhakṛtyasya kartā / [271/08]
T07vakobhau:9628: karmaṇāṃ tu gurulaghutvaṃ jñātukāmena samāsataḥ ṣaṭ kāraṇāni jñeyāni /
T07vakobhau:9637: āśayastadabhiprāya evaṃ caivaṃ ca kuryāmevaṃ caivaṃ ca na kariṣyāmīti / [271/14]
T07vakobhau:9641: tatraiva kṣetre punaradhiṣṭhānavaśāt guru saṃpadyate nānyathā / [271/16]
T07vakobhau:9644: yasya tu sarvāṇyadhimātrāṇi bhavanti tasyātyarthamadhimātraṃ guru karma veditavyam / [271/18]
T07vakobhau:9652: saṃcintya kṛtaṃ bhavati nābuddhipūrvaṃ na sahasā kṛtam / [271/22-271/23]
T07vakobhau:9656: tatra yo yāvatā gacchati tasminnasamāpte kṛtaṃ tatkarma nopacitam samāpte tūpacitam / [271/25]
T07vakobhau:9658: nirvipratisāraṃ ca tat karma bhavati niṣpratipakṣaṃ ca / [272/01]
T07vakobhau:9667: dvividhaṃ hi puṇyaṃ tyāgānvayaṃ tyāgādeva yadupapadyate paribhogānvayaṃ ca deyadharmaparibhogādyadutpadyate / [272/07]
T07vakobhau:9671: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sati pratigrahītari bhavitavyaṃ nāsatīti / [272/09]
T07vakobhau:9674: yadi hi puṇyaṃ parānugrahādeva syāt maitryādyapramāṇasamyagdṛṣṭibhāvanāyāṃ na syāt / [272/11]
T07vakobhau:9677: yathā maitryādiṣvantareṇāpi pratigrāhakaṃ parānugrahaṃ vā puṇyaṃ bhavati svacittaprabhavaṃ tathābhyatīte 'pi guṇavati tadbhaktikṛtaṃ svacittāt puṇyaṃ bhavati / [272/14-272/15]
T07vakobhau:9683: tathābhyatīte śāstari tadbhaktisamutthāṃ dānamānakriyāṃ kurvato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ jāyate / [272/19]
T07vakobhau:9685: yadi svakṣetre dānakriyāvījamiṣṭaphalaṃ bhavati tatkṣetre tarhyaniṣṭaphalaṃ bhaviṣyati / [272/21]
T07vakobhau:9687: kukṣetre 'pi phalasya bījādaviparyayo dṛṣṭo mṛdvīkābījānmṛdvīkāphalamevotpadyate madhuraṃ nimbavījānnimbameva tiktam / [272/23-272/24]
T07vakobhau:9688: evaṃ kukṣetre 'pi parahitādhyāśayapravṛttasya dānabījasyeṣṭameva phalaṃ nirvartate nāniṣṭam / [272/24-273/01]
T07vakobhau:9698: yayā ca viramyate vijñaptyā yacca tadviramaṇam avijñaptiḥ / [273/06-273/07]
T07vakobhau:9702: yadapi na prakṛtyā dauḥśīlayaṃ bhagavatā ca buddhena pratikṣiptamakālabhojanādikaṃ tasmādapi dvidhā viratiḥ śīlam / [273/10]
T07vakobhau:9717: maulaiḥ karmapathairviśuddhaṃ bhavati sāmantakairviśuddhaṃ vitarkairanupahataṃ smṛtyā 'nuparigahītaṃ nirvāṇapariṇāmitaṃ ceti / [273/19-273/20]
T07vakobhau:9738: sutra uktaṃ “catvāraḥ pudgalā brāhmaṇyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavantī“ti / [274/07-274/08]
T07vakobhau:9742: caturṇāṃ brāhmapuṇyatvaṃ kalpaṃ svargeṣu modanāt // VAkK_4.124 // [274/11]
T07vakobhau:9743: yāvatā puṇyena kalpaṃ svargeṣu modate idaṃ brāhmaṃ puṇyam / [274/11-274/12]
T07vakobhau:9746: “brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati kalpaṃ svargeṣu modata” iti / [274/14]
T07vakobhau:9752: ato mahatīṃ ta ātmanaḥ puṇyajyāniṃ kurvanti ye viparītadharmaṃ deśayanti / [274/17-274/18]
T07vakobhau:9756: puṇyabhāgīyaṃ yadiṣṭavipākaṃ mokṣabhāgīyaṃ yasminnutpanne niyataṃ parinirvāṇadharmā bhavati / [274/21-274/23]
T07vakobhau:9757: yasya saṃsārādīnavanairātmyanirvāṇaguṇadyotikāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā romaharṣāśrūpātau bhavatastasyāsti
T07vakobhau:9760: yadidaṃ loka ucyate lipimudrāgaṇanā kāvyaṃ saṃkhyeti ka eṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ / [275/02-275/03]
T07vakobhau:9762: lipimudre sagaṇanaṃ kāvyaṃ saṃkhyā yathākramam // VAkK_4.126 // [275/04]
T07vakobhau:9772: kliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sāvadyā nivṛtā hīnā iti paryāyāḥ / [275/10]
T07vakobhau:9791: tāni karmāṇyanuśayavaśādupacayaṃ gacchanti antareṇa cānuśayān bhavābhinirvarttane na samarthāni bhavanti / [277/04]
T07vakobhau:9794: kleśo hi pravartamāno daśa kṛtyāni karoti / [277/06-277/09]
T07vakobhau:9795: mūlaṃ ca dṛḍhīkaroti saṃtatimavasthāpayati kṣetramāpādayati niḥṣyandaṃ nirvartayati
T07vakobhau:9796: karmabhavamabhinirharati svasaṃbhāraṃ arigṛhṇāti ālambane saṃmohayati vijñānasroto
T07vakobhau:9797: namayati kuśalapakṣādvyutkrāmati pandhanārthaṃ ca spharati dhātvanatikramayogeneti / [277/10]
T07vakobhau:9807: ta ete ṣaḍnuśayāḥ sūtre rāgasya dvidhā bhedaṃ kṛtvā saptoktāḥ / [277/17-277/19]
T07vakobhau:9808: kāmarāgānuśayaḥ pratighānuśayo bhavarāgānuśayo mānānuśyaḥ avidyānuśayo dṛṣṭyanuśayo vicikitsānuśaya iti / [277/19-278/01]
T07vakobhau:9809: kathamidaṃ jñātavyaṃ kāmarāga evānuśayaḥ kāmarāgānuśayaḥ āhosvit kāmarāgasyānuśayaḥ kāmarāganuśayaḥ / [278/01]
T07vakobhau:9814: tasya tatkāmarāgaparyavasthānaṃ sthāmaśaḥ samyaktvasamavahataṃ sānuśayaṃ prahīyata“iti / [278/04-278/06]
T07vakobhau:9828: yasmādanuśayaiḥ kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ bhavatyapūrvaṃ kuśalaṃ notpadyate utpannācca parihīyate tasmānna viprayuktāḥ / [278/13]
T07vakobhau:9835: tadidamajñāpakaṃ yasmādyo viprayuktamanuśayamicchati sa etatsarvamanuśayakṛtaṃ necchati / [278/18]
T07vakobhau:9850: yastu kleśānāṃ bījārthamarthāntaraṃ vīprayuktamanuśayaṃ kalpayati tena smṛtibījamapyarthāntaraṃ kalpayitavyaṃ jāyate / [279/01-279/03]
T07vakobhau:9851: yattarhi sūtre kleśa evānuśaya uktaḥ ṣaṭṣaṭke “so 'sya bhavati sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśaya” iti / [279/03]
T07vakobhau:9858: ya eṣa sūtre rāgasya bhedaḥ kṛtaḥ kāmarāgo bhavarāga iti / [279/06]
T07vakobhau:9868: te ca sattvāḥ samāpattiṃ sāśrayā māsvādayanta ātmabhāvamevāsvādayanti kāmavītarāgatvāt / [279/13]
T07vakobhau:9874: ṣaṇṇāmanuśayānāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ pañcadhā kṛtvā daśa bhavanti / [279/17-279/18]
T07vakobhau:9878: kāmāvacarāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśad rūpāvacarā ekatriṃśat ārūpyāvacarā ekatriṃśat / [279/21]
T07vakobhau:9885: ya ete daśānuśayā uktā ete kāmadhātau daśāpi duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ santi / [280/04]
T07vakobhau:9887: sapta nirodhadarśanaheyāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭimantagrāhadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ ca varjayitvā / [280/05]
T07vakobhau:9901: kīdṛśā ete duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ kīdṛśā yāvad bhāvanāheyāḥ / [280/14-280/15]
T07vakobhau:9903: tā eva dvādaśa dṛṣṭayo bhavanti catasro vicikitsāḥ pañca rāgāḥ pañca pratighāḥ pañca mānāṃ pañcāvidyā ityete kāmāvacarāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadanuśayā bhavanti
T07vakobhau:9906: pañcaprakāraṃ pratighamapahāya ta eva rūpāvacarā ekatriṃśadanuśayā bhavanti / [280/21]
T07vakobhau:9912: ya ime darśanaprahātavyānuśayā uktāḥ kimete niyataṃ darśanenaiva prahīyante / [281/02]
T07vakobhau:9916: ye bhavāgrabhūmijā anvayajñānakṣāntiheyā anuśayāste darśanaheyā eva na bhāvanāheyāḥ / [281/05]
T07vakobhau:9920: śeṣāsu bhūmiṣu yathāyogaṃ dharmānvayajñānakṣāntiheyā anuśayā āryāṇāṃ darśanaheyāḥ pṛthagjanānāṃ bhāvanāheyāḥ / [281/09]
T07vakobhau:9922: sarvāsu bhūmiṣu ye 'nuśayā jñānavadhyāste ubhayeṣāṃ nityaṃ bhāvanāheyāḥ / [281/10-281/11]
T07vakobhau:9923: naiva hi bāhyakānāṃ darśanaprahātavyāḥ prahīyanta ityapare / [281/12-281/14]
T07vakobhau:9924: tathāhi mahākarmavibhāgasūtre pūrvāntakalpakānāṃ ca śāśvatavādināmekatyaśāśvatikānām ahetusamutpattikānāṃ ca vītarāgāṇāṃ ca kāmadhātvālambanānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ / [281/13-281/14]
T07vakobhau:9925: na ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ kāmadhāturālambanaṃ vītarāgatvāt / [281/14-281/15]
T07vakobhau:9926: tasmāt kāmapratisaṃyuktā eva tā aprahīṇā iti / [281/15-281/16]
T07vakobhau:9927: dṛṣṭyutpādasamakālaṃ te parihīṇā devadatta iveti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [281/17]
T07vakobhau:9928: dṛṣṭayaḥ paṇca nāmato nirdiṣṭā na tu svabhāvatastat kastāsāṃ svabhāvaḥ / [281/18-281/19]
T07vakobhau:9940: yathā gamyeta satkāyadṛṣṭiriyaṃ nātmani nātmīye veti / [282/01-282/03]
T07vakobhau:9941: yathoktaṃ “ye kecid bhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti sarve ta imāneva pañcopādānaskandhāni“ti / [282/03]
T07vakobhau:9945: sarvaiva hi viparītasvabhāvapravṛṭtā dṛṣṭirmithyādṛṣṭiḥ ekaiva tūktā / [282/05-282/06]
T07vakobhau:9956: taṃ ca hetuṃ paśyati prajāpatimanyaṃ vā / [282/10-282/11]
T07vakobhau:9957: agnijalapraveśādayaśca na hetuḥ svargasya tāṃśca hetuṃ paśyati / [282/11-282/12]
T07vakobhau:9958: śīlavratamātrakaṃ sāṃkhyayogajñānādayaśca na mārgo mokṣāsya tāṃśca mārgaṃ paśyati / [282/12-282/13]
T07vakobhau:9959: atrāpi kilādiśabdalopaḥ kṛta ityetāstāḥ pañca dṛṣṭayo veditavyāḥ / [282/13]
T07vakobhau:9962: yo hi kaścidīśvaraḥ prajāpatimanyaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ paśyati sa tannityamekaṃ cātmānaṃ kartāramabhiniviśya / [282/15]
T07vakobhau:9966: duḥkhadarśanādeva hi teṣu tau nityātmagrāhau prahīyete / [282/18-282/19]
T07vakobhau:9968: yastarhi jalāgnipraveśādibhiḥ svargopapattiṃ paśyati śīlavṛtena vā śuddhiṃ so 'pi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavya eva / [282/20]
T07vakobhau:9970: “ye caivaṃ dṛṣṭaya evaṃvādino yadayaṃ puruṣapudgalo gośīlaṃ samādāya vartate mṛgaśīlaṃ kukkuraśīlaṃ,
T07vakobhau:9971: sa tena śudhyati mucyate sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnoti / [282/22-282/23]
T07vakobhau:9972: akāraṇaṃ kāraṇataḥ pratyeti śīlavrataparāmarśo duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaḥ” iti vistaraḥ / [282/23-282/24]
T07vakobhau:9979: yasya ca mārgālambanā mithyādṛṣṭirvicikitsā vā 'sti sa nāsti mokṣamārga iti paśyan vicikitsan vā kathaṃ tayā śuddhiṃ pratyeṣyati / [283/01]
T07vakobhau:9980: athānyaṃ mokṣamārgaṃ parāmṛśya eṣa mokṣamārgo nāstītyāha / [283/01-283/02]
T07vakobhau:9981: so 'pi tenaivānyena śuddhiṃ pratyeti na tayā mithyādṛṣṭyeti / [283/02-283/03]
T07vakobhau:9983: yaścāpi samudayanirodhadarśanaprahātavyālambanayā mithyādṛṣṭyā śuddhiṃ pratyeti sa kasmānna taddarśanaheyaḥ / [283/04]
T07vakobhau:10001: ātmānameva tatra vaśinaṃ paśyennātmīyaṃ paśyatītyātmadṛṣṭirevāsau dvimukhī athāhamityetasmāt mameti dṛṣṭyantaraṃ syāt / [283/13]
T07vakobhau:10011: anye kleśā na santīrakā ato na viparyāsāḥ / [283/21-283/22]
T07vakobhau:10012: yattarhi sūtre ukta “manitye nityamiti saṃjñāviparyāsaḥ cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsa” iti / [283/22]
T07vakobhau:10018: loke hi viparyastasaṃjño viparyastacitta iti prasiddhaṃ na punarviparyastavedana iti / [284/04-284/05]
T07vakobhau:10019: ta ete viparyāsāḥ sarve 'pi srota āpannasya prahīṇā bhavanti / [284/05]
T07vakobhau:10025: duḥkhe ca saṃjñā cittaviparyāsāvaśucau ceti nikāyāntarīyāḥ / [284/08-284/09]
T07vakobhau:10026: itarathā hi kathamantareṇa sukhaśucisaṃjñāmavītarāgasyāryasya kāmarāgaḥ saṃbhavediti / [284/09]
T07vakobhau:10030: na hi striyāmātmani ca vinā sattvasaṃjñāyā kāmarāgo yukta iti / [284/12-284/13]
T07vakobhau:10031: sūtre 'pi coktaṃ “yataśca śrutavānāryaśrāvaka idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / [284/13-284/14]
T07vakobhau:10032: yāvat tasya tasmin samaye yo 'nitye nityamiti saṃjñāviparyāsaḥ cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭivīparyāsaḥ sa prahīyata” iti vistaraḥ / [284/14-284/16]
T07vakobhau:10033: tasmād dṛṣṭisamutye eva saṃjñācitte viparyāsau nānye tatkāla bhrāntimātratvādalātacakracitra yakṣabhrāntivat / [284/16]
T07vakobhau:10037: tasmāt sarva evāṣṭau saṃjñācittaviparyāsāḥ śaikṣasyāprahīṇā ityapare / [284/19-284/20]
T07vakobhau:10040: atha kiṃ dṛṣṭyanuśayasya eva bhedo nānyasya /
T07vakobhau:10058: asti me śreyānasti me sadṛśo 'sti me hīnaḥ / [285/07]
T07vakobhau:10059: nāsti me śreyānnāsti me sadṛśo nāsti me hīna” iti / [285/07-285/08]
T07vakobhau:10068: nāsti me hīna ityatra kimunnati sthānam / [285/14]
T07vakobhau:10069: asti sadṛśo yo 'bhiprete vare sattvarāśau nihīnamapyātmānaṃ bahu manyate / [285/15]
T07vakobhau:10071: prākaraṇaṃ tu nirdeśaṃ parigṛhya śreyānasmītyekeṣu māno 'pi syādati māno 'pi mānātimāno 'pi hīnasamaviśiṣṭāpekṣayā / [285/18]
T07vakobhau:10075: etaduktaṃ bhavati sarve darśanabhāvanāprahātavyā iti yadbhāvanāheyamaprahīṇaṃ kimavaśyaṃ tadāryāṇāṃ samudācarati / [285/21]
T07vakobhau:10078: yena kleśaparyavasthānena saṃcintya prāṇivadhaṃ kuryādyāvanmṛṣāvādaṃ tad bhāvanāheyaṃ bhāvanāheyadharmālambanatvāt / [285/25]
T07vakobhau:10103: vimatiḥ saha tābhiśca yā 'vidyā 'veṇikī ca yā // VAkK_5.12 // [286/20-286/21]
T07vakobhau:10104: duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyā dṛṣṭayo vicikitsā ca tābhiśca saṃprayuktā avidyā āveṇikī ca duḥkhasamudayaprahātavye cāvidyā / [286/20-287/01]
T07vakobhau:10106: sapta dṛṣṭayo dve vicikitse dve avidye sakalasvadhātvālambanatvāt / [287/02]
T07vakobhau:10109: atha yugapat kaḥ sakalena kāmadhātunā śuddhiṃ pratyetyakāraṇaṃ vā kāraṇataḥ / [287/04]
T07vakobhau:10112: evamapi yatrātmadṛṣṭistatrātmatṛṣṇā yatrāgraśuddhidṛṣṭī tatra tatprārthanā tena ca māna iti tṛṣṇāmānayorapi sarvatragatvaṃ prāpnoti / [287/06-287/07]
T07vakobhau:10123: kāmapratisaṃyuktā ārūpyapratisaṃyuktālambanāḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktā rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktālambanā” iti vacanāt / [287/15-287/17]
T07vakobhau:10124: yadā kāmadhātau sthito brahmaṇi sattvadṛṣṭiṃ nityadṛṣṭiṃ cojtpādayati tadā kathaṃ satkāyānta grāhadṛṣṭī visabhāgadhātvālambane na bhavataḥ /
T07vakobhau:10128: kuto nu khalvetadanyā tadālambanā dṛṣṭireṣā na dṛṣṭiriti siddhāntastu pramāṇayitayaḥ / [287/21]
T07vakobhau:10132: sarvatragairanuśayaiḥ sahabhuvo ye 'pyanye dharmāste 'pi sarvatragāḥ prāptayastu naivam / [287/23-288/01]
T07vakobhau:10134: ata eva syuḥ sarvatragānuśayā na sarvatrahetunā heturiti catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate / [288/02]
T07vakobhau:10141: nirodhadarśanaprahātavyāstrayo 'nuśayā mithyādṛṣṭirvicikitsā 'vidyā ca tābhyāṃ saṃprayuktā '; 'veṇikī ca / [288/08]
T07vakobhau:10148: nirodhālambanānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādīnāṃ svabhūminirodha evālambanaṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ kāmadhātoreva yāvat bhavāgrabhūmikānāṃ bhavāgrasyaiva / [288/13-288/14]
T07vakobhau:10149: mārgālambanānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ ṣaḍbhūmiko dharmajñānapakṣo mārgaḥ sarva evālambanam / [288/14-288/15]
T07vakobhau:10152: yadyapi dharmajñānānvayajñāne apyanyonyahetuke natvanvayajñānaṃ kāmadhātupratipakṣa iti / [288/17-288/18]
T07vakobhau:10159: varjanīyo hi rāgaḥ yadi cānāsravālambanaḥ syānna varjanīyaḥ syātkuśaladharmacchandavat / [289/03]
T07vakobhau:10163: na māno na parāmarśau śāntaśuddhayagrabhāvataḥ // VAkK_5.16 // [289/06]
T07vakobhau:10172: ye sarvatragā anuśayāste sakalāṃ pañcaprakārāmapi svāṃ bhūmimālambanato 'nuśerate / [289/13]
T07vakobhau:10173: asarvatragāstu svasyāṃ bhūmau svameva nikāyamālambanato 'nuśerate nānyam / [289/14]
T07vakobhau:10183: yaddhi vastvātmadṛṣṭitṛṣṇābhyāṃ svīkṛtaṃ bhavati tatrānye 'pyanuśayā anugamayitumutsahante / [289/21]
T07vakobhau:10188: kuśalo 'sau dharmmacchandaḥ vipakṣabhūtau ca nirvāṇamārgau tadālambanānāṃ kleśānāmūrdhvā ca bhūmiradharāṇām / [290/01]
T07vakobhau:10195: yena yaḥ saṃprayuktastu sa tasmin saṃprayogataḥ // VAkK_5.18 // [290/05]
T07vakobhau:10200: te cānuśayāḥ saṃprayogato 'nuśayīrannālambanataḥ na syurvisabhāgabhūmisarvatragā anuśayāḥ / [290/09]
T07vakobhau:10212: ahaṃ pretya sukhī bhaviṣyāmīti dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati / [290/17]
T07vakobhau:10214: ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā “etadagraṃ bāhyakānāṃ dṛṣṭigatānāṃ yaduta no ca syāṃ no ca me syāt na bhaviṣyāmi na me bhaviṣyatī“ti / [290/19]
T07vakobhau:10233: setyavyākṛtatāṃ darśayati yā kācidavyākṛtā tṛṣṇā avidyā prajñā cāntato vipākajā api sarvā 'sāvavyākṛtamūlamiti kāśmīrāḥ / [291/15]
T07vakobhau:10238: vividhasmṛtimūlāni hi sthirāṇyadhovṛttīni ca loke dṛṣṭānnīti / [292/01]
T07vakobhau:10249: yāni sūtre caturdaśāvyākṛtavastūni kiṃ tāni avyākṛtatvāt /
T07vakobhau:10259: kiṃ sarve janiṣyanta iti vibhajya vyākarttavyaṃ saṃkleśā janiṣyante na niḥkleśā iti / [292/16-292/17]
T07vakobhau:10260: kiṃ manuṣyo viśiṣṭo hīna iti paripṛcchayya vyākattevyam / [292/17]
T07vakobhau:10272: yastu pṛcchedye mariṣyanti kiṃ te janiṣyanta ityetadvibhajyavyākaraṇīyaṃ syāt / [292/24-293/01]
T07vakobhau:10273: manuṣyeṣu cobhayamasti hīnatvaṃ viśiṣṭatvaṃ cāpekṣikamityubhayamekāṃśena vyākarttavyam / [293/01-293/02]
T07vakobhau:10274: tadyathā vijñānaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ceti ekāntena tu pṛcchato naikāntavyākaraṇāt vibhajyavyākaraṇaṃ yujyate / [293/02-293/03]
T07vakobhau:10280: “tathāgato bhagavānarhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svākhyāto 'sya dharmaḥ supratipannaḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ
T07vakobhau:10282: vibhajjavyākaraṇaṃ nāma yadi kaścid brūyāddharmān vadeti sa vaktavyo bahavo dharmā atītā anāgatāḥ pratyutpannāḥ katamān vadāmīti / [293/09]
T07vakobhau:10284: sa vyaktavyo 'tītā api bahavo rūpaṃ yāvadvijñānamiti / [293/10]
T07vakobhau:10286: sa vaktavyo rūpamapi trividhaṃ kuśalamakuśalamavyākṛtaṃ ca / [293/11]
T07vakobhau:10295: na tu vibhaktavyā yāvattūṣṇim vā tiṣṭhati svayaṃ vā vyākarotīti / [293/16-293/17]
T07vakobhau:10296: yadā tau na kiñcit pṛcchataḥ kevalamadhyeṣayataḥ tayośca na kiñcit vyākriyate kevalaṃ paripraśnyete tat kathamanayoḥ praśno bhavati kathaṃ vā vyākaraṇam / [293/18]
T07vakobhau:10297: yo hhi panthānaṃ brūhītyāha kim tena panthā na pṛṣṭo bhavati / [293/18-293/19]
T07vakobhau:10298: paripṛcchayaiva vyākaraṇāt kathaṃ na paripṛcchāvyākaraṇaṃ bhavati / [293/19-293/20]
T07vakobhau:10299: sthāpanīyastu yathā antavān loko 'nantavānityevamādi sūtrāntādeva tu praśnavyākaraṇānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam / [293/20-293/21]
T07vakobhau:10306: sarve saṃskārā anityā ityayaṃ bhikṣava ekāṃśavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ / [293/24]
T07vakobhau:10308: saṃcetanīyaṃ karma kṛtvā kiṃ prativedayata ityayam vibhajyavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ / [293/25-293/26]
T07vakobhau:10310: saṃjñāsu puruṣasyātmā utāho 'nyāsaṃjñā anya ātmeti pṛṣṭena satā paripraṣṭavyaḥ katamaṃ punarāyuṣmānātmānaṃ pratyeti / [293/27-293/28]
T07vakobhau:10311: sa cedevaṃ vadedau dārikaṃ khalvahayāyuṣmannātmānaṃ pratyemi / [293/28-293/29]
T07vakobhau:10312: evaṃ satyanyā saṃjñā anya ātmetyevaṃ vacanīyaḥ / [293/29]
T07vakobhau:10321: bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇānna bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt yāvadanyo jīvo 'nyaccharīramityayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sthāpanīyaḥ praśna” iti /
T07vakobhau:10322: yasya pudgalasya yo 'nuśayo yasminnālambane 'nuśete sa tena tasmin saṃprayuktaḥ / [294/05-294/06]
T07vakobhau:10323: idaṃ tu vaktavyamatīte na kasmin yāvat pratyupanne na kasminniti / [294/07]
T07vakobhau:10330: atītāḥ pratyutpannāśca rāgapratighamānā yasmin vastunyutpannā na ca prahīṇāstasmin vastuni taiḥ saṃyuktaḥ / [294/12]
T07vakobhau:10354: kathaṃ tatra tena vā saṃyukto bhavati visaṃyukto vā / [295/04-295/05]
T07vakobhau:10355: na saṃskārāṇāṃ śāśvatatvaṃ pratijñāyate vaibhāṣikaiḥ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇayogāt / [295/05-295/06]
T07vakobhau:10360: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā '“tītaṃ ced bhikṣavo rūpaṃ nābhaviṣyanna śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'tīte rūpe 'napekṣo 'bhaviṣyat / [295/11-295/12]
T07vakobhau:10362: anāgataṃ cedrūpaṃ nābhaviṣyat na śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'nāgataṃ rūpaṃ nābhyanandiṣyat / [295/13-295/14]
T07vakobhau:10367: cakṣū rūpāṇi yāvat mano dharmā iti / [295/17]
T07vakobhau:10368: asati vā 'tītānāgate tadālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ dvayaṃ pratītya na syāt / [295/18]
T07vakobhau:10372: yadi cātītānāgataṃ na syādasadālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ syāt / [295/21]
T07vakobhau:10375: yadi cātītaṃ na syāt śubhāśubhasya karmaṇaḥ phalamāyatyāṃ kathaṃ syāt / [295/23-296/01]
T07vakobhau:10381: ye he sarvamastīti vadanti atītamanāmataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca te sarvāstivādāḥ / [296/04-296/06]
T07vakobhau:10382: ye tu kecidasti yat pratyutpannamadattaphalaṃ cātītaṃ karma kiñcinnāsti yaddattaphalamatītamanāgataṃ ceti vibhajya vadanti te vibhajyavādinaḥ
T07vakobhau:10390: yathā suvarṇabhājanasya bhittvā 'nyathā kriyamāṇasya saṃsthānānyathātvaṃ bhavati na varṇānyathātvam / [296/12-296/13]
T07vakobhau:10391: yathā ca kṣīraṃ dadhitvena pariṇamadrasavīryavipākān parityajati na varṇam / [296/13-296/14]
T07vakobhau:10393: evaṃ pratyutpannādatītamadhvānaṃ gacchan pratyutpannabhāvaṃ jahāti na dravyabhāvamiti / [296/16]
T07vakobhau:10399: tadyathā puruṣa ekasyāṃ striyāṃ raktaḥ śeṣāsvavirakta iti / [296/20]
T07vakobhau:10402: dharmo 'dhvasu pravartamāno 'vasthāmavasthāṃ prāpyānyo 'nyo nidiśyate avasthāntarato na dravyāntarataḥ / [296/21-296/23]
T07vakobhau:10403: yathaikā vartikā ekāṅke nikṣiptā ekamityucyate śatāṅke śataṃ sahasrāṅke sahasramiti / [297/01]
T07vakobhau:10406: dharmo 'dhvasu pravartamānaḥ pūrvāparamapekṣyānyo 'nya ucyate avasthāntarato na dravyāntarataḥ / [297/02-297/03]
T07vakobhau:10407: yathaikā strī mātā vocyate duhitā veti / [297/03]
T07vakobhau:10409: eṣāṃ tu prathamaḥ pariṇāmavāditvāt sāṃkhyapakṣe nikṣeptavyaḥ / [297/04-297/05]
T07vakobhau:10412: puruṣasya tu kasyāñcit striyāṃ rāgaḥ samudācarati kasyāñcit kevalaṃ samanvāgama iti kimatra sāmyam / [297/06-297/07]
T07vakobhau:10414: atīte 'dhvani pūrvapaścimau kṣaṇāvatītānāgatau madhyamaḥ kṣaṇaḥ pratyutpanna iti / [297/08]
T07vakobhau:10421: yadā sa dharmaḥ kāritraṃ na karoti tadā 'nāgataḥ /
T07vakobhau:10429: yadyevaṃ pratyutpannasya tatsabhāgasya cakṣuṣaḥ kiṃ kāritram / [297/16]
T07vakobhau:10431: atītānāmapi tarhi sabhāgahetvādīnāṃ phaladānāt kāritraprasaṅgo 'rdhakāritrasya veti lakṣaṇasaṃkaraḥ / [297/18]
T07vakobhau:10442: atha tannaivātītaṃ nāpyanāgataṃ na pratyutpannamasti ca / [298/02]
T07vakobhau:10444: ato na vaktavyaṃ yadā karitraṃ na karoti dharmastadā 'nāgata iti / [298/04]
T07vakobhau:10451: yadi dharma eva kāritraṃ kasmātsa eva dharmastenaivātmanā vidyamānaḥ kadācidatīta ityucyate kadācidanāgata ityadhvanāṃ vyavasthā na sidhyati
T07vakobhau:10454: yo jāto bhavati na ca vinaṣṭaḥ sa varttamānaḥ / [298/11]
T07vakobhau:10457: yadi yathā varttamānaṃ dravyato 'sti tathā 'tītamanāgataṃ cāsti / [298/12]
T07vakobhau:10461: tenaiva svabhāvena sato dharmasya kathamidaṃ sidhyatyajāta iti yo vinaṣṭaḥ iti veti / [298/16]
T07vakobhau:10463: kiṃ ca paścānnāsti yasyābhāvā dvinaṣṭa ityucyate / [298/17]
T07vakobhau:10465: yadyabhutvā bhavatīti neṣyate bhūtvā ca punarna bhavatīti / [298/18-298/19]
T07vakobhau:10468: nityaṃ ca nāmāsti sa dharmo na ca nitya ityapūrvaiṣā vāco yuktiḥ / [298/20]
T07vakobhau:10476: evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'stītyucyate na tu punardravyataḥ / [299/03]
T07vakobhau:10483: tasmāt bhūtapūrvasya ca hetorbhāvinaśca phalasya bhūtapūratāṃ bhāvitāṃ ca jñāpayituṃ hetuphalāpavādadṛṣṭipratiṣedhārthamuktaṃ bhagavatā “astyatītamastyanāgatami“ti
T07vakobhau:10485: yathā 'sti dīpasya prāgabhāvo 'sti paścādabhāva iti vaktāro bhavanti yathā cāsti niruddhaḥ sa dīpo na tu mayā nirodhita iti / [299/09]
T07vakobhau:10488: yattarhi laguḍaśikhīyakānparivrājakānadhikṛṭyoktaṃ bhagavatā “yatkarmābhyatītaṃ kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ tadastī“ti / [299/11-299/12]
T07vakobhau:10489: kiṃ te tasya tasya karmaṇo bhūtapūrvatvaṃ necchanti sma / [299/12-299/13]
T07vakobhau:10490: tatra punastadāhitaṃ tasyāṃ saṃtatau phaladānasāmarthyaṃ saṃdhāyoktam / [299/13]
T07vakobhau:10491: anyathā hi svena bhāvena vidyamānamatītaṃ na sidhyet / [299/13-299/15]
T07vakobhau:10492: itthaṃ caitadevaṃ yat paramārthaśūnyatayāmuktaṃ bhagavatā “cakṣurutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchati nirudhyamānaṃ na kvacitsaṃnicayaṃ gacchati
T07vakobhau:10493: iti hi bhikṣavaścakṣurabhūtvā bhavati bhūtvā ca pratigacchatī“ti [299/16-299/17]
T07vakobhau:10494: yadi cānāgataṃ cakṣuḥ syānnoktaṃ syād bhūtvā na bhavatīti / [299/17]
T07vakobhau:10499: yadapyuktaṃ “dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpādāditi idaṃ tāvadiha saṃpradhāryam / [299/20-299/21]
T07vakobhau:10500: yanmanaḥ pratītya dharmaścotpadyate manovijñānaṃ kiṃ tasya yathā manojanakaḥ pratyaya evaṃ dharmā āhosvidālambanamātraṃ dharmā iti / [299/21-299/22]
T07vakobhau:10501: yadi tāvat janakaḥ pratyayo dharmāḥ kathaṃ yadanāgataṃ kalpasahasreṇa bhaviṣyati vā na vā tadidānīṃ vijñānaṃ janayiṣyati / [299/23]
T07vakobhau:10507: yadā tadālambanaṃ tathāsti kathaṃ tadālambanam abhūt bhaviṣyati ceti / [299/25-299/26]
T07vakobhau:10508: na hi kaścidatītaṃ rūpaṃ vedanāṃ vā smarannastīti paśyati / [299/26]
T07vakobhau:10511: yathā khalvapi varttamānaṃ rūpamanubhūtaṃ tathā tadatītaṃ smaryate / [299/27-299/28]
T07vakobhau:10512: yathā cānāgataṃ varttamānaṃ bhaviṣyati tathā buddhyā gṛhyate / [299/28]
T07vakobhau:10519: yadi ca tattadeva rūpaṃ kevalaṃ paramāṇuśo vibhaktam / [300/01-300/02]
T07vakobhau:10522: na tu kiñcidutpadyate nāpi nirudhyata ityājīvikavāda ālambito bhavati / [300/04-300/05]
T07vakobhau:10523: sūtraṃ cāpaviddhaṃ bhavati “cakṣurutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchatī“ti vistaraḥ / [300/05]
T07vakobhau:10526: yadi ca te tathaiva santi nityāḥ prāpnuvanti / [300/06-300/07]
T07vakobhau:10532: evaṃ tarhi nāma eva nāstīti pratīyeta / [300/09-300/10]
T07vakobhau:10535: evaṃ tarhi yaḥ śabdābhāvaṃ prārthayate tasya śabda eva kartavyaḥ syāt / [300/11]
T07vakobhau:10542: yattarhi bodhisattvenoktam “yattat loke nāstitadahaṃ jñāsyāmi vā drakṣyāmi vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata” iti / [300/15-300/16]
T07vakobhau:10545: itarathā hi sarvabuddhīnāṃ sadālambanatve kuto 'sya vimarśaḥ syāt ko vā viśeṣaḥ / [300/18]
T07vakobhau:10547: yadanyatra bhagavatoktam “etat bhikṣurmama śrāvako yāvatsa mayā kalpamavoditaḥ sāyaṃ viśeṣāya paraiṣyati / [300/19-300/20]
T07vakobhau:10549: sacca sato jñāsyati asaccāsataḥ sottarañca sottarataḥ anuttaraṃ cānurattarata” iti / [300/21]
T07vakobhau:10553: naiva hi sautrāntikā atītāt karmaṇaḥ phalotpatti varṇayanti / [300/23]
T07vakobhau:10556: yasya tvatītānāgataṃ dravyato 'sti tasya phalaṃ nityamevāstīti kiṃ tatra karmaṇaḥ sāmarthyam / [300/25]
T07vakobhau:10580: yathā tu tadasti tathoktaṃ athāsatyatītātānāgate kathaṃ tena tasminvā saṃyukto bhavati / [301/10-301/11]
T07vakobhau:10581: tajjataddhetvanuśayabhāvāt kleśena tadālambane kleśānuśayabhāvādvastuni saṃyukto bhavati / [301/11]
T07vakobhau:10597: yatra vā visaṃ yuktaḥ prahīṇaṃ tasya tadvastviti / [301/20-301/21]
T07vakobhau:10599: syātu prahīṇaṃ na ca tatra visaṃyuktastadyathā [301/22-301/23]
T07vakobhau:10601: prāk prahīṇe prakāre ca śeṣaistadviṣayairmalaiḥ // VAkK_5.28 // [301/24-302/01]
T07vakobhau:10602: duḥkhajñāne samutpanne samudayajñāne 'nutpanne duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo nikāyaḥ prahīṇo bhavati / [302/01]
T07vakobhau:10603: tasmin prahīṇe tadālambanaiḥ samudayadarśanaprahātavyaiḥ sarvatragaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ / [302/02-302/03]
T07vakobhau:10604: bhāvanāprahātavye 'pi nikāye navānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ yaḥ prakāraḥ prāk prahīṇastasmin prahīṇe 'pi śeṣaistadālambanaiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃyukto veditavyaḥ
T07vakobhau:10605: kasminvastuni katyanuśayā anuśerata iti etatpratipadamabhidhīyamānaṃ bahutaraṃ vaktavyaṃ jāyate / [302/05]
T07vakobhau:10607: kathamalpenālpena yatnena mahato mahataḥ praśnaughān pratipādyemahīti / [302/06-302/07]
T07vakobhau:10608: samāsata ime ṣoḍaśa dharmāḥ kāmarūpārupyāvacarāḥ pañcaprakārāḥ anāsravāśca / [302/07]
T07vakobhau:10610: tatra katamo dharmaḥ kasya cittasyālambanamiti jñātvā amuṣminniyanto 'nuśayā anuśerata ityetadabhyūhitavyam / [302/09]
T07vakobhau:10617: kāmāvacarāstāvad duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśca dharmāḥ pañcānāṃ cittānāmālambanam / [302/14-302/15]
T07vakobhau:10618: svadhātukānāṃ trayāṇāṃ teṣāmeva ūrdhvadhātukasyaikasya bhāvanāheyasyaiva anāsravasya ceti / [302/16]
T07vakobhau:10620: rūpāvacarāsta eva triprakārā dharmā aṣṭānāṃ cittānāmālambanam / [302/17-302/18]
T07vakobhau:10626: ārūpyāvacarāsta eva triprakārā dharmā daśānāṃ cittānāmālambanam / [302/21-302/22]
T07vakobhau:10634: kāmāvacarā hi nirodhadarśanaheyā dharmāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāmālambanam / [303/03-303/04]
T07vakobhau:10639: nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyāstasyaiva nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyasyādhikasya cittasyālambanamiti navānāmekādaśānāṃ ca cittānāmālambanaṃ bhavanti
T07vakobhau:10648: evameṣāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ cittānāṃ ṣoḍaśadharmālambanavyavasthāṃ viditvā kathamanuśayakāryāṃ yojayitavyam / [303/17]
T07vakobhau:10650: sukhendriyālambane vijñāne katyanuśayāḥ anuśerata iti praśna āgate vicārayitavyam / [303/19-303/20]
T07vakobhau:10651: sukhendriyaṃ saptavidhaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ ca pañcaprakāramanāsravaṃ ceti / [303/20-303/21]
T07vakobhau:10656: tatra yathāsaṃbhavaṃ kāmāvacarāścatvāro nikāyā rūpāvacarāśca saṃskṛtālambanā ārūpyāvacarau ca dvau nikāyau sarvatragāścānuśayā anuśerata iti jñātavyam / [303/25-303/26]
T07vakobhau:10658: tat punaḥ sukhendriyālambanālambanaṃ dvādaśavidhaṃ vijñānaṃ katamasya vijñānasyālambanam / [304/01-304/02]
T07vakobhau:10659: tasyaiva dvādaśavidhāsyārūpyāvacarasya ca bhūyo dviprakārasya duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyasya / [304/02-304/05]
T07vakobhau:10660: idaṃ caturdaśavidhaṃ sukhendriyālambanālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ tatrārūpyāvacarau dvau duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyau
T07vakobhau:10661: vardhayitvā kāmāvacarā ārūpyāvacarāścatvāro nikāyā rūpāvacarāḥ saṃskṛtālambanā anuśayā
T07vakobhau:10701: apare svadṛṣṭāvevānyatra gṛhīte tyaktāyāṃ dveṣamicchanti darśanaheyānāṃ rāgādīnāṃ svāsāntānikadṛṣṭyālambanatvāt / [305/14]
T07vakobhau:10707: tadyathā rāgānuśayo 'prahīṇo bhavatyaparijñātaḥ kāmarāgaparyavasthānīyāśca dharmā ābhāsagatā bhavanti tatra cāyoniśo manaskāra evaṃ kāmarāga utpadyate / [305/20-305/21]
T07vakobhau:10709: evamanyo 'pi kleśa utpadyata iti veditavyo yaḥ [305/22]
T07vakobhau:10714: eta evānuśayāḥ sūtre bhagavatā traya āsravā uktāḥ kāmasravo bhavāsravo 'vidyāsrava iti / [306/03-306/04]
T07vakobhau:10721: avidyāṃ varjayitvā 'nye kāmāvacarāḥ kleśāḥ saha paryavasthānaiḥ kāmāsravo veditavya ekacatvāriṃśaddravyāṇi / [306/09-306/10]
T07vakobhau:10728: nanu ca tatrāpyasti paryavasthānadvayaṃ styānamauddhatyaṃ ca / [306/15]
T07vakobhau:10734: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ rūpārūpyāvacarā anuśayāḥ samasyaiko bhavāgra uktaḥ / [306/19]
T07vakobhau:10737: te hyūbhaye 'pyavyākṛtā antarmukhapravṛttāḥ samāhitabhūmikāśceti trividhena sādhamyerṇaikatāḥ / [306/22-306/23]
T07vakobhau:10738: yenaiva ca kāraṇena bhavarāga uktastenaiva bhavāsravaḥ ityavidyedānīṃ traidhātukyavidyāsrava iti siddham / [306/23]
T07vakobhau:10746: evaṃ bhavāsrava eva bhavaugho bhavayogaścānyatra dṛṣṭibhyaḥ / [307/05]
T07vakobhau:10750: na ca kila kevalā dṛṣṭya āsyānukūlāḥ paṭutvāt / [307/08]
T07vakobhau:10752: miśrīkṛtya sthāpitā iti tadevaṃ kāmaugha ekānnatriṃśaddravyāṇi / [307/09-307/10]
T07vakobhau:10768: gṛhiṇo 'pyanena vipralabdhā anaśanādibhiḥ svargamārgasaṃjñayā pravrajitā apīṣṭaviṣayaparivarjanena śuddhipratyāgamanāditi / [307/21-307/22]
T07vakobhau:10771: avidyā tu grāhikā neti miśritā // VAkK_5.38 // [308/01]
T07vakobhau:10772: asaṃprakhyānalakṣaṇatayā 'paṭutvādavidyā na grāhikā bhavatyataḥ kila miśritā / [308/01-308/02]
T07vakobhau:10774: vistareṇa yāvadyo 'sya bhavati kāmeṣu kāmarāgaḥ kāmacchandaḥ kāmasnehaḥ kāmaprema
T07vakobhau:10775: kāmecchā kāmamūrcchā kāmagṛddhaḥ kāmaparigarddhaḥ kāmanandī kāmaniyantiḥ kāmādhyavasānaṃ
T07vakobhau:10779: cchandarāgaścopādānamuktaṃ sutrāntareṣvato vijñāyate kāma hyupādānamapi kāmādiṣu cchandarāga iti / [308/07]
T07vakobhau:10791: āsayanti saṃsāre āsravanti bhavāgrādyāvadavīciṃ ṣaṅbhirāyatanavraṇair ityāsravāḥ / [308/17]
T07vakobhau:10811: ata evocyate syāt dṣṭisaṃprayukteṣu dharmeṣvanunayasaṃyojanena saṃyukto na dṛṣṭisaṃyojanena na ca tatra dṛṣṭyanuśayo nānuśayīta / [309/06-309/07]
T07vakobhau:10812: āha syāt samudayajñāne utpanne nirodhajñāne 'nutpanne nirodhamārgadarśānaprahātavyeṣu dṛṣṭiśīlavrataparāmarśasaṃprayukteṣu dharmeṣu / [309/08]
T07vakobhau:10817: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ saṃyojaneṣu tisro dṛṣṭayo dṛṣṭisaṃprayojanaṃ pṛthaguktaṃ dve punardṛṣṭī parāmarśāsaṃyojanaṃ pṛthak / [309/14]
T07vakobhau:10821: ataḥ kila dravya sāmānyādete saṃyojanāntaram kṛte / [309/16-309/17]
T07vakobhau:10822: ete ca dve parāmarśasvabhāvena śeṣāiti parāmarśanasāmānyādapyete pṛthagvihite grāhyagrāhakabhedāt / [309/18-309/19]
T07vakobhau:10823: atha kasmādīṣryāmātsarye saṃyojane pṛthaksaṃyojanadvayamuktaṃ nānyat paryavasthānam / [309/20-309/21]
T07vakobhau:10832: tadyathā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo vicikitsā kāmacchando vyāpāda iti / [310/03]
T07vakobhau:10835: avaro hi bhāgaḥ kāmadhāturetāni ca tasyānuguṇāni / [310/04]
T07vakobhau:10841: tribhiḥ sattvāvaratāṃ nātikrāmati pṛthagjanatvaṃ dvābhyāṃ dhātvavaratāṃ kāmadhātum / [310/09-310/10]
T07vakobhau:10843: yadā srota āpannasya paryādāya trisaṃyojanaprahāṇāt ṣaṭkleśāḥ prahīṇāḥ kimarthaṃ tisro dṛṣṭīrapahāya trayamevāha satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ vicikitsāṃ ca / [310/12]
T07vakobhau:10861: eṣāṃ mokṣagamanāntarāyāṇāṃ prahāṇaṃ dyotayan bhagavān kleśatrayasyaiva prahāṇaṃ deśitavān / [311/06]
T07vakobhau:10870: tadyathā rūparāga ārūpyarāga auddhatyaṃ māno 'vidyā ca / [311/13]
T07vakobhau:10875: rāgo bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ dveṣo bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ moho bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ / [311/15]
T07vakobhau:10885: tatra ye yāvat kleśā upakleśā api te / [312/04-312/05]
T07vakobhau:10889: ye 'pyanye kleśebhyaḥ kliṣṭā dharmāḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītāścaitasikāsta upakleśāste punarye kṣudravastuke paṭhitāḥ / [312/09-312/10]
T07vakobhau:10905: kaukṛtyaṃ ca vyāpāda vihiṃsāvarjitaḥ sattvāsattvayorāghātaḥ krodhaḥ / [312/20]
T07vakobhau:10918: pratighasamutthe ityete ca daśa kleśaniḥṣyandā upakleśāḥ / [313/09]
T07vakobhau:10924: cittakauṭilyaṃ śāṭhyaṃ yena yathābhūtaṃ nāviṣkaroti vikṣipatya parisphuṭaṃ vā pratipadyate / [313/14]
T07vakobhau:10926: sāvadyavastudṛḍhagrāhitā pradāśo yena nyāyasaṃjñaptiṃ na gṛhṇāti / [313/15]
T07vakobhau:10928: viheṭhnaṃ vihiṃsā yena prahārapāruṣyādibhiḥ parān viheṭhyate / [313/16-313/17]
T07vakobhau:10938: ete pañca dharmā dvividhā darśanabhāvanāprahātavyā ubhayaprakārakleśasaṃprayogāt / [314/06-314/07]
T07vakobhau:10957: etau dvau kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne /
T07vakobhau:10960: sa hi tatra mahābrahmā vitathātmasaṃdarśanatayā āyuṣmantamaśvajitaṃ vañcayituṃ pravṛttaḥ / [315/06]
T07vakobhau:10970: darśanaprahātavyāḥ sarve manobhūmikāḥ saha mānasiddhābhyāṃ bhāvanāheyābhyāmapi / [315/15]
T07vakobhau:10973: ye ca kecidupakleśāḥ svatantrāste bhāvanāheyā api santo manobhūmikā eva draṣṭavyāḥ / [315/19]
T07vakobhau:10980: yānīmāni sukhādīni pañcendriyāṇi eṣāṃ katamenendriyeṇa katamaḥ kleśa upakleśo vā saṃprayuktaḥ / [316/05]
T07vakobhau:10991: tābhyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ saṃprayuktā puṇyakarmaṇāṃ pāpakarmaṇāṃ ca yathākramam / [316/15]
T07vakobhau:11031: na hi tasyāḥ kvacit pratiṣedho yathā 'vidyāyāḥ / [318/05]
T07vakobhau:11033: āhlīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ styānamauddhatyaṃ caitānicatvāri paryavasthānāni pañcabhirapīndriyaiḥ saṃprayujyante / [318/07]
T07vakobhau:11035: yāni sūtre pañca nivaraṇāni uktāni kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhamauddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ca / [318/09-318/10]
T07vakobhau:11041: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ dve styānamiddhe ekaṃ nivaraṇamuktaṃ dve cauddhatyakaukṛtye ekam / [318/15]
T07vakobhau:11052: ubhe api hyete cittaṃ layaṃ codayataḥ / [319/01]
T07vakobhau:11056: jñātivitarko janapadavitarko 'maravitarkaḥ paurāṇasya ca hasitakriḍitaramitaparibhāvitasyānusmartā bhavatīti / [319/04]
T07vakobhau:11065: styānamiddhena prajñāskandhasyauddhatyakaukṛtyena samādhiskandhasya samādhiprajñayorabhāve satyeṣu vicikitsako bhavatītyataḥ pañcoktāni / [319/10-319/11]
T07vakobhau:11066: etasyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ samādhiskandhavirodhina auddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇasya pūrva grahaṇaṃ prāpnoti / [319/11]
T07vakobhau:11072: cāragatasya priyāpriyarūpeṣu viṣayeṣu nimittagrāhādvihāragatasya tatpūrvakau kāmacchandavyāpādau samādhipraveśasyādito 'ntarāyaṃ kurutaḥ / [319/15-319/17]
T07vakobhau:11073: tataḥ samādhipraviṣṭasyāprayogeṇa śamathavipaśyanā sevanāt styānamiddhamauddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ca yathākramaṃ śamathavipaśyanayorantarāyaṃ kurutaḥ / [319/17]
T07vakobhau:11077: visabhāgadhātusarvatragāṇāṃ nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyānāṃ ca sāsravālambanānāṃ yadālambanaṃ parijñāyate tadā na prahīyante / [319/20-319/21]
T07vakobhau:11078: yadā prahīyante tadālambanaṃ na parijñāyate iti kathameṣāṃ prahāṇam / [319/21-319/22]
T07vakobhau:11095: yasya hi kleśaprakārasya pratipakṣo mārga utpadyate sa prahīyate / [320/05-320/06]
T07vakobhau:11106: vidūṣaṇāpratipakṣo yena mārgeṇa taṃ dhātum doṣato darśanādvidūṣayati / [320/13-320/14]
T07vakobhau:11114: na hi saṃprayogāt kleśo vivecayituṃ śakyate ālambanācca śakyate / [320/19-320/20]
T07vakobhau:11151: kim mārgaviśeṣagamanāt kleśānāṃ punaḥ prahāṇaviśeṣo bhavati /
T07vakobhau:11165: sa eva visaṃyogastāsu tāsvavasthāsu parijñāsaṃjñāṃ labhate / [322/06-322/07]
T07vakobhau:11166: dve hi parijñe jñānaparijñā prahāṇaparijñā ca / [322/07]
T07vakobhau:11181: yathā kāmāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tisraḥ parijñāḥ [322/18]
T07vakobhau:11183: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tathaiva tisraḥ parijñā bhavanti / [322/19-322/21]
T07vakobhau:11185: mārgadarśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tṛtīyeti traidhātukānāṃ darśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ ṣaṭ parijñā bhavanti / [323/01]
T07vakobhau:11191: kasmādrūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ pṛthak parijñā na darśanaheyānām / [323/05-323/06]
T07vakobhau:11205: vaibhāṣikamatena mauladhyānaphalaṃ pañca parijñā yā rūpārūpyāvacarakleśaprahāṇa svabhāvāḥ / [323/16]
T07vakobhau:11207: sa hi vītarāgasyāpi kāmāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ darśanamārgaphalamicchanti / [323/18]
T07vakobhau:11225: dharmajñānapakṣasya ṣaṭ parijñāḥ phalaṃ yā eva dharmajñāna kṣantijñānānām / [324/12-324/13]
T07vakobhau:11232: yatraitāni trīṇi kāraṇāni bhavanti tat prahāṇaṃ parijñocyate / [324/18-325/01]
T07vakobhau:11233: pṛthagjanasya tāvadanāsravā visaṃyogaprāptirnāsti bhavāgravikalīkaraṇaṃ ceti nāsya prahāṇaṃ parijñākhyāṃ labhate / [325/01]
T07vakobhau:11235: tatra yāvat duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntāvanāsravā visaṃyogaprāptirasti na tu bhavāgravikalīkṛṭam / [325/02-325/03]
T07vakobhau:11246: yaḥ prakāraḥ prahīṇo yadi tatrānyena tadālambanena kleśena visaṃyukto bhavatīti / [325/10-325/11]
T07vakobhau:11247: sa tu nāsya ubhayahetusamudghātāt dhātusamatikramācceti na brūmaḥ / [325/12]
T07vakobhau:11255: bhavanāsthaḥ punaḥ ṣaṅbhirekayā vā dvayena vā // VAkK_5.69 // [325/19-325/20]
T07vakobhau:11256: bhāvanāmārgasthaḥ punarāryapudgalo mārgānvayajñāne ṣaḍibhiḥ parijñābhiḥ samanvāgato yāvat kāmavairāgyaṃ na prāptaḥ / [325/20-325/21]
T07vakobhau:11257: parihīṇo vā tataḥ kāmavairāgyaṃ prāptaḥ pūrvaṃ paścād vā ekayā 'varabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñayā / [325/21-325/22]
T07vakobhau:11262: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamanāgāmyarhatorekaiva parijñā vyavasthāpyate na bhūyasyaḥ / [325/25-325/01]
T07vakobhau:11265: dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ parijñānāṃ saṃkalanaṃ bhavatyekatvena vyavasthāpanaṃ dhātuvairāgyāt phalaprāptitaśca / [326/03]
T07vakobhau:11268: atha kaḥ kati parijñāstyajati labhate vā / [326/06]
T07vakobhau:11269: ekāṃ dve pañca ṣaṭ kaścijjahātyāpnoti pañca na // VAkK_5.70 // [326/07]
T07vakobhau:11270: ekāṃ tyajati arhattvāt kāmavairāgyād vā parihīyamāṇaḥ / [326/07-326/08]
T07vakobhau:11271: dve parijñe tyajatyanāgāmī rūpavītarāgaḥ kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇaḥ / [326/08-326/09]
T07vakobhau:11303: “anāsravā mārgasatyami“ti svaśabdena “pratisaṃkhyānirodho yo visaṃyoga” iti nirodhasatyaṃ “duḥkhaṃ samudayo loka” ityatra duḥkhasamudayasatye
T07vakobhau:11314: itarathā hi pūrvaṃ hetunirdeśo 'bhaviṣyat paścāt phalanirdeśaḥ / [328/02]
T07vakobhau:11318: na hyeṣa niyamo yat pūrvamutpannānāṃ prahāṇāya cchandaṃ janayati / [328/04-328/05]
T07vakobhau:11322: yatra hi satto yena ca vādhyate yataśca mokṣaṃ prarthayate tadevādau vyavacāraṇāvasthāyāṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ parīkṣyate / [328/07-328/08]
T07vakobhau:11323: paścātko 'sya heturiti samudayasatyaṃ ko 'sya nirodha iti nirodhasatyaṃ ko 'sya mārga iti mārgasatyam / [328/08-328/09]
T07vakobhau:11328: yathā ca vyavacāraṇāvasthāyāṃ satyaparīkṣā tathābhisamayāvasthāyāṃ satyābhisamayaḥ / [328/11-328/12]
T07vakobhau:11339: ata eva tayoḥ phalahetubhāvānnāmato bhedo na dravyataḥ / [328/16]
T07vakobhau:11347: ata āryāṇāmetāni satyānyucyante na tvanāryāṇāṃ vīparītadarśanāt / [328/21-328/22]
T07vakobhau:11351: dve āryāṇāṃ satye dve ārye cāryāṇāṃ ca satye ityapare / [328/23-328/24]
T07vakobhau:11355: manāṣā amanāpāśca tadanye caiva sāsravāḥ // VAkK_6.3 // [329/01]
T07vakobhau:11356: tisro hi duḥkhatā duḥkhaduḥkhatā saṃskāraduḥkhatā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā ca / [329/01-329/02]
T07vakobhau:11362: tisro vedanā yathākramaṃ tadvaśena sukhavedanīyādayo 'pi saṃskārā manāpādisaṃjñāṃ labhante / [329/05-329/06]
T07vakobhau:11364: sūtra uktaṃ “sukhā vedanā utpādamukhā sthitisukhā vipariṇāmaduḥkh“ti / [329/07]
T07vakobhau:11376: “ūrṇāpakṣma yathaiva hi karatalasaṃsthaṃ na vedyate pumbhiḥ
T07vakobhau:11377: akṣigataṃ tu tathaiva hi janayatyaratiṃ ca pīḍaṃ ca /
T07vakobhau:11380: na hi bālānāmāvīcikeṣvapi skandheṣu tathā duḥkhabuddhiḥ pravartate yathāryāṇāṃ bhāvāgrikeṣvapīti / [329/18]
T07vakobhau:11383: pratikūlaṃ hi duḥkhamiti lakṣaṇānna mārgo duḥkham / [329/19-329/20]
T07vakobhau:11384: na hi tasyotpāda āryāṇāṃ pratikūlaḥ sarvaduḥkhakṣayāvāhanāt / [329/20-329/21]
T07vakobhau:11385: yadāpi te nirvāṇaṃ śāntataḥ paśyanti tadāpi yadeva duḥkhato dṛṣṭaṃ tasyaiva nirodhaṃ śāntataḥ paśyantina mārgasya / [329/21-329/22]
T07vakobhau:11388: ko hi vidvān pariṣekasukhāṇukena gaṇḍasukhamiti vyavasyet / [329/24]
T07vakobhau:11391: duḥkhe ca sati tadiṣṭerduḥkhaṃ sukhamiti vyavasyanti” iti // [330/01]
T07vakobhau:11392: sahaiva tu sukhena sarvaṃ bhavamāryā duḥkhataḥ paśyanti /
T07vakobhau:11402: na hi punasteṣāṃ duḥkhavedanāhetuḥ skandhā bhavanti / [330/07]
T07vakobhau:11403: saṃskāraduḥkhatā ca sūtre kimarthaṃ pṛthaguktā bhavet / [330/07-330/08]
T07vakobhau:11408: anityaṃ tu dṛśyamānaṃ pratikūlaṃ bhavatītyanityākāro duḥkhākāramākarṣati / [330/10-330/11]
T07vakobhau:11409: nāstyeva sukha vedanetyekīyā duḥkhaiva tu sarvā / [330/11]
T07vakobhau:11419: ya eva hi kecitpānabhojanaśītoṣṇādaya iṣyante sukhahetavasta evātyupayuktā akālopayuktāśca punarduḥkhahetavaḥ saṃpadyante / [330/15-330/17]
T07vakobhau:11420: na ca yuktā sukhahetubṛddhacyā samena vā 'nyasminkāle duḥkhotpattirityādita eva te duḥkhahetavo na sukhasya / [330/17]
T07vakobhau:11421: ante tu tadduḥkhaṃ vṛddhimāpannaṃ vyaktimāpadyata iti / [330/17-330/18]
T07vakobhau:11424: na hi tāvat sukhamiti vedyate kiñcidyāvanna duḥkhāntareṇopadruto bhavati kṣutpipāsāśītoṣṇaśramakāmarāgaprabhaveṇa / [330/20-330/21]
T07vakobhau:11425: tasmāt pratīkāra evāviduṣāṃ sukhabuddhirnasukhe duḥkhavikalpe ca vālaḥ sukhabuddhimutpādaynti yathāṃśādaṃśaṃ bhāraṃ saṃcārayantaḥ / [330/22]
T07vakobhau:11441: yā hi vedanā svena lakṣaṇenābhipretā nāsau pouonastenaiva jātvanabhipretā bhavati / [330/27-331/02]
T07vakobhau:11442: tathā hyenāmākārāntareṇa vidūṣayantyāryāḥ pramādapadaṃ caināṃ paśyanti mahābhisaṃskārasādhyāṃ ca vipariṇāminīṃ cānityāṃ cayenānabhipretā bhavati
T07vakobhau:11444: yadi cāsau svenātmanānabhipretā bhavennaiva tasyāṃ kasyacidrāgo bhavedyato vairāgyārthaṃ prakārāntareṇāpi doṣavatīṃ paśyeyuḥ / [331/04]
T07vakobhau:11447: “saṃskārānityatāmānanda mayā saṃghāya bhāṣitaṃ saṃskāraviopariṇāmatāṃ ca yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasye“ti / [331/07-331/08]
T07vakobhau:11448: ato na duḥkha-dukhatāṃ saṃdhāyaitaduktamiti siddhaṃ bhavati / [331/08-331/09]
T07vakobhau:11449: yadica svabhāvata eva sarvaṃ veditavyaṃ duḥkhamabhaviṣyatkimarthamāryānanda evaṃ bhagavantamaprakṣyat / [331/09]
T07vakobhau:11450: tisra ime vedanā uktā bhagavatā sukhā duḥkhā 'duḥkhāsukhā ca / [331/10]
T07vakobhau:11452: kiṃ nu saṃdhāya bhagavatā bhāṣitam yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti / [331/11-331/12]
T07vakobhau:11453: evaṃ hi so 'prakṣyat kiṃ nu saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā iti / [331/12]
T07vakobhau:11455: idaṃ mayā saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā iti / [331/13]
T07vakobhau:11458: idaṃ tu saṃdhāya mayā bhāṣitaṃ yatkimcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyetyābhīprāyikametadvākyaṃ darśayati / [331/15]
T07vakobhau:11461: sukhatvaṃ ca svabhāvatomanāpatvād duḥkhatvaṃ ca paryāyato vipariṇāmānityadharmatvāt / [331/16-331/17]
T07vakobhau:11462: sā tu sukhato dṛśyamānā bandhāya kalpate tadāsvādanāt / [331/17-331/18]
T07vakobhau:11465: yathā dṛśyamānā mokṣāya kalpate tathaināṃ draṣṭumājñāpayanti buddhāḥ / [331/19]
T07vakobhau:11472: lokasya hi sukhasaṃjñā vedanāyāṃ kāmaguṇeṣūpapattau ca / [331/23-331/24]
T07vakobhau:11473: tatra sūkhaṃ vedanāṃ paryāyeṇa duḥkhaṃ satīmekāntasukhāṃ paśyato viparyāsaḥ / [331/24]
T07vakobhau:11476: yadi tu svabhāvata eva sarvaṃ veditaṃ duḥkhamabhaviṣyat tisro vedanā iti vacane koguṇo 'bhaviṣyat / [331/26-332/01]
T07vakobhau:11479: “yacca sukhendriyaṃ yacca saumanasyendriyaṃ sukhaiṣā vedanā draṣṭavye” ti vistareṇoktvā
T07vakobhau:11480: “yenemāni pañcendriyāṇyevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā dṛṣṭāni trīṇi cāsya saṃyojanāni
T07vakobhau:11482: loko 'pi ca kathaṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ trividhāṃ vyavasyet / [332/05]
T07vakobhau:11485: sukhasyāpi trividhatvāt mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣvadhimātrā disukhabuddhiḥ syāt / [332/06-332/08]
T07vakobhau:11486: yadā ca gandharasaspraṣṭavyaviśeṣajaṃ sukhaṃ vedayate tadā katamat duḥkhaṃ mṛdubhūtaṃ yatrāsya sukhabuddhirbhavati / [332/08-332/09]
T07vakobhau:11487: anutpannavinaṣṭe catasminmṛduni duḥkhe sutarāṃ sukabuddhiḥ syāt / [332/09]
T07vakobhau:11490: kathaṃ ca nāmedaṃ yojyate yanmṛdunivedite suvyaktastīvro 'nubhavo gṛhyate madhye punaravyakta iti / [332/11]
T07vakobhau:11491: triṣu ca dhyāneṣu sukhavacanāt mṛdu duḥkhaṃ syāt / [332/11-332/12]
T07vakobhau:11492: ūrdhvamaduḥkhasukhavacanānmadhyaṃ duḥkhamiti na yujyate mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣu duḥkheṣu sukhādivedanāvyavasthānam / [332/12-332/14]
T07vakobhau:11493: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā “rūpaṃ cenmahānāmannekāntaduḥkhamabhaviṣyanna sukhaṃ na sukhānugatami“tyevamādi / [332/14]
T07vakobhau:11498: āśrayaviśeṣāpekṣo hi viṣayaḥ sukhaheturvā bhavati duḥkhaheturvā /
T07vakobhau:11500: sa yāṃ kāmavasthāṃ prāpya sukhaheturbhavati na tāṃ punaḥ prāpya kadācinna bhavatīti vyavasthita eva sukhahetuḥ / [332/18-332/20]
T07vakobhau:11501: tadyathā sa evāgniḥ pākyabhūtaviśeṣāpekṣaḥ svādupākaheturbhavati sa evāsvādapākahetuḥ na tu yāṃ pākyabhūtāvasthāṃ prāpya svadupākahetustāṃ punaḥ prāpya na heturityeṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ / [332/20-332/21]
T07vakobhau:11502: dhyāneṣu ca kathaṃ na vyavasthitaḥ sukhahetuḥ / [332/21-332/22]
T07vakobhau:11503: yattu punaḥ duḥkhapratikāre sukhabuddhirityuktaṃ tatra vihitaḥ pratīkāraḥ / [332/22-332/23]
T07vakobhau:11504: yadā gandhādiviśeṣajaṃ sukhaṃ vedayate tadā kasya pratīkāreṣu sukhabuddhirbhavatyanutpannavinaṣṭe ca tasmin duḥkhe sutarāṃ sukhabuddhiḥ syāt
T07vakobhau:11505: dhyānaje sukhe kaḥ kasya pratīkāra ityevamādi / [332/24-332/25]
T07vakobhau:11522: “karma ca tṛṣṇā ca atho avidyā saṃskārāṇāṃ heturabhisaṃparāya” iti / [333/06]
T07vakobhau:11527: upapattyabhinirvṛttihetuṃ sahetukaṃ brūvatā gāthāyāṃ karma ca tṛṣṇā cāvidyoktā / [333/10-333/11]
T07vakobhau:11533: tayoryathākramaṃ karma ca bhavatṛṣṇā ca hetuḥ / [333/14-333/15]
T07vakobhau:11540: satṛṣṇā eva jātā dṛśyante na vītatṛṣṇā iti / [333/18]
T07vakobhau:11544: yatra ca satṛṣṇā tatrābhīkṣṇaṃ cittasaṃtatiṃ namantīṃ paśyāmaḥ / [333/19-333/20]
T07vakobhau:11546: na cātmabhāva evaṃ kenacidāgṛhīto yathā tṛṣṇayā / [333/21]
T07vakobhau:11548: na cānyo heturevamanuṣatto yathātmasneha ityeṣā yuktiḥ / [333/23]
T07vakobhau:11550: dve api satye saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ ca / [333/24]
T07vakobhau:11552: yatra bhinnena tadbuddhiranyāpohe dhiyā ca tat /
T07vakobhau:11554: yasminnavayavaśo bhinne na tadbuddhirbhavati tat saṃvṛtisat /
T07vakobhau:11556: tatra hi kapālaśo bhinne ghaṭabuddhirna bhavati / [334/04-334/05]
T07vakobhau:11557: tatra cānyānapohya dharmān buddhacyā tadbuddhirna bhavati taccāpi saṃvṛtisadveditavyam / [334/05]
T07vakobhau:11560: teṣveva tu saṃvṛtisaṃjñā kṛteti saṃvṛtivaśāt ghaṭaścāmbu cāstīti brūbantaḥ satyamevāhurna mṛṣetyetatsaṃvṛtisatyam / [334/07-334/08]
T07vakobhau:11565: tatra hi paramāṇuśo bhinne vastuni rasārhānapi ca dharmānapohya buddhacyā rūpasya svabhāvabuddhirbhavatyeva / [334/10]
T07vakobhau:11568: yathā lokottarena jñānena gṛhyate tat pṛṣṭhalabdhena vā laukikena tathā paramārthasatyam / [334/12-334/13]
T07vakobhau:11575: satyāni ha draṣṭukāma ādita eva śīlaṃ pālayati / [334/16-334/17]
T07vakobhau:11577: śrutvā cintayati aviparītaṃ cintayitvā bhāvanāyāṃ prayujyate / [334/18]
T07vakobhau:11578: samādhau tasya śrutamayīṃ prajñāṃ niśritya cintāmayī jāyate / [334/18-334/19]
T07vakobhau:11589: suśikṣitā plavan nirapekṣastaratītyeṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [335/02-335/03]
T07vakobhau:11590: asyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ cintāmayī prajñā na siddhacyatītyapare / [335/03-335/04]
T07vakobhau:11591: yāhi nāmālambanā śrutamayī prāpnoti yā 'rthālambanā bhāvanāmayīti / [335/04-335/05]
T07vakobhau:11598: tasya punarevaṃ bhāvanāyāṃ prayuktasya kathaṃ bhāvanā saṃpadyata ityāha / [335/09]
T07vakobhau:11610: nanu ca sā 'tibhūyaskāmatā 'labdha eva na labdhe bhavatīti ko 'nayorviśeṣa iti vaktavyametad / [335/17]
T07vakobhau:11636: dharmasvāminā hi bhagavatā parityaktasvavṛttikarmāntebhyaḥ śiṣyebhyo mokṣārthamabhyupagatebhyo dvayaṃ prajñaptaṃ vṛttiśca karma ca / [336/16]
T07vakobhau:11638: anayā vṛttyedaṃ karma kurvāṇā bhavantī na cirānmokṣaṃ prāpsyantīti / [336/17-336/18]
T07vakobhau:11653: tasya tvevaṃ pātrobhūtasya katham tasyāṃ bhāvanāyāmavatāro bhavati / [337/08]
T07vakobhau:11659: adhiko rāgo vitarkaścaiṣāṃ ta ime adhirāgavitarkāḥ / [337/11-337/12]
T07vakobhau:11667: tatra punaścaturvidho rāgaḥ varṇarāgaḥ saṃsthānarāgaḥ sparśarāga upacārarāgaśca / [337/16-337/17]
T07vakobhau:11669: dvitiyasya vikhāditakavikṣiptālambanāṃ tṛtīyasya vipaṭumnā pūyanibaddhāsthyālambanāṃ caturthasya niśceṣṭamṛtkāyālambanām / [337/19]
T07vakobhau:11672: asthisaṃkaklāyāṃ hi sarvametaccaturvidhaṃ rāgastu nāstīti adhimuktiprādeśikamanaskāratvādaśubhayā na kleśaprahāṇam viṣkambhaṇaṃ tu / [338/02-338/03]
T07vakobhau:11673: sa punar ayam aśubhāṃ bhāvayan yogācāras trividha ucyate / [338/03]
T07vakobhau:11678: svāṅgāvayave cittaṃ nibadhnāti pādāṅguṣṭhe lalāṭe yatra cāsyābhiratiḥ / [338/06-338/07]
T07vakobhau:11679: sa tatra māṃsakledapītā dhimokṣakrameṇāsthiviśodhayan sakalāmasthisaṃkalāṃ paśyati / [338/07-338/09]
T07vakobhau:11680: tathaiva ca punardvitīyāmadhimucyate yāvadvihārārāmakṣetrakrameṇa samudraparyantām pṛthivīmasthisaṃkalāṃ pūrṇāmadhimucyate 'dhimokṣābhivardhanārtham
T07vakobhau:11685: sa punaḥ cittasaṃkṣepaviśeṣārtha tasyāmasthiśaṅkalāyāṃ pādāsthīni hitvā śeṣaṃ manasi karoti / [338/14-338/15]
T07vakobhau:11686: evaṃ krameṇa yāvat kapālasyārdhaṃ hitvā 'rdhaṃ manasi karoti kṣayakṛtaparijayaḥ / [338/16]
T07vakobhau:11688: so 'rdhamapi kapālasya muktvā brūvormadhye cittaṃ dhārayati / [338/17-338/18]
T07vakobhau:11690: astyaśubhā ālalmbanaparīttatayā parīttā na vaśitāparīttatayā parītteti catuṣkoṭikam / [338/19-338/20]
T07vakobhau:11692: atha kiṃsvabhāveyamaśubhā katibhūmikā kimālambanā kva cotpadyate / [338/22]
T07vakobhau:11695: alobhasvabhāvā daśabhūmikā sasāmantakadhyānāntareṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣui kāmadhātau ca kāmāvacara dṛṣyālambanā kiṃ poounrdṛśyavastusaṃsthāne /
T07vakobhau:11715: pañcasu bhūmisu triṣu sāmantakeṣu dhyānāntare kāmadhātau copekṣāsaṃprayogitvāt / [339/10-339/11]
T07vakobhau:11718: ye tu mauleṣvapi dhyāneṣu samāpannasyopekṣāmicchanti neṣāmaṣṭabhūmikā / [339/13]
T07vakobhau:11730: gaṇanayā 'nugamena sthāpanayā upalakṣaṇayā vivarttena pariśūddhacyā ca / [339/20-339/22]
T07vakobhau:11731: tatra ca gaṇanā nāma āśvāsapraśvāseṣu cittaṃ dattvā 'nabhisamskāreṇa kāyaṃ cittaṃ cādhyupekṣya smṛtimātreṇa gaṇayatyekaṃ dvau yāvaddaśa / [339/22]
T07vakobhau:11740: kiyaddūramete praviśanti vā niṣkrāmanti vā kimete sarvaśarīravyāopina ekadeśacāriṇa iti / [340/04]
T07vakobhau:11742: niṣkrāmato vitastivyāmāntaraṃ yāvadvāyumaṇḍalaṃ vairambhāśca vāyava ityapare / [340/06]
T07vakobhau:11744: sthāpanā nāma nāsikāgre yāvat pādanṅguṣṭhe sthitāṃ paśyati / [340/07]
T07vakobhau:11746: kimanugrāhakā ete upadhātakāḥ śītā uṣṇā iti / [340/08]
T07vakobhau:11747: upalakṣaṇā nāma naite kevalā vāyava eva / [340/08-340/10]
