T07vakobhau:11748: catvāryetāni mahābhūtāni mahābhūtābhinirvṛttamupādāyarūpaṃ tadāśritāścittacaittā iti pañcaskandhānupalakṣayati / [340/10-340/11]
T07vakobhau:11749: vivarto nāma vāyvālambanāṃ vṛddhiṃ vivarttyottareṣu kuśalamūleṣu saṃniyojanaṃ yāvadagradharmeṣu / [340/11]
T07vakobhau:11761: yadi hi kāyaḥ śuṣiro bhavati āśvāsapraśvāsabhūmikaṃ ca cittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtamevaṃ te varttante / [340/20-340/21]
T07vakobhau:11762: jāyamānasya caturthadhyānādvyuttiṣṭhamānasya ca praviśanti bhiyamāṇasya caturthaṃ ca dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasya niṣkrāmanti / [340/21-340/22]
T07vakobhau:11772: nādhareṇa lakṣayete manasā ca tau // VAkK_6.13 // [341/06]
T07vakobhau:11784: sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tu anityatā saṃskṛtānāṃ duḥkhatā sāsravāṇāṃ śunyatā 'nātmate sarvadharmāṇām / [341/13]
T07vakobhau:11788: sāmāhitasya kila kāyaṃ paramāṇuśaḥ kṣaṇikataśca paśyataḥ kāyasmṛtyupasthāṇaṃ niṣpannaṃ bhavati / [341/16]
T07vakobhau:11815: tadyathā hyuktamāyuṣmatā aniruddhena “tasya kāye kāyānupaśiyano viharataḥ kāyālalmbanānusmṛtistiṣṭhati saṃtiṣṭhata” iti vistaraḥ / [342/13-342/14]
T07vakobhau:11816: bhagāvatā 'pi coktaṃ “tasya kāye kāyānupaśiyano viharata upasthitā smṛtirbhavatyasaṃmūḍhe“ti / [342/14-342/15]
T07vakobhau:11817: yatra tūktaṃ “kathaṃ bhikṣavaścaturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ samudayaśca bhavatyastaṅgamaśca / [342/15-342/17]
T07vakobhau:11820: yathālambanaṃ caiṣāṃ nāma svaparobhayasaṃtatyālambanatvāt pratyekameṣāṃ traividhyam / [342/19]
T07vakobhau:11825: yato vā kāmarāgasya kāyo 'dhaṣṭhānaṃ sa ca vedanā 'bhilāṣātsa ca cittasyādāntatvāt tatkleśāprahāṇāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ / [342/24]
T07vakobhau:11827: śucisukhanityātmaviparyāsanāṃ caturṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa catvāri smṛtyupasthā nānyuktāni yathākramaṃ nādhikanyūnāni evaṃ ca trīṇyasaṃbhinnālambanāni caturthamubhayathā / [343/03]
T07vakobhau:11829: atha kāyādīnāṃ dve trīṇi catvāri vā samastāni paśyati saṃbhinnālambanam / [343/04-343/05]
T07vakobhau:11833: saṃbhinnalambane dharmasmṛtyupasthāne sthitastān kāyādīn sarvānabhisamasya caturbhirākāraiḥ paśyati / [343/09]
T07vakobhau:11844: nirodhaṃ caturbhiḥ nirodhataḥ śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsaraṇataśca / [343/18-343/19]
T07vakobhau:11864: yathā mūrdhāna uktāḥ evaṃ mṛdumadhye kṣāntī tathaivākaraṇāt / [344/12-344/13]
T07vakobhau:11874: dvābhyāṃ kṣaṇābhyāṃ manasi karotyeṣā sarvaiva madhyā kṣāntiryadaikameva kṣaṇaṃ tadadhimātreti / [345/01]
T07vakobhau:11879: te 'pi hi kāmāvacaraduḥkhālambanāḥ kṣaṇikāśca laukikāścaite 'grāśca dharmāḥ / [345/05]
T07vakobhau:11882: ta eta ūṣmagatādayaḥ smṛtyupasthānasvabhāvatvāt prajñātmakā ucyante / [345/08]
T07vakobhau:11888: tatra trisatyālambanoṣmagatākaraṇe dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratyutpannamanāgatāni catvāri bhāvyante / [345/14]
T07vakobhau:11894: mūrdhākaraṇe catuḥsatyālambane 'pi nirodhālambanavardhane cāntyamanāgatāni catvāri ākārāḥ sarve / [345/17-345/18]
T07vakobhau:11901: ityetāni catvāri nirvedhabhāgīyāni kuśalamūlāni yadutoṣmagataṃ mūrdhānaḥ kṣāntayo 'gradharmāśca / [346/02-346/03]
T07vakobhau:11902: eṣāṃ dve mṛdūnī calatvāt parihāṇitaḥ kṣāntayo madhyamagradharmā adhimātram / [346/03]
T07vakobhau:11905: niścito vedhā nirvedhaḥ āryamārgastena vicikitsā prahāṇāt satyānāṃ ca vibhajanādidaṃ duḥkhamayaṃ yāvat mārga iti / [346/05]
T07vakobhau:11912: anāgamyaṃ dhyānāntaraṃ catvāri ca dhyānānyasya bhūmistatsaṃgṛhītatvāt / [346/11]
T07vakobhau:11921: bhadantaghoṣakasya tu dve prathame nirvedhabhāgīye saptabhūmike kāmāvacare api taḥ / [346/17]
T07vakobhau:11935: yadbhūmikānyanena pratilabdhānibhavanti tāṃ bhūmi tyajannāryastānyapi tyajati nānyathā bhūmityāgaḥ punarbhūmisaṃcārāt / [347/06]
T07vakobhau:11943: yo mauladhyānabhūmikāni nirvedhabhāgīyānyutpādayati satatraiva janmāti satyānyavaśyaṃ paśyati / [347/13]
T07vakobhau:11946: yadā vihineṣu punarlābhobhavatyapūrvāṇyeva tadā labhyante na pūrvaṃ tyaktāni / [347/16]
T07vakobhau:11970: ūṣmagataṃ mūrdhānaṃ ca śrāvakagotrādutpannaṃ vyāvartya punarbuddhaḥ syādityasti saṃbhavaḥ / [348/13]
T07vakobhau:11978: trīṇyapi nirvedhabhāgīyāni śrāvakagotrādvacyāvartya buddhādibhavaḥ syāt pratyekabuddha ityarthaḥ / [348/18-348/19]
T07vakobhau:11986: kiṃ punaḥ prathama eva janmani kṛtaprayogo nirvedhabhāgīyānyutpādayet / [349/03-349/04]
T07vakobhau:12039: tataḥ punarduḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteranantaramatraia kāmāvacare duḥkhe dharmajñānamutpadyate / [350/14]
T07vakobhau:12042: yathā ca kāmāvacare duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirdharmajñānaṃ cotpadyate [350/16]
T07vakobhau:12070: duḥkhe hi dṛśyamāne tasya trividho 'bhisamayaḥ samudayādīnāṃ kāryābhisamayaḥ / [351/15-351/16]
T07vakobhau:12075: na tarhi satyānāṃ duḥkhādito darśanaṃ syāt /
T07vakobhau:12077: “ihāryaśravakasya duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasi kūrvataḥ samudayaṃ vā samudayato yāvat mārga vā mārgato manasi kurvato 'nāsraveṇa manasikāreṇa saṃprayukto yo dharmāṇo pravicaya” iti / [351/21]
T07vakobhau:12080: athāpyekasya darśanāccheṣeṣu va4itvalābhādekābhisamayaṃ brūyānna doṣaḥ syāt / [352/01-352/02]
T07vakobhau:12081: antarā tu vyutthānamasti nāstīti vicāryaṃ syāt / [352/02-352/03]
T07vakobhau:12082: atha punarbrūyāt duḥkhameva parijānansamudayaṃ prajahāti nirodhaṃ sākṣāt karoti mārgaṃ bhāvayati / [352/03-352/04]
T07vakobhau:12084: evamapi na doṣaḥ syādekasya darśane śeṣāṇāṃ kāryābhisamayavacanāt / [352/04-352/05]
T07vakobhau:12085: darśanābhisamayaṃ tu prati sūtre satyānāṃ krameṇābhisamaya ukto lakṣyate / [352/05-352/07]
T07vakobhau:12086: “nahaiva gṛhapate satyānāmekābhisamayo 'pi pūrvābhisayaya” iti vistareṇa sadṛṣṭāntāni trīṇi sūtrāṇi / [352/07-352/08]
T07vakobhau:12087: “yo duḥkhe niṣkāṅkṣo nirvicikitso buddhe 'pi sa” iti sūtrādekābhisamaya iti cet / [352/08] na /
T07vakobhau:12093: kasmāt punaḥ kṣāntayo jñānāni cavaśyaṃ bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:12101: yadi punardvitīyenānantaryamārgeṇaiva saha visaṃyogaprāptirutpadyeta kiṃ syāt / [352/18]
T07vakobhau:12103: kṣāntibhiḥ kleśaprahāṇānnava saṃyojananikāyā jñānavadhyā iti śāstravirodha iti cet / [352/19]
T07vakobhau:12111: duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntimārabhya yāvat mārge 'nvayajñāna kṣāntirete pañcadaśa kṣāṇā darśanamārgaḥ / [353/02]
T07vakobhau:12122: ata eva darśanamārga iti cet / na /
T07vakobhau:12126: na hi sarvaṃ satyadarśanaṃ samāptamiti tadantarālatvāttanyappi darśanamārgaḥ / [353/10-353/11]
T07vakobhau:12129: ya ete darśanamārgasvabhāvāḥ pañcādaśa kṣaṇa uktā veditavyau [353/14]
T07vakobhau:12141: phalānāmādyaṃ srota āpattiphalaṃ sarvaphalaprāptau tasya prathamatvāt / [353/20-353/22]
T07vakobhau:12142: tāveva śraddhādharmānusāriṇau yadi pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇāprahīṇabhāvanāheyau bhavataḥ sakalavandhanau to srota āpattiphalapratipannakāvucyete
T07vakobhau:12144: yadi pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa kāmāvacarāṇaṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ yāvat pañca prakārāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti / [353/25]
T07vakobhau:12148: yadi tayostasmāt pareṇa ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau vā prakārāḥ pūrvaprahīṇā bhavanti / [354/03]
T07vakobhau:12153: yadi punarnavamasyāpi prakārasya prahāṇāt kāmadhātorvītarāgau bhavata ūrdhvaṃ vā yāvadākiñcanyāyatanāt tau tṛtīya pratīpannakāvucyete / [354/07]
T07vakobhau:12156: ṣoḍaśe tu phalasthau tau yatra yaḥ pratipannakaḥ / [354/10]
T07vakobhau:12157: ṣoḍaśe tu citta utpanne tau na punaḥ śraddhādharmānusāriṇāvucyete / [354/10-354/11]
T07vakobhau:12161: yatra phale yaḥ pratipannako bhūtaḥ sa tadānīṃ tatra phalasthito bhavati / [354/12]
T07vakobhau:12162: srota āpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale vā anāgāmiphale vā / [354/13]
T07vakobhau:12167: tasminkāle yo mṛdvindriyaḥ śraddhānusāripūrvī sa śraddhādhimukta ityucyate / [354/17]
T07vakobhau:12170: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prahīṇapañcaprakāro 'pi ṣoḍaśe citte srota āpanna evocyate na sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannakaḥ / [354/20]
T07vakobhau:12174: phale hi labhyamāne phalaviśiṣṭo mārgo na labhyata ityeṣa niyamaḥ / [354/23-354/24]
T07vakobhau:12175: ataḥ phalastho yāvanna viśeṣāya prayujyate phalāntaraprāptau tāvat pratipannako nocyate / [354/24-354/25]
T07vakobhau:12177: yastu tṛtīyadhyānavītarāgo 'dharāṃ bhūmi niśritya niyāmamavakrāmati so 'vaśyaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ mārga saṃmukhīkaroti / [355/01-355/02]
T07vakobhau:12178: anyathā hi sa tasmādūrdhvopapannaḥ sukhendriyeṇāsamanvāgataḥ syāt / [355/02-355/03]
T07vakobhau:12182: yathaite kāmadhātau navaprakārāḥ kleśā upadiṣṭā evaṃ [355/06]
T07vakobhau:12187: tatpratipakṣā apyānantaryavimuktimārgākhyā guṇā bhūmau bhūmau navaprakārā eva / [355/09-355/10]
T07vakobhau:12191: teṣāṃ punaḥ pratyekaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātratvena trividhatvāt nava vyavasthāpyante / [355/13-355/15]
T07vakobhau:12192: tadyathā mṛdumṛduḥ prakāro mṛdumadhyo mṛdvadhimātro madhyamṛdurmadhyamadhyo madhyādhimātro 'dhimātramṛduradhimātramadhyo 'dhimātrādhimātraśceti
T07vakobhau:12195: ādita evādhimātramārgasaṃbhavādutpannādhimātramārgasya cādhimātrakleśāsaṃbhavāt audāriko hi malaścelātpūrvaṃ nirdūyate paścāt sūkṣmaḥ / [355/18-355/19]
T07vakobhau:12196: audārikaṃ ca tamaḥ sūkṣmeṇālokena hanyate sūkṣmaṃ cādhimātreṇetyeṣa dṛṣṭāntayogaḥ / [355/19]
T07vakobhau:12197: śuklā hi dharmā valavanto durbalāstu kṛṣṇāḥ / [355/19-355/21]
T07vakobhau:12202: yasya hi phalasthasyaiko 'pi bhāvanāheyaḥ prakāro 'prahīṇaḥ sa srota āpanaḥ / [356/01-356/02]
T07vakobhau:12210: tadasāvāpanna āgataḥ prāpta iti srota āpannaḥ / [356/05]
T07vakobhau:12216: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sa eva nāṣṭamakaḥ / [356/08-356/09]
T07vakobhau:12223: yattarhhi sūtra uktaṃ “asthānamanavakāśo yaddaṣṭisaṃpannaḥ pudgalo 'ṣṭamaṃ bhavamabhinirvartayiṣyati / [356/13]
T07vakobhau:12226: yathārutaṃ vā kalpyamāne 'ntarābhavo 'pi na syāt evamapyūredhvasrotaso bhavāgraparamasyaikasyāṃ gatāvaṣṭama upapattibhāvo na prāpnoti / [356/15-356/16]
T07vakobhau:12229: iha caiva kiṃ jñāpakaṃ pratyekaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu saptakṛtvo na pounarubhayeṣveva saptakṛtva iti / [356/17]
T07vakobhau:12235: yaśca manuṣyesu srota āpanno bhavati sa tānevāgamya parinirvāti / [356/20]
T07vakobhau:12263: yathākāśaṃ kuru maṇḍapaṃ pātayeti bhavanti vaktāraḥ / [357/08]
T07vakobhau:12264: anyo 'pi ca syātsaptakṛtvaḥ paramo na tu niyata iti nocyate / [357/08-357/09]
T07vakobhau:12265: evaṃ tāvadakṣīṇabhāvanāheyaḥ phalasthaḥ saptakṛtvaḥ paramo bhavati / [357/10]
T07vakobhau:12271: śloke tu dvayorgrahaṇaṃ srota āpannasya paścātprahīṇe sati tatpratipakṣānāsravendriyasyānuktasiddhatvāt / [357/14-357/15]
T07vakobhau:12276: tatprahāṇe ṣaṣṭhasyāvaśyaṃ prahāṇāt nahi tasyaikaḥ prakāraḥ phalaṃ vighnayituṃ samarthaḥ / [357/17]
T07vakobhau:12279: devakulaṅkulo yo deveṣa dve trīṇi vā kulāni saṃśritya parinirvāti tatra vā 'nyatra vā devanikāye / [357/19-357/20]
T07vakobhau:12280: manuṣyakulaṅkulo yo manuṣyeṣu tatra vā 'nyatra va dvīpe parinirvāti / [357/20]
T07vakobhau:12283: yasya phalasthasyaikaprakāroyāvatpañcamaḥ prahīṇo bhavati asau dvitīyaphalapratipannako veditavyaḥ / [357/24]
T07vakobhau:12299: avasthātraye hi karmāṇi vidhnāyopatiṣṭhanta” ityuktaṃ prāk / [358/09-358/10]
T07vakobhau:12300: yathā karmāṇyevaṃ kleśā api veditavyā iti / [358/10]
T07vakobhau:12302: vīcirnāmāntaraṃ tasya caikajamavyavahitatvāt nirvāṇasya ekakleśaprakāravyavahitatvādvā 'nāgāmiphalasyaiko vīcirasyetyekavīcikaḥ / [358/12-358/13]
T07vakobhau:12304: pūrvaprahīṇaprakārastu phalaprāptau na tāvatkulaṅkulo bhavatyekavīciko vā yāvatphalaviśiṣṭo mārgo na samukhīkṛtaḥ / [358/15]
T07vakobhau:12309: avaśyaṃ dve trīṇi vā pūrvaṃ prahīṇāni bhavanti / [358/19]
T07vakobhau:12316: upapadyaparinirvāyī ya upapannamātrī na cirāt parinirvātyabhiyuktavāhimārgatvāt / [359/02]
T07vakobhau:12330: ūrdhvasrotā yasyordhvaṃ gatirna tatriva parinirvāṇaṃ yatropapannaḥ / [359/10]
T07vakobhau:12335: phalato 'kaniṣṭhabhavāgraparamatvāt tatra yena dhyānaṃ vyavakīrṇaṃ so 'kaniṣṭhān gatvā parinirvāti / [359/15]
T07vakobhau:12339: tatra pluto nāma ya iha dhyānāni vyayakīrya dhyānacyāt oparihīṇaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamāsvādya
T07vakobhau:12340: brahmakāyikeṣūpapannaḥ pūrvābhyāsavaśāccaturthaṃ dhyānaṃ vyavakīrya tasmāt pracyuto
T07vakobhau:12343: ardhpluto nāma yastataḥ śuddhāvāseṣūpapadya madhyādekamapi sthānāntaraṃ vilaṅghacyākaniṣṭhān praviśati / [359/20-359/21]
T07vakobhau:12345: sarvacyuto nāma yaḥ sarvāṇi sthānāntarāṇi saṃcaryākaniṣṭhān praviśati / [359/22]
T07vakobhau:12355: sa hi samāpattyantarāṇyāsvādayan sarvasthānāntareṣūpapadyāpraviśyaiva śuddhāvasānārupyakramotpattito bhavāgraṃ gatvā parinirvāti / [360/04]
T07vakobhau:12359: akaniṣṭhabhavāgraparamatvaṃ tu pareṇa gatyabhāvādyathā sapta kṛtvaḥparamatvaṃ srota āpannasyeti / [360/06-360/07]
T07vakobhau:12382: teṣāmapi navānāṃ prtyekamata eva yathāyogaṃ viśeṣaḥ / [361/02]
T07vakobhau:12386: kathaṃ tarhi sūtre sapta satpuruṣagatayo deśitāḥ / [361/05]
T07vakobhau:12390: kasmāt punaretā eva satpuruṣagatayo nānyāḥ śaikṣagatayaḥ / [361/07-361/08]
T07vakobhau:12391: etā hi gatayo yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ satyeva karmāṇi vṛttiḥ kuśale asatyavṛttirakuśale / [361/08-361/09]
T07vakobhau:12405: kāmadhātau parāvṛttajanmāntara āryo na dhātvantaraṃ gacchati / [361/17-361/18]
T07vakobhau:12406: anāgāmi phalaṃ prāpya tatraiva janmani parinirvāṇāt / [361/18-361/19]
T07vakobhau:12409: yattarhi śakreṇoktaṃ “ye te devā akaniṣṭhā iti viśrutāḥ / [361/20]
T07vakobhau:12414: sa ca kāmadhātau parivṛttajanmā ūrdhvadhātūpapannaścāryo naivendriyāṇi saṃcarati nāpi kathañcit parihīyate / [362/03-362/04]
T07vakobhau:12415: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ parivṛttajanmāntāsyāryasya rūpārupyapraveśendriyasaṃcāraparihāṇayo neṣyante / [362/04]
T07vakobhau:12419: atha kasmādvītarāgaḥ śaikṣo nāntarāye parinirvāyī bhavati / [362/06-362/08]
T07vakobhau:12420: mārgasyājitatvādasaṃmukhībhāvataḥ anuśayānāṃ ca nātimandatvāt duḥsamatikrāmatvātkāmavātoriti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [362/08]
T07vakobhau:12429: arhannanāgāmī vā pravāhayuktamanāsravaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate / [362/15]
T07vakobhau:12430: tasmādvacyutthāya pravāhayuktaṃ tadeva sāsravaṃ samāpadyate punaścānāsravam / [362/15-362/17]
T07vakobhau:12431: evaṃ pravāhāprahāsena yadā kila dvau kṣaṇāvanāsravau samāpadyate dvau sāsravau punaścānāsravāvayaṃ vyavakiraṇasya prayogaḥ / [362/18]
T07vakobhau:12433: yadā tvanāsravasya kṣayasyānantaraṃ sāsravaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti sāsravasyānāsravam / [362/20-362/21]
T07vakobhau:12434: evaṃ sāsravasya kṣaṇasyānāsravābhyāṃ miśraṇāt vyavakiraṇaṃ niṣpannaṃ bhavatīti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [362/21-362/22]
T07vakobhau:12435: dvau hi kṣaṇāvānantaryamārgasadṛśau tṛtī yo vimuktimārgasadṛśa iti / [362/22]
T07vakobhau:12436: evaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ vyavakīrya tadvalelnānyānyapi vyavakīryante / [362/22-362/23]
T07vakobhau:12440: ata icchātaḥ pravāhatrayasamāpattito niṣpannaṃ bhavatīti paśyāmaḥ / [362/26]
T07vakobhau:12463: yo hi kaścidanāgāmī nirodhasamāpattilābhī sa kāyasākṣītyucyate / [363/16-363/17]
T07vakobhau:12468: sa hi tasmādvyutthāyāpratilabdhapūrvā savijñānakāṃ kāyaśāntiṃ pratilabhate / [363/19-363/20]
T07vakobhau:12469: yato 'syaivaṃ bhavati śāntā vata nirodhasamāpattirnirvāṇasadṛśī vata nirodhasamāpattiriti / [363/20]
T07vakobhau:12470: evamanena tasyāḥ śāntatvaṃ kāyena sākṣatkṛtaṃ bhavati / [363/21]
T07vakobhau:12472: aṣṭādaśa śaikṣā” ityatra sūtre ki kāraṇaṃ kāyasākṣī noktaḥ / [363/22]
T07vakobhau:12489: gotre gotre nava pudgalāḥ sakalabandhano yāvadaṣṭaprakāravītarāgaḥ svasmātsthānāt ṣaṇṇṇavakāni catuṣpañcāśat ṣoḍaśa catuṣpañcāśatkāni catuḥṣaṣṭānyaṣṭau śatāni / [364/06-364/07]
T07vakobhau:12490: indriyabhedāt punastriguṇā ityevaṃ kṛtvā yo 'dharadhyāne navaprakāravītarāgaḥ sa uttare sakalabandhana uktaḥ / [364/07-364/08]
T07vakobhau:12492: yathāntarāparinirvāyiṇa evaṃ yavadūrdhvasrotasa ityabhisamasya sarve catvāriṃśadūnāni trayodaśasahasrāpyanāgāmināṃ bhavanti / [364/10]
T07vakobhau:12495: sa khalvayamanāgāmī prathamadhyānaikaprakāravairāgyāt prabṛti yāvat bhavāgrāṣṭaprakāraprahāṇādarhattvapratipannako bhavanti / [364/13]
T07vakobhau:12497: navamasyāpi bhāvāgrikasya prakārasya prahāṇāyānantaryamārge so 'rhattvapratipannaka eva / [364/16]
T07vakobhau:12517: yeṣāṃ tu mārgānvayajñānamapyekaikabhūmipratipakṣālambanamiṣṭaṃ teṣāmaṣṭāviṃśatimadhikān prakṣīpyānāgamyasaṃgṛhītā aśītirvajropamā bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:12521: yastvasau bhāvāgriko navamaḥ prakāra ukto yasya vajropamena prahāṇaṃ [365/11]
T07vakobhau:12523: tasya punarnavamasya prakārasya saha kṣayaprāptyā kṣayajñānamutpadyate / [365/12-365/13]
T07vakobhau:12527: utpanne ca punaḥ kṣayajñāne so 'rhattvapratipannakaḥ aśaikṣo bhavatyarhaścārhattvaphalaprāptaḥ / [365/17]
T07vakobhau:12529: ata eva sa paramārtaṃ karaṇārthatvāt sarvasarāgapūjārhattvāccārhanniti siddhaṃ bhavatyanye sapta pūrvoktāḥ pudgalāḥ śaikṣā iti / [365/19]
T07vakobhau:12535: ata eva dvirabhidhānaṃ sūtre “śikṣāyāṃ śikṣate śikṣāyāṃ śikṣata iti śivakatasmācchaikṣa ityucyata” iti / [365/23-365/24]
T07vakobhau:12536: yaḥ śikṣata eva nāpaśikṣate sa śaikṣa ityavadhāraṇaṃ yathā vijñāyeta / [365/24]
T07vakobhau:12550: tadyathā srota āpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakaḥ srota āpannaḥ / [366/03]
T07vakobhau:12557: bhūyaḥkāmavītarāgau tu syātāṃ darśanamārge sakudāgāmyanāgāmiphalapratipannakau na ca srota āpanna sakṛdāgāmināviti / [366/08]
T07vakobhau:12558: dvividho hi bhāvanāmārga ukto laukiko lokottaraśceti / [366/08-366/09]
T07vakobhau:12563: tata ūrdhva laukikābhāvāt svabhūmikasya vā pratipakṣatvāt / [366/12]
T07vakobhau:12566: yo hi kleśo yatra vastunyanuśete na tasya tadvastu oprahāṇāya saṃvartate yasya ca yaḥ pratipakṣo na tatra sa kleśo 'nuśete iti / [366/15]
T07vakobhau:12571: laukikena mārgeṇāryavairāgyaṃ gacchato dvividhā visaṃyogaprāptaya utpadyante laukikyo lokottarāśca / [366/20]
T07vakobhau:12576: yadi hyāryamārgeṇa vairāgyaṃ prāpnuvato laukikī visaṃyogaprāpotirnotpadyate evaṃ
T07vakobhau:12577: sati ya āryamārgeṇākiñcanyāyatanādvītarāgo dhyānaṃ niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati sakṛtsnapūrvamārgatyāgātkevalaphalamārgalābhāccordhvabhūmikleśavisaṃyogenāsamanvāgataḥ syāt / [367/04]
T07vakobhau:12578: tyakte ca tasmin taiḥ kleśaiḥ samanvāgataḥ syāditi / [367/05]
T07vakobhau:12580: asatyāmapi tu tasyāṃ laukikyāṃ visaṃyogaprāptau na taiḥ samanvāgamaḥ syāt / [367/07-367/09]
T07vakobhau:12581: tadyathā bhavāgrādardha prakāravimuktasyāsatyāmapi tu laukikyāṃ tadvisaṃyogaprāptau tyaktāyāmapi cendriyasaṃcāreṇa lokottarāyāṃ na punastaiḥ kleśaiḥ samanvāgamo bhavati / [367/09-367/10]
T07vakobhau:12582: yathā ca pṛthagjanasya prathamadhyānabhūmerurdhvaṃ jātasya kāmāvacarakleśavisaṃyogaprāptityāgānna punastaiḥ samanvāgamo bhavatītyajñāpakametat
T07vakobhau:12586: atha yaḥ sāmantakaṃ niśrityādharabhūmivairāgyaṃ prāpnoti kimasyānantaryamāgavatsarve vimuktimārgāḥ sāmantakādbhavanti / [367/14]
T07vakobhau:12593: tasmin paścimo vimuktimārgaḥ sāmantakādbhavati dhyānādvā maulāt / [367/19]
T07vakobhau:12596: triṣu hi dhyāneṣu sāmantakamaulayorindriyabhedāt kaścinna śaknoti maulaṃ dhyānaṃ praveṣṭum / [368/01]
T07vakobhau:12603: tatra lokottarā ānantaryavimuktimārgāḥ satyālambanatvātsatyākārapravṛttā iti siddham / [368/08]
T07vakobhau:12609: vimuktimārgā uttarāṃ bhūmiṃ śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsarṇataścākārayanti saṃbhavataḥ / [368/14]
T07vakobhau:12622: na cedakopyadharmā bhavati kṣayajñānāt kṣavajñānamevotpadyate aśaikṣī vā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ / [369/03]
T07vakobhau:12634: “śamitā anena bhavanti anekavidhāḥ ṣāpakā akuśalā dharmā vistareṇa yāvajjarāmaraṇīyāstasmācchramaṇa ityucyata” iti sūtre vacanāt / [369/13-369/14]
T07vakobhau:12643: darśanaheyaprahāṇāyāṣṭāvānantryamārgā aṣṭau vimuktimārgā bhāvanāheyaprahāṇāya navasu bhūmiṣu pratyekaṃ nava prakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya tāvanta evānantaryamārgā vimuktimārgāśca / [369/22-370/01]
T07vakobhau:12652: yasyāṃ hi prahāṇamārgāvasthāyāṃ pañca kāraṇāni saṃbhavanti tasyāṃ kia bhagavatā phalaṃ vyavasthāpitam / [370/06]
T07vakobhau:12660: imāni hi pañca kāraṇāni phale phale bhavanti / [370/13-370/14]
T07vakobhau:12661: yadyanāsravo mārgaḥ śrāmaṇyaṃ kathaṃ laukikamārgaprāptaṃ phaladvayaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalaṃ yujyate / [370/15]
T07vakobhau:12662: laukikāoptaṃ tu miśratvānāsravāptiḥ dhṛteḥ phalalm // VAkK_6.53 // [370/16-370/17]
T07vakobhau:12663: na hi tatra laukikamārgaphalamev prahāṇaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā bhavatyanāgāmiphalaṃ vā / [370/17]
T07vakobhau:12667: ata eva hi sūtra uktaṃ “sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ katamat / [370/19-370/20]
T07vakobhau:12668: yattrayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇaṃ rāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca tatutvamiti / [370/20]
T07vakobhau:12679: “eṣa hi bhagavān brahmā ityapi śāntaḥ śītībhūta ityapī“ti sūtrāt / [371/03]
T07vakobhau:12688: samyagvākkarmāntājīvā nābhisthānīyāḥ samādhirnemisthānīya iti darśanamārgo dharmacakramiti / [371/10-371/11]
T07vakobhau:12689: kuta etat āryakauṇḍinyasya tadutpattau “pravarttitaṃ dharmacakrami“ti vacanāt / [371/11-371/12]
T07vakobhau:12692: tat khalu parijñeyaṃ tat khalu parijñātamityete trayaḥ parivartāḥ / [371/13-371/14]
T07vakobhau:12693: ekaikasmiṃśca parivarte cakṣurudapādi jñānaṃ vidyā buddhirudapādi ityete dvādaśākārāḥ / [371/14]
T07vakobhau:12697: ebhiśca parivartairdarśanabhāvanāśaikṣamārgā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ darśatā iti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [371/16-371/17]
T07vakobhau:12698: yadyevaṃ na tarhi darśanamārga eva triparivartto dvādaśākāra iti kathamasau dharmacakraṃ vyavasthāpyate / [371/17-371/18]
T07vakobhau:12699: tasmātsa eva dharmaparyāyo dharmacakraṃ triparirtaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ ca yujyate / [371/18]
T07vakobhau:12714: antyaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalamarhatvaṃ tasya triṣu dhātuṣu prāptiḥ / [372/05-372/06]
T07vakobhau:12719: na ca tena vinā 'sti vītarāgasyānāgāmi phalaprāptirityetat kāraṇam / [372/09]
T07vakobhau:12720: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra darśanamārgo nāsti / [372/10]
T07vakobhau:12723: asaṃvegādiha vidhā tatra niṣṭheti cāgamāt // VAkK_6.55 // [372/12]
T07vakobhau:12724: rūpāvacarā hi pṛthagjanāḥ samāpattimukhasaṅgā duḥkhavedanābhāvācca na saṃvijante / [372/12-372/13]
T07vakobhau:12725: na ca vinā saṃgenāryamārgaḥ śakto labdhum / [372/13]
T07vakobhau:12727: āgamo 'pyayaṃ “pañcānāṃ pudgalānāmiha vidhā tatra niṣṭhā antarāparinirvāyiṇo yāvadūrdhvaṃsrotasa” iti / [372/15]
T07vakobhau:12733: sūtra uktaṃ ṣaḍarhantaḥ parihāṇadharmā cetanādharmā anurakṣaṇā dharmā sthitākampoyaḥ prativedhanābhavyo 'kopyadharmā ceti / [372/21]
T07vakobhau:12737: eṣāṃ ca pañcānāṃ sāmayikī kānta cetovimuktirveditavyā / [373/03-373/04]
T07vakobhau:12749: kālāntarātyantavimuktito vā kopyākopyadharmaṇoḥ samayāsamaye vimuktatvaṃ parihāṇisaṃbhavāsaṃbhavataḥ / [373/13]
T07vakobhau:12752: kiṃ punarete ṣaḍarhanta ādita eva tadgotrā bhavantyatha paścāt / [373/16]
T07vakobhau:12757: tatra parihāṇadharmā yaḥ parihātuṃ bhavyo na cetanādidharmā / [373/20]
T07vakobhau:12760: sthitākampyo yaḥ parihāṇipratyayaṃ balavantamantareṇānurakṣannapi sthātuṃ bhavyo na hātuṃ nāpi vardhayituṃ vinābhiyogena / [374/01]
T07vakobhau:12768: nacāvaśyaṃ varihāṇadharmā parihīyate nāpi yāvat prativedhanābhavyaḥ pratividhyati / [374/05-374/06]
T07vakobhau:12771: yeṣāṃ tvavaśyaṃ parihīyate yāvat pratividhyati teṣāṃ kāmadhātau ṣaṭ rūpārupyadhātvoḥ sthitākampyo 'kopyadharmā ca / [374/08]
T07vakobhau:12777: na hi parihāṇadharmā punaḥ svagotrāt parihīyate / [374/12-374/13]
T07vakobhau:12781: yasya yat prathamagotraṃ sa tasmānna parihīyate /
T07vakobhau:12783: śaikṣastu laukikalokattarābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvāt na parihīyate svagotrāt / [374/16-374/17]
T07vakobhau:12785: yasya ca yat prathamaṃ phalaṃ sa tasmānā parihīyate / [374/18]
T07vakobhau:12788: evaṃ ca kṛtvā parihāṇadharmaṇastrayaḥ prakārā bhavanti / [374/19-374/20]
T07vakobhau:12793: evamanyeṣāṃ trayāṇāmekaikaprakāravṛddhacyā yathākramaṃ pañca ṣaṭ sapta prakārā veditavyāḥ / [374/22-374/23]
T07vakobhau:12794: yasya ca yat prathamaṃ gotraṃ sa parihāya śaikṣobhūtastatraivāvatiṣṭhate nānyasmin / [374/23-374/24]
T07vakobhau:12795: anyathā hi tadgotraviśeṣa labhād vṛddhirevāsya syānna parihāṇiḥ / [374/25]
T07vakobhau:12796: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prathamānām nāsti parihāṇiḥ /
T07vakobhau:12807: bhāvanāheyāstu rāgapratighamānāvidyā rūpādike vastuni kevalaṃ saktyāghātonnatyasaṃprakhyānabhāvena vartanta iti savastukā ucyante / [375/06-375/07]
T07vakobhau:12808: asti ca tacdhrātādimātraṃ yatra teṣāṃ pravṛttayaḥ na tvātmādileśo 'pi / [375/07-375/08]
T07vakobhau:12809: tathā hi bhāvanāheyānāmasti pratiniyataṃ vastumanāpāmanāpalakṣaṇaṃ na tu darśanaheyānāmātmādilakṣaṇam / [375/08-375/09]
T07vakobhau:12811: api khalvāryasyānupanidhyāyataḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣāt kleśa utpadyate nopanidhyāyato rajjvāmiva sarpasaṃjñā / [375/10-375/12]
T07vakobhau:12812: na cānupanidhyāyata ātmadṛṣṭacyādīnāmupapattiryujyate santīrakatvāditi nāsti darśanaheyakleśa prahāṇātparihāṇiḥ / [375/12]
T07vakobhau:12823: tato 'haṃ na kenacit paryāyeṇa parihāṇaṃ vadāmī“ti coktam / [375/19]
T07vakobhau:12828: maulo hi dhyānasamādhiḥ samaye saṃmukhībhāvātsāmayikī cimuktirityucyate / [375/21]
T07vakobhau:12833: yadi cārhattvāt parihaṇisaṃbhavo 'bhaviṣyat kimarthaṃ bhagavānādhicetasikebhya eva dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇimavakṣyat / [375/24-375/25]
T07vakobhau:12843: tau hi yaṃ yameva samāpattiviśeṣamutpādayatastasmānna parihīyete / [376/03-376/04]
T07vakobhau:12844: sthitākampyastu yasminneva guṇe sthitastasmātkevalaṃ na parihīyate na tvanyamutpādayati / [376/04]
T07vakobhau:12845: utpādayati vā tasmāttu kampata ityeva viśeṣo lakṣyate / [376/05-376/07]
T07vakobhau:12847: parihīyamāṇo nirviṇnaḥ śastramādhārayan kāyajīvitanirapekṣatvānmaraṇakāla evārhattvaprāptaḥ parinirvṛttaśca / [376/07]
T07vakobhau:12852: yadi cārhattvaṃ sāmayikī kāntā cetovimuktirabhaviṣyat kimarthaṃ tatraiva daśake 'rhattvasya dvigrahaṇamakariṣyāt / [376/10-376/11]
T07vakobhau:12865: kāmarāgānuśayio 'prahīṇo bhavatyaparijñātaḥ kāmarāgaparyavasthānīyāśca dharmā ābhāsagatā bhavanti tatra cāyoniśo manaskāra” iti / [376/18]
T07vakobhau:12870: yadi tāvadarhatastadrūpaḥ pratipakṣa utpanno yena kleśā atyantamanutpattidharmatāmāpannāḥ kathaṃ punaḥ parihīyate / [376/21]
T07vakobhau:12873: atyantamanayoddhratāyāṃ tadbījadharmatāyāmakṣīṇāsravo vā punaḥ kathamarhanbhavatītyevaṃ yuktiḥ / [376/22-376/23]
T07vakobhau:12875: yatredamuktaṃ “tasya khalu śrutavata āryaśrāvakasyaivaṃ carata evaṃ viharataḥ kadācitkarhicit smṛtisaṃpramoṣādutpadyante pāpakā akuśalā vitarkā” iti / [376/25]
T07vakobhau:12880: yāvattu cāro na supratibaddhastāvadevaṃ carato 'pi śaikṣasyāsti saṃbhavaḥ kleśotpattāviti śaikṣāvasthāmadhikṛtyaivaṃ vacanādadoṣaḥ / [377/05]
T07vakobhau:12883: kiṃ punarime 'rhanta eva ṣaḍgotrā bhavanti athānye 'pi ṣaḍgotrā bhavanti / [377/08]
T07vakobhau:12893: yadidaṃ sūtra uktaṃ “ye tvanena catvāra ādhicaitasikā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārā adhigatāstato
T07vakobhau:12894: 'hamasyānyatamānyatamasmāt parihāṇiṃ vadāmi yā tvanenaikākinā yāvadakopyā cetovimuktiḥ
T07vakobhau:12895: kāyena sākṣātkṛtā tato 'haṃ na kenacit paryāyeṇa parihāṇiṃ vadāmī“ti / [377/16-377/17]
T07vakobhau:12902: antyā śāsturakopyasya madhyā cānyasya tu tridhā // VAkK_6.59 // [378/01]
T07vakobhau:12915: naiva hi kaścitphalāt parihīṇaḥ kālaṃ karoti / [378/07-378/09]
T07vakobhau:12916: “dhandhā bhikṣava āryaśrāvakasya smṛtisaṃpramoṣā atha ca punaḥ kṣipramevāntaṃ parikṣayaṃ sapadi saṃgacchanīti sūtre vacanāt / [378/09]
T07vakobhau:12924: akopyagotre pratividhyamāne pritivedhabhāvanābhavyasya navānantaryamārgā vimuktimārgāśca bhavanti / [378/16]
T07vakobhau:12928: tasya mṛdvindriyagotraṃ bhavatīti nālpena vyāvarttayituṃ śakyate / [378/18-378/19]
T07vakobhau:12940: kaḥ punaḥ katamāṃ bhūmi niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati / [379/08]
T07vakobhau:12948: indriyāṇi hi saṃcaran phalaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ ca mṛdvindriyamārgaṃ tyaktvā tīkṣṇendriyagotrakaṃ phalamārgameva pratilabhate / [379/15-379/16]
T07vakobhau:12953: dvau buddhau śrāvakāḥ sapta navaite navadhendriyāḥ // VAkK_6.62 // [380/01]
T07vakobhau:12956: akopyadharmā ca dvividha uttāpanāgata āditaśca tadgotraḥ akopyabheda eva / [380/02]
T07vakobhau:12960: śraddhānusārī dharmānusārī śraddhādhimukto dṛṣṭioprāptaḥ kāyasākṣī prajñāvimukta ubhayatovimuktaśca / [380/05]
T07vakobhau:12990: indriyagotramārgavairāgyāśrayataḥ paṇḍitāḥ śatasahasraṃ saṃpadyante sahasrāṇi ca saptacatvāriṃśacchatāni cāṣṭau pañcaviśatiśca / [380/22]
T07vakobhau:12998: yaduktaṃ bhagavatā “kleśān prahāyeha hi yastu pañca ahāryadharmā paripūrṇaḥ śaikṣa” iti / [381/07]
T07vakobhau:13008: samāpattita eva samāpattīndriyaśca paripūrṇatvaṃ nāsti vina phalena / [381/14]
T07vakobhau:13011: phalena tvaparipūrṇasyāśaikṣatvameva nāstīti nāsya punaḥ phalena paripūrṇaparipūrṇatvaṃ vyavasthāpyate / [381/16-381/17]
T07vakobhau:13015: vahava ime mārgabhedā uktā laukikalokokttaradarśanabhāvanā 'śaikṣamārgāḥ prayogānantaryavimuktiviśeṣamārgā iti / [381/20]
T07vakobhau:13024: eṣa hi nirvāṇasya panthā etena tadgamanāt / [382/04]
T07vakobhau:13035: caturdhyāneṣu mārgaḥ sukhā pratipadaṅgaparigraha śamathavipaśyanā samatābhyāmayiatnavāhitvāt / [382/13]
T07vakobhau:13037: anyāsvanāgamyadhyānāntarārupyabhūmiṣu mārgo duḥkhā pratidaṅgāparigrahācchamathavipaśyanānyūnatvācca yatnavāhitvāt śamathanyūne hyanāgamyadhyānāntare vipaśyanānyūnā ārupyā iti / [382/16]
T07vakobhau:13040: mṛdvindriyasya sukhā duḥkhā vā pratipaddhandhābhijñā tīkṣṇendriyasya kṣiprābhijñā dhandhābhijñā asyāṃ pratipadi / [382/19]
T07vakobhau:13066: śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ prajñā samādhiḥ prītyupekṣaṇe / [383/10]
T07vakobhau:13073: tāvadvalāni ca nāmagrāhikayā śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñādravyāṇi ca smṛtyupasthānāni
T07vakobhau:13080: tānyetāni pañca dravyāṇi evamete bodhipakṣyā daśa dravyāṇi bhavanti / [383/21]
T07vakobhau:13085: pradhānagrahaṇaṃ sarve gunāḥ prāyogikāstu te // VAkK_6.69 // [384/04]
T07vakobhau:13095: “ṛddhim ca vo bhikṣavo darśayiṣyāmi ṛddhipādāṃśaca yāvadṛddhiḥ katamā / [384/09-384/10]
T07vakobhau:13107: bhāvane darśane caiva sapta vargā yathākramam // VAkK_6.70 // [384/18]
T07vakobhau:13117: tatra dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bodhirvodhyaṅgaṃ ca samyagdṛṣṭirmārgo mārgāṅgaṃ ceti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [384/25-384/26]
T07vakobhau:13120: cetasa upanibaddhāni bhavanti yāvadeva gardhāśritānāṃ smarasaṃkalpānāṃ prativinodanāye“ti sūtre vacanāt / [385/02-385/03]
T07vakobhau:13127: tathā hyuktam “āryāṣṭāṅge khalu mārge bhāvanāparipūri gacchati / [385/07-385/08]
T07vakobhau:13128: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti yāvat sapta bodhyaṅgānī“ti / [385/08-385/10]
T07vakobhau:13129: punaścoktaṃ “yathābhūtavacanārocanamiti bhikṣavaścaturṇāmāryasatyānāmetadadhivacanaṃ yathāgatena mārgeṇa prakramaṇamiti bhikṣo āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasyaitadadhivacanami“ti / [385/10-385/11]
T07vakobhau:13133: kati bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ sāsravā iti katyanāsravā iti / [385/14]
T07vakobhau:13155: ārupyesu samyagvākkarmāntājīvaiḥ prītisaṃkalpābhyāṃ ca varjitā dvātriṃśat / [386/10]
T07vakobhau:13161: duḥkhasamudayanirodhasatyānyabhisamayan dharme cāvetyaprasādamāryakāntāni ca śīlāni pratilabhate / [386/16-386/17]
T07vakobhau:13162: mārgasatyamabhisamayan buddhe tasya ca śrāvakasaṃghe 'vetyaprasādaṃ pratilabhete / [386/17-386/18]
T07vakobhau:13163: yo hi tayoḥ prasādaḥ so 'śaikṣyeṣu buddhakarakeṣu dharmeṣu śaikṣāyāśaikṣeṣu ca saṃghakarakeṣu prasādaḥ / [386/18]
T07vakobhau:13171: buddhadharmasaṃghāvetyaprasādāḥ śraddhāsvabhāvāḥ āryakāntāni ca śīlāni śīlamiti dve dravye bhavataḥ / [387/07]
T07vakobhau:13178: samyaksaṃbuddho vata bhagavān svākhyāto 'sya dharmavinayaḥ supratipanno 'sya śrāvakasaṃgha iti vaidyabhaiṣajyopasthāpakabhūtatvāt / [387/12-387/13]
T07vakobhau:13182: sūtra ukta“maṣṭābhiraṅgai samanvāgataḥ śaikṣo darśabhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato 'śaikṣa” iti / [387/15-387/16]
T07vakobhau:13183: kasmācchaikṣasya samyak vimuktiḥ samyagjñānaṃ ca noktam / [387/17]
T07vakobhau:13188: binā ca vimuktacyā kathaṃ vimuktijñānam vyavasthāpyate / [387/20-387/21]
T07vakobhau:13189: aśaikṣastu sarvakleśabandhanātyantanirmokṣādvimuktitatpratyātmajñānābhyāṃ prabhāvita iti tasyaiva tadvacanaṃ nyāyyam / [388/01]
T07vakobhau:13201: saiva saṃskṛtā vimuktirdve vimuktī sūtra ukte / [388/09-388/10]
T07vakobhau:13205: iha bhikṣavo rāgāccittaṃ viraktaṃ bhavati vimuktaṃ dveṣānmohāccittaṃ viraktaṃ bhavati
T07vakobhau:13206: vimuktamityaparipūrṇasya vā vimuktiskandhasya paripūraye paripūrṇasya cānugrahāya
T07vakobhau:13215: yaiva hi pūrvaṃ bodhiruktā saiveha samyagjñānaṃ veditavyam / [388/18-388/19]
T07vakobhau:13222: vajropame hi samādho sa ca prahīyate / [389/03]
T07vakobhau:13231: nanu cāmuktasyāpi śaikṣasya laukikamutpadyate na tattādṛśam / [389/07]
T07vakobhau:13237: yā cāsaṃskṛtā vimuktiruktā ye ca trayodhātava ucyante prahāṇadhāturviṃrāgadhātunirodhadhāturiti / [389/12]
T07vakobhau:13250: yena vastu nirvidyate virajyate 'pi tena vastunā /
T07vakobhau:13267: tatra vītarāgaḥ satyāni paśyandharmajñānakṣāntibhiḥ kleśānna prajahāti / [390/12-390/13]
T07vakobhau:13269: abhidharmakośabhāṣye mārgapudgalanirdeśo nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptamiti [390/16]
T07vakobhau:13273: kṣāntayaścocyante jñānāni ca samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyagjñānaṃ ca / [391/03]
T07vakobhau:13274: kiṃ punaḥ kṣāntayo na jñānaṃ samyagjñānaṃ ca na dṛṣṭiḥ / [391/04]
T07vakobhau:13277: dṛṣṭayastu tā santiraṇātmakattvāt yathā ca kṣāntayo dṛṣṭirna jñānamevaṃ punaḥ [391/07]
T07vakobhau:13286: eṣā ṣaḍvidhā laukikī prajñādṛṣṭiḥ anyā na dṛṣṭiḥ / [391/15]
T07vakobhau:13311: te eva dharmajñānānvayajñāne satyabhedena punaścatvāri jñānāni bhavanti / [392/14-392/15]
T07vakobhau:13316: ete eva dharmajñānānvayajñāne caturvidhe adṛṣṭisvabhāve kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ cocyate / [392/20]
T07vakobhau:13328: bhūmyakṣapudgalotkrāntam naṣṭājātaṃ na veti tat // VAkK_7.5 // [393/09]
T07vakobhau:13341: tatra paracittajñānena darjñanamārga jñātukāmaḥ prayogaṃ kṛtvā prathamau [393/19-393/20]
T07vakobhau:13344: śrāvako darśanamārgāt paracittajñānena dvau kṣaṇau jānāti / [393/21-393/22]
T07vakobhau:13347: yāvacca sa tatra prayogamāra mate tāvadayaṃ ṣoḍaśacittamanuprāpto bhavatītyantarā na jānāti / [394/01-394/02]
T07vakobhau:13349: prathamau ca dvāvaṣṭamaṃ ca samudayānvayajñānaṃ mṛduprayogatvāt / [394/03]
T07vakobhau:13357: samudayaḥ prahīṇo nirodhaḥ sākṣātakṛto mārgo bhāvita iti jānāti / [394/09-394/10]
T07vakobhau:13358: tadupādāya yat jñānaṃ darśanaṃ vidyā buddhirbodhiḥ prajñā āloko 'bhisamayamidamucyate kṣayajñānam / [394/10-394/11]
T07vakobhau:13360: duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na pounaḥ parijñeyamiti jānāti yāvat mārgo bhāvito na punarbhāvayitavya iti / [394/12]
T07vakobhau:13369: ityetāni daśa jñānāni bhavanti yaduta dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayañṇyānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānaṃ paracittajñānaṃ kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ ca / [394/18-394/19]
T07vakobhau:13384: kasmāt punaretāni vīṇi santi daśa vyavasthāpyante / [395/01-395/02]
T07vakobhau:13396: na hi tena caittā na jñāyate / [395/07]
T07vakobhau:13414: duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārga jñānāni svaiḥ svaiḥ satyākāraiḥ pravartanta ityekaikaṃ caturākāraṃ bhavanti / [396/03]
T07vakobhau:13420: sāsravaṃ paracittajñānaṃ jñeyānāṃ cittacaittānāṃ yat svalakṣaṇam tadākārayati / [396/08]
T07vakobhau:13424: yadā cittaṃ gṛhlāti na tadā cittānāṃ yadā vedanāṃ na tadā saṃjñāmityevamādi / [396/11-396/12]
T07vakobhau:13425: yattarhi bhagavatīktam “sarāgaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātī“tyevamādi / [396/12]
T07vakobhau:13430: tatra sarāgaṃ saṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ dvābhyāṃ sarāgaṃ tato 'nyatsāsravaṃ saṃyogasarāgatayā sarāgam / [396/14-396/15]
T07vakobhau:13431: atra tu sūtre rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ sarāgaṃ rāgapratipakṣī vigatarāgamityeke / [396/15-396/16]
T07vakobhau:13432: yadi hi rāgeṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgaṃ syādanyakleśasamprayuktamapi syāt / [396/16-396/17]
T07vakobhau:13433: evaṃ tarhi tadapratipakṣaḥ sāsravaṃ cittamakliṣṭaṃ naiva sarāgaṃ na vigatarāgaṃ syādityevamādi / [396/17-396/18]
T07vakobhau:13440: tadeva hi cittaṃ saṃkṣiptavikṣiptaṃ syāt kliṣṭamiddhasaṃprayīgāt / [396/22]
T07vakobhau:13443: tajjñānaṃ catvāri jñānāni dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ mārgajñānami“ti / [396/24]
T07vakobhau:13453: kliṣṭaṃ tajjātīyānāgatabhāvanā 'bhāvānna mahāparivāraṃ tribhiśca skandhaiḥ sānuparivartam / [397/04-397/05]
T07vakobhau:13454: kuśalaṃ tu mahāparivāraṃ caturbhiśca skandhaiḥ sānuparivartam / [397/05-397/06]
T07vakobhau:13456: ekayā hi duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntyā daśānuśayātyantasamudghātaḥ kriyate / [397/07]
T07vakobhau:13464: bhāvitaṃ kuśalaṃ tābhyāṃ bhāvitatvāt vimuktaṃ kliṣṭaṃ svabhāvasaṃtānavimuktibhyāmavimuktatvāt / [397/12]
T07vakobhau:13467: eṣāṃ ca padānāṃ nārthaviśeṣa ukto bhavati / [397/13-397/14]
T07vakobhau:13469: yaccittam styānamiddhasahagatamadhyātmaṃ saṃnirodhasahagataṃ no tu vipaśyanayā samanvāgatam / [397/15-397/16]
T07vakobhau:13472: nanu coktaṃ tadeva cittaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ syādvikṣiptaṃ ceti / [397/17-397/18]
T07vakobhau:13480: ityapyetat kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ līnamiti vistaraḥ / [397/23-397/24]
T07vakobhau:13483: yadi ca sūtre tadeva līnaṃ cittaṃ tadevoddhatamityabhipretaṃ syāt idaṃ noktaṃ syāt / [397/25-397/27]
T07vakobhau:13484: “yasminsamaye līnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati layābhirśaṅka vā akālastasminsamaye prasrabdhisamādhyupekṣāsaṃvodhyaṅgānāṃ bhāvanāyāḥ / [397/27-397/28]
T07vakobhau:13485: yasminsagaye uddhātaṃ cittaṃ bhavati auddhatyābhiśaṅki vā akālastasminsamaye dharmavicayavīryaprītisaṃvodhyaṅgānāṃ bhāvanāyā” iti / [397/28-398/01]
T07vakobhau:13487: manasikaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ bhāvaneṣṭā na saṃmukhībhāva ityadoṣa eṣaḥ / [398/01-398/02]
T07vakobhau:13490: tayostu sahabhāvāttadeva cittaṃ līnaṃ tadevoddhatamiti brūmaḥ / [398/03]
T07vakobhau:13503: na ca paracittajñānaṃ prāptyālambanaṃ nāpi taccittālambanaṃ rāgālambanam / [398/09-398/10]
T07vakobhau:13506: rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ sarāgamasaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgamiti sūtrābhigrāyo dṛśyate / [398/11-398/12]
T07vakobhau:13507: yat tūktaṃ “vigatarāgamasya taccittaṃ bhavati vigatadveṣaṃ vigatamohamanāvarttikadharmi kāmabhave rūpabhave ārupyabhave” iti / [398/13]
T07vakobhau:13509: nanu coktam anyakleśasaṃprayuktamapi cittaṃ rāgaviprayuktatvādvigatarāgaṃ syādi“ti / [398/14]
T07vakobhau:13516: na gṛhlāti ākāralambananirapekṣaṃṃ hi tadraktamidaṃ cittamiti jānāti natvamuṣmin rupe raktamiti jānāti / [398/19-398/20]
T07vakobhau:13517: anyathā hi tadrūpālambanamapi syāt tadālambanaṃ ca paracittaṃ gṛhlataḥ svabhāvagrahaṇaṃ prāpnuyāt / [398/20-398/22]
T07vakobhau:13518: sarvaṃ ca paracittajñānaṃ dravyasvalakṣaṇacittacaittapratyutpannaparasaṃtatikāmarūpapratisaṃyuktāpratisaṃyuktaviṣayaṃ darśanamārgapratiṣiddhaṃ bhāvanāmārga upalabhyate / [398/22-398/23]
T07vakobhau:13519: śūnyatā 'nimittasamādhi viprayuktaṃ kṣayānutpādajñānāsaṃgṛhītamānantaryamārga pratiṣiddhaṃ ca vedittavyam / [398/23]
T07vakobhau:13522: kṣayānutpādajñāne śeṣe te caturdaśākāre śūnyānātmakārau varjayitvā / [399/02-399/04]
T07vakobhau:13523: pāramārthikayorapi saṃvṛtibhajanāt śīṇā me jātirnāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāmīti tadvalānuvyavahārataḥ / [399/05]
T07vakobhau:13534: anityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ hetutaḥ samudayataḥ prabhavataḥ pratyayataḥ / [399/11-399/12]
T07vakobhau:13537: nāsyāyamartho yadastyetatsthānamastyetadvastvityevaṃ vijānīyāditi api tvastyetat sthānamastyetadvastu yadanityādito vijānīyāditi cet / [399/14]
T07vakobhau:13543: ātmata ātmīyata ucchedataḥ śāśvatataḥ ahetuto 'kriyāto 'pavādato 'grataḥ śreṣṭhato viśiṣṭataḥ paramataḥ śuddhito muktito nairyāṇikataḥ kāṅkṣāto vimatito vicikitsātaḥ / [399/18-399/19]
T07vakobhau:13549: kiṃ punarime ṣoḍaśākārā nāmata āhosvit dravyataḥ / [399/21-399/22]
T07vakobhau:13609: kṣetrādivaśena hi phalasya gandharasavīryavipākaprabhāvabhedā bhavanti caturthaḥ prabhavastataḥ eva tatsaṃbhavāt phalasyeva puṣpāvasānamiti
T07vakobhau:13611: tṛṣṇāvicaritānāṃ dvau pañcakau dvau catuṣkau catvāraśchandāḥ / [401/01-401/02]
T07vakobhau:13612: “asmīti bhikṣavaḥ sāti itthamasmīti bhavati evamasmīti bhavati anyathā 'smīti sadasmīti asadasmīti / [401/02-401/03]
T07vakobhau:13613: bhaviṣyāmītyasya bhavati na bhaviṣyāmi itthaṃ bhaviṣyāmi evaṃ bhaviṣyāmi evaṃ bhaviṣyāmi śranyathā bhaviṣyāmi / [401/04-401/05]
T07vakobhau:13614: syāmityasya bhavati itthaṃ syām evaṃ syām anyathā syām apitu syām apītthaṃ syām apyevaṃ syām apyanyathā syāmityasya bhavati / [401/06]
T07vakobhau:13617: “iti hi bhikṣavo duḥkhāḥ saṃskārāḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇami“ti vacanāta / [401/07]
T07vakobhau:13624: “eṣa mārgo hi nāstyanyo darśanasya viśuddhaya” iti [401/11]
T07vakobhau:13631: punaḥ punaḥ parihāṇito nātyantiko mokṣa iti dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ niḥsaraṇākāraḥ / [401/16-401/17]
T07vakobhau:13632: nāsti mārgaḥ kumārgo 'yamanyo mārgaḥ punarāvartī mārga iti dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ mārganyāyapratipannairyāṇikākārā iti / [401/18]
T07vakobhau:13635: evaṃ tarhi prajñā sākārā na bhaviṣyati /
T07vakobhau:13643: prajñā cānye ca sarve sālambanā dharmā ākārayanti / [402/02]
T07vakobhau:13646: tadevaṃ kṛtvā siddhaṃ bhavati prajñā ākāraścākārayati cākāryante ca / [402/04-402/05]
T07vakobhau:13659: anvayajñānaṃ tāsveva ca ṣaṭsu bhūmiṣvārupyatraye ca / [402/16]
T07vakobhau:13662: bhedena punrdharmajñānasaṃgṛhītāni ṣaṭsu anvayajñāna saṃgṛhītāni navasu / [402/19]
T07vakobhau:13698: traidhātu kāmalā dharmā akṛtāśca dvidhā dvidhā / [404/13]
T07vakobhau:13703: ime daśa dharmāḥ kathaṃ yojyāḥ kasya jñānasya katyālambanamiti / [404/15-404/16]
T07vakobhau:13704: tatra saṃvṛtijñānasya sarve daśa dharmā ālambanam / [404/16]
T07vakobhau:13720: saṃvṛtijñānaṃ svasmātkalāpādanyān sarvadharmānanātvato jānīyāt sarvadharmā anātmāna iti / [405/03]
T07vakobhau:13724: tacca kāmāvacaraṃ śrutacintāmayaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ śrutamayam bhāvanāmayam / [405/05-405/06]
T07vakobhau:13739: ataḥ paraṃ caturṣu kṣaṇeṣu ekaikajñānavṛddhirasya jñātavyā / [405/14-405/15]
T07vakobhau:13741: samudayanirodhamārgadharmajñāneṣu samudayanirodhamārgajñānāni vardhanta iti mārgadharmajñāne saptabhirjñānaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati / [405/16-405/17]
T07vakobhau:13746: darśanamārge yadyadevotpadyate kṣāntirjñānaṃ vā tajjātīyamanāgataṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati tadākārā eva catvāraḥ / [406/02-406/03]
T07vakobhau:13749: tatraiva darśanamārge saṃvṛtijñānaṃ cāpi bhāvyate triṣu duḥkhasamudayanirodhānvayajñāneṣu / [406/06]
T07vakobhau:13756: kṛtsnaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ śakyate parijñātuṃ samudayaḥ prahātuṃ nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartu na tu mārgaḥ śakyate kṛtsno bhāvayitum ityabhisamayāntābhāvānna tasminnābhisamayāntikaṃ bhāvyate / [406/12-406/13]
T07vakobhau:13757: samudayo 'pi na tadā sarvaḥ prahīṇo bhavatīti na syādābhisamayāntikam / [406/13]
T07vakobhau:13760: mārgastaddarśanaheyapratipakṣo na sarvaḥ śakyate bhāvayituṃ vahugotratvāt ityasti mahānviśeṣaḥ / [406/15]
T07vakobhau:13767: alabdhalābhāt kathamidānīṃ tatpratilabdhaṃ yadi naiva saṃmukhīkartu śakyate / [406/20]
T07vakobhau:13771: evaṃ tu sidhyati yad āhuḥ pūrvācāryāḥ / [406/22]
T07vakobhau:13773: lokottaramārga-sāmarthyāt saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate yad vyutthitaḥ satyālambanam viśiṣṭataraṃ laukikaṃ jñānaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti / [406/24-407/01]
T07vakobhau:13774: eṣa eva ca tasya lābho yat-tat-saṃmukhībhāva-samarthāśrayalābhaḥ / [407/01]
T07vakobhau:13775: gotre hi labdhe labdhaṃ gautrikaṃ bhavati /
T07vakobhau:13780: yadbhūmiko darśanamārgo bhavati tadbhūmikam cāvarabhūmikaṃ ca saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate / [407/05]
T07vakobhau:13783: evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānabhūmike darśanamārge saptabhūmikaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāṣyate / [407/07]
T07vakobhau:13786: nirodhe 'bhisamite yat saṃvṛtijñānaṃ tadantyaṃ smṛtyupasthānaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānam / [407/09-407/10]
T07vakobhau:13787: ekasya parisaṃkhyānātsiddhaṃ bhavati śeṣaṃ catvāri smṛtyupasthānānīti / [407/10-407/11]
T07vakobhau:13798: avītarāgasya ṣoḍaśe mārgānvayajñānakṣaṇe dve jñāne pratyutpanne / [407/20]
T07vakobhau:13805: ṣoḍaśāt kṣaṇādurdhvaṃ bhāvanāmārge yāvanna vītarāgo bhavati tāvat sarveṣu prayogāntaryavimuktiviśeṣamārgeṣu sapta jñānāni bhāvyante / [408/05-408/06]
T07vakobhau:13813: tāsāṃ jayaḥ vairāgyaṃ tasmin saptabhūmike vairāgye pañcasu cābhijñāsu akopyaprativedhe
T07vakobhau:13814: ca vyavakīrṇabhāvite ca dhyāne śaikṣasya yāvantaḥ ānantaryamārgāsteṣvapi sarveṣu
T07vakobhau:13821: saptabhūmivairāgyādapi cordhvaṃbhavāgravairāgye vimuktimārgeṣvaṣṭāsu saptaiva jñānāni bhāvyante / [408/17-408/18]
T07vakobhau:13827: śaikṣasyendriyottāpanāyāṃ vimuktimārge sarāgasya ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāvanā dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānānāṃ vitarāgasya saptānāṃ paracittajñānaṃ prakṣipya / [408/23]
T07vakobhau:13832: vītarāgasyāvītarāgasya vā śaikṣasyendriyottāpanāyāmānantaryamārge ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāvanā pūrvavat / [409/03]
T07vakobhau:13845: yastvakopyadharmā bhavati tasya daśānāṃ jñānānāṃ bhāvanā / [409/12-409/13]
T07vakobhau:13848: yo 'pyakopyatāṃ saṃcarati tasyāpyantye vimuktimārge daśānāṃ bhāvanā / [409/16]
T07vakobhau:13851: kāmavairāgye navamo vimuktimārgaḥ saptabhūmivairāgyābhijñāvyavakīrṇabhāviteṣu vimuktimārgaḥ akopyaprativedho 'ṣṭau vimuktimārgāḥ sarve ca vītarāgasya prayogaviśeṣamārgāḥ / [409/19]
T07vakobhau:13855: aśaikṣasya punarabhijñādiprayogavimuktaviśeṣamārgeṣu nava jñānāni daśa vā / [409/21-409/23]
T07vakobhau:13863: saṃvṛtijñānaṃ tāvadyadbhūmiko mārgo yāṃ ca prathamato bhūmi labhate tadbhūmikamanāgataṃ bhāvyate / [410/04-410/05]
T07vakobhau:13864: anāsravaṃ tu na kevalaṃ yadbhūmiko mārgaḥ / [410/05]
T07vakobhau:13867: yadbhūmivairāgyāyāpi hi dvividho 'pi mārgo bhavati prayogamārgādiḥ yāṃ ca bhūmi labhate vairāgyatastdbhūmikānyadhobhūmikāni cānāsravāṇi jñānāni bhāvanāṃ gacchanti / [410/10]
T07vakobhau:13869: kṣayajñāne tu sarvabhūmikāḥ sāsravā api guṇāḥ kṣayajñānalābhikā bhāvanāṃ gacchanti a4ubhānāpānasmṛtismṛtyupasthānāpramāṇavimokṣādayaḥ rajjucchedāducchvasantīva peḍāsādharmyeṇa / [410/13-410/14]
T07vakobhau:13876: kiṃ khalu pratilambha eva bhāvanā netyucyate /
T07vakobhau:13889: “ṣaḍigānīndriyāṇi sudāntāni yāvatsubhāvitāni tathā santyasminkāye kleśā” iti vistaraḥ / [411/06-411/07]
T07vakobhau:13893: ye buddhasyaiva bhagavataḥ kṣayajñāne bhāvanāṃ gacchanti nānyasya /
T07vakobhau:13895: daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni mahākaruṇā ca / [411/11-411/12]
T07vakobhau:13920: atha kṣīṇasravasaṃtāne jñānamāsravakṣayajñānaṃ tato daśa jñānāni / [412/10]
T07vakobhau:13936: yasmādasya sarvatra jñeye jñānabhavyāhataṃ vartate tasmādvalam / [412/19-412/20]
T07vakobhau:13939: sthaviraśāriputreṇa pravrajyāpekṣapuruṣapratyākhyānaṃ śyenopadrutasya pakṣiṇa upapattyādīparyantājñānaṃ cātrodāharaṇam / [413/02-413/03]
T07vakobhau:13953: prākṛtagandhahastimahānagnapraskandināṃ daśāttaravṛddhacyārdhanārāyaṇaṃ balaṃ tat dviguṇaṃ nārāyaṇa mityapare / [413/15-413/16]
T07vakobhau:13956: taccatatkāyikaṃ balaṃ sarvasyaiva spraṣṭavyāyatanasvabhāvaṃ mahābhūtaviśeṣa eva / [413/19]
T07vakobhau:13964: yathā sthānāsthānajñānabalamevaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhasya vata me sate ityetadvaiśāradyaṃ veditavyam / [414/04]
T07vakobhau:13965: yathāsravakṣayajñānabalamevaṃ kṣīṇāsravasya vata me sata ityetadvaiśāradyam / [414/05-414/06]
T07vakobhau:13966: yathā karmasvakajñānavalamevaṃ ye vā punarmayā śrāvakāṇāmantarāyikā dharmā ādhyātā ityetadvaiśāradyam / [414/06-414/07]
T07vakobhau:13967: yathā sarvatragāminī pratipajjñānaṃ valamevaṃ yo va punarmayā śrāvakāṇāṃ niryāṇāya mārga ādhyāta ityetadvaiśāradyaṃ veditavyam / [414/07-414/08]
T07vakobhau:13977: yadā śrāvakasyāpi śuśrūṣamāṇāśuśrūpamāṇobhayeṣvānandī na bhavatyāghāto vā / [414/14]
T07vakobhau:13980: athavā yasya śrāvakāstasya cacchūśrūṣamāṇāśuśrūṣamāṇobhayeṣu saumanasyādyavakāśaḥ sutarāṃ na tathā 'nyasyeti tasyaiva tānutpādādāścarya vyavasthāpyate nānyasyeti / [414/17]
T07vakobhau:13985: anyathā hi na sarvasattvālambanā sidhyet na ca triduḥkhatākārā / [414/20]
T07vakobhau:14005: kiṃ punaḥ sarve buddhāḥ sarvaprakārasāmānyā bhavanti /
T07vakobhau:14013: etāmeva ca trividhāṃ saṃpadaṃ manasikurvāṇena viduṣā śakyaṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike tīvraprema gauravaṃ cotpādayituṃ yaduta hetusaṃpadaṃ phalasaṃpadamupakārasaṃpadaṃ ca / [415/19]
T07vakobhau:14023: sarvakleśaprahāṇam atyantaprahāṇaṃ savāsanaprahāṇaṃ sarvasamādhisamāpattyāvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ ca caturvidhā prabhāvasaṃpat / [416/02-416/04]
T07vakobhau:14029: tacca punarbuddhā eva sakalaṃ jñātuṃ baktuṃ ca samarthāḥ yadyanekāsaṃkhyeyaṃ kalpaṃ jīvitamadhitiṣṭheyuḥ / [416/08]
T07vakobhau:14031: atha capunarbālāḥ svaguṇadāridracyahatādhimokṣāḥ śruṇvanto 'pi tāṃ tādṛśīṃ guṇasamṛddhiṃ buddhaṃ ca nādriyante tasya ca dharmam / [416/10-416/11]
T07vakobhau:14032: paṇḍitāstu punarmajjābhirapi taṃ bhagavantamabhiprapadyante tasya ca dharmam / [416/11-416/13]
T07vakobhau:14033: te he śraddhāmātrakeṇāpyekāntikenābhiprasannā aniyatavipākānāṃ pāpānāṃ rāśīnabhibhūya daivīṃ mānuṣīṃ ca śriyamabhibhūya nirvāṇaparāyaṇāḥ saṃvartante
T07vakobhau:14046: tatrāraṇā nāma kaścidevārhan kleśaprabhavaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ viditvātmānaṃ ca dakṣiṇīyaviśeṣaṃ
T07vakobhau:14047: pareṣāṃ tadālambanaṃ kleśotpādaṃ parihartukāmastādṛśaṃ jñānamutpādayati bhena pareṣāṃ
T07vakobhau:14049: na kasyacittadālambano rāga utpadyate dveṣo māno vā / [417/05]
T07vakobhau:14058: anyo hi svasaṃtānādapi kadācit kleśaraṇaṃ parihartu na śaknoti / [417/13]
T07vakobhau:14062: anāgatāḥ kāmāvacarāḥ savastukāḥ kleśāḥ asyā ālambanaṃ nāpareṣāṃ kleśa udapādītyevaṃ pravṛttatvāt / [417/17-417/18]
T07vakobhau:14063: avastukāstu kleśā na śakyāḥ parihartuṃ sarvatragāṇāṃ sakalasvabhūmyālambanatvāt / [417/18]
T07vakobhau:14066: tadapi hi saṃvṛtijñānaṃ dhyāne 'ntye 'kopyadharmaṇaḥ manuṣyāśrayaṃ ca [418/02]
T07vakobhau:14073: praṇidhipūrvakaṃ jñānaṃ praṇidhijñānaṃ yaddhi praṇidhāya prāntakoṭikaṃ caturtha dhyānaṃ samāpadyate / [418/06]
T07vakobhau:14077: dharmārthayorniruktau ca pratibhāne ca saṃvidaḥ // VAkK_7.37 // [418/09]
T07vakobhau:14093: sarvabhūmikā cāsau kāmadhātau yāvat bhavāgre vāṅmārgayoranyatarālambanāt / [419/04]
T07vakobhau:14101: anye tu dve dharmaniruktipratisavidau saṃvṛtijñānasvabhāve nāmakāyādivāgālambanasvabhāvatvāt / [419/12]
T07vakobhau:14108: “padavyañjane tasyaivarthe tasyaikadvivahustrīpuruṣādyadhivacane tasyāsaktatāyāmavivartyajñānaṃ dharmāvipratisaṃvida” ityata evāsāṃ kramasiddhiḥ
T07vakobhau:14112: āsāṃ ca kila pratisaṃvidāṃ gaṇitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ śabdavaidyā hetuvidyā ca pūrvaprayogo yathākramam / [419/21-420/01]
T07vakobhau:14115: yasya caikā tasyāvaśyaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidī bhavanti / [420/03]
T07vakobhau:14125: niruktipratisaṃvidastadvalena lābho na tu sā caturthadhyānabhūmikā / [420/12]
T07vakobhau:14133: pratilomaṃ punaryāvatkāmāvacaraṃ cittaṃ tataḥ punaranulomaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānamevaṃ sarvabhūmyanulomitam / [420/18-420/19]
T07vakobhau:14175: kīdṛśe 'pi me kāye kīdṛśaṃ cittam bhavaty evaṃ pareṣāmapyābhujataścittajñānādabhiniṣpannā bhavati / [422/07]
T07vakobhau:14177: pūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmartukāmaḥ samanantaraniruddhamanovijñāno nimittamudgṛhya tatsamanantaraprātilomyenāvasthāntarāṇi manasikaroti / [422/09-422/10]
T07vakobhau:14190: yadbhūmikā ṛddhacyabhhijñā bhavati tāṃ bhūmi tayā gacchati / [422/16-422/17]
T07vakobhau:14192: evaṃ divyaśrotrābhijñayā svabhūmikameva śabdaṃ śṛṇotyadharabhūmikaṃ vā nordhvabhūmikam / [422/18]
T07vakobhau:14196: ata evārupyabhumikaṃ cittaṃ cetaḥparyāyapūrvanivāsabhijñābhyāṃ na gṛhlātyurdhvabhūmikatvāt / [422/21]
T07vakobhau:14200: janmāntarābhyastā abhijñā vairāgyato labhyante vaiśeṣikyaḥ prayogataḥ / [422/23-422/24]
T07vakobhau:14211: kathaṃ tarhi “cyutopapādajñānenaiva jānāti amī bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatāḥ” ityevamādi / [423/07-423/08]
T07vakobhau:14240: iṣṭe śaikṣsya nokte tu vidye sāvidyasaṃtateḥ // VAkK_7.46 // [424/07]
T07vakobhau:14254: asti hi ca gāndhārī nāma vidyā yayāphāśena gacchati īkṣaṇikā ca nāma vidyā yayā paracittaṃ jānāti / [424/19-425/01]
T07vakobhau:14255: na tu yathābhūtānuśāsanam anyathā śakyaṃ kartumavybhicāritvāt / [425/01-425/03]
T07vakobhau:14256: pradhānamāvarjanamātraṃ ca tābhyāmanuśāsanaprātihāryeṇa tu hitena iṣṭenaphalena yogo bhavatyupāyopadeśādityevāvaśyam ṛddhirityucyate / [425/04]
T07vakobhau:14265: śarīravāhinī ādhimokṣikī manojavā ca tatra gatiḥ / [425/11]
T07vakobhau:14267: manasa ivāsyā rava iti manojavā gatirbuddhasyaiva nānyasya / [425/12-425/13]
T07vakobhau:14269: ata e“vācintyo buddhānāṃ buddhaviṣaya” ityuktaṃ bhagavatā / [425/14]
T07vakobhau:14287: kāmadhātāvidaṃ caturvidhaṃ nirmāṇamevaṃ rūpadhātau-ityaṣṭavidhaṃ samāsato nirmāṇam / [426/06-426/07]
T07vakobhau:14288: kathaṃ rūpadhātūpapannasya kāmāvacaranirmāṇe gandharasābhyāṃ na samanvāgamo bhavati / [426/07]
T07vakobhau:14300: evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikāni catvāri pañca ca yojyāni / [426/15]
T07vakobhau:14313: nirmāṇacittādapi śuddhakaṃ dhyānaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ cotpadyate nānyat / [427/04-427/05]
T07vakobhau:14314: na hi samādhiphalasthitasvāpraviśya punaḥ samādhiṃ tasmāt vyutthānamasti / [427/05-427/06]
T07vakobhau:14320: kāmadhātuprathamadhyānabhūmiko hi nirmitaḥ svabhūmikenaiva cittena bhāṣyate / [427/11]
T07vakobhau:14326: yadā ca vahavo nirmitā bhavanti tadā yugapat bhāṣante / [427/16]
T07vakobhau:14328: ekasya tūṣṇīṃbhūtasya sarvetūṣṇīṃ bhavanti ta” iti gāthā / [427/18]
T07vakobhau:14329: buddhasya pūrva paścādvā yathecchaṃ nirmitā bhāṣante / [427/18-427/19]
T07vakobhau:14330: yadā bhāṣaṇacittaṃ tadā nirmāṇacittābhāvo nirmāṇacittābhāvānnirmitābhāva iti kathamenaṃ bhāṣayanti / [427/20]
T07vakobhau:14346: jitāyāṃ tvabhijñāyāmekena cittenānekaṃ nirmiṇoti yāvannirmātumiṣṭaṃ bhavati / [428/12-428/13]
T07vakobhau:14351: upapattipratilambhikaṃ tu nirmāṇacittaṃ kuśalākuśalamavyākṛtaṃ bhavati devanāgapiśācādīnām / [428/18-428/19]
T07vakobhau:14356: ṛddhirmantrauṣadhābhyāṃ ca karmajā ceti pañcadhā // VAkK_7.53 // [429/02]
T07vakobhau:14361: kimete divye eva āhosvit divye eva divye / [429/05]
T07vakobhau:14371: nāsti divyaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca tatsabhāgaṃ nityaṃ vijñānasahitatvāt nāpi vikalaṃ kāṇavibrāntābhāvāt / [429/14]
T07vakobhau:14382: sarvābhhisaṃskāreṇa saha śrāvako 'pi dvisāhasra lokadhātuṃ divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati / [430/03]
T07vakobhau:14397: yaccāpi tārkikaṃ paracittajñānaṃ naimittikānāṃ yacca vidyākṛtaṃ tadapi trividhaṃ veditavyam / [430/16]
T07vakobhau:14413: asya svabhāvānāṃ tu kartavya ityādita eva dhyānānyārabhyante sarvaguṇāśrayatvāt / [432/05]
T07vakobhau:14434: evaṃ tarhi cittānyevaikālambanāni samādhirna caitasikaṃ dharmāntaramiti prāpnoti / [433/01]
T07vakobhau:14436: yena tu tānyekāgrāṇi vartante sa dharmaḥ samādhiḥ / [433/01-433/02]
T07vakobhau:14438: nanu ca kṣaṇikatvātsarvaṃ cittamekāgraṃ dvitīyasya tasmādavikṣepa iti cet / [433/03]
T07vakobhau:14440: yata eva ca smādhistata eva cittānāmekālambanatvaṃ kiṃ neṣyate / [433/04-433/05]
T07vakobhau:14444: tathā hyadhicittaṃ śikṣā cittapariśuddhipradhānaṃ ca sūtre catvāri dhyānānyuktānītyapare / [433/08]
T07vakobhau:14455: sa hi śamathavipaśyanābhyāṃ yuganddhavāhitvāddṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāra uktaḥ sukhā ca pratipaditi / [433/12]
T07vakobhau:14462: kīdṛśaṃ punaḥ kuśalamaikāgyraṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ kīdṛśaṃ yāvaccaturtham / [433/15-433/16]
T07vakobhau:14472: vicāravivarjitaṃ prītisukhavat dvitīyaṃ vicāraprītivarjitaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vicāraprītisukhavarjitaṃ caturthamiti / [433/23-433/24]
T07vakobhau:14492: na hi tatra rūpasaṃjñā vibhūtā na vigatetyarthaḥ / [434/13-434/14]
T07vakobhau:14493: yaduktaṃ “catuskandhā” iti sādhyaṃ tāvadetadārupyeṣu rūpaṃ nāstīti / [434/14]
T07vakobhau:14497: yadi kāyavāk saṃvaramātraṃ kathaṃ tadabhāve tatsaṃvarau bhaviṣyataḥ / [434/16]
T07vakobhau:14520: yacca nāmarūpayoranyonyāśritatvamuktaṃ kimidaṃ kāmarūpāvacaraṃ nāma saṃdhāyoktamāhosvitsarvamiti / [435/01-435/02]
T07vakobhau:14521: yacca vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamuktaṃ kimatra sarva vijñānaṃ nāmarūpasya pratyayamuktamāhosvitsarve nāmarūpaṃ vijñānapratyayamiti / [435/03]
T07vakobhau:14523: kimatra sarvaireva tairvinā tatpratiṣedha āhosvit ekenāpīti / [435/04]
T07vakobhau:14526: bāhyasyāpi hyaṣmaṇa āyuṣā binā bhāvo na prāpnoti / [435/05-435/06]
T07vakobhau:14529: “atikramya devān kavaḍīkārā hārabhakṣāni“ti vacanāt prītyāhāravacanāccāprasaṅga iti cet / [435/08-435/09]
T07vakobhau:14533: “arupiṇaḥ santi sattvāḥ sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramādi“ti vacanāt / [435/11]
T07vakobhau:14534: sati hi rupe svaṃ rūpamavaśyaṃ saṃjānīranniti / [435/11-435/12]
T07vakobhau:14542: bhavena bhavasyāniḥsaraṇavacanaṃ tu tenaiva tasyāniḥsaraṇādasarvānatyanta niḥsaraṇācca / [435/16-435/17]
T07vakobhau:14543: dhyānesu coktaṃ bhagavatā “yattatra bhavati rūpagataṃ vā yāvadvijñānagataṃ veti / [435/17-435/18]
T07vakobhau:14544: ārupyeṣu tūktaṃ “yattatra bhavati vedanāgataṃ vā yāvadvijñānagataṃ ve“ti / [435/18-435/19]
T07vakobhau:14545: satyāṃ tesu rūpajātau kasmādrūpagataṃ veti nāvakṣyat / [435/19]
T07vakobhau:14565: anantamākāśamanantaṃ vijñānaṃ nāsti kiñcidityeva manasikurvāṇasteṣu prayujyante yathāsaṃkhyam / [436/06]
T07vakobhau:14569: na hi sā paṭvī saṃjñā na ca punarnaiva saṃjñeti / [436/09-436/10]
T07vakobhau:14570: “yadyapi tatrāpyevaṃ prayujyante saṃjñārogaḥ saṃjñāgaṇdaḥ saṃjñāśalyaḥ āsaṃjñikasaṃmohaḥ etacchāntametatpraṇītaṃ yaduta naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamiti
T07vakobhau:14571: kasmāttu taistadevaṃ gṛhyata ityavaśyamidaṃ vaktavyaṃ jāyate /
T07vakobhau:14574: ityetānyaṣṭau maulāni samāpattidravyāṇi yaduta catvāri dhyānāni catvāra ārupyā iti / [436/14]
T07vakobhau:14596: eṣāṃ ca samāpattidravyāṇāṃ dhyānānyeva bhavanti nārupyāḥ / [437/14]
T07vakobhau:14601: vitarko vicāraḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā cetyetāni pañcāṅgāni samādhiḥ kilāṅgaṃ dhyānaṃ ca / [437/19]
T07vakobhau:14603: yathā caturaṅgā senā evaṃ pañcāṅgaṃ dhyānam / [438/01]
T07vakobhau:14607: tṛtīye pañca tūpekṣā smṛtiḥ prajñā sukhaṃ sthitiḥ / [438/05]
T07vakobhau:14627: ata evocyate yānyaṅgāni prathame dhyāne dvitīye 'pi tānīti catuṣkoṭikam / [438/16-438/917]
T07vakobhau:14638: iha prasrabdhisukhaṃ tatra vedanāsukhamiti kuta etat / [438/23]
T07vakobhau:14645: na cāpi tayoḥ paryāyeṇa dhyāne vṛttiryuktā pañcāṅgavacanāditi / [439/01]
T07vakobhau:14647: nāstyeva caitasikaṃ sukhendriyaṃ triṣvapi hi dhyāneṣu / [439/02]
T07vakobhau:14650: yatsukhavedanīyena sparśena spṛṣṭasyotpadyate kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ sātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatamidamucyate sukhendriyami“ti / [439/04]
T07vakobhau:14653: “sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayata” iti svaśabdena vacanācca / [439/06]
T07vakobhau:14662: “yasminsamaye āryaśrāvakaḥ pravivekajāṃ prītiṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatī“tyatra sūtre prasrabdhisukhayoḥ pṛthagvacanānna prasrabdhireva sukham / [439/11]
T07vakobhau:14668: kāyavijñā nakāle vyutthitaḥ syāditi cet / [439/15] na /
T07vakobhau:14678: cakṣuryāvadeva spraṣṭavyami“tyasya sūtrasya virodhāditi cet / [439/20] na /
T07vakobhau:14680: na cānāsrave kiñcidaṅgaṃ sāsravaṃ kicidanāsravaṃ syāditi cet / [439/21-439/22]
T07vakobhau:14681: ayaugapadyātko doṣaḥ sukhaprītyasamavadhānānna pañcāṅgaṃ syāditi cet / [439/22-439/23]
T07vakobhau:14685: tasmādyānyeva prathamadhyāne pañcāṅgāni teṣāṃ dvitricaturaṅgāpakarṣeṇa dvitīyādidhyānavyavasthānam / [439/25-440/01]
T07vakobhau:14686: ata eva ca prathame dhyāne pañcānāmaṅgatvamuktam / [440/01]
T07vakobhau:14694: naiva tu pūrvācāryā evaṃ nirdiśanti sma yāvantaḥ prajñāntam / [440/04]
T07vakobhau:14698: sormikeva hi nadī vitarkavicārakṣobhitā saṃtatir aprasannā vartate iti / [440/07-440/08]
T07vakobhau:14699: na tarhi sa dravyāntaram iti kathaṃ dravyata ekādaśāṅgāni bhavanti / [440/08]
T07vakobhau:14713: yathecchanti nikāyāntarīyāḥ dharmāntarameva caitasikaṃ prītiḥ saumanasyaṃ tu triṣvapi dhyānesu sukhamiti / [440/15-440/16]
T07vakobhau:14714: na vai sukhaṃ dhyāneṣu saumanasyaṃ yujyate / [440/17]
T07vakobhau:14716: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā aviparītakasūtre tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamuktvā “atrāsyotpannaṃ saumanasyendriyamapariśeṣaṃ nirudhyata iti / [440/19-440/20]
T07vakobhau:14717: caturthe ca dhyāne sukhendriyaṃ nirudhyata” ityuktam / [440/20-440/21]
T07vakobhau:14718: punaścoktaṃ “sukhasya ca prahāṇāt duḥkhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṅgamādi“tyato 'pi na tṛtīye dhyāne saumanasyendriyamasti
T07vakobhau:14720: kiṃ punaḥ kliṣṭeṣvapi dhyāneṣu yathāvihitānyaṅgāni bhavanti / [441/02]
T07vakobhau:14721: na hi kiṃ teṣu na vidyate / [441/03]
T07vakobhau:14737: trīṇi ca dhyānāni señjitāni uktāni bhagavatā / [441/12]
T07vakobhau:14741: vitarkacārau śvāsau ca sukhādi ca catuṣṭayam // VAkK_8.11 // [441/16]
T07vakobhau:14747: taskiṃ yā dhyānasamāpattiṣu vedanāstā eva dhyānopapattiṣu / [441/21]
T07vakobhau:14760: yadi dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu trayo vijñānakāyā na saṃvidyante vitarkavicārau ca katham te paśyanti yāvatspṛśanti katham cāvijñapti samutthāpayanti
T07vakobhau:14766: prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrakāyavijñānaṃ vijñaptisamutthāpakaṃ ca dvitīyādiṣu ca dhyāneṣu saṃmukhīkurvanti / [442/13-442/14]
T07vakobhau:14769: anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca tat prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ vijñānaṃ veditavyaṃ yatte saṃmukhīkurvanti / [442/17]
T07vakobhau:14780: śuddhakena prayogato 'pi nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ śuddhakaṃ pratilabhate parihāṇito vā hānabhāgīyam / [442/24-443/01]
T07vakobhau:14781: ata evocyate “syācchuddhakaṃ dhyānaṃ vairāgyeṇa pratilabheta vairāgyeṇa vijahyāt / [443/01]
T07vakobhau:14793: nanu ca niyāmā vakrāntito 'pyanāsravaṃ prathamato labhate / [443/09]
T07vakobhau:14809: svabhūmike dve ākāśānantyāyatanacaturthadhyānabhūmikāni catvāri ākiñcanyāyatanabhavāgrabhūmikāni trīṇīti / [443/19]
T07vakobhau:14814: śubhagrahaṇena śuddhamanāsravaṃ ca gṛhyate kuśalatvāt anāsravasya samāpatti dravyasyānantaraṃ svabhūmike ca śuddhānāsrave utpadyete / [444/02]
T07vakobhau:14816: vyutkrāntakasamāpattāro hi tṛtīyāt pareṇa laṅghayituṃ notsahante / [444/03-444/04]
T07vakobhau:14820: tathā śuddhāt kliṭaṃ cāpi svabhūmikam // VAkK_8.15 // [444/07]
T07vakobhau:14827: kleśotpīḍito hyadharamapi samāpattiṃ śuddhakaṃ bahu manyate / [444/12-444/13]
T07vakobhau:14831: pūrvāvedhāt pūrvaṃ hi sa evaṅkāmo bhavati varamadhastāt śuddhakaṃ nopariṣṭāt kliṣṭamiti / [444/15]
T07vakobhau:14836: śuddhakāt kliṣṭācca samanantaraṃ svabhūmikameva kliṣṭamutpadyate nānyabhūmikamiti / [444/19]
T07vakobhau:14845: hānabhāgīyaṃ viśeṣabhāgīyaṃ sthitibhāgīyaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyamiti caturvidhaṃ śuddhakam / [445/06]
T07vakobhau:14850: kleśotpattyanuguṇaṃ hānabhāgīyaṃ svabhūmyanuguṇaṃ sthitibhāgīyamūrdhvabhūmyanuguṇaṃ viśeṣabhāgīyamanāsravānuguṇaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyam / [445/10]
T07vakobhau:14853: dve trīṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca hāna bhāgādyanantaram / [445/13]
T07vakobhau:14868: sāsravā aṣṭau bhūmiranulomapratilomasamāpattito nirjitya anāsravāśca sapta / [446/03-446/04]
T07vakobhau:14871: evaṃ punaḥ pratilomaṃ nirjitya anāsravā apyekalaṅghitā anulomapratilomaṃ ca samāpadyate / [446/06]
T07vakobhau:14873: yadā tu prathamātsāsravāt tṛtīyamanāsravaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate tasmātsāsravamākāśānantyāyatanaṃ tasmādanāsravamākiñcanyāyatanam / [446/08]
T07vakobhau:14877: tāṃ ca triṣu dvīpeṣu asamayavimukta evārhannutpādayati / [446/10]
T07vakobhau:14879: dṛṣṭiprāptasya yadyapi tīkṣṇendriyatvāt samādhau vaśitvaṃ na tu niṣkleśaḥ / [446/11-446/12]
T07vakobhau:14880: samayavimukto yadyapi niḥkleśo natvasya samādhau vaśitvamiti / [446/13]
T07vakobhau:14885: bhavāgraṃ bhavāgre ca saṃmukhīkriyate adhaśca yāvatkāmadhātau / [446/17-446/18]
T07vakobhau:14890: nahi tasyādhareṇa samāpattidravyeṇa kiñcit prayojanaṃ vidhīyate / [445/21-446/21]
T07vakobhau:14907: maulānāṃ kuśalārūpyāṇāmadhobhūmikaṃ sāsravaṃ vastu nālambanaṃ svordhvabhūmyālambanatvāt / [447/10]
T07vakobhau:14924: kiṃ tānyapi trividhāni tathaiva ca teṣu vedanā / [447/21]
T07vakobhau:14927: śuddhakāni ca tānyupekṣendriyasaṃprayuktāni ca yantabāhyatvādadhobhūmyudvegānapagamāt vairāgyapathatvācca nāsvādanāsaṃprayuktāni / [448/03]
T07vakobhau:14929: ādyaṃ sāmantakamanāgamyaṃ tacchuddhakaṃ cānāsravaṃ ca yadyapi sāmantakacittena pratisaṃdhibandhaḥ kliṣṭo bhavati / [448/05]
T07vakobhau:14938: ata eva dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu na vyayasthāpyate viśeṣābhāvāditi / [448/11]
T07vakobhau:14949: tāṃ hi dhyānāntarikāṃ bhāvayitvā mahābrahmā bhavati / [448/19-448/20]
T07vakobhau:14950: punaḥ sarvasamādhīn saṃkalayya trayaḥ samādhayaḥ uktāḥ sūtre / [448/20]
T07vakobhau:14954: tatra dhyānāntaraṃ tāvadavitarko vicāramātraḥ samādhhiriti jñāpitam / [449/02]
T07vakobhau:14976: paraiḥ śeṣaiḥ satyākāraiḥ saṃprayuktaḥ samādhipraṇihito daśākāraḥ / [449/17-449/18]
T07vakobhau:14977: anityaduḥkhataddhetubhya udvegāt mārgasya ca kolopamatayā 'vaśyatyājyatvāttadākāraḥ samādhirapraṇihitaḥ / [450/01]
T07vakobhau:14998: na duḥkhato na hetvādito 'nāsravasyātallakṣaṇatvānna mārgākāraiḥ dūṣaṇīyatvāt / [450/17]
T07vakobhau:15019: asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā vahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya saṃvartate” iti vistaraḥ / [451/09]
T07vakobhau:15021: samādhibhāvanā dhyānaṃ śubhamādyaṃ sukhāya hi // VAkK_8.27 // [451/11]
T07vakobhau:15022: kuśalaṃ prathamaṃ śuddhakamanāsravaṃ vā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya samādhibhāvanā / [451/11-451/12]
T07vakobhau:15028: prayogajāḥ sarve guṇāstraidhātukā anāsravāḥ prajñāprabhedāya samādhibhāvanā / [451/18]
T07vakobhau:15030: yaścaturthadhyāne vajropamaḥ samādhiḥ sa āsravakṣayāya samādhibhāvanā / [452/01-452/02]
T07vakobhau:15034: idānīṃ samādhisaṃniśritānāṃ guṇānāṃ nirdeśakāla iti vyākhyāyante [452/05]
T07vakobhau:15060: sukhitā vata sattvā iti manasikurvan maitrīṃ samāpadyate / [453/03-453/05]
T07vakobhau:15061: duḥkhitā vata sattvā iti karuṇāṃ modantāṃ vata sattvā iti muditāṃ sattvā ityeva manasi kurvannupekṣāṃ samāpadyate / [453/05]
T07vakobhau:15063: atadvatāṃ sukhādhimokṣatvāt kathaṃ na viparītatvaṃ bhavati / [453/06]
T07vakobhau:15096: yathā sukhitamātmānaṃ manyate parānvā śṛṇoti buddhabodhisattvāryaśrāvakāṃstathā sattvānāṃ tatsukhamadhimucyate evaṃ sukhitā vata santu sattvā iti / [454/07-454/08]
T07vakobhau:15097: na cecchaknoti kleśasyodbhatavṛttitvāt sa mitrapakṣaṃ tridhā bhittvā 'dhimātre tatsukhamadhimucyate / [454/08-454/09]
T07vakobhau:15099: teṣu cetsamāṃ maitrīṃ labhate tata udāsīnapakṣe / [454/09-454/10]
T07vakobhau:15100: tataḥ śatrūpakṣaṃ tridhā bhittvā mṛdau tat sukhamadhimucyate / [454/10]
T07vakobhau:15102: tataścedadhimātra iva mitrapakṣe sukhādhimokṣo na vyāvartate / [454/11-454/12]
T07vakobhau:15103: tataḥ krameṇa grāmarāṣṭrasukhādhimokṣo yāvadekāṃ diśaṃ yāvatsarva lokaṃ maitryā sphurati / [454/12-454/13]
T07vakobhau:15105: śakyaṃ hi samucchinna kuśalamūle 'pi guṇagrāhiṇā bhavituṃ pratyekabuddhe ca doṣa grāhiṇā pūrvaṃ puṇyāpuṇyaphalasaṃdarśanāt / [454/14-454/16]
T07vakobhau:15106: evaṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyāṃ ca prayujyate amī sattvā bahuvidhavyasanīdhanimagnā apyevaṃ duḥkhādvimucyeran apyevātipramoderannityadhimucyamāna upekṣāṃ tūdāsīnapakṣādārabhate / [454/16-454/17]
T07vakobhau:15111: kiṃ punarya ekenāpramāṇena samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ sarvaiḥ /
T07vakobhau:15119: śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatīti tṛtīyaḥ / [455/03]
T07vakobhau:15139: kuśalāḥ samāhitā eva cārūpyavimokṣākhyāṃ labhante na kliṣṭā nāpyasamāhitāstadyathāmaraṇabhave / [455/17]
T07vakobhau:15151: bhavāgraṃ hi saṃjñā sūkṣmaṃ tat punaḥ sūkṣmataraṃ kṛtvā nirodhaṃ samāpadyante /
T07vakobhau:15154: bhāvāgrikeṇa vā śuddhakena cetasā tato vyutthānaṃ bhavatyākiñcanyāyatana bhūmikena vā sāsraveṇa / [456/08-456/09]
T07vakobhau:15155: tadevaṃ tasyāḥ sāsravaṃ samāpatticittaṃ bhavati sāsravānāntarya tu vyutthānacittamiti / [456/09]
T07vakobhau:15161: ārūpyavimokṣāṇāṃ svabhūmikordhvabhūmikaṃ duḥkhaṃ taddhetunirodhau cālambanaṃ sarvaścānvayajñānapakṣo mārgaḥ / [456/15]
T07vakobhau:15166: aśubhayā līnaṃ saṃtatiṃ pramodayituṃ jijñāsanārthaṃ vā / [456/18]
T07vakobhau:15168: evaṃ ca punastau niṣpannau bhavato yadi śubhato 'pi manasi kurvataḥ kleśo notpadyata iti / [456/20]
T07vakobhau:15176: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī vahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇāni durvarṇāni tāni khalu rūpāṇyabhibhūyajānātyabhibhūya paśyatītyevaṃsaṃjñī bhavatīdaṃ prathamamabhibhvāyatanam / [457/04]
T07vakobhau:15183: yathā prathamo vimokṣa evaṃ dve abhibhvāyatane prathamadvitīye / [457/08]
T07vakobhau:15185: yathā dvitīyo vimokṣa evaṃ dve abhibhvāyatane tṛtīyacaturthe / [457/10]
T07vakobhau:15210: sarvāṇi caitāni vimokṣādīni pṛthagjanāryasāṃtānikāni sthāpayitvā nirodhavimokṣam / [458/11]
T07vakobhau:15217: ārupyavimokṣā ārupyakṛtsne ca traidhātukāśrayāṇi śeṣaṃ manuṣyāśrayameva / [458/18]
T07vakobhau:15226: dhyānānāṃ rūpadhātau tu tābhyāṃ dharmatayāpi ca // VAkK_8.38 // [459/05-459/06]
T07vakobhau:15227: rūpadhātau dhyānotpādanametābhyāṃ hetukarmabalābhyāṃ dharmatayā ca saṃvartanīkāle / [459/06]
T07vakobhau:15233: tatrāgamaḥ sūtravinayābhidharmā adhigamo bodhipakṣyā ityeṣa dvividhaḥ saddharmaḥ / [459/11]
T07vakobhau:15234: dhātārastasya vaktāraḥ pratipattāra eva ca // VAkK_8.39 // [459/12]
T07vakobhau:15237: ato yāvadete sthāsyanti tāvatsaddharma iti veditavyam / [459/13]
T07vakobhau:15241: yo 'yamiha śāstre 'bhidharma uktaḥ kimeṣa eva śāstrābhidharmo deśitaḥ / [459/16-459/19]
T07vakobhau:15243: yaddurgṛhītaṃ tadihāsmadāgaḥ saddharmanītau manayaḥ pramāṇam // VAkK_8.40 // [460/01-460/02]
T07vakobhau:15244: prāyeṇa hi kāśmīravaibhāṣikāṇāṃ nītyādisiddha eṣo 'smābhirabidharma ākhyātaḥ / [460/02]
T07vakobhau:15246: saddharmanītau tu punarbuddhā eva pramāṇaṃ buddhaputrāśca / [460/04-460/07]
T07vakobhau:15247: nimīlite śāstari lokacakṣuṣi kṣayaṃ gate sākṣijane ca bhūyasā /
T07vakobhau:15249: gate 'tha śāntiṃ paramāṃ svayaṃbhuvi svayaṃbhuvaḥ śāsanadhurdhareṣu ca /
T07vakobhau:15250: jagatyanāthe gunaghātibhirmataiḥ niraṅkuśaiḥ svairamihādya caryate // VAkK_8.42 // [460/12-460/13]
T07vakobhau:15263: kathaṃ punaridaṃ gamyate skandhasaṃtāna evedamātmābhidhānaṃ vartate nānyasminnabhidheya iti / [461/06]
T07vakobhau:15265: ye hi dharmāḥ santi teṣāṃ pratyakṣamupalabdhirbhavatyasatyantarāye / [461/07]
T07vakobhau:15270: sati kāraṇe kāraṇāntarasyābhāve kāryasyābhāvo dṛṣṭo bhāve ca punarbhāvistadyathāṅkurasya / [461/09-461/11]
T07vakobhau:15271: satyeva cābhāsaprāpte viṣaye manaskāre ca kāraṇe viṣayagrahaṇasyābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ punaśca bhāvo 'ndhavadhirādīnāmanandhāvadhirādīnāṃ ca / [461/11-461/12]
T07vakobhau:15278: kiṃ cedaṃ dravyata iti kiṃ vā prajñaptitaḥ / [461/16]
T07vakobhau:15294: yadyayamarhtaḥ skandhānāṃ lakṣyate teṣveva pudgalaprajñaptiḥ prāpnoti / [461/23]
T07vakobhau:15302: na hi vinendhanenāgniḥ prajñapyate na cānya indhanādagniḥ śakyate prajñapayituṃ nāpyananyaḥ / [462/02]
T07vakobhau:15305: evaṃ na ca vinā skanvaiḥ pudgalaḥ prajñapyate / [462/03-462/04]
T07vakobhau:15306: na cānyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ śakyate pratijñātuṃ śāśvataprasaṅgāt / [462/04]
T07vakobhau:15311: etadevātra vaktavyaṃ kiṃ dāhyaṃ kok dāhaka iti / [462/07-462/08]
T07vakobhau:15312: loke hi tāvadapradīptaṃ kāṣṭḥādikamindhanamucyate dāhyaṃ ca / [462/08]
T07vakobhau:15314: yacca bhasvaraṃ coṣṇaṃ ca bhṛśaṃ ca tena hi tadidhyate dhyate ca / [462/09]
T07vakobhau:15317: yathā kṣīraṃ pratītya dadhi madhu pratītyaśuktam / [462/11]
T07vakobhau:15320: yadi caiyaṃ pudgalaḥ skandhān pratītyotpadyate sa tebhyo 'nyaścānityaśca prāpnoti / [462/12-462/14]
T07vakobhau:15321: atha punastatraiva kāṣṭhādau pradīpte yadīṣṇyaṃ tadagnistatsahajātāni trīṇi bhūtānīndhanamiṣyante / [462/14]
T07vakobhau:15325: na hi tattasya kāraṇaṃ nāpi tat prajñapteḥ /
T07vakobhau:15328: skandhā apyevaṃ pudgalasyāśrayasahabhūtāḥ prāpnuvantīti vispaṣṭamanyatvaṃ pratijñāyate / [462/18-462/19]
T07vakobhau:15337: atha punaḥ sarvameva tat pradīptaṃ kāṣṭhādikamindhanaṃ cāgniśceṣyate / [462/25]
T07vakobhau:15339: skandhā eva ca pudgalā ityananyatvamanivāryaṃ prāpnoti / [462/26]
T07vakobhau:15341: yathendhanamupādāyāgniḥ prajñapyate evaṃ skadhānupādāya pudgalaḥ iti / [463/01-463/02]
T07vakobhau:15342: yadi cāyamanyaḥ skandhebhyo na vaktavyaḥ “pañcavidhaṃ jñeyamatītānāgataṃ pratyupannamasaṃskṛtamavaktavyami“ti na vaktavyaṃ prāpnoti / [463/02-463/03]
T07vakobhau:15343: naiva hi tadatītādibhyaḥ pañcamaṃ nāpañcamaṃ vaktavyam / [463/03-463/04]
T07vakobhau:15344: yadā ca pudgalaḥ prajñapyate ki tāvatskandhānupalabhya prajñapyate āhosvit pudgalam / [463/04-463/05]
T07vakobhau:15348: pudgala eva hi tasyā upādānaṃ prāpnoti / [463/06-463/07]
T07vakobhau:15349: atha mataṃ satsu skandheṣu pudgala upalabhyate tataḥ skandhānupādāyāsya prajñaptirucyata iti / [463/07-463/08]
T07vakobhau:15350: tadevaṃ rūpasyāpi cakṣurmanaskārālokeṣu satsūpalambhāt tānupādāya prajñaptirbaktavyā / [463/08-463/09]
T07vakobhau:15356: cakṣurvijñeyāni cedrūpāṇi pratītyapudgalaṃ pratibhāvayati cakṣurvijñeyaḥ pudgalo vaktavyaḥ no tu vaktavyo rūpāṇi vāno vā / [463/13-463/14]
T07vakobhau:15357: evaṃ yāvat manovijñeyān ceddharmān pratītya pudgalaṃ prativibhāvayati manovijñeyaḥ pudgalo vaktavyo no tu vaktavyo dharmā vā no vā / [463/14-463/15]
T07vakobhau:15359: cakṣurvijñeyāni cedrūpāṇi pratītya kṣīraṃ vibhāvayatyudakaṃ vā cakṣurvijñeyaṃ kṣīramudakaṃ ceti vaktavyaṃ no tu vaktavyaṃ rūpāṇi vā no vā /
T07vakobhau:15360: evaṃ ghrāṇajihvākāyavijñeyaṃ vaktavyaṃ no tu vaktavyaṃ spraṣṭavyāni vā no vā / [463/18]
T07vakobhau:15362: ato yathā rūpādīnyeva kṣīramudakaṃ vā prajñapyate samastānyevaṃ skandhāḥ pudgala iti siddham / [463/20]
T07vakobhau:15363: yaccocyate cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi pratītya pudgalaṃ prativibhāvayatīti / [463/21]
T07vakobhau:15365: kiṃ tāvadrūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavatiti āhosvidrūpāṇyupalabhamānaḥ pudgalamupalabhata iti / [463/22-463/23]
T07vakobhau:15366: yadi rūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavanti sa ca tebhyo 'nyo na vaktavyaḥ / [463/23-463/24]
T07vakobhau:15372: rūpādabhinnasvabhāvaḥ pudgalaḥ prāpnoti rūpa eva vā tatprajñāptiḥ / [463/27]
T07vakobhau:15373: idaṃ ca rūpamayaṃ pudgalaḥ kathamidaṃ gamyate /
T07vakobhau:15383: yadi cāyamasti no tu vaktavyo rūpāṇi vā to vā / [464/06-464/07]
T07vakobhau:15386: kiṃ tadrūpāṇi pratītyotpadyate āhosvit pudgalamubhayaṃ vā / [464/09]
T07vakobhau:15389: yameva hi viṣayaṃ cakṣurvijñāneṣu pratītyotpadyate vijñānaṃ sa eva tasyālambanapratyayaḥ / [464/11-464/12]
T07vakobhau:15392: sūtre hi nirdhāritaṃ dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpādo bhavatīti / [464/13]
T07vakobhau:15395: yatkiñcit bhikṣo cakṣurvijñānaṃ sarvaṃ taccakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ceti / [464/15]
T07vakobhau:15397: “ye hi hetayo ye pratyayā vijñānasyotpādāya te 'pyanityā” iti sūtre vacanāt / [464/16-464/17]
T07vakobhau:15398: atha pudgalo na tasyālambanaṃ na tarhi tena vijñeyaḥ / [464/18]
T07vakobhau:15404: “yānīmāni brāhmaṇa pañcendriyāṇi nānāgocarāṇi nānāviṣayāṇi svaṃ svaṃ gocaraviṣyaṃ pratyanubhavanti / [464/22]
T07vakobhau:15406: tadyathā cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyam / [464/23-464/24]
T07vakobhau:15407: mana eṣaṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ gocaraviṣayaṃ pratyanubhavati manaścaiṣāṃ pratisaraṇami“ti / [464/24]
T07vakobhau:15411: ṣaḍimānīndriyāṇi nānāgocarāṇi nānāviṣayāṇi svaṃ svaṃ gocaraviṣayamākāṅkṣantī tyuktaṃ ṣaṭprāṇakopame / [464/27]
T07vakobhau:15415: yacca tatkevalaṃ mana ādhipatyādhyākṛtaṃ manovijñānaṃ naivaṃ tadanyeṣāṃ viṣayamākāṅkṣatyato nāstyeṣa doṣaḥ / [465/03-465/06]
T07vakobhau:15416: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā “sarvābhijñeyaṃ vo bhikṣavo dharmaparyāyaṃ deśayiṣyāmī“tyuktvā
T07vakobhau:15418: veditaṃ suḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā yāvat manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayam / [465/06-465/07]
T07vakobhau:15420: ata etāvadevābhijñeyaṃ pratijñeyaṃ cetyavardhāryate na pudgalaḥ / [465/07-465/08]
T07vakobhau:15423: cakṣuṣa ca pudgalaṃ paśyām iti paśyanta paudgalikā anātmanā ātmānaṃ paśyāma iti dṛṣṭisthānamāpannā bhavanti / [465/10]
T07vakobhau:15426: “cakṣuḥpratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sparśasahajātā
T07vakobhau:15427: vedanā saṃjñā cetanā itīme catvāro rupiṇaḥ skandhāśvakṣurindriyaṃ ca rūpametāvanmanuṣyatvamucyate / [465/13-465/14]
T07vakobhau:15428: atreyaṃ saṃjñā sattvo naro manuṣyo mānavaśca poṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pudgalo jīvo janturiti / [465/14-465/15]
T07vakobhau:15429: atreyaṃ pratijñā ahaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyāmīti / [465/15-465/16]
T07vakobhau:15430: atrāyaṃ vyavahāra ityapi sa āyuṣmānevaṃnāmā evañjātya evaṅgotra evamāhāra evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evandīrghāyurevañcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyanta iti / [465/16-465/17]
T07vakobhau:15432: sarva ime dharmāḥ anityāḥ saṃskṛtāśceti tāḥ pratītyasamutpannā iti / [465/18]
T07vakobhau:15436: yadi cāyaṃ pudgalo nāyatanaṃ na sostīti siddham / [465/20-465/21]
T07vakobhau:15438: teṣāmapi caivaṃ paśyato “yāvatā bhikṣo cakṣuryāvatā rūpāṇi vistareṇa etāvatā bhikṣo tathāgataḥ sarvaṃ ca prajñāpayati sarvaprajñaptiṃ ce“ti
T07vakobhau:15439: bimbisārasūtre coktam “ātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatito na tvātrā tmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā duḥkhamidamutpadya mānamutpadyate” iti vistaraḥ / [465/25]
T07vakobhau:15441: “manyase ki nu sattveti māradṛṣṭigataṃ hi te /
T07vakobhau:15444: evaṃ skandhānupādāya saṃvṛtyā sattva ucyate” // iti / [466/05]
T07vakobhau:15447: yathā saṃkliśyate cittaṃ yathā cittaṃ viśudhyati // [466/08-466/09]
T07vakobhau:15449: nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ // [466/10-466/11]
T07vakobhau:15453: na labhyate so 'pi kaścidyo bhāvayati śūnyatāmi“ti / [466/14]
T07vakobhau:15458: śūnyatāyāmasya cittaṃ na praskandati na prasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate na vimucyate / [466/16-466/17]
T07vakobhau:15460: na vaita evaṃ grandhaṃ pramāṇaṃ kurvanti /
T07vakobhau:15464: yadi nikāya eva pramāṇaṃ na tarhi teṣāṃ budhaḥ śāstā / [466/19-466/20]
T07vakobhau:15473: yo hi granthaḥ sarveṣu nikāyāntareṣvāmnāyate na ca sūtraṃ dharmatāṃ vā bādhate so 'smābhirapāṭhānna buddhavacanamiti vacanaṃ kevalaṃ sāhasamātram
T07vakobhau:15474: kiṃ cedamapi teṣāṃ sūtraṃ nāsti “sarvadharmā anātāna” iti / [467/01]
T07vakobhau:15476: naiva hi pudgalo dharma ucyate nāpyanyo dharmāditi / [467/01-467/02]
T07vakobhau:15479: iha caivaṃ vikalpyate “anātmanyāteti saṃjñāviparyāsa ścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsa” iti / [467/04]
T07vakobhau:15480: anātmanyātmeti viparyāso na tvātmani kiṃ ca punaḥ / [467/04-467/05]
T07vakobhau:15481: “nātmā skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ” yattāvaduktaṃ prāk “no tu vaktavyaṃ rūpāṇi vā no ve“ti tattāvadaśocam / [467/05-467/07]
T07vakobhau:15482: uktaṃ ca sūtrāntare “ye kecit bhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti sarve ta imāneva pañcopādānaskandhāni“ti
T07vakobhau:15484: tathoktaṃ “ye kecidanekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmarantaḥ samanusmārṣuḥ samanusmaranti samanusmariṣyanti vā punaḥ sarve ta imāneva opañcopādanaskandhāni“ti
T07vakobhau:15487: yadi tu rūpavantaṃ pudgalaṃ paśyetsatkāyadṛṣṭiprasaṅgaḥ syāt / [467/12]
T07vakobhau:15490: yadyevaṃ tarhi na buddhaḥ sarvajñaḥ prapnoti / [467/14-467/15]
T07vakobhau:15491: na hi kiñcictrittamasti caittā vā yatsarvaṃ jānīyāt / [467/15]
T07vakobhau:15494: evaṃ tarhi cittavināśe pudgalasyāvināśābhyupagamāt nityatvamasyābhyupetaṃ bhavati / [467/16-467/17]
T07vakobhau:15495: naiva ca vayaṃ sarvatra jñānasaṃmukhībhāvād buddhaṃ sarvajñamācakṣmahe / [467/17]
T07vakobhau:15498: yā hyasau buddhākhyā saṃtatistasyā idamasti sāmarthyaṃ yadābhogamātreṇāviparītaṃ jñānamutpadyate yatreṣṭam / [467/19]
T07vakobhau:15504: “ye cābhyatītāḥ saṃbuddhā ye ca buddhā anāgatāḥ /
T07vakobhau:15505: yaśca etarhhi saṃbuddho bahūnāṃ śokanāśana” iti / [468/01]
T07vakobhau:15506: skandhā eva ca traiyadhvikā iṣyante na pudgalā yuṣmābhiḥ / [468/01-468/02]
T07vakobhau:15508: “bhāraṃ ca vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi bhārādānaṃ ca bhāranikṣepaṇaṃ ca bhārahāraṃ ce“ti / [468/03]
T07vakobhau:15510: na hi bhāra eva bhārahāro yuktaḥ / [468/04]
T07vakobhau:15518: “yo 'sāvāyupmānevaṃnāmā yāvadevañcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyantaḥ” sa eṣa yathā vijñāyeta / [468/07-468/08]
T07vakobhau:15519: mānyathā vijñāyi nityo vā avaktavyaṃ veti / [468/08-468/09]
T07vakobhau:15520: skandhā eva ca skandhānāmupadhātāya saṃvartante pūrvakā uttareṣāmiti bhāraṃ ca bhārahāraṃ ca kṛtvoktāḥ / [468/09]
T07vakobhau:15522: asty eva pudgalo yasmād uktaṃ “nāsti sattva upapāduka iti mithyādṛṣṭiḥ” / [468/11]
T07vakobhau:15523: kaścaivam āha nāsti sattva upapāduka iti / [468/11-468/12]
T07vakobhau:15524: sattvastu yathā 'sti tathā vibhakto bhagavateti brūmo mānuṣyakasūtre / [468/12-468/13]
T07vakobhau:15525: tasmād yaḥ paratropapādukasattvākhyaskandhasaṃtānāpavādaṃ karoti tasyaiṣā mithyādṛṣṭir nāsti sattva upapāduka iti / [468/14]
T07vakobhau:15527: athaiṣā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ pudgalāpavādikā satī kiṃprahātavyā bhavet / [468/15]
T07vakobhau:15530: “ekaḥ pudgalo loka utpadyamāna utpadyate” iti vacanāt na skandhā iti cet / [468/17] na /
T07vakobhau:15532: saṃskṛta iti vā pudgalo vaktavya utpatīmattvābhyupagamāt / [468/18-468/19]
T07vakobhau:15533: na sa evamutpadyate yathā skandhā apūrvaprādurbhāvāt / [468/19]
T07vakobhau:15536: yathā yājñiko jāto vaiyākaraṇo jāta ityucyate vidyopādānāt / [468/20-468/21]
T07vakobhau:15539: na pratikṣepāt sūtra eva hi pratikṣiptaṃ bhagavatā paramārthaśūnyatāyām / [468/22-468/23]
T07vakobhau:15541: ya imāṃśca skandhānnikṣipati anyāṃśca skandhān pratisaṃdadhātyanyatra dharmasaṃketāditi / [468/24-468/25]
T07vakobhau:15542: phalgusūtre coktam “upādatta iti phalgu na vadāmīti / [468/25-468/26]
T07vakobhau:15544: kaṃ ca tāvadbhavānyājñikaṃ yāvadvacyā dhita madhimucyate / [469/01]
T07vakobhau:15556: yadi ca skandhānāmapūrvotpādo na pudgalasyeṣyate so 'nyaśca tebhyo nityaśca sphuṭaṃ dīpito bhavati / [469/06]
T07vakobhau:15557: pañca skandhā ekaḥ pudgala iti brūvatā kathamanyatvaṃ nocyate / [469/07]
T07vakobhau:15558: kathaṃ tāvat bhūtāni catvāri rūpaṃ tvekaṃ na ca bhūtebhyyo 'nyadrūpam /
T07vakobhau:15562: tathāpi tu yathā bhūtamātraṃ rūpamevaṃ skandhamātraṃ pudgala ityabhyupetaṃ bhavati / [469/09-469/10]
T07vakobhau:15563: yadi skandhamātraṃ pudgalaḥ kasmāt bhagavatā sa jīvastaccharīrakanyo veti navyākṛtam / [469/10]
T07vakobhau:15566: sa ca kasmiścinnāstīti kathamasyānyatvamananyatvaṃ vā vyākriyatām / [469/12]
T07vakobhau:15571: yadi yadeva pṛccheyaṃ tadeva vyākuryā iti /
T07vakobhau:15576: nanu bhadantaḥ pūrvameva pratijñāṃ kārito nā 'nyadvacyākartavyamiti / [469/17-469/18]
T07vakobhau:15579: ahamapi mahārājaṃ pṛccheyaṃ bahuvollakāśca rājāno bhavanti / [469/19]
T07vakobhau:15580: yadi yadeva pṛccheyaṃ tadeva vyākuryā iti / [469/19-469/20]
T07vakobhau:15582: yaste 'ntaḥpure ābhravṛkṣastasya kimamlāni phalāni āhosvit madhurāṇīti / [469/21]
T07vakobhau:15584: nanu mayā pūrvameva mahārājaḥ pratijñāṃ kārito nānyadvacyākartavyamiti / [469/22]
T07vakobhau:15586: sa āha kathamasato vṛkṣasya phalānāmamlatāṃ madhuratāṃ vā vyākaromīti / [469/23-469/24]
