T07vakobhau:15587: evameva mahārāja sa eva jīvo nāsti kuto 'sya śarīrādanyatāmananyatāṃ vā vyākaromīti / [469/25]
T07vakobhau:15590: sa hi yasyāpi skandhasaṃtānasya jīva ityākhyā tasyāpyabhāvaṃ pratīyāditi mithyādṛṣṭiṃ pātitaḥ syāt / [469/27]
T07vakobhau:15594: yat bhagavatoktam “astyātmetyānanda vatsasagotrāya parivrājakāya praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ nanvakalpaṃ syādvacanāya sarvadharmā anātmāna iti /
T07vakobhau:15595: nāstyātmetyānanda vatsasagotrāya parivrājakāya praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ nanu vatsasagotraḥ
T07vakobhau:15596: parivrājakaḥ pūrvameva saṃmūḍho bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃmohamāpadyeta abhūt me ātmāsa me etarhi nāstīti / [470/05-470/06]
T07vakobhau:15608: jīvākhyā tatra sā na syāt jīvanāstitvadeśanāt // [470/15-470/16]
T07vakobhau:15610: abhavyaḥ śūnyatāṃ boddhuṃ tadānīṃ tādṛśo janaḥ // [470/17-470/18]
T07vakobhau:15611: tathā hyātmāsti nāstīti pṛṣṭo vāstyeva nāvadat /
T07vakobhau:15612: āśayāpekṣāyā praṣṭuḥ sati tvastīti nāha kim // [470/19]
T07vakobhau:15614: yadi hi tāvadātmā loka iṣṭaḥ syāttasyābhāvādayuktaṃ caturdhā vyākaraṇam / [470/20-471/01]
T07vakobhau:15616: śāśvate loke na kasyacit parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt /
T07vakobhau:15617: śāśvate loke na kasyacit parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt / [471/02]
T07vakobhau:15619: ubhayathātve niyamata ekeṣāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt ekeṣāṃ na / [471/03]
T07vakobhau:15621: ato mārgadhīnatvāt parinirvāṇasya caturdhāpi niyamo na vyākriyate nirgrantha4rāvakacaṭakavat / [471/05]
T07vakobhau:15624: tathāhi muktikaḥ parivrājaka eva catuṣkaṃ pṛṣṭvā punaḥ pṛṣṭavān kiṃ nu sarvo loko 'nena mārgeṇa niryātyāhosvidekadeśo lokasye“ti / [471/07-471/09]
T07vakobhau:15625: sthavira ānanda āha “yameva tvaṃ muktika tatprathamato bhagavantaṃ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭavāṃstame vaitarhi pṛcchasyanena paryāyeṇe“ti sarvam / [471/09-471/10]
T07vakobhau:15626: bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maranādityapi catuṣkaḥ praṣṭurāśayāpekṣayā na vyākṛtaḥ / [471/10]
T07vakobhau:15627: sa hi muktvāmānaṃ tathāgataṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭavān / [471/11-471/12]
T07vakobhau:15628: paudgalikastu paryanuyojyaḥ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavān jīvantaṃ pudgalamastīti vyākaroti paraṃ maraṇānna vyākarotīti / [471/12]
T07vakobhau:15630: idaṃ tarhi kasmādvacyākaroti “bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ maitreyānāgate 'dhvani tathāgato 'rhan saṃyaksaṃbuddha” iti / [471/14-471/15]
T07vakobhau:15633: yadi ca bhagavān pūrvaṃ pudgalaṃ dṛṣṭvā parinirvṛtaṃ punaḥ na paśyatyajñānānna vyakarotīti sarvajñatvaṃ śāsturutpāditaṃ bhavati na vā so 'stītyabhyupagantavyam
T07vakobhau:15635: arthatadapi na vaktavyaṃ paśyati vā naveti / [471/18-471/19]
T07vakobhau:15636: evaṃ tarhi idamapi śanaiḥ śanairavaktavyaṃ kriyatāṃ sarvajño vā na vā bhagavānna veti / [471/19-471/20]
T07vakobhau:15637: astyeva pudgalo yasmātsatyataḥ sthitito nāsti me ātmeti dṛṣṭisthānamuktam / [471/20-471/21]
T07vakobhau:15642: “astyātmetyānanda śāśvatāya paraiti nāstyātmetyānandocchedāya paraitī“ti vātsyasūtre vacanāt / [471/24]
T07vakobhau:15643: yadi tarhi pudgalo nāsti ka eṣa saṃsarati / [471/24-471/25]
T07vakobhau:15645: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā “avidyānivaraṇānāṃ sattvanāṃ saṃdhāvatāṃ saṃsaratāmi“ti / [472/01]
T07vakobhau:15649: yathātu kṣaṇiko 'gniḥ saṃtatyā saṃsaratītyucyate tathā sattvākhyaḥ skndhasamudāyastṛṣṇopādānaḥ saṃsaratītyucyate / [472/03-472/05]
T07vakobhau:15650: yadi skandhāmātramidaṃ kasmādāha bhagavān “grahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena sunetro nāma śāstā 'bhūvami“ti / [472/05]
T07vakobhau:15658: yadi cātmā bhavettthāgatā eva suvyaktaṃ paśyeyuḥ / [472/08]
T07vakobhau:15660: “ātmani ca satyātmīyaṃ bhavatī“ti sūtre vacanādātmagrāho 'pyeṣāṃ skandheṣvadhikaṃ pravarteta / [472/09-472/10]
T07vakobhau:15664: atha mataṃ naivātmani pravartate sneha iti / [472/12-472/13]
T07vakobhau:15665: tat ka idānīmeṣa yogo yadanātmanyātmadhimokṣāt sneha utpadyate ātmanyeva tu notpadyate / [472/13-472/14]
T07vakobhau:15666: tasmāt dṛṣṭacyarvudametasmin śāsane utpannaṃ ya eṣa ekeṣāṃ pudgalagrāha ekeṣāṃ sarvanāstitāgrāhaḥ / [472/14-472/15]
T07vakobhau:15667: ye 'pi ca dravyāntaramevātmānaṃ manyante tīrthakārāstepāmeva mokṣābhāvadoṣo niṣkampaḥ / [472/16-472/17]
T07vakobhau:15668: yadi tarhi sarvathāpi nāstyātmā kathaṃ kṣaṇikeṣu citteṣu cirānubhūtasyārthasya smaraṇaṃ bhavati pratyabhijñānaṃ vā / [472/17-472/18]
T07vakobhau:15672: tādṛśo 'pi hyatadanvayaścittaviśeṣo na samarthaḥ tāṃ smṛtiṃ bhavayituṃ tadanvayo 'pi cānyādṛśo na samarthastāṃ smṛtiṃ bhavayitum / [472/21-472/22]
T07vakobhau:15673: labhayathā tu samartha ityevaṃ smṛtirbhavatyanyasyāṃ sāmarthyādarśanāt / [472/22]
T07vakobhau:15675: evaṃ hi devadattacetasā dṛṣṭaṃ yajñadattacetaḥ smaret / [472/23]
T07vakobhau:15677: na hi tayoḥ saṃbandho 'sti akārya kāraṇabhāvādyathaikasaṃtānikayoḥ / [472/24-472/25]
T07vakobhau:15680: saṃtatipariṇatyā yathoktamiti ka evaṃ sati doṣaḥ / [472/26]
T07vakobhau:15689: tato caitrākhyātsaṃtānāttāṃ bhavantīṃ dṛṣṭvocyate caitraḥ smaratīti / [473/02-473/03]
T07vakobhau:15697: kva ca punaḥ smṛtirviniyoktavyā va evaṃ tasyāḥ svāmī mṛgyate / [473/05]
T07vakobhau:15706: hetureva tarhi svāmī prāpnoti phalameva ca svam / [473/09]
T07vakobhau:15707: yasmāddhetorādhipatyaṃ phale phalena ca tadvān heturiti / [473/09-473/10]
T07vakobhau:15709: yaścāpi sa caitrābhidhānaḥ saṃskārasamūhasaṃtāna ekato gṛhītvā gavākhyasvāmītyucyate
T07vakobhau:15710: sa cāpi tasya deśāntaravikārotpattau kāraṇabhāvaṃ cetasi kṛtvā na tu khalu kaścidekaścaitro
T07vakobhau:15713: evaṃ ko vijānāti kasya vijñānamityevamādiṣu vaktavyam / [473/14]
T07vakobhau:15715: yo 'pyāha bhāvasya bhavitrapekṣatvāt sarvo hi bhāvo bhavitāramapekṣate / [473/15-473/16]
T07vakobhau:15716: yathā devadatto gacchatītyatra gatirbhāvo gantāraṃ devadattamapekṣate / [473/16]
T07vakobhau:15723: so 'pi na kaścidekaḥ saṃskārā hi ta evaṃnāmānaḥ / [473/19-473/20]
T07vakobhau:15724: tatra yathā devadatto gacchati yathā vijānāti / [473/20]
T07vakobhau:15726: kṣaṇikā hisaṃskārā abhinnasaṃtānā devadatta iti bālairekasattvapiṇḍagraheṇādhimuktāḥ svasya saṃtānasya deśāntare kāraṇaṃ bhavanta ucyante gacchati devadatta iti / [473/22]
T07vakobhau:15729: ta eva ca punarvijñānasya kāraṇaṃ bhavanta ucyante jānāti devadatta iti / [473/24]
T07vakobhau:15731: yattarhi “vijñānaṃ vijānātī“ti sūtra uktaṃ kiṃ tatra vijñānaṃ karoti / [473/25-473/26]
T07vakobhau:15739: ata eva tadindriyādapyutpannaṃ viṣayaṃ vijānātītyucyate nendriyam / [474/02-474/03]
T07vakobhau:15740: athavā tathā 'trāpi vijñānasaṃtānasya vijñāne kāraṇabhāvādvijñānaṃ vijānātīti vacanānnirdoṣaṃ kāraṇe dartṛśabdanirdeśāt / [474/04]
T07vakobhau:15742: api khalu yathā pradīpo gacchati tathā vijñānaṃ vijānātīti / [474/05]
T07vakobhau:15748: yathā cābhijāyate tiṣṭhati rūpamityatra bhaviturbhāvādanarthantaratvamevaṃ vijñānasyāpi syāt / [474/09-474/10]
T07vakobhau:15749: yadi vijñānādvijñānamutpadyate nātmānaḥ kasmānna nityaṃ tādṛśamevotpadyate na ca kramaniyamenāṅkurakāṇḍapatradivat / [474/10]
T07vakobhau:15751: eṣa hi saṃskṛtasya svabhāvo yadavaśyaṃ prabandhasyānyathātvaṃ bhavati / [474/11-474/13]
T07vakobhau:15752: anyathā hi nikāmadhyānasamāhitānāṃ sadṛśakāyacittotpattau prathamakṣaṇaniṃrviśeṣatvāt paścādapi na syāt svayaṃ vyutthānam / [474/13]
T07vakobhau:15757: yadyathā strīcittānantaraṃ yadi tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittamutpannaṃ bhavati tatpatiputrādicittaṃ
T07vakobhau:15758: vā punaśca paścātsaṃtatipariṇatyā strīcittamutpadyate tat samartha bhavati tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittotpādane
T07vakobhau:15762: atha punaḥ paryāyeṇa strīcittādvahuvidhaṃ cittamutpannaṃ vahutara māsannataraṃ vā tadevotpadyate / [474/19]
T07vakobhau:15765: saiva balīyasī bhāvanā kasmānnityaṃ na phalati / [474/21-474/22]
T07vakobhau:15773: ya eva tvayamekīyastīrthika ātmaprabhavāṃ cittotpattiṃ manyate tasyaivedaṃ sphuṭaṃ codyamāpadyate kasmānna nityaṃ tādṛśamevotpadyate na ca kramaniyamenāṅkurakāṇḍapatrādivaditi
T07vakobhau:15776: saṃyoginostu paricchinnatvādaprāptipūrvikā prāptiḥ samyoga iti lakṣaṇavyākhyānāccātmānaḥ paricchedaprasaṅgaḥ / [475/05-475/06]
T07vakobhau:15780: astu vā saṃyogastathāpi nityamaviśiṣṭe manasi kathaṃ saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ / [475/08]
T07vakobhau:15782: sa eva paricodyate kathaṃ buddhiviśeṣa iti / [475/09]
T07vakobhau:15785: nahi kiñcidātmanaḥ upalabhyate sāmarthmauṣadha kāryasiddhāviva kuhakavaidyaphuḥsvāhānām / [475/11]
T07vakobhau:15790: na hi te citravadarādivadādhārye nāpi sa kuḍacyakuṇḍādivadādhāro yuktaḥ / [475/13-475/14]
T07vakobhau:15797: ko hi sa gandhādibhyo 'nyāṃ pṛthivīṃ nirdhārayati / [475/16-475/17]
T07vakobhau:15799: te hyeva tadākhyā gandhādayo yathā pratīyerannānya iti / [475/18]
T07vakobhau:15803: sa eva valiṣṭhaḥ kasmānnityaṃ na phalati /
T07vakobhau:15807: smṛtyādīnāṃ guṇapadārthatvāt tasya cārthādavaśyaṃ dravyāśritatvāt teṣāṃ cānyāśrayāyogāditi cet / [476/01] na /
T07vakobhau:15815: ahaṃ sukhī syāmahaṃ duḥkhī na syāmityevamarthaḥ / [476/05]
T07vakobhau:15821: gauro 'hamahaṃ śyāmaḥ sthūlo 'hamahaṃ kṛśaḥ jīrṇo 'hamahaṃ yuveti gaurādibuddhibhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇo 'yamahaṅkāro dṛśyate / [476/08]
T07vakobhau:15824: ātmana upakārake 'pi śarīra ātmopacāro yathā ya evāyaṃ sa evāhaṃ sa evāyaṃ me bṛtya iti bhavatyupakārake 'pi ātmopacāro natvahaṅkāraḥ / [476/10-476/11]
T07vakobhau:15827: yenaiva hi sahāsya saṃvandhaḥ kāyena cittena vā yatraivāyamahaṅkāra utpadyate nānvatra / [476/12-476/13]
T07vakobhau:15836: asatyātmani ka eṣa sukhito duḥkhito vā / [476/16-476/17]
T07vakobhau:15842: asatyātmani ka eṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ kartā kaśca phalānāṃ bhoktā bhavati / [476/19-476/20]
T07vakobhau:15848: asti punaḥ kvacideva kārye kasyacit svātantryam / [476/22]
T07vakobhau:15854: tatra kāyakarmaṇi tāvat kāyasya cittaparatantrā vṛttiḥ / [476/25-476/26]
T07vakobhau:15855: cittasyāpi kāye svakāraṇaparatantrā vṛttistasyāpyevamiti nāsti kasyacit svātantryam / [476/26]
T07vakobhau:15859: yattu yasya pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ tattsya kartetyucyate / [477/01]
T07vakobhau:15860: na ca ātmanaḥ kvacidapi kāraṇatvaṃ dṛśyate / [477/01-477/02]
T07vakobhau:15862: smṛtijo hi cchandaḥ cchandajo vitarko vitarkātprayatnaḥ prayatnādvāyustataḥ karmeti kimatrātmā kurute / [477/03-477/04]
T07vakobhau:15863: phalasyāpica ka upabhogo yamayamātmā kurvannupabhoktā kalpyate / [477/04]
T07vakobhau:15867: vedanādyanāśrayatvāt tadāśrayaśca ṣaḍāyatanaṃ nātmā yathā tathoktam / [477/07]
T07vakobhau:15869: ātmanyapi sati kathaṃ vinaṣṭāt karmaṇa āyatyāṃ phalotpattiḥ / [477/08]
T07vakobhau:15873: naiva tu vayaṃ vinaṣṭāt karmaṇa āyatyāṃ phalotpattiṃ brūmaḥ / [477/10]
T07vakobhau:15881: tat punaḥ puṣpānniṣpannaṃ kasmāttasya vījasya phalamityucyate / [477/14]
T07vakobhau:15883: yadi hi tatpūrvikānnabhaviṣyat tattādṛśasya phalasyotopattau na samarthamabhaviṣyat / [477/15-477/16]
T07vakobhau:15888: kā punaḥ saṃtatiḥ kaḥ pariṇāmaḥ ko viśeṣaḥ / [477/18-477/19]
T07vakobhau:15889: yaḥ karmapūrva uttarottaracittapravasaḥ sā saṃtatistasyā anyathotpattiḥ pariṇāmaḥ / [477/19-477/20]
T07vakobhau:15892: trividhakarmapūrvakatve 'pi yatkarma guru vā bhavatyāsannamabhyastaṃ vā yatkṛtaṃ sāmarthyaṃ dyotyate natvanyasya / [477/22]
T07vakobhau:15894: “yat guru yaccāsannaṃ yaccābhyastaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat /
T07vakobhau:15896: tatra vipākahetvāhitaṃ tu vipākaphaladānasāmarthyaṃ vipākaṃ dattvā vinivartate / [477/25-477/26]
T07vakobhau:15900: na tāvat dṛṣṭāntena sarvaṃ samānaṃ bhavati / [478/02]
T07vakobhau:15901: tatrāpi tu na phalādeva punaḥ phalāntaramutpadyate / [478/02-478/03]
T07vakobhau:15904: yo hi tatra bhūtaprakārāṅkuraṃ nirvartayati sa tasya vījaṃ nānyaḥ / [478/04-478/05]
T07vakobhau:15905: bhāvinyā tu saṃjñāyā sādṛśyādvā pūrvako 'pi saṃtāno bījamityākhyāyate / [478/05-478/07]
T07vakobhau:15906: evamihāpi tasmādvipākādyadi sadasaddharmaśravaṇā dipratyayaviśeṣajaḥ kuśalasāsravo 'kuśalo vā cittavikāra utpadyate tasmātpunarvikārāntaramutpadyate nānyatheti samānametat / [478/07]
T07vakobhau:15908: yathā lākṣārasarañjitāt mātuluṅgapuṣpātsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣajaḥ phale raktaḥ keśara upajāyate na ca tasmāt punaranyaḥ evaṃ karmajādvipākāt na punarvipākāntaramiti / [478/09-478/10]
T07vakobhau:15910: nānāvidhaśaktibhinnaistu karmabhiradhivāsitāḥ saṃtataya etāmavasthāṃ gatā īdṛśaṃ phalamabhinivartayantīti buddhānāmeva viṣayaḥ / [478/11]
T07vakobhau:15926: ye dharmahetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
